Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Truly, truly, the grace of God is never without any effect.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: God always answers our prayers; if there is a delay, it is because He has something better in mind for us. Don’t give up- we commit the mistake of giving up too soon thinking that God has forgotten us little realizing that He never forsakes His children. If you feel your prayers have not been answered, then keep praying, increase the intensity of your prayers till He gives you what you want.
Author: Latika Teotia

Quote: We are born to make manifest the glory of God.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We must clean ourselves of any impurity.We must clear our cities of any dirt."For God has not called us to uncleanness, but to holiness." 1 Thessalonians 4:7
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: O God, please give us grace to do the good we must do.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: As a result, they do not live the rest of their earthly lives for evil human desires, but rather for the will of God. I Peter 4:2
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Don’t let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.
Author: Roopleen, Words to inspire the winner in YOU

Quote: Never say anything about yourself you don't want to come true
Author: Brian Tracy

Quote: Just because you're in a situation, doesn't mean you have to be that situation. You're not the situation you're in!
Author: K.M. Johnson, Knowing the Struggle Is Over!

Quote: Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: It is not until you change your identity to match your life blueprint that you will understand why everything in the past never worked.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: The world’s greatest achievers have been those who have always stayed focussed on their goals and have been consistent in their efforts.
Author: Roopleen, Words to inspire the winner in YOU

Quote: [The wives of powerful noblemen] must be highly knowledgeable about government, and wise – in fact, far wiser than most other such women in power. The knowledge of a baroness must be so comprehensive that she can understand everything. Of her a philosopher might have said: "No one is wise who does not know some part of everything." Moreover, she must have the courage of a man. This means that she should not be brought up overmuch among women nor should she be indulged in extensive and feminine pampering. Why do I say that? If barons wish to be honoured as they deserve, they spend very little time in their manors and on their own lands. Going to war, attending their prince's court, and traveling are the three primary duties of such a lord. So the lady, his companion, must represent him at home during his absences. Although her husband is served by bailiffs, provosts, rent collectors, and land governors, she must govern them all. To do this according to her right she must conduct herself with such wisdom that she will be both feared and loved. As we have said before, the best possible fear comes from love. When wronged, her men must be able to turn to her for refuge. She must be so skilled and flexible that in each case she can respond suitably. Therefore, she must be knowledgeable in the mores of her locality and instructed in its usages, rights, and customs. She must be a good speaker, proud when pride is needed; circumspect with the scornful, surly, or rebellious; and charitably gentle and humble toward her good, obedient subjects. With the counsellors of her lord and with the advice of elder wise men, she ought to work directly with her people. No one should ever be able to say of her that she acts merely to have her own way. Again, she should have a man's heart. She must know the laws of arms and all things pertaining to warfare, ever prepared to command her men if there is need of it. She has to know both assault and defence tactics to insure that her fortresses are well defended, if she has any expectation of attack or believes she must initiate military action. Testing her men, she will discover their qualities of courage and determination before overly trusting them. She must know the number and strength of her men to gauge accurately her resources, so that she never will have to trust vain or feeble promises. Calculating what force she is capable of providing before her lord arrives with reinforcements, she also must know the financial resources she could call upon to sustain military action. She should avoid oppressing her men, since this is the surest way to incur their hatred. She can best cultivate their loyalty by speaking boldly and consistently to them, according to her council, not giving one reason today and another tomorrow. Speaking words of good courage to her men-at-arms as well as to her other retainers, she will urge them to loyalty and their best efforts.
Author: Christine de Pizan, The Treasure of the City of Ladies

Quote: No matter how tiny you look, you can lead huge men if you have what the huge men don't have.
Author: Michael Bassey Johnson

Quote: Believe in yourself. Under-confidence leads to a self-fulfilling prophecy that you are not good enough for your work.
Author: Roopleen

Quote: Sometimes we have to soak ourselves in the tears and fears of the past to water our future gardens.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: FOCUS = Follow On Course Until Successful.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Some people today are wandering generalities instead of meaningful specifics because they have failed to discover and mine the wealth of potentials in them.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: The greatest Emotion is Love.The greatest quality is seeking to serve others.The greatest gift is your own Life.The greatest pleasure is CHOCOLATE!The greatest thing you’ll ever learn is that there's always something new to learn.The greatest virtue is temperance.The greatest meditation is a peaceful mind.The greatest practice is to be Kind.education.The greatest challenge is to let go. The greatest wisdom is to be in the NOW
Author: Pablo

Quote: Going down in history is a dead end pursuit
Author: Benny Bellamacina

Quote: We are no longer in the dispensation of age and experience. We are in the era of knowledge and information. Information leads a true leader and a true leader leads others.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: You can'tstop dreamingjust becausethe night neverseems toend.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: True confidence is not about what you take from someone to restore yourself, but what you give back to your critics because they need it more than you do.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Don’t hide what you have just because people tell you it’s not normal. I have known normal people…and guess what? They are as boring as hell...
Author: Sidney Knight

Quote: Confident Assured Posture: Foundation of Powerful Style
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: You are conditioned to believe that if you let go, if you surrender, you will either be a victim of circumstances and not assertive in your own being, or you will be viewed as being lazy, lacking in willpower, and un-motivated.Yet will and power cannot exist alongside one another. Motivation does not come into question when you surrender fully into the present moment. Motivation to do, to take action, to make moves, comes naturally from this surrender.
Author: Kelly    Martin, When Everyone Shines But You - Saying Goodbye To I'm Not Good Enough

Quote: The results of knowledge without application results in nothing at all. Do what you know better to do.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Before this generation lose the wisdom, one advice - read books.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Good...if you've done things you aren't proud of. It means you have a conscience.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: Leadership is all about caring, daring and sharing!Caring for people, Daring to Act fearlessly,& Sharing the success with all!
Author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

Quote: When you practice leadership,The evidence of quality of your leadership, Is known from the type of leaders that emerge out of your leadership
Author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

Quote: Freedom flourishes upon the bedrock of ethics and integrity.
Author: Mollie Marti

Quote: Make your lives a masterpiece, you only get one canvas.
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri, Brushstrokes of a Gadfly

Quote: If it doesn't open, it's not your door
Author: Life Advancer

Quote: Empowered women empower women.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Even on my worst day I'm Kill'n it!
Author: Boss Babe

Quote: If you're sad, add more lipstick and attack!
Author: Coco Chanel

Quote: A true leader should have the power to begin, the eloquence to communicate, the patience to execute and the wisdom to evaluate. Without one, he remains a slave to he who possesses it.
Author: Charbel Tadros

Quote: A leader, without wisdom, is dangerous. A wise person, without leadership, is useless. But if they work together, they are unstoppable.
Author: Charbel Tadros

Quote: We rely on our education, on our judgment and our intuition to make decisions, but sometimes we find ourselves in the most dangerous scenario we can be in as individuals or as team, when we don’t know that we don’t know but we believe we do know.
Author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D., Engineering Success: The True Meaning of Leadership and Team Building

Quote: I call for all religions, cultures, countries, crews, parties and peacemakers to unite for the sake of building a peaceful, united global village for future generations. It starts TODAY. If we stay divided, we will only remain crippled - and we will fall. It is time for everyone to see there is more for us to GAIN through unity and love than hatred and division. Get wise and unite. This is the only way. We need to start fresh with a truly united perspective.
Author: Suzy Kassem

Quote: Happiness keeps you Sweet , Trials keep you Strong, Sorrows keep you Human, Failures keep you Humble, Success keeps you Glowing, But Only faith Keeps You Going! Be Happy Live Simply.
Author: Abhysheq Shukla

Quote: Fail soon so that you can succeed sooner.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Today it is cheaper to start a business than tomorrow.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: I believe there are only three businesses: my business, other people's business, and God's business.
Author: Tobe Hanson, The Four Seasons Way of Life:: Ancient Wisdom for Healing and Personal Growth

Quote: Later that day when I walked down this dried-out riverbed, enjoying the last rays of sunshine on my bare skin, I felt a deep inner peace coming up straight from my heart.
Author: Nina Hrusa

Quote: I believe I will not not die a minute too early or a minute too late, but exactly when I am supposed to.
Author: Tobe Hanson, The Four Seasons Way of Life:: Ancient Wisdom for Healing and Personal Growth

Quote: If you feel anxiety or depression, you are not in the present. You are either anxiously projecting the future or depressed and stuck in the past. The only thing you have any control over is the present moment; simple breathing exercises can make us calm and present instantly.
Author: Tobe Hanson, The Four Seasons Way of Life:: Ancient Wisdom for Healing and Personal Growth

Quote: Suffering introduces a man to his soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Die wertvollste Reise ist die Reise zu unserem Selbst.
Author: Nina Hrusa

Quote: Whatever you experience is what you must feel.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: To a farmer dirt is not a waste, it is wealth.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: If the farmer is rich, then so is the nation.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: I am a scientist, and as such I am proud to say that being stupid at times is a very human thing. Be proud to be stupid, be proud to be fool. Being a fool is a billion times better than being blinded by the illusion of intellect. I admit I am a fool, but at the very least, with each passing day I do my best to get lesser fool.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

Quote: I believe that the best leadership is loud authenticity. That is what the world needs now. We don’t need more plastic, Photoshooped perfection. I don’t want people to look at me and wish they could be me. I want people to look at me and see their own potential. I want people to be more accepting of their own failures, imperfections, and struggles because they watch me accept of my own.
Author: Vironika Tugaleva

Quote: Being a fool is a billion times better than being blinded by the illusion of intellect.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

Quote: A farmer is a magician who produces money from the mud.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: You can't have favour with God and suffer in life. Learn to have God's favour first, and the favour of men will fall in place automatically for you.
Author: WISDOM KWASHIE MENSAH (WKM)

Quote: Life is a continuum of problems to solve and lessons to learn. Once you accept this truth, then the problem you’re facing is no longer a problem but rather an opportunity to learn.
Author: Tobe Hanson, The Four Seasons Way of Life: Ancient Wisdom for Healing and Personal Growth

Quote: Networking isn't how many people you know, it's how many people know you.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: An entrepreneur with strong network makes money even when he is asleep.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A grandmother’s love is selfless all the way to the bones.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: ...the depth or humaneness of our love depends on the wideness of our souls.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Fire and Ice Legend

Quote: ...Unsettling emotions are capable of messing up the most beautiful minds in this world.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Dark Shades

Quote: A man has a hard time feeling fulfilled when he lives a life that does not serve a purpose that is more than himself.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: The basis of love that most people share is the intimacy they developed with their partners, the intensity of their attraction, or the similarity of their thought patterns.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Fire and Ice Legend

Quote: The masses often let themselves down and even those at the forefront who are hoisting the flag of the cause that is intended to alleviate their miseries. However, they do not do so out of wickedness or malice. Often times, they betray their interests out of incomprehension, docility and resignation to the status quo. In a subtle way, the masses often end up collaborating with those oppressing them.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Fire and Ice Legend

Quote: ...The world gets blessed every now and then with unique souls who though burdened by their invisible crosses, still have the extraordinary strength to forge ahead in life and give others a helping hand at the same time. Despite their tribulations, most of us think they are fine. Even when the weight of their crosses become unbearable, even when they proceed in a breathless manner, we still have a hard time understanding that they are drowning. In fact, we even condemn them for failing to sacrifice more...
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: What is the purpose of wealth if it cannot serve an ideal that enhances humanity and betters the lives of the people, even if that means those we have never met before in our lives?
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: A good relationship with our children is the ultimate comfort we have while dying.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: We still need to give our best to life even if we do not understand the purpose of our existence on earth.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: With true love, you can move mountains, make unusual sacrifices, live a life of deprivations and still be happy.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Never allow yourself to be sapped of your extraordinary energy that is the necessary ingredient for creating something new and progressive.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: ... People who are the spices of this world are the natural souls with instincts and impulses that have not been pruned by evolution and civilization.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Most of the truly kind people of this world show some measure of discomfort when offered kindness. Their gratitude stems not only from their understanding of the depth of the force of kindness, but also from their conviction that kindness should not be taken for granted.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: So, you see; you have the soul of a missionary, the heart of a revolutionary and the mind of a reformer. But what are you to yourself and the family and friends who will always be there for you?
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Writers are the most pathetic souls when it comes to expressing their own feelings. Their personalities are as complex as the characters they weave.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Some honest people think it is better to know the ways of the devil without being evil.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: …our recollections bring out our joyful smiles, but hardly make us chortle or guffaw; our recollections often leave imprints on our faces that show our regrets, but they hardly produce sounds that echo the depth of those regrets.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: The selfish and self-centered have a hard time being kind, even though you and I know that kindness is a source of relief to the soul.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: I think preconceived ideas or prejudgments are meant to give us an edge whenever we are dealing with others we don’t know or haven’t made the effort to understand.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: When we tend to be too hard on those we love, we erode the softness of our souls in the process, taking out the humanity within us that is the nucleus of our goodness, even if our actions are for their own sake.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Perhaps fate has a way of turning things around and making something good out of the action of someone who failed humanity without meaning to.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: The writer is the cursed artist of the soul. The expression of his art is a reflection of his quest to understand man by unraveling the mysteries that have been haunting humankind from time immemorial. In the end of his journey to understand man, the writer becomes more human even though his soul ends up finding less peace.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: The scrupulous survivors in life are the best counterweight to unscrupulous survivors.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Most people live lives that are full of mysteries, lives whose ultimate purpose we may never really understand. But for the sake of serenity, we must believe in life’s nobleness.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: …the truest feeling of happiness is the security that comes with being loved.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: A man can’t talk of true happiness if he has never known true love—the trusting, selfless and unconditional love that I took for granted.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: The true leaders of our time, the legends of this world or the movers of the movers are the towering figures that are blessed with beautiful minds, receptive ears and directing voices. They are the ones we should emulate in life.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Singers, actors or artists who touch on sorrow are trying to give comfort to aggrieved souls by giving some meaning to their sorrows.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Man craves joy far more than anything else in life, but there is nothing as madly intoxicating as the feeling of joy that comes from the soul.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: When faced with difficulties, a humble, understanding, appreciative and selfless person finds it easy to win a friend. On the other hand, a temperamental, egoistic, condensing, self-absorbed, self-conceited and narrow-minded person who lacks the basic sense of humility easily loses friends when in distress.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: Kindness is a source of relief to the soul of the giver, creating a sense of fortitude that is incomprehensible to those who do not know what kindness is all about.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: There are people who bring joy to our lives, but who fail to make us happy. They are the people for the moment. Never rely on their love because it is not sustainable. Their love is alike a comet that illuminates the sky, but then fades away because it lacks the sustainable energy of the sun.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: We need the wisdom to accept the fact that this world abounds with issues we cannot solve; and we need to part ways with those people, ideas and things that are a vexation to the soul.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: The narrow-minded find it convenient to create stereotypes, and then try to fit everybody, everything and every situation into those stereotypes.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Some people live their memorable years fighting against their basic instincts only to succumb in the end to what was actually good for them.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Writers understand the world better, but they lack the strength to change it. Perhaps that is so because they understand their limitations more than others.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Writers are the most tormented of all the different categories of artists that are out there in the world.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: When singers, actors or artists touch on sorrow, they are trying to give comfort to aggrieved souls by giving some meaning to their sorrows. The job of the singer, actor or artists ,in general, is to make us comfortable with our feelings or emotions―be it pain, hurt, anger, hatred, sadness, pleasure, love, cheerfulness or joy.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Male writers who never find the stabilizing force of an understanding woman in their lives usually end up as the jaded figures of their days, the types who give much artistic expression to the world, but who are lonely in their overcrowded worlds of love.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: A writer needs a partner who can act as fuel to his artistic mind, yet has the great ability to sober him up and help him be in sync with the non-artistic part of his soul.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Writers are the most pathetic souls when it comes to expressing their personal feelings. Their personalities are as complex as the characters they have weaved. And in a curious way, without them really knowing it, writers are the sum total of the characters they created in their heads or in their writings. Yes, My Dear Tania; writers are capable of reflecting their characters, even though most of them are determined to be just like your ordinary guy next door.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: We always emerge from the death of a loved one like a phoenix arising from its funeral pyre.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: When somebody you love dies, a phase of life’s innocence dies with that person, and a part of you dies as well.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Societies and people that come close to being happy are those that do well in narrowing the disparity between their desires and their needs, especially the material things of life.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: In the world of today, human desires far supersede human needs. Waste, as you can see, is the result of all of those contradictions. That is how we ended up complicating our world.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: …a writer, like most artists, needs a partner who can act as the fuel to his artistic mind and soul, yet has the great ability to sober him up and help him be in sync with the non-artistic part of his soul.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: In today’s world, human desires far supersede human needs. Waste, as you can see, is the result of that disparity.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Judgments based on preconceptions make life simple for us to deal with since that means we safely shield ourselves behind barriers of preconception that helped us feel safe in whatever views or assumptions we are having.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: We, humans, have come up with so many superficialities that are completely unnecessary for our existence and happiness on earth.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Most people have this tendency to make judgments on others based on preconceptions, especially when they are dealing with them for the first time.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: In dealing with others, man is inherently a slave to his preconceptions, to the stereotypes he became familiar with that made life easier for him to comprehend.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Life is full of intriguing souls that you cannot penetrate… An uncomfortable percentage of those anguished and impregnable souls also have suffering hearts that are further tormented by a deluded mind. They will hurt out of an impulse, and then live their lives after that without the slightest remorse.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Avoid people who hurt from an impulse. I mean people who have this tendency to relish their capacity to hurt the good souls of this world, and who after hurting, wake up the next day without a trace of despondent brooding, and then move on with life never thinking that they should show some remorse or try to repent.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: In your selflessness pursuit of things higher than yourself, you appear selfish or inconsiderate to those who truly love you and who have cared deeply about you from the first day you came into their lives.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: There is no bigger gratification than the realization of the things you believe in after overcoming all the odds.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Hold onto your creativity, that idealism that is rooted in some degree of innocence and a firm belief in something finer than the things we already have.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Never give up the freeness of your soul. Live your duty to mankind, nurture creatures of this world as a true mother of the earth, but never shut your imagination off from those desires that distinguish you from the ordinary. Never allow yourself to be sapped of that extraordinary energy that is the necessary ingredient for creating something new and progressive.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: Isn’t reality based on the prevailing culture, the trend that people want to identify with?
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: At what point is normal natural?
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

Quote: What is the purpose of achieving your dream if the people you had dreamed your achievements for are no longer there to reap the benefits?
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Triple Agent, Double Cross

Quote: A yesterday missed can never be found even in a fine tomorrow.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Flash of the Sun

Quote: The people’s hero does not only have to be someone in possession of the scepter of power. It can be anyone capable of giving unity, prosperity, security, peace and a sense of worthiness to his people. Such a figure gets elevated to the status of a revered hero with the human touch if he imparts a sense of oneness on a multi-racial, multi-ethnic and multi-religious group; especially a diverse people who have been fighting one another for years and centuries...
Author: Janvier Chando, The Union Moujik

Quote: My patria vera or true fatherland is the place that enriches my soul.
Author: Janvier Chando, The Union Moujik

Quote: a person who tries to use reasoning to explain faith gets lost in the wilderness of incomprehension.
Author: Janvier Chando, The Union Moujik

Quote: The purpose of life is to nurture joy, which involves those aspects of humanity that enrich the soul.
Author: Janvier Chando, The Union Moujik

Quote: It was one thing to be fooled, and another thing to be taken for a fool all the time.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Triple Agent, Double Cross

Quote: Love and hate when stretched to their extremes blind reasoning.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Triple Agent, Double Cross

Quote: He learned...never to show his anger or hatred against a stronger adversary, for fear of being crushed.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Triple Agent, Double Cross

Quote: A nationalist will blindly follow his country to his death out of love for it. A patriot will stand up for and even against his country to his death out of love for it.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Flash of the Sun

Quote: ...There is no greater dividing force in this world than self-interest...
Author: Janvier Chando, The Union Moujik

Quote: Only a fool would find happiness from an achievement that is detrimental to those he loves.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: ...No man is foolish when his friend betrays him because a man’s world is most serene when he has people to trust and call friends. After all, is it not often said that a friend is another self?
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

Quote: When you are wise, peace shall follow.
Author: Abhijit Naskar

Quote: If you are someone who dislikes, condemns and rejects new ideas, you aren’t fit to lead.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: We seek excellence before we seek understanding, wisdom before we gain knowledge, success before we understand hardwork; for this reason we need great teachers and leaders.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: ...Never opt for war, no matter how simple it may seem, especially when you know that peace is achievable, even if achieving that peace entails going through a complicated and protracted process,
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

Quote: ...True classical dropouts in society are those who avoid difficult challenges and cling to the first opportunity that comes their way. They never test their talents. These latent talents will only help to produce the next cycle of dropouts...
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

Quote: Sometimes, our pride compels us to engage in costly wars when a true commitment to a compromising peace would have been the best course to pursue.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

Quote: ...A canonical leader is someone whose exemplary rule might have appeared to be for the alleviation of the pains and miseries of a particular group, but which in reality is for the advancement of humanism...
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

Quote: ...A legendary leader distinguishes himself as someone who gets ahead of his people from an impasse and futile general consensus, and then finds new grounds that constitute the base from which a unique course of his people’s destiny is charted...
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

Quote: ...Bad leaders are known to destroy one, more or even all of the foundations of their people’s way of life...
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

Quote: The glory of youth is their strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Survivors and prevailers are those who love themselves above failure and everything else except the abstract and mysterious.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Most of our brains are out, but it is good what they did for themselves by leaving this country. They are Cameroon’s reserve for development, for the day that this country shall be free. Your late father was an intelligent man. He was even more than that. He was a sage. He once said to me that the intelligent Bamilekés are those who have sought a better future for themselves and for their families in British Cameroons. He was right. They have not been brainwashed as much as their francophone brothers have. If he were alive today, I am sure he would have judged that the intelligent Cameroonians are those who have sought refuge out of Cameroon.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Life is a mighty joke that is not meant to be funny.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: It is easier for an ambitious friend to become an enemy than for an enemy to become a friend. It is even easier to make friends than you can find people to trust as friends.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: Remember these, Sons! Truth presented with tenderness enriches the soul of man and enhances humanity in the process. A Franco-Cameroonian relation based on truth and nurtured with tenderness will be to the benefit not only of Kamerun and France, but also of mankind as a whole.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: Where else can we find happiness for a day other than from something that can offer momentary relief, something like the booze?
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: No true...father would be unconcerned about discord in his family that may cause it to disintegrate in his absence...
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: A woman’s love is all a man should expect from his wife. That love could be translated into so many positive things, especially if it is reciprocated.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Life is a rare fantasy that can be made a reality by being objective.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Sons, any man who is considered a success in life owes a lot to society. We have been very blessed, my dear sons. We have to show our appreciation to our society for making that possible. A time will come when you will meet other Kamerunians who share the same vision for this land. I am advising you to make them partners in our common goals when that time comes. We shouldn’t shy away from playing a formidable role in financing that political force that shall emerge. We must use our influence to ensure that it succeeds.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: ...political realism is the way forward for any system that is genuinely for humanity or for the interest and advancement of the people of this world.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Even with all its positive attributes, capitalism in its imperialistic form is the most treacherous system mankind ever devised. It is driven by a selfishness that has an almost religious underlining to it.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Our love for our country is worth nothing if it deprives us of our sense of humanity, if it destroys positive consensus.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: The vicissitude of life teaches us about our limitations in a world with no guarantees and permanence.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Always strive to get what you want, what you need, especially if your intentions are good and nobody gets hurt in the process.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Men have the blood of their fathers and the passions of their mothers, in the same sense that women have the blood of their mothers and the passions of their fathers. We often find ourselves trapped in life when we fail to balance the two. The most unusual of men are those who are haunted by the warped blood of their fathers and the untamed passions of their mothers. They become either the legends of the legends that mankind remembers for generations or they end up as the fools of their time,
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Huh! Mankind always comes up with ideas to make up for the follies of the status quo. But what happens if those ideas are inflexible and fail to respond to the changing times. They end up betraying the people who believed in them.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: True heroes and ideas never fall in the final sense of the word. They can only encounter temporary setbacks in their difficult journey to progress and success,
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: Fear is a basic human instinct and an indicator of the gravity of a situation. It becomes an asset if it is effectively controlled. It becomes a weakness for a man if he lets it prevail over him.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: Human ties are the greatest distorters of reality because they tend to conceal man’s worst selfish instincts.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: Expose human ties for what they really are and you are most likely to find the worst forms of betrayal staring back at you.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: ...only the dreamers of a dream are capable of translating their dreams into worthy practical endeavors that are devoid of haunting errors. After all, they are the ones who carefully observed the link between their dreams and reality; they are the ones who worked consciously to blend them into one.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: The people are like an audience watching a drama. They have characters whose sides they chose even before the start of the show, but they know little or nothing about the people behind the stage―the manipulators.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: ...We find our greatest peace when we embrace something that gives meaning to our lives. Often, it is love for somebody or something we can give up our lives for, or somebody or something that we are sure will never betray us. That love could be for a partner, for our offspring, for a country or for a belief...
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: The Romans construed Jesus Chris’s crucifixion as a defeat, but what do we have today? Christianity triumphed. Jesus Christ never betrayed himself, he never betrayed his mission and he never corrupted the ideas that God wants us to live by. The Cameroonian soul is genuine. It is noble, and it embodies humaneness. There is no reason to try to kill it because it will triumph ultimately.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

Quote: Arise, my friend – the world is wailing for kindness – it is wailing for compassion – it is wailing for love.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

Quote: To make your Opinion Count,you have to do something morethan just making Money.
Author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

Quote: What is the point of being humans, if our actions scream with more bestiality than humanity!
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

Quote: Humanity is not a word my friend. It is a symbol – a symbol of hope – a symbol of wisdom – yet this very symbol has become disgraced by our faults and deluded justification of mistakes.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

Quote: I believe in what you see is what you get, but I also believe in what you see is getting better!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Each timewe bow to thefeet of anythingwe find riveting,the mind rises tobe surprised withnew crowningdiamonds ofcreativity.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: You alwaysdrop by, to en-lighten my mind,when my wings arefeeling heavy &i've forgottenhow tofly.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: Live in the shadow of the moon until you're bright enough to give birth to your own suns.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: I believe in what you see is what you get, but I also believe in what you see is getting better.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Some teach youwhat can't be taught,by turning their backon you & helpingyou get internallycloser to everythingyou externallysought.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: You'll always be curious yet deliriously sinking into whatever your nightmare is until you let your wings know you're serious by leaping into your wildest dreams of self love.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: Please don't be overly sober with your precious wings, it's your addiction to freedom that makes me think that i too can defy gravity.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: In the future, there will be no female leaders. There will just be leaders.
Author: Sheryl Sandberg, Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

Quote: Faith moves mountains, love transforms hearts.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: The more you believed in yourself, the more you could trust yourself. The more you trust yourself, the less you compare yourself to others.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: It is better to find your courage to make changes when you can choose to rather than being forced to. If you do not make change, change will make you.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: The value of surrounding yourself with positive people is not what you get from them, but how good a person you have become because of them.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Everyone's time is limited. What matters most is to focus on what matters most.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: It is difficult to make the right choice if you fear choosing wrongly.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Stop giving meaningless praise and start giving meaningful action.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Dream big. Wake up. Take the first step into the unknown.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Accepting personal responsibility for your life frees you from outside influences – increases your self-esteem – boosts confidence in your ability to decisions – and ultimately leads to achieve success in life.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.If you always do what is easy and choose the path of least resistance, you never step outside your comfort zone. Great things don’t come from comfort zones.
Author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

Quote: The beginning is always NOW.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Step out of your comfort zone. Comfort zones, where your unrealized dreams are buried, are the enemies of achievement. Leadership begins when you step outside your comfort zone.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: The only thing wrong with trying to please everyone is that there's always at least one person who will remain unhappy. You.
Author: Elizabeth Parker, Bark Out Loud! Motivational Quotes Inspired by Dogs

Quote: The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you’ll be in all areas of life.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity.
Author: Roy  Bennett

Quote: If you don't make the time to work on creating the life you want, you're eventually going to be forced to spend a LOT of time dealing with a life you don't want.
Author: Kevin Ngo, Let's Do This! 100 Powerful Messages to Help You Take Action

Quote: Don’t come back when you realize that I’m rare
Author: Genereux Philip

Quote: We have to be honest about what we want and take risks rather than lie to ourselves and make excuses to stay in our comfort zone.
Author: Roy  Bennett

Quote: Integrity is doing the right thing when nobody's watching, doing as you say you would do.
Author: Roy  Bennett

Quote: Someone needs to fight, someone needs to sacrifice, someone needs to inspire, someone needs to be a hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.
Author: Steve Pavlina

Quote: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
Author: Roy  Bennett

Quote: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
Author: Roy  Bennett

Quote: When we aren't curious in conversations we judge, tell, blame and even shame, often without even knowing it, which leads to conflict." -The Power Of Curiosity: How To Have Real Conversations That Create Collaboration, Innovation and Understanding
Author: Kirsten Siggins, The Power of Curiosity: How to Have Real Conversations that create Collaboration, Innovation and Understanding

Quote: Strive to make small changes and learn something new daily, because there is always these experiences you have had to tap into for the future.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
Author: Swami Vivekananda , Ramakrishna Paramhans, Sarda Devi

Quote: Dare to be a fool in the face of impossibilities.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: The moon stared at me through sprinkled nighttime stardust and I alone smile.
Author: Jay     Long

Quote: Your rebel soul shines like a diamond pulled from dust: bright, clear and flawless.
Author: Jay     Long

Quote: Not all things that fall down break. Some develop wings.
Author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

Quote: We put great expectations on our tomorrows when we truly need to rely on ourselves. Far too many overlook personal action, as a means to get things done. Blame is easily passed if one does not hold themselves accountable.
Author: Jay     Long

Quote: Hopes, wants and wishes, all cast across the night sky with my heart in tow.
Author: Jay     Long

Quote: Start small and keep going.
Author: Abhijit Naskar

Quote: Turn obstacles into opportunities and problems into possibilities.
Author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

Quote: Those who win never give up.Those who give up never win.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Patience, more than the ability to bear pains or endure waiting, is to be calm no matter what happens – constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities – and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Comfort zone: simply means the routine of one’s daily life – it is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Do not be complacent about your achievements and not to strive for continual improvement when you get to the top. As soon as you let success go to your head, you sink into following familiar patterns and play it safe. In other words, you risk losing your edge.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Learning to focus on the big picture will help you keep things in a proper perspective.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Be the positive impact on someone’s life.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: There is nothing so convincing as a thing well done.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quote: Time is too short in this one life, to be able to do everything, but it definitely is long enough at least to be able to develop the will to do anything & everything...
Author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

Quote: Ordinary people never win.
Author: Quang Nguyen

Quote: You may be a poet and not even know it.
Author: M.L. Shanahan

Quote: Manipulation is not of God, it is the highest form of sorcery for it enslave the soul to the will of man.....
Author: Stanley Kujokera, Scripted Quotes: "transformational writings that will revolutionize your thinking and set you on course for success"

Quote: For a happy and health life, get the answers to these questions in this order: Where, Who, Why, What and How to be you.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Your life purpose is about you. It is a tangible, practical, everyday way to be that evolves over time as you mature. It is not just a new age, cheesy, flaky, peace and love statement. It is the greatness of who you are taking meaningful action. This is how you stay healthy and happy. Then and only then does your energy ripple out to make the world a better place.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Your life purpose is not just one thing, nor just what you love to do, nor a role, nor a legacy you leave. Your life purpose is who you are 24/7.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Before defining what you want, know who you are.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Knowing your real life purpose makes you clear on where to focus your energy to move in the direction of your life. Knowing your real life purpose helps you connect to your potential since all you really need is inside you all the time! And knowing your real life purpose helps you become more creative so you have infinite options and energy to live your daily life with confidence and joy.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: There's a way and a place for everyone to contribute to the greater good. Stop going no where fast and go "your where".
Author: Diana Dentinger

Quote: Who you were taught to be is not who you really are! How about learning to be you?
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Where is the most important of the 5 W Questions. When you are in your "Where" you can fearlessly become "Who" you are to fully live "Why" you are here. Determine your "Where" then your "Who" then your "Why".
Author: Diana Dentinger

Quote: Stop making excuses and start doing what makes you profoundly happy!
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: No one could teach you to be you... until now!
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Your real personality identity is not an option, it is the foundation for your happiness and health.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: You are not one type, nor belong to one category. You are a unique blend of personality needs. Live your needs for total life fulfillment.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Learn to be You to be Free to be You!
Author: Diana Dentinger

Quote: Nourish your Nature. Be who you are meant to be.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: What matters most is that you take the journey (of self awareness and transformation).
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Soap, toothpaste and detergent are all "new and improved". Are you?
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Learn to be You. Why follow in someone else's footprints?
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Why settle for anything less than total life fulfillment. Start by filling yourself up with you!
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: So many celebrations have become empty because the meaning has changed. Find your meaning, to find yourself for a fulfilling life experience.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Get the kNACk of being you by getting the NAG out of you. Find out how in Chapter 5.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Think "Energy" before opening your mouth. Send out good vibes in every word you pronounce.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Your Life Purpose is a blend of your Core Personality Needs. Remember it, define it and refine it as you journey through life.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: One Need activates hundreds of Desires. Find long lasting happiness and fulfillment by knowing your Personality Needs instead of following your desires.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: You feel most fulfilled when your actions are filled with meaning. Find meaning to find yourself.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Age is neither a limit nor an exception to realize your true potential or the way you want to live your life
Author: Kashaf Shaikh (Co-founder, Dealivore)

Quote: When you get more middle fingers than thumbs up, it's a progress.
Author: Aishwarya Shiva Pareek

Quote: I gave up many times but I never quit.
Author: Ken Poirot

Quote: Stand for something. Make your life mean something. Start where you are with what you have. You are enough.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: The 7 Steps to Transformation:1. Dream it.2. Envision it.3. Think it.4. Grow it.5. Become it.6. Live it.7. OWN it.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: The road to success begins with knowing what you need to know and why
Author: Savania China

Quote: A good life is doing what you love as much as you can and doing what you must as much as you should
Author: Savania China, Challenge and Improve: Confronting, and Deriving Valuable Life Lessons from, Popular Quotes

Quote: Always assume your assumptions about others are wrong. Because often, they are
Author: Savania China

Quote: A life full of excuses is a life full of regrets
Author: Thibaut Meurisse

Quote: The agony of defeat is always greater than the pain of preparing for victory.
Author: Rick Julian

Quote: Never underestimate the latent power of nature. Often when she is most beautiful she is also most dangerous to those who fail to pay attention.
Author: Rich Hungerford, Survival Wisdom: Motivational Thoughts to Help You Prevail

Quote: The black, the white, the brown, the red, the yellow, the hetero, the homo, the trans, the poor, the rich, the literate, the illiterate, the weak, the strong – all are my sisters and brothers. My life is their life. And till the last breath in my body, I shall be serving you all with all the power in my veins. And beyond death, my ideas shall be serving you for eternity.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: Champions realise that defeat - and learning from it even more than from winning - is part of the path to mastery.
Author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

Quote: I am the thread of unification that goes through humans of all religions, cultures and ideologies while reinforcing their innate sense of one humanity.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: I work to make human beings out of human bodies. I work to make conscience out of mindlessness. I work to make Gods out of obedient worshippers.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: Give me your soul and I will give you a unified humanity replete with courage, conscience and compassion.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: O my brave Almighty Human, with the ever-effulgent flow of courage, conscience and compassion, turn yourself into a vivacious humanizer, and start walking with bold footsteps while eliminating racism, terminating misogyny, destroying homophobia and all other primitiveness that have turned humanity into the most inhuman species on earth.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: Your real journey starts from the point when you realize that your life, ambition, success, dreams, achievements, future, everything is on your own.
Author: Muhammad Talha

Quote: It’s better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
Author: Robin Sharma, The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari (Marathi) Sanyasi Jyane Apli Sampati Vikli

Quote: Everyday presents a new opportunity to grow and press forward to your success. Stay the course believing that where you are right now doesn't matter, as long as you are moving in the right direction.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: God has already equipped you with the skills you need to achieve your dreams. If you just try, work hard, take control of your destiny, remain true to yourself and believe it is possible, you will have unlimited power to achieve the impossible.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Give me your soul and I will give you a unified humanity.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: Es sind tausend Tropfenin einer Weltnur für uns gemachtTausend Tropfenwenn der Himmel weintund man dennoch lacht
Author: Nina Hrusa

Quote: Excuses, we all have them, but successful choose not to use them
Author: Kyle Vidrine, Wake Up The Winner In You: Your Time Is Now

Quote: Until you become who you are supposed to become, you will never live how you are supposed to live. Start acting like who you are supposed to become and not who you are now
Author: Kyle Vidrine, Wake Up The Winner In You: Your Time Is Now

Quote: It doesn't matter if you have to kick, crawl, scratch, hop, limp, hobble, or be carried to the finish line. Just make sure you finish you race.
Author: Kyle Vidrine, Wake Up The Winner In You: Your Time Is Now

Quote: If you can't finish you can't succeed. You have to become a finisher.
Author: Kyle Vidrine, Wake Up The Winner In You: Your Time Is Now

Quote: You have to focus on the finish line from the starting line.
Author: Kyle Vidrine, Wake Up The Winner In You: Your Time Is Now

Quote: If you see a shot, shoot.
Author: Kyle Vidrine, Wake Up The Winner In You: Your Time Is Now

Quote: Dream again, think again, and live again.
Author: Kyle Vidrine, Wake Up The Winner In You: Your Time Is Now

Quote: You can either complain about it or grind, I choose to grind.
Author: Kyle Vidrine, Wake Up The Winner In You: Your Time Is Now

Quote: Nowists get off on getting on, so they run when they could walk, jump when they could sit and dance when they could sit at the edge. They regret inaction, so simply act.
Author: Max McKeown, #NOW: The Surprising Truth About the Power of Now

Quote: Build roads never seen before. Build bridges never existed before. Build a society never lived before. It is all in your hands now.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Film Testament

Quote: Technology is either a curse or a blessing depends on how we use it.
Author: Harrish Sairaman

Quote: Leaders cannot build a successful nation once they are yoked to these two evils, ignorance and greed.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: We're all a blemished spirit full of censurable faults
Author: Netiera Danise, Common Cents: How to Live a Happy Life Without Money? It's Simple, Just Live!

Quote: Barely halfway back, exhaustion sets in. What if I don’t make it? An edge of panic gets intercepted by a calmer inner voice: Look behind you.
Author: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

Quote: Without inner peace we have nothing.
Author: Allen Weinsten

Quote: LIFE and TIME are the world's best teachers.LIFE teaches us to make good use of TIME and TIME teaches us the value of LIFE.
Author: Aamir Sarfraz (aamir rajput khan)

Quote: I wish my whispers are heard and requited as a storm... Because, the storm is that keeps me alive!
Author: Lukhman Pambra

Quote: Most people have a perception that winners are born great. Winners aren’t born great. They have become great by the virtue of doing a little extra to achieve greatness. That little extra effort accumulates to one day giving them the winning results when compared to the ordinary efforts of others.
Author: Kevin Abdulrahman, The Book on What Ever You're Into: These Are the 52 Timeless Winning Truths You Need to Know to Have a Chance at Winning

Quote: The zenith of the peak of mountains has to be balanced by the nadir of the depth of the seas.
Author: Ackshat Deoli, Kilol-Bruges Express: The Fading Nomad

Quote: Many people spend more time looking at their failures than focusing on their successes.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Don’t blame others. it won’t make you a better person.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Becoming a great leader doesn’t mean being perfect. it means living with your imperfections.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Do not allow your inner doubts to keep you from achieving what you can do.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: When your intuition is strong, follow it.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Intuition is a sense of knowing how to act decisively without needing to know why.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Don’t set your own goals by what other people make important.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Focus on how far you have come in liferather than looking at the accomplishments of others.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Self-assurance reassures others and reassures yourself.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Greatness means setting out to make some difference somewhere to someone in someplace.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Choose your counsel, company and companions wisely: beware seeking wise words of advice from a fool or expecting informed opinions or decisions from the ignorant.
Author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

Quote: The worst enemy of our humanity is our self-doubt.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: When we allow negative messages to fester in our head, they take on a life of their own.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Don’t let any situation intimidate you, defeat you, or conquer you. you are stronger and smarter than anything that challenges you.
Author: Lolly Daskal

Quote: Chimerical words, the words were written,Some are wasted; some are still on the page,Tattered words, the words were written,Some are young, some are aged,Gloomy words, the words were written,Some are unspoken, some are told,Words were hurt, though they can heal,Words are breathless, though can feel,Words won hearts, words shattered hearts,Words lost battles, words won wars,Wars within, words had scars.
Author: Nishikant, The Papery Onions

Quote: His pen spoke more to her than he ever did”.In the war of words, some are unwritten and some are unspoken.
Author: Nishikant, The Papery Onions

Quote: How might I get over this? How would I be able to overlook the way he used to be with me? How could I overlook that his fingers touched my indiscernible soul before it twisted my nipples? How might I overlook his essence that still is in my garments? Despite everything, I still hear you saying that you love me. Though I know you don't.
Author: Nishikant, The Papery Onions

Quote: All she captures is a moment and what she calls it is a memory,Sometimes, it is assumptions that we use; all we need is a theory,Because you don’t know what is there in the future,And all you need is a vision to make a perfect picture.I feel that I have known you for a century,And whatever she calls is a memory.
Author: Nishikant, The Papery Onions

Quote: The depth of love is immeasurable, when you scale it, you will only see and experience it to the degree of your scales.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: Let your work speak,Let your work scream,Let your work live,Forever.
Author: Akash Lakhotia, World Hypnotized: Making of the Fuhrer

Quote: After all these years, all I know is, I need not to do anything as a part of remorse.All I need is to write.Because,'Poetry forgives.
Author: Nishikant, The Papery Onions

Quote: When you judge your art with number of likes you get in response to it, you're killing the artist within, and giving rise to an entertainer.
Author: Sameer  Khan, Eerie Edges

Quote: Don't play the victim role, empower yourself instead. Place yourself and others around you in a position to win.
Author: Peprah Boasiako

Quote: The shadow demons (fears) you've been avoiding keep you stuck in a rut, a prisoner in your own life - it's time to break free and shine!
Author: Sharon Kirstin, The Answers Within

Quote: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.
Author: William James

Quote: If you've got nothing to dance about, find a reason to sing.
Author: Melody Carstairs

Quote: Are you going to allow the world around you to change while you remain stagnant? Make this the time you throw away old habits that have hindered your happiness and success and finally allow your greatest self to flourish.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Life itself is simple...it's just not easy.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Your life begins to change the day you take responsibility for it.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: When you find yourself in need of spiritual nourishment, it is in the opportunities to serve others that you will find the abundance you seek.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: I do not care about happiness simply because I believe that joy is something worth fighting for.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: The value of a moment is immeasurable. The power of just ONE moment can propel you to success and happiness or chain you to failure and misery.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Free yourself from the complexities of your life! A life of simplicity and happiness awaits you.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship’s poison.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Live Today! Do not allow your spirit to be softened of your happiness to be limited by a day you cannot have back or a day that does not yet exist.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: It is not as much about who you used to be, as it is about who you choose to be.
Author: Sanhita Baruah

Quote: Learn from your history, but don’t live in it.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Free yourself from the burden of feeling the need to hold on to anything. Let go… you are a part of everything.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Stop waiting for the right person to come into your life. Be the right person to come to someone’s life
Author: Leo Babauta

Quote: The greatest love stories are not those in which love is only spoken, but those in which it is acted upon.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: This moment is yours and yours alone! Take charge, seize this moment and allow it to propel you to the high levels of an empowered life. Allow upon this fertile moment to be planted the seeds of your happiness and success.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: How would your life be different if...You decided to give freely, love fully, and play feverously? Let today be the day...You free yourself from the conditioned rules that limit your happiness and dilute the beautiful life experience. Have fun. Give - Love - Play!
Author: Steve Maraboli, The Power of One

Quote: Everything is easier said than done. Wanting something is easy. Saying something is easy. The challenge and the reward are in the doing.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: You are the point of origin for everything in your world: you set the standard for yourself.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: We need more than just the Law of Attraction. We need to connect with its more successful twin, the Law of Generosity. And further entwine ourselves with their parent; the Law of Love.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: You would not be here TODAY if YESTERDAY was your defining moment. LIVE THIS DAY and move towards your dreams.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: To be happy, you have to risk being unhappy.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: Like love, like talent, like any other virtue, like anything else in this life, happiness needs to be nurtured - this is the truth of the whole matter.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: If life throws you a few bad notes or vibrations, don't let them interrupt or alter your song.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Nothing that happens to you was meant to be. The only thing about you that was meant to be is you. Blaze your own trail.
Author: George Alexiou

Quote: To embark on the journey towards your goals and dreams requires bravery. To remain on that path requires courage. The bridge that merges the two is commitment.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Get out of your own way… stop the paralysis by analysis… decide what you want, create a simple plan, and get moving!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Always be happy, you never know how happy you can make another by just being happy.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: To fall in love for any reason does cause fires of emotion. When we are in love, we ride on a positive energy as compared to not being in love. When we are love, we transcend conditional love to that of unconditional and we are now flowering in consciousness. Love is a very important element of consciousness as it becomes purer with Source union even as our consciousness is expanded further. Consciousness is love that is light.
Author: Nandhiji, Mastery of Consciousness: Awaken the Inner Prophet: Liberate Yourself with Yogic Wisdom.

Quote: Just like your body and lifestyle can be healthy or unhealthy, the same is true with your beliefs. Your beliefs can be your medicine or your poison.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Not matter what your sacred or religious book is, it's not how well you know the book, it's how well you're in alignment with the author.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: When your sense of self and happiness comes from within and isn't a roller coaster ride dependent on others or circumstances, you approach life differently. You make better choices. You draw to you the people and situations that matter. The others, they fall away.
Author: Kamal Ravikant, Live Your Truth

Quote: Blame is the creed of the disempowered.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Develop habits of self-love that allow you to feel happy and cared for. You deserve happiness and your actions every day should be giving you that. Make time for yourself to enjoy life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: There are no quick fixes in your life. If you want to live a happier life you have to make your actions happier every day. You need to be determined to make your life better if you want it to be so.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Whoever count his blessings, shall be content.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: As you act with more control, compassion, and love, the lives of those around you improve. When you let yourself find happiness, your friends, family, and acquaintances will begin to find their happiness too.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: As long as you have food, water, and shelter, all that matters is what goes on inside your mind. A happy mind makes for a happy life. Find the little pleasant moments that happen in your day and summon all the happiness you can from each and every one. There may be bad days but if you can find a tiny speck of happiness then it is not all for nothing. Live in the moment. Let go of the bad in your past and enjoy every happy moment to the fullest extent.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Smile is the beauty of the soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Every human being desires love and happiness.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Life should be simple and easy. If you're doing it hard, you're doing it wrong.
Author: Conrad Aquino, Life Should Be Simple and Easy: If You're Doing It Hard, You're Doing It Wrong

Quote: Live a life that fits your specific circumstances, not one that fits someone else’s expectations
Author: Savania China, Challenge and Improve: Confronting, and Deriving Valuable Life Lessons from, Popular Quotes

Quote: Have the courage to follow your heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Living life without a goal is like sailing the sea without a compass.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: Everywhere I look I see people doing their best to make sense of this overwhelming reality, and to be kind, authentic human beings despite the many invitations we all receive to be phony, unkind assholes. Sometimes their best doesn’t look like much to me, and I remind myself that my best doesn’t look like much a lot of the time, too. I empathize. We’re all human, and we’re all struggling. Every single one of us, every single day. It’s not my job to police the paths of others, not when it takes so much effort to light my own.
Author: Scott Stabile

Quote: Grow your courage by remembering each day is a gift.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: You can’t shower happiness on others without getting few drops back on yourself.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: You can’t afford to limit your joy. It has been proven several times that angry people are never happy people.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: ...Past joys and achievements give us the outlines of how to get to a state of happiness again. That memory is a treasure that can never be taken away. At least we know where we were, what we have lost, what we miss and what more to add to our experiences.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Union Moujik

Quote: Anyone who wants to prevent you from making other people happy is an enemy. If you are stopping yourself from making others happy, you are your own enemy.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: You put your own joy in prison if you work hard to make other people’s happiness suffocate.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Pursuit of contentment is not the pursuit of an elusive tomorrow; it is the celebration of today. In that, it is the pursuit to end all pursuits.
Author: Majid Kazmi, The First Dancer: How to be the first among equals and attract unlimited opportunities

Quote: Peace is a flame that can only be ignited from within. Harness positive thoughts and illuminate once again.
Author: Tyconis D. Allison Ty

Quote: Do what you can with all love and passion irrespective of whether it pays you well or not. Joy in the result lives longer than the joy in the reward.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: The essence of one life is empowering another life, and so your passion has to be linked to the liberation of other people’s happiness.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Hatred is a burden that can hunt you day by day, robbing you off your personal joy in broad day light.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Most of us respond with panic when we get what we want. The moment of victory is often the moment of greatest peril. We let success get to our head and start acting in over-confident ways. This is the beginning of self-destruction
Author: Mohadesa Najumi

Quote: Passion is a Horse Given to Us to Discipline.
Author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

Quote: You are a Hero. Be Heroic. Always.
Author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

Quote: Wise is the one who flavors the future with some salt from the past. Becoming dust is no threat to the phoenix born from the ash.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: Haters can never rejoice especially when their enemy wins. The moment you can’t be happy when someone wins, watch yourself. That habit is not good for you.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Your fate is never determined when your massive imagination is.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: You can'tassume i'min bad shapejust becausei've run out ofthe energy toimpressyou.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: Positive thinking is powerful thinking. If you want happiness, fulfillment, success and inner peace, start thinking you have the power to achieve those things. Focus on the bright side of life and expect positive results.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: The fun part is finding which thoughts, in that crazy beehive of emotion, are the ones that mass produce the honey.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: Pay attention to your goals and never let the euphoria of the early success convince you to brag about.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Become a Better You

Quote: You'd corner me in your conformity but even in dormancy i'm sleeping with enormity, stretching the belly of the earth & everything i was born to be.
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

Quote: Though no one can backtrack and create a brand new start, Everyone is capable of taking their life in a brand new direction.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: LIFE - Death's Very Emissary
Author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

Quote: True Success is about A Winners Heart-Mind-set that enables, energizes and empowers Leadership and SWIFT Actions that Ensure REAL Success and Sustained Long-Term Freedom, Love, Abundance, Peace, Meaning and Joy.” ― Tony "Success Activator" Dovale
Author: ― Tony "Success Activator" Dovale

Quote: As Technology Revolutionizes the Workplace, we must Revolutionise our thinking to make the Workplace a HUMANE and GREAT place to Work.. or we will surely lose our Souls to business profiteers.
Author: ― Tony "Success Activator" Dovale
