During that time the Lord is polishing, sharpening and preparing us to fit into His bow, so at the right time, like “a polished shaft” He can launch us into fruitful service. The invisible years are years of serving, studying, being faithful in another person’s ministry and doing the behind-the-scenes work. The Bible says, ‘God is not unjust; he will not forget your work’ (Hebrews 6:10 NIV 2011 Edition). Be patient; when the time is right He will bring forth the fruit He placed inside you.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: We only live once. We all have an expiration date after that we will never come again. I am not saying that to make you sad. I am saying that so you can cherish each moment in your life and be grateful that you are here and you are Special
Author: Pablo

Quote: When your people are lying dead around you, don't come crying to me...
Author: Sarah J. Maas, Heir of Fire

Quote: If you've delayed achieving your goals, have you ever asked yourself, "What's stopping you?
Author: Elizabeth Parker, Bark Out Loud! Motivational Quotes Inspired by Dogs

Quote: Rulers are not anointed. They are created by the void of self-mastery.
Author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

Quote: Be creative enough to dream, brave enough to try, persistent enough to succeed, and humble enough to thank those who helped you along the way.
Author: Elizabeth Parker, Bark Out Loud! Motivational Quotes Inspired by Dogs

Quote: Remember that reading these quotes will not change your life. These quotes only work to push you in the right direction. You are the only one who can change you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: You are serving someone for the rest of your life, not knowing a time must come when you must also be served.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, 101 Keys To Everyday Passion

Quote: Speak Life:You are loved.You have purpose.You are a masterpiece.You are wonderfully made.God has a great plan for you.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Some women think being arrogant, selfish, bitter and looking down on others are qualities of being an Independent, strong, powerful and successful business women. No matter how high you are in life. Never look down on others and never forget humanity.
Author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

Quote: Our government says people must not take law in their own hands, But has given the law in the hands of people who in power. That is why people who are in power are always corrupt, arrogant, violent, Aggressive, selfish, and don't care about anyone. They get away with all the bad things they do that Is criminating unlawful and injustice
Author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

Quote: When Learning to "LOVE YOURSELF", you attract two types of energies: Lovers & Haters. Lovers should take you higher, haters should inspire. Both should give you fire to illuminate your environment.
Author: Ace Antonio Hall, Lord of the Flies: Fitness for Writers

Quote: Leadership is not always about your power, it's all about your ability to empower, encourage, and elevate others
Author: Farshad Asl

Quote: Advising gives a great illusion of superiority
Author: Harrish Sairaman

Quote: Today, I am doing well in every aspect of my life. But, this is only because I've realized that I can do it.
Author: Mohith Agadi

Quote: There are only 2 things in this world, you and the rest of you. When this becomes ‘one’ you are enlightened.
Author: Harrish Sairaman

Quote: There are no crash courses on ‘enlightenment’, you only crash in a course like that.
Author: Harrish Sairaman

Quote: Don’t talk while having food was only meant to be in integrity with food.
Author: Harrish Sairaman

Quote: I have licked the fire and danced in the ashes of every bridge I ever burned. I fear no hell from you.
Author: Nicole  Lyons, Hush

Quote: More often than not, an inspirational or motivational speaker is someone who makes money from telling us that we can do all of the things that we can do … and pretty much all of the things that we cannot do.
Author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

Quote: Part-time effort means part-tim results.
Author: Tony Curl

Quote: When you find a truth that surpasses your desire to fit trends and meet approval, you can be certain it’s worth fighting to spread.
Author: Caroline George, The Vestige

Quote: Premeditated anger is a bitch. Instead of saying, "Next time he does this, I will ... ", say, "Next time he does that, I will show him more patience and more love. That's premeditative love. She's much sexier!
Author: Ace Antonio Hall

Quote: The sum of our greatness lies not in asking“what do I want to do?” but rather “who do I want to be?
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.
Author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

Quote: We all have problems. Or rather, everyone has at least one thing that they regard as a problem.
Author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

Quote: Make mistakes, a thousand of them because we are only humans.Never repeat your mistakes because we are humans.
Author: Akash Lakhotia, World Hypnotized: Making of the Fuhrer

Quote: If you can't impress them with your argument, impress them with your actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: El reproche y la culpa solo sirven para aprisionarnos y para no dejarnos avanzar.
Author: Miquel Reina, Luces en el Mar

Quote: Motivate Yourself to Inspire Others.
Author: Mohith Agadi

Quote: Politeness is the first thing people lose once they get the power.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Your brand is the value and magic that's not in your bottle, body or box. It's the inspiration, incense, intent and impact before, within and beyond.
Author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

Quote: If you are in hard times, ask yourself: “What would this problem and my life mean to people two hundred years from now?
Author: Catherine B. Roy, Live From Your Heart and Mind: The Secret to the Simplicity of Connecting your Heart and Mind on the Road to Happiness and Success.

Quote: With discipline, you can lose weight, you can excel in work, you can win the war.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Anger gets you into trouble, ego keeps you in trouble.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Arrogant men with knowledge make more noise from their mouth than making a sense from their mind.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Respect cannot be inherited, respect is the result of right actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: No tricks, no tools, but talent makes a task truly top class.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: State first, subject second, statesman last.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Creativity without discipline will struggle, creativity with discipline will succeed.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Parents expect only two things from their children, obedience in their childhood and respect in their adulthood.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Father has a strengthening character like the sun and mother has a soothing temper like the moon.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Cowards say it can't be done, critics say it shouldn't have been done, creator say well done.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: During a conversation, listening is as powerful as loving.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: If thinking should precede acting, then acting must succeed thinking.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Making a product is just an activity, making a profit on a product is the achievement.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Some of us can live without a society but not without a family.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: The job of feets is walking, but their hobby is dancing.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: He who sacrifices his respect for love basically burns his body to obtain the light.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: What luck has gave you will probably leave you.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: When you were making excuses someone else was making enterprise.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: In united families, they might sleep with half filled stomach but no one sleeps with empty stomach.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: You can take the Indian out of the family, but you cannot take the family out of the Indian.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: In your name, the family name is at last because it's the family name that lasts.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: In a democracy government is the God.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: If not from eternal separation from God, what exactly are we saving people from?
Author: Braden Pedersen, 30-Second Theology: By Braden Pedersen

Quote: Music is the fastest motivator in the world.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Common man's patience will bring him more happiness than common man's power.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Always focus on the power of love than the love of power
Author: Henry Johnson Jr, Liberian Son

Quote: An invention is a responsibility of the individual, society cannot invent, it can only applaud the invention and inventor.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A true professional not only follows but loves the processes, policies and principles set by his profession.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A professional who doesn't deliver as committed is not just lazy, he is a liar.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Good becomes better by playing against better, but better doesn't become the best by playing against good.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Let someone else be the most powerful country, make ours the most peaceful country.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A good swordsman is more important than a good sword.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: In any game, the game itself is the prize, no matter who wins, ultimately both lose the game.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: It is the sweat of the servants that make their squire look smart.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Power does not pardon, power punishes.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: In a democracy, there will be more complaints but less crisis, in a dictatorship more silence but much more suffering.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Fashion doesn't make you perfect, but it makes you pretty.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Texting is not talking and a phone is not a friend.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: The purpose of a profession is to fulfil the personal wishes of a prospect.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Dresses won't worn out in the wardrobe, but that is not what dresses are designed for.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Dresses don't look beautiful on hangers.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: It's time to shop high heels if your fiance kisses you on the forehead.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A poor, who hates power, once become powerful, hates poor.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: If your prudence stops you every time from taking an action, then you are no more prudent, you are frightened.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Hands can cook, hands can create, hands can kill. There is no better tool than our hands.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Take care of your costume and your confidence will take care of itself.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Hunger gives flavour to the food.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: With right fashion, every female would be a flame.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Diet food is not a meal its a medicine.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: All worries are less with wine.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Some people when they see cheese, chocolate or cake they don't think of calories.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: The salt is to the food, what soul is to the body.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A good food is mouthwatering when you see it and finger licking when you eat it.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: We love our mother because she cares and also because she cooks.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Any girl with a grin never looks grim.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: An old fashioned outfit is not a costume, it's a comedy.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: You cannot choose your face but you can choose your dress.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: During your struggle society is not a bunch of flowers, it is a bunch of cactus.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: In the business people with expertise, experience and evidence will make more profitable decisions than people with instinct, intuition and imagination.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Passion makes you good, but pride stops you to get better.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: The smell of the sweat is not sweet, but the fruit of the sweat is very sweet.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: The mistakes of the world are warning message for you.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Don't mention your move before you make a move.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: The decision is your own voice, an opinion is the echo of someone else's voice.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Fear of failure is fiction, face this fact and fear will fall.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A powerful process automatically takes care of progress, productivity and profits.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: In general, poor is polite and rich is rude.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Anything which you have in profusion is poison
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Prudence is precaution, prudence is protection.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Most of the people readily accept the principle but resist its practice.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: An assembly is extra slow in taking actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: If where you are is worthwhile then where you are from doesn't matter.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: For few matters you need to be solo, for some matters you need soul mate and for many matters you need society,
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Hard work is vital to success. As long as it's in the right direction!
Author: Izey Victoria Odiase

Quote: Celebrate Yourself. You are Unique!
Author: Izey Victoria Odiase

Quote: If she says goodbye, someone else will say hi.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Music shouldn't be just a tune, it should be a touch.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Routine ruins the life, variety vitalise the life.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: In modern times couples are more concerned about loyalty than love.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Civilians enjoy their time because soldiers sacrifice their time.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Before we complicated life with money, machines and missiles we did well with morals, manpower and meetings.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: When regret and shame fades away, beauty will be in your heart to forever stay.
Author: Imania Margria

Quote: Mixing old wine with new wine is stupidity, but mixing old wisdom with new wisdom is maturity.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: The wrong man is not always wrong because of his wrong actions, often he is wrong because of no actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Words are better than weapons, wisdom is better than war.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Don't compare the size of your roof with the size of the sky.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Brilliance of the brain must be admired more than beauty of the body.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Uniform of a soldier and uniform of a student both are equally needed for the nation.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Simplicity saves strength.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Action achieves ambition.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Rich can live better than poor but they cannot live without poor.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Education makes your maths better, not necessarily your manners.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: To succeed in life, doing your best is not enough, you should also improve your best.
Author: Mohith Agadi

Quote: Don't always use prudence for precaution, sometimes use it for progress.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Faster is fatal, slower is safe.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: hold company with yourself so sacredthat even when you are alone,you are whole.
Author: AVA., you are safe here.

Quote: you have outgrown this skin.stop trying to hold it in.stop trying to hold it together.let yourself break.
Author: AVA., you are safe here.

Quote: love yourself first,and you will always be in love.
Author: AVA., you are safe here.

Quote: no one needs love from youmore than you need love from you.love yourself first,and you will always be in love.
Author: AVA., you are safe here.

Quote: you're going to love your way out of this.out of the hurt.out of the pain.you're going to love your way out of it and be free.
Author: Ava, You Are Safe Here.

Quote: You must possess Passion along with having a very strong no-fear spiritual belief in order to gain true success in life.
Author: Darin E. Lee

Quote: Time is your weapon, If you lose it, you will lose the battle.
Author: Khaled Ibrahim

Quote: stay curious and stay the brave, strong, unrelenting soldier of love that you are.
Author: Ava, You Are Safe Here.

Quote: The world is administered by rich but it is constructed by poor.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Health is hearty, health is harmony, health is happiness.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A slip of the foot may injure your body, but a slip of the tongue will injure your bond.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: One who doesn't recognise an opportunity is bigger loser than one who tries his hand at an opportunity.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: i am a woman and i am alone,and i cannot tell which one of the twoi love being more.
Author: Ava, You Are Safe Here.

Quote: love is my thighs,this belly,my eyes.love is my speech,the search,my cry.love is myself in the mirror.i will see love every time.

Quote: War is not just the shower of bullets and bombs from both sides, it is also the shower of blood and bones on both sides.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: My spouse is my shield, my spouse is my strength.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: the woman is rain,and when she falls,she is a monsoon.to love her is to drown.

Quote: Principles in a poor is admirable as politeness in a prince.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Seed becomes tree, son becomes stranger.

Quote: Before you worry about the beauty of your body, worry about the health of your body.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: You can not control the thought, but you can control the tongue.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: A true leader leads by empowering not by enslaving.

Quote: Making hard decisions in life to accomplish the dreams, It requires a gut from within.

Quote: A leader is solution oriented and a philosopher is problem oriented.

Quote: what if I fall? oh, my darling, but if you fly?
Author: Erin Hanson

Quote: Live as many lives as you can.
Author: Sanober  Khan

Quote: Don’t forget to collect the memories on your journey. Remember, if you only focus on your destination, you will miss out on the benefits of the journey.
Author: Tanya R. Liverman, Journey to Legacy: A Poetic Timeline of My Life

Quote: An educator will teach the students. An Educarer will reach the students.
Author: Tanya R. Liverman, Memoirs of an Educarer: An Inspiration for Education

Quote: In an age when nations and individuals routinely exchange murder for murder, when the healing grace of authentic spirituality is usurped by the divisive politics of religious organizations, and when broken hearts bleed pain in darkness without the relief of compassion, the voice of an exceptional poet producing exceptional work is not something the world can afford to dismiss.
Author: Aberjhani, The American Poet Who Went Home Again

Quote: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.
Author: Bernard Branson

Quote: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
Author: Criss Jami, Healology

Quote: I often ask myself, 'Who would Jesus vote for?' Then I start to think that he wouldn't vote at all; however, it would not be out of apathy or disinterest, but out of perfection and light. As a miracle worker, I think he would, by the power of God's teachings, the perseverance and the truth, influence in a modern sense whoever is put into office how to best serve his fellow men. One, like his skeptics, may find that impractical. But there is a message in that no man in power can slow the momentum of the will of God, and the miracles of his teachings will be forever victorious.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: You will never get everything in life but you will get enough.
Author: Sanhita Baruah

Quote: [at CMC West Coast 2011, on 1 Samuel 14] If just a few of you would step up and be like Jonathan ... as you step out in faith, you know what's going to happen? There'll be people like Saul who'll say, "God's doing something through that guy, God's doing something through that girl. I want to be a part of that.
Author: Francis Chan

Quote: To believe in miracles in one thing...to know what miracle you want to manifest right now, and accept it, is another.
Author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

Quote: Faith is expressed in love.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: To be content is to live without your wants.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Fear is a faint heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Faith is freedom.

Quote: We all know that there is a reward for every labour as well as there is a reward for every game played and won. How committed you are in life determines your reward.
Author: Godspower Oparaugo, Wake Up

Quote: If you can survive and won the battle over other millions of semen deposited alongside with you in your mothers womb, tell me why you cannot win the battle over challenges, difficulties and poverty? Friend, I know you will succeed because; you'd once done it in the womb.
Author: Godspower Oparaugo, Wake Up

Quote: Risk is one of the qualities of any good decision. This is so because, decision itself is a risk. Therefore, making a decision literally means, taking a risk... In tracing the histories of successful men and women, the first thing to notice in their lives is risk.
Author: Godspower Oparaugo, The Power of Decision: Your Destiny Lies in Your Decisions

Quote: May the grace of faith, keep you going in the forward motion to reach the ultimate goal.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Faith in Jesus Christ is a continuous effort.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Humanity greatest need is God's grace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It takes heart to battle great challenges, great faith to be victorious over them.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: The curse of sin is nullify by the blood of Jesus Christ.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The future is a dark cave. So focus on the now, where it steps. Make of faith the spark that illuminates and of positivity the sound that echoes.

Quote: Faith is not to understand, but to feel!
Author: 1 Minuto na Palma da Mão

Quote: Faith is a kind of spiritual magnet that you polarize.
Author: 1 Minuto na Palma da Mão

Quote: The heavenly Father is wise in heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Isn’t materialism the cause of much that is evil in the land of mortal souls?
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

Quote: Do not lose faith, it only lead to fear.

Quote: A true businessperson should also be a true humanist who understands that he stands to gain the most in a world that is stable for those he deals with, even if they do not fare as well as he does.

Quote: Son, it is bad for a man to be condemned by his children, more so by the sons he cherishes.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

Quote: Faith is like the freshness of dewdrops.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The flame is faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Build your self in the Holy Faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: There is no fear in faith.

Quote: When you see yourself in a shattered mirror, don't think of it as the broken pieces of yourself. Think of it as all of the pieces that make up you.

Quote: The moment the religious population of the world begins to see the prophets what they really were - mortal teachers of the mortal world, a great portion of the world's religious conflicts shall vanish into thin air.

Quote: Having faith does not mean you should be idle and expecting manna to fall from above. You must get up and do something!

Quote: God promised to bless the works of our hands. If you do not work, what is God going to bless you for?
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Become a Better You

Quote: Sometimes when the world goes dark, and everyone turns their backs on you, just look to the sky to see the light, and follow the stars to paradise
Author: Timothy Norr

Quote: Sometimes when the world goes dark, and everyone turns their backs on you, just look the sky to see light, and follow the stars to paradise
Author: Timothy Norr

Quote: Faith in God is optional, but faith in the self – in the spirit within, is imperative.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Principia Humanitas

Quote: Faith in God is optional, but faith in the self – in the spirit within, is imperative. Have faith in yourself. Have faith in the human first, then God if you want.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Principia Humanitas

Quote: Have faith in yourself. Have faith in the human first, then God if you want.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Principia Humanitas

Quote: GOD is like a streetlight. He keeps observing you silently when it is light and showers you with light when you are in darkness!
Author: Uma Shanker

Quote: If the tenacity of flowing water weakens the structure of a solid rock, what more; if the ordinary visionaries become just as tenacious.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: The term “musalman” refers to someone with “musallam iman”, that means, a pure conscience. Thus, any individual whose conscience is pure and clear, who can think for himself or herself, is a musalman or muslim, regardless of socio-religious background. Likewise, any human being who loves the neighbor as much as his or her own family is a Christian.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Islamophobic Civilization: Voyage of Acceptance

Quote: Generous leaders have faith in others to succeed. In turn, they receive tenfold loyalty, commitment, and a positive outcome.
Author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

Quote: Part of leadership is preparing those who follow to someday go on ahead without you.
Author: Rev. Kellen Roggenbuck

Quote: Leaders who aren't conduits are either dams of dry.
Author: Johnathan Key

Quote: Where there are people, there is injustice, and that is not God’s design. It may not be our fault, but it is our fight. Let us do our part by holding up our corners.
Author: F. Willis Johnson

Quote: Lack of wisdom does not make a fool. A fool, in the truest sense, is the man who regards his own misfortunes or those of others as a source of doubt or criticism of the infinite mercy of the Gohonzon.-Josei Toda
Author: Daisaku Ikeda, Human Revolution- Volume 2

Quote: God is my happy place
Author: Izey Victoria Odiase

Quote: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.
Author: Pablo Picasso

Quote: I write for the same reason I breathe - because if I didn't, I would die.
Author: Isaac Asimov

Quote: When I face the desolate impossibility of writing five hundred pages, a sick sense of failure falls on me, and I know I can never do it. Then gradually, I write one page and then another. One day's work is all I can permit myself to contemplate.
Author: John Steinbeck, Travels with Charley: In Search of America

Quote: As with all other aspects of the narrative art, you will improve with practice, but practice will never make you perfect. Why should it? What fun would that be?

Quote: Don't be indifferent about any random idea that occurs to you, because each and every idea is for a particular purpose. it may not be beneficial to you, but can be what others are craving for

Quote: Never ever forget that you enlisted in the ranks – you weren’t press ganged or drafted. Nobody owes you anything – least of all respect for your work – until you’ve earned it with what you put on the page.
Author: T.F. Rigelhof

Quote: The most intriguing people you will encounter in this life are the people who had insights about you, that you didn't know about yourself.

Quote: If you think you are beaten, you areIf you think you dare not, you don't,If you like to win, but you think you can'tIt is almost certain you won't.If you think you'll lose, you're lostFor out of the world we find,Success begins with a fellow's willIt's all in the state of mind.If you think you are outclassed, you areYou've got to think high to rise,You've got to be sure of yourself beforeYou can ever win a prize.Life's battles don't always goTo the stronger or faster man,But soon or late the man who winsIs the man WHO THINKS HE CAN!

Quote: Men love women who are courageous for it means they can go all the way with him in his pursuit of his good dreams and intentions.

Quote: An average man is egoistic, proud and has strong self esteem. They always require partners who massage their ego not those who will drag their ego to the mud.

Quote: There is no tomorrow and there was no yesterday if you truly want to accomplish your goals you must engulf yourself in today.

Quote: Diversity of character is due to the unequal time given to values. Only through each other will we see the importance of the qualities we lack and our unfinished soul's potential.

Quote: Notice the difference between being in control and needing control.

Quote: A confident woman wears a smile and has this air of comfortability and pleasantness about her.

Quote: Until one is committed there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, always ineffectiveness. Concerning all acts of initative or creation, there is one elementary truth...that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence moves. too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would otherwise never have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in ones's favor all manner of incidents and meetings and material assistance which no man would have believed would have come his way. Whatever you think you can do or believe you can do, begin it. Action has magic, grace, and power in it.

Quote: Perseverance is the act of true role models and heroes.

Quote: Patience is a virtue not a vice.

Quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember ~ the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.

Quote: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.

Quote: An intelligent woman is a goldmine! She has the ability to learn, reason and understand things better and faster than her contemporaries. She is competent, alert and can reason out stuffs easily.

Quote: Everyday of your life is a another lesson. If you learn the lesson well and apply it; whether positive or negative, you determine what happens in your tomorrow.

Quote: The choice to make good choices is the best choice you can choose. Fail to make that choice and on most choices you will lose.

Quote: Second half of the year starts NOW July 1st with the next 6 months being MORE important than the last 6 months. I Your Name promise to do all that I can to achieve my Goal . I will not sit on a corner wait I will seek my opportunity. I promise to go after my Goal with passion knowing that the clock is ticking… Sign and date

Quote: Your decision not to join the crowd may be what God is waiting for to grant you revelation on how to deliver your family, your country, business, profession or even your church!

Quote: So cheer up Beloved; for your God is able, He is the maker of all things.

Quote: The presence of God is so important in the life of believers. There is abundance of all you need to make your life comfortable in His presence.

Quote: God wants all man's attention, thoughts and focus to be on Him.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: Man is like a bride unto God. God is jealous when man veers away from Him.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: He is the only option for better living.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: We cannot prevail by our own might or strength, we need to plug on to the source of our strength so that we will remain resourceful always.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: Are you the fruit of redemption? If yes, then make a delightful noise unto Him.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: Another way of remaining in intimacy with God is by remaining in His presence.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: God is not a thief. That which steals, kills and destroys is the devil - not God!
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: God comes down in the evenings to chat with man, enjoy man's company and find out how man faired in the course of the day.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: The Prince came to give life unto those whose lives were almost being snuffed out by the devil via the cares of this world.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: You don't need to go running from pillar to post looking for what God looks like.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: Either be a good parent to your career or just give your dream up for adoption.
Author: Loren Weisman, The Artist's Guide to Success in the Music Business: The “Who, What, When, Where, Why & How” of the Steps that Musicians & Bands Have to Take to Succeed in Music

Quote: To grow you must not gain something but instead get rid of all the things that have held you back.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Motivation doesn't work, Your decisions do!
Author: Farshad Asl

Quote: Gratitude is the kindling for Peace.
Author: Tara L Lemméy

Quote: Its not enough to just own a camera. Everyone owns a camera. To be a photographer you must understand, appreciate and harness the power you hold!
Author: Mark Denman

Quote: Having a camera is not enough. You must understand, appreciate, and harness the power you hold!
Author: Mark Denman

Quote: When your heart jumps every time your camera locks focus...You've become a photographer.
Author: Mark Denman

Quote: Be yourself, be yourself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: He used to hide his true self because he feared people wouldn’t like him, or would judge him for being too much this and not enough that. He found himself acting like everyone else, even though his heart wanted to express itself in ways that felt different than much of what he was seeing in the world. His heart grew louder, and he longed to taste a different kind of freedom, one his mind had worked hard to contain in order to keep him feeling safe. But that safety came with a price: his authenticity. Then it occurred to him, some people would judge him no matter who he was or what he did. And that if he was going to be judged anyway, he may as well live his life as authentically as possible and at least be judged for his truth. He also knew some people would love him no matter who he was or what he did, and how much better it would feel to be loved for being real.
Author: Scott Stabile

Quote: Someone was recently telling me how inspirational he is to his team - apparently he mistook whether that was a good thing or bad. Turns out - they were inspired to keep him busy so he stayed out of their hair!The morale of the story - we all think we're inspirational, a great leader, know what's right, etc... If we didn't, we'd act differently. It's a true leader who listens to the real message and recognizes what they aren't.
Author: Colleen Ferrary Bader

Quote: If we mediate on the Scriptures, our minds shall be on Christ Jesus, the Saviour.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Today, I choose not to take my life for granted.I choose not to look upon the fact that I am healthy, have food in my refrigerator and have clean water to drink as givens. They are not givens for so many people in our world. The fact that I am safe and (relatively) sane are not givens. That I was born into a family who loves me and into a country not ravaged by war are not givens. It is impossible to name all of the circumstances in my life I've taken for granted. All of the basic needs I've had met, all of the friendships and job opportunities and financial blessings and the list, truly, is endless. The fact that I am breathing is a miracle, one I too rarely stop to appreciate.I'm stopping, right now, to be grateful for everything I am and everything I've been given. I'm stopping, right now, to be grateful for every pleasure and every pain that has contributed to the me who sits here and writes these words.I am thankful for my life. This moment is a blessing. Each breath a gift. That I've been able to take so much for granted is a gift, too. But it's not how I want to live—not when gratitude is an option, not when wonder and awe are choices.I choose gratitude. I choose wonder. I choose awe. I choose everything that suggests I'm opening myself to the miraculous reality of simply being alive for one moment more.
Author: Scott Stabile

Quote: Thirst is the aim for quest,It keeps inspiring to find more and more;Otherwise, satisfied we would sit,And lazily rest on the shore!
Author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

Quote: If human brain is like the world, then positive thinking must be the size of mountain, and negative thinking must be the size of mustard seed and not vice versa.
Author: Nikita Tak, The First SIp Of My Morning Coffee

Quote: If you don't start, you're finished.
Author: Max McKeown, #NOW: The Surprising Truth About the Power of Now

Quote: Sometimes, people don’t need our monies and our treasures. All they need is our encouragements to give them hope.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Leave the past behind. Give privacy your future . Body and mind in yours now. Perceive the world around you, feel the world inside.
Author: 1 Minuto na Palma da Mão

Quote: To live is to evolve our point of view about the world and what we have decided to do with it.
Author: 1 Minuto na Palma da Mão

Quote: You have to believe that your voice can mean something. You have to believe that what you do matters. And you have to keep going even on days you can't find that belief. If you can't do it for yourself, you do it for all the other young souls who need to be shown that things are possible. That they too can do that thing they dream of. You do it despite the doubts and the struggles. You do it because it's what you came here to do.That's what makes an artist.

Quote: Let these words be your guide; money or no money, houses or no houses, cars or no cars, never turn down the divine assignment of God for your life. Become an inspiration to another life through good service and healthy relationship.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: To get over a mountain, you have to climb it.

Quote: Why wait to get old and dream about the things you could have done, when you can start now and look back on the things you did.

Quote: You can’t inspire and lead people without earning their attention. You achieve that in a counter-intuitive way – by paying close attention to what interests them.
Author: Phil Dourado, The 60 Second Leader: Everything You Need to Know about Leadership, in One Minute Bites

Quote: Do not Speak for Anyone.Just let them know their Right to Speak.
Author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

Quote: The distance between your Dreams and Reality is inversely proportional to your Efforts.

Quote: What do you mean, You have No Dreams?The Truth is, you have No Courage.
Author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

Quote: In business, sport, entertainment and beyond an idea is worth next to nothing. The energy, effort, passion, talent, tenacity, strategy, resilience and resourcefulness to see it through and make something of it is worth everything.
Author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

Quote: You have to see the good in yourself before expecting someone else to see the good in you. Be aware of who you are and what you can truly be.
Author: Blaque Diamond

Quote: The courage to admit when you're wrong doesn't show weakness. It shows your strength. Your integrity speaks volumes about you as a person.
Author: Blaque Diamond

Quote: Just because someone tells you that you will never amount to anything doesn't mean you have to prove them right. Prove them wrong by succeeding. There is no sweeter revenge than making someone eat their words. Even if they don't admit they're wrong about you, you will know.
Author: Blaque Diamond

Quote: Your principles are your true north because they instruct how you will handle every situation, especially when there is no easy choice.
Author: Brian de Haaff, Lovability: How to Build a Business That People Love and Be Happy Doing It

Quote: There are times when the world is rearranging itself that the right person can change the world.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Believe you can and you will be halfway there.
Author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

Quote: Some things don’t just happen, they happen because somebody decided to make them happen.
Author: D.S. Mashego

Quote: Your propensity to succeed in life is largely dependent on your understanding of the concept, your ability to discover your purpose, and your willingness to pursue and act on your purpose.
Author: D.S. Mashego

Quote: 7 keys to getting more things done: 1 start 2 dont make excuses3 celebrate small steps4 ignore critics5 be consistent6 be open7 stay positive
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Violence can read like poetry. You just have to describe the act as if you’re in love with the way your characters bleed.
Author: F.K. Preston, The Artist, The Audience and a Man Called Nothing

Quote: Honestly, I don’t know what I would recommend from this story. Perhaps it is this: if you have the choice to laugh or do nothing, you might as well laugh.
Author: F.K. Preston, The Artist, The Audience and a Man Called Nothing

Quote: Where do they go, these dreams of mine? Do they live? Do they die? Do they fall? Do they fly?
Author: F.K. Preston, The Artist, The Audience and a Man Called Nothing

Quote: If my life was pulled into the pages of a book, there would be coffee stains and wrinkles along the lines of that narrative. Because all I can wish is that the book of my life would be well read and well loved. Living within words and the sound of writing.
Author: F.K. Preston, The Artist, The Audience and a Man Called Nothing

Quote: Learn to hear your inner voice, be led by your heart and never stop giving back – this way you shall always walk the right path and shall never be walking alone.
Author: Aleksej Metelko, Intuition Quotes and Reflections: World`s Largest Treasury of Intuition Sayings

Quote: Whether you choose to move on from your struggles and enjoy life or waddle in your misery, life will continue.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Don't stop believing,Don't be afraid of change,Don't underestimate yourself,Don't make excuses,Don't cheat yourself,Don't ever ever STOP!
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Become loving and become courageous. Become the inspiration which you seek outside. Bring the metaphorical heart of your limbic system in sync with the analytical powerhouse of the prefrontal cortex. From your mind shall rise the inspiration. From your mind shall rise the love. From your mind shall rise the greatest education of all.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: The reason your life stays the same is because you think everyone else is the problem. Stop pointing fingers and placing blame on others. Your life can only change to the degree that you accept responsibility for it.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Seek pleasure in work itself as in result you have no control.
Author: Pravin Agarwal, 8 Course Meal For The Soul

Quote: Survivors don't allow the word QUIT in their dictionary because they know the art of staying positive in any kind of negative situation.""BE A SURVIVOR
Author: Dipika Agarwal, The Better Side - 16 Positive Attributes To Lead A Better Life

Quote: Beautiful relations are based on bricks of trust, sometimes situations become unfriendly with no logical reasons behind it, some are eye-openers and some make you realize your faults , but if your intentions are right be bold enough to face all oppositions.
Author: Dipika Agarwal, The Better Side - 16 Positive Attributes To Lead A Better Life

Quote: If you can't remember past history, don't worry;you are born to create a history for the future
Author: Samura

Quote: The resistance, though it comes in many forms, begins with the mistaken belief that I am somehow separate from change, and that I can control it, rather than to align myself with change as it makes itself apparent, and ride it.
Author: Sharon Weil, ChangeAbility: How Artists, Activists, and Awakeners Navigate Change

Quote: I realize that what happened in Bosnia could happen anywhere in the world, particularly in places that are diverse and have a history of conflict. It only takes bad leadership for a country to go up in flames, for people of different ethnicity, color, or religion to kill each other as if they had nothing in common whatsoever. Having a democratic constitution, laws that secure human rights, police that maintain order, a judicial system, and freedom of speech don't ultimately guarantee long lasting peace. If greedy or bloodthirsty leaders come to power, it can all go down. It happened to us. It can happen to you.
Author: Savo Heleta, Not My Turn to Die: Memoirs of a Broken Childhood in Bosnia

Quote: Learn from the past, prepare for the future, and perform in the moment." (Moments: Making Your Life Count For What Matters Most, Mike Van Hoozer)
Author: Mike Van Hoozer

Quote: If you can show people how to build castles, make sure you do not neglect building and nurturing your own.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Christianity enhanced the notion of political and social accountability by providing a new model: that of servant leadership. In ancient Greece and Rome no one would have dreamed of considering political leaders anyone's servants. The job of the leader was to lead. But Christ invented the notion that the way to lead is by serving the needs of others, especially those who are the most needy.
Author: Dinesh D'Souza, What's So Great About Christianity

Quote: On your quest to spirituality it is often required to suspend your rationality but true spirituality asks that you enhance your rationality.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: La libertad nos mantiene volando alto, pero la contienda destruye nuestra habilidad de volar.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, En Busca de La Verdadera Libertad

Quote: El amor de Cristo nos ayuda a mirar más allá del amor de otros.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, En Busca de La Verdadera Libertad

Quote: Mientras más mengüe tu nivel de inseguridad, más crecerá tu nivel de fe.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, En Busca de La Verdadera Libertad

Quote: Nuestra expectativa debe de ser mayor en nosotros mismos que en las demás personas.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, En Busca de La Verdadera Libertad

Quote: El error más grande al caer es quedarnos en el piso.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, En Busca de La Verdadera Libertad

Quote: Más importante que empezar bien nuestro caminar con Dios es terminar bien la obra.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, En Busca de La Verdadera Libertad

Quote: Without the persistent rising up of individuals that seek the Lord and place themselves under His direct leadership, churches will inevitably...slip into human hierarchy, institutionalizing a system of doctrines and practices.
Author: Henry Hon, ONE: Unfolding God's Eternal Purpose from House to House

Quote: The only true religion is the grace to act right.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: No one cultivates in a stony-ground, instead he cultivates in a soft-rich ground. Do not expect people to invest in you if you're a lazy type.
Author: Godspower Oparaugo, The Power of Decision: Your Destiny Lies in Your Decisions

Quote: The spirit of Christ dwells in a holy body.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Liberty is my religion and Humans are my God.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: Sacred service is sacrifice.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Of what a strange nature is knowledge! It clings to a mind when it has once seized on it like a lichen on a rock." - Frankenstein p115
Author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley, Frankenstein

Quote: It's not always what we don't know that gets in our way sometimes it's what we think we know that keeps us from learning.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Always hear others out and remain open-minded the day you think you know everything is the day you have the most yet to learn.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: We can only transform our lives by renewal of mind via renewed knowledge.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: One act of a kind deed is better than thousand words of knowledge.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The architect and the father of war are covetousness of the leaders and of different interest groups fueling war.
Author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

Quote: If there is anything the leaders in the society or the nations must take note of is to know the importance of justice.
Author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

Quote: When justice is prioritized by any leader at any level then to give justice to the citizenry will always be at the back of the mind of such a leader.
Author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

Quote: A leader must be taught or made to know the importance of justice for the people.
Author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

Quote: If there is any society where the leaders lack the knowledge and the importance of justice, then oppression will be a common neighbor of the citizens.
Author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

Quote: The leaders have the responsibility to protect and hold in high esteem the law and virtues of the land.
Author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

Quote: If lawmakers in nations today refused to be bribed and be corrupted by some larger-than-life leaders, the people will be less insulted and molested by ungodliness and injustice.
Author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

Quote: The first step of grace to seek knowledge begins with the reading of the Holy Scripture.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The more we know, the more we grief.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Earning is a product of learning. You're only one letter away from earning more.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: If don’t want to be eliminated, you must be innovative. Update your knowledge and you won’t be outmoded.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Become a Better You

Quote: All the calculus, quantum mechanics and languages in the world are worthless pieces of information, if they are not brought to the service of the society.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: The only service to be done for our downtrodden sisters and brother, is to give them education to develop their individuality. We must give them ideas, alongside cultivating their living conditions.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: The methodical implementation of modern human faculties that allow us human beings to transcend the physical limits of biological evolution is Education. However, today, the term education has become somehow synonymous with economic benefits and due to the primeval craving for security, it has disgracefully lost its very core of transcendence into the unknown. Thus, the very evolutionary seeds that gave birth to the method known as education have gone almost extinct in the modern industrialized system of soulless competition and regurgitation. Hence emerged the reason for me to get to the root of its quite unofficially accepted problems, and to concoct the thought processes that would make necessary amendments to the perceptual errors of what I call the three major nodes of education system, which are the teachers, the students and the parents.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: Education is not the amount of information that is pushed into the brain and causes havoc there, undigested all through a lifetime. Education must be a symposium of life-building, character- making and assimilation of ideas in the pursuit of building a more harmonious, peaceful and truly civilized world.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: Change is constant.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Time well-spent is life well-lived.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Relationships are built on trust.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Time management is essential for a work-life balance.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Compromise makes relationships survive.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Sometimes, changing circumstances also changes relationships.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Good times don’t last and bad times don’t stay forever.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Change is difficult, since it challenges the status quo.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Perseverance guarantees success.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Strategy is influenced by circumstances.

Quote: Knowledge is something that fire cannot burn, water cannot wet, air cannot dry, thieves cannot steal, and the more you spend the more it increases.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: In relationships, the cheater is unable to trust anyone, including the cheated.

Quote: Experience is costly knowledge.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Only time can reveal the future.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Strategy can turn a losing battle into a winning battle.

Quote: The winning strategy is the one that successfully adapts to the changing circumstances of time, place, and person.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Change is possible only if the top management agrees.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Entrepreneurs utilize even a negative change positively.
Author: Rajen Jani

Quote: Those benefiting from the status quo, resist change.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Relationships need to be valued today, for tomorrow is uncertain.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Knowledge if churned like milk, results in the butter of wisdom.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Reasoning culminates in gaining knowledge.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Time should be spent happily without regrets.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Intelligent efforts are successful.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Unwise application of knowledge is dangerous.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Strategy can win over tricky situations.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Over time, repetition brings perfection, which brings success.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: How one treats another one, determines success.
Author: Rajen Jani

Quote: Sometimes a problem itself offers its own solution.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: A clear mind achieves success.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Some problems are imaginary and not real.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: With a common ground, solution of problems is easy.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Leaders prioritize what they want.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Improvements enable adapting to new situations.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Addressing the interests of the audience, results in effective communication.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Anger creates distances that shouting increases.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: The wise communicate in subtle ways.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: For further communication, previous communication may be archived or discarded.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Even if all communication from everyone is followed, yet one cannot please everyone.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Actions undertaken in anger, only result in pain, sorrow, and regret.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Mutual respect is an integral part of communication.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Workers can offer guidance for improving the work.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Improvement combines effectiveness with simplicity.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Even a child can offer ideas for improvement.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Leaders rule hearts, not people.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Angry issues need settling time.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Investor confidence rests on leaders who deliver.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Some leaders lead from the front.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Adverse situations used advantageously can offer solutions to problems.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Conflicts may create unfathomable distances.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Make sure a conflict exists before working to resolve it.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: If the difficult tasks are completed first, then the remaining tasks seem easy.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Words motivate.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Conflicts are expensive.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Employees are usually motivated to stay or leave due to their managers.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Recognition motivates.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Conflicts have small beginnings.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: A positive change in approach improves quality.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: The quality of the product is inseparable from the quality of its parts.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Quality is all about taking care of the details.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: The clearer the objective, the better the performance.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Quality solves the trade-off between margins and sales.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Work always makes a difference.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Growth-oriented performance demands sustained entrepreneurial efforts.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Any work not executed honestly, fails to fulfill its objective.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Well-intentioned but ill-informed actions usually compromise quality.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Criticizing is easy, performing is difficult.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Needless documentation hampers performance.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Motivation overcomes self-limitations.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Sensible motivation is always effective.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Regular and concentrated training makes an expert.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Training of parts leads to training of the whole.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Helping others is an effective way of training oneself.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Unfulfilled needs makes training unfulfilled.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: The highest training trains oneness.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: The concern of a team member is also the concern of the team.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Mutually helping team members achieve both individual and team objectives.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Conflicts need to be resolved at the earliest.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: For self-educated scientists and thinkers such as Charles Darwin, Srinivasa Ramanujan, Leonardo-da-Vinci, Michael Faraday, myself and many others, education is a relentless voyage of discovery. To us education is an everlasting quest for knowledge and wisdom.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: If education were the same as information, the encyclopedias would be the greatest sages in the world.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: The system that aims at educating our boys and girls in the same manner as in the circus where the trainer teaches the lion to sit on a stool, has not understood the true meaning of education itself. Instead of being like a circus where the trainer uses his stick to make animals do stunts to serve the interest of the audience, the system of education should be like an Orchestra where the conductor waves his stick to orchestrate the music already within the musicians’ heart in the most beautiful manner. The teacher should be like the conductor in the orchestra, not the trainer in the circus.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: A satisfied customer brings more customers.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: A team is more than the sum of the individuals.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: The point is, education in its truest form, is the foundation of all human endeavors. It is the most noble of all the civilized elements of human consciousness. Education enables the humans to achieve their fullest mental and physical potential in both personal and social life. The ability of being educated is what distinguishes humans from animals. You can teach a cockatoo to repeat a bunch of vocabularies, but you cannot teach it to construct a space shuttle and go to the moon.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: Instead of being like a circus where the trainer uses his stick to make animals do stunts to serve the interest of the audience, the system of education should be like an Orchestra where the conductor waves his stick to orchestrate the music already within the musicians’ heart in the most beautiful manner. The teacher should be like the conductor in the orchestra, not the trainer in the circus.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: This is not education my friend. It is a process of manufacturing computation devices that look like Homo sapiens, and thereby falsely labeled as Education.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: Education enables the humans to achieve their fullest mental and physical potential in both personal and social life.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: All systems of the society should serve the mind, instead of the mind serving the systems.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: Mind is the Alpha – Mind is the Omega. There is nothing else in the pursuit of knowledge. And more importantly, there is nothing else in education. All systems of the society should serve the mind, instead of the mind serving the systems.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: Education means nourishing the mind and make it develop in order to see beyond the limitations of current social perception - it means breaking the barriers of the rugged sociological system that impede in the progress of human civilization - it means trying out new things for the first time in human history and succeeding in a few while failing in some. And that is how a species grows to become more advanced.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: Highlighting strengths increases sales.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Good sales copy creates good sales.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: In sales, every prospect is a potential customer.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: In order to sell, salespersons have to correctly evaluate and cater to customer choices.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Retail selling benefits from aggressive publicity.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: A team succeeds where an individual fails.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Some team members act as adhesives to unite the team.
Author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

Quote: Come out my friend. Come out from the narrow lanes of darkness. Come out into the vivacious light of the day where all the glory resides.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Islamophobic Civilization: Voyage of Acceptance

Quote: A leader’s purpose is to provide knowledge and generate trust through kindness. This will provide a foundation that allows others to make choices, right or wrong, and grow in a positive manner from the experience.
Author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

Quote: Develop the mindset that prompts you to continue pressing pass your norms - you'll begin to discover a whole new you.
Author: Carl Holt III

Quote: teach your brain now .. don't wait until life teach you !
Author: Hamadene Aziz

Quote: Knowledge is what you know,that gives you an edge overthe ordinary person.
Author: Dele Ayo Bankole

Quote: Only the foolish would think that wisdom is something to keep locked in a drawer. Only the fearful would feel empowerment is something best kept to oneself, or the few, and not shared with all.
Author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

Quote: People who give the best are those who give of themselves – your time, talents, words, knowledge.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: He who believes not in your quest should not sail with you, so that he won't sink your ship.
Author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

Quote: Choose a leader who will invest in building bridges, not walls. Books, not weapons. Morality, not corruption. Intellectualism and wisdom, not ignorance.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: It is always healthy to be honest.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Sacrifice of the self is sheer stupidity if sacrifice is not for the self.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Be a true traveller, don't be a temporary tourist.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: A man might share his wealth, but never his authority.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Trekking means a travelling experience with a thrilling excitement.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Travelling the road will tell you more about the road than the google will tell you about the road.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Travelling shouldn't be just a tour, it should be a tale.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Knowledge is strength. Ignorance is the kiss of death.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Any impossibility turned into a possibility is magic.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Be creative while inventing ideas, but be disciplined while implementing them.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Travel teaches as much as a teacher.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Life is not only about acquiring knowledge, it is about applying knowledge.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The one who love power becomes dictator and one who admires power becomes slave.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Enjoy without injury, live without loss.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The Story Is Always ThereSometimes you don't need to speak to someone to know how they are feeling. You don't need to ask what is their story - often people have it written on their faces and you just have to take the time out to read it.
Author: Delma Pryce, ABOVE AND BEYOND: My Spiritual Journey

Quote: I read for pleasure and to acquire knowledge.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Explore. Search. Seek.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Don't just become a monument of information, rather a solace of knowledge refuge.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Reading leads to knowledge and wise ways of living.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It is better to be informed than to be ignorant.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you search enough, you will find.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Leaders don’t hide good news from their followers. As long as they discover knowledge, they share knowledge. They leave part of them with people they meet; hence they are hardly missed when they are gone.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: When you are a person people can trust, they will call on upon you, love to be around you and work with you. A leader’s skills take him to people, but his character brings people to him.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders don’t leave people empty handed. They give them part of themselves through knowledge sharing and influence creation.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A leader’s skills take him to people, but his character brings people to him.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: You don’t miss great leaders because their impacts and footprints are always staring at you in the face.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: You can’t give what you don’t have. To lead people in a better way, mingle with them in body. But in knowledge, be far ahead of them!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: In my quest to search for knowledge, I know God, the source of knowledge.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Because you're always learning, the chief lesson remains: you still know nothing.
Author: Criss Jami, Healology

Quote: Just as the bird needs wings to fly, a leader needs useful information to flow. Leaders learn.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A self-leader cries for no followers by himself. He does his thing and people get to know him, chase him and learn from him.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: What kills leadership growth isn't ignorance, but rather the illusion of knowledge.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: Act the way you'd like to be and soon you'll be the way you'd like to act.
Author: Bob Dylan

Quote: Fear can only grow in darkness. Once you face fear with light, you win.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: If you really want the key to success, start by doing the opposite of what everyone else is doing.
Author: Brad Szollose

Quote: Life is a balanced system of learning and evolution. Whether pleasure or pain every situation in your life serves a purpose. It is up to us to recognize what that purpose could be.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: How would your life be different if…You pretended those around you were deaf to your words? Let today be the day…You let your actions speak and communicate your feelings and intentions.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: You've been given the innate power to shape your life...but you cannot just speak change, you have to LIVE change. Intent paired with action builds the bridge to success. You can't just want it; you have to do it, live it...BE it! Success isn't something you have, it's something you DO!
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: You are where you are right now because of the actions you've taken, or maybe, the inaction you've taken.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: If you don’t know exactly where you’re going, how will you know when you get there?
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: NEVER be surprised by your own success!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Your agreement with reality defines your life.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Soar with wit. Conquer with dignity. Handle with care.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it's something you do.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: The difference between greed and ambition is a greedy person desires things he isn't prepared to work for.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Make the choice to embrace this day. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the ghost of yesterday or the "To-Do" list of tomorrow! It’s inspiring to see all the wonderfully amazing things that can happen in a day in which you participate.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Stop allowing your day-to-day life to be clouded by busy nothingness.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Success is a poor teacher
Author: Robert T. Kiyosaki, Cashflow Quadrant: Rich Dad's Guide to Financial Freedom

Quote: Change is in the air. This change reminds us that we are made and beautifully sculpted by the same power that orchestrates the change of season. Let this be the season you embrace and align yourself with this change.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: When you establish a destination by defining what you want, then take physical action by making choices that move you towards that destination, the possibility for success is limitless and arrival at the destination is inevitable.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Live your vision and demand your success.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Your dream is a reality that is waiting for you to materialize. Today is a new day! Don’t let your history interfere with your destiny! Learn from your past so that it can empower your present and propel you to greatness
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Interrupt your thoughts of "I should", with your action of doing.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: What do you think will be more effective when it comes to succeeding, believing you can or KNOWING you will? Let today be the last day you took timid steps of belief and start taking confident steps of purpose-driven knowing!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Instead, shake things up today! Live through today. Don’t just exist through it - LIVE through it!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: You cannot continue on the same path and arrive at a different destination. Make the choice to have your actions reflect your goals.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Start shaping your own day. Start walking your own walk. This journey is yours, take charge of it. Stop giving other people the power to shape your life.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Let today be the day you stop having conflict between your actions and your goals and finally align your greatest intent with your purposeful actions, creating a universal symphony serenading your success!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: A lack of clarity could put the brakes on any journey to success.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: When you truly embrace your human impermanence you connect with the power you have, and influence you have, over the time you have.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Too much action with too little intent makes for wasteful exertion of energy and the confusion between movement and progress.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: No guts, no story.
Author: Chris Brady
