Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: A willing spirit, diligently perform the sacred duty.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Education must be an equal opportunity for all.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The “right time’ is now. Go onward and fulfill your dream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Be awake and arise to fulfill your dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Failure is only a temporary fall. You must rise up any time you fall.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Growing older doesn't mean that you are more mature than everyone who is younger than you. Maturity is a lot of things, and age has nothing to do with it.
Author: Abhysheq Shukla, KISS Life  "Life is what you make it"

Quote: It's a good day for Kokomo
Author: Michael Harris

Quote: Don’t believe those who say, ‘you can’t’. You can make it in life.You can realise all your dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: For every great success, diligence is desirable from the beginning to the very end.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Life will be empty without great stories to read.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: You have the capacity to do the work.Find the willpower to begin work.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Reject anything advice, which does not lead to your personal progress.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: All the great treasures of life are hidden in a book.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: In the pages of a book, we find greatest solitude.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: When we replace a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: You are the most important person in your life. Your relationship with yourself defines your relationships with every other person you encounter. Celebrate yourself and celebrate all those around you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: I believe there are no wrong decisions, just different consequences.
Author: Liimu McGill, The MomStar Manifesto

Quote: I believe that I can teach my children to follow their dreams by following my own.
Author: Liimu McGill, The MomStar Manifesto

Quote: Better Associations:If you associate yourself with a change maker,Your life will by all means become better.You will wink at challenges and begin to think.In times of frustrations, you will not sink.If you miss the way to a great destination,Just look for those going to that direction.Mount the shoulders of a giant believerAnd you will become a great achiever.People around you determine your speed.They will influence the growth of your seed.People you are around will decide your strengthAnd also the figure of your success’ lengthI trust you want to become a better you.It matters, what your associates plan to do.It depends, where your companions want to go.It relies on what your friends believe and know.Quit friendships that build you nothingChoose friends who bring out of you somethingOne iron sharpens another ironGo along with great people and ride on.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Become a Better You

Quote: Don’t ever stop believing in your own personal transformation. It is still happening even on the days you may not realize it or feel like it.
Author: Lalah Delia

Quote: I honor you for every timethis year you:got back upvibrated highershined your lightand loved and elevatedbeyond—the call of duty.
Author: Lalah Delia

Quote: I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain.
Author: Frank Herbert, Dune

Quote: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.
Author: Arthur C. Clarke

Quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Author: Confucius, Confucius: The Analects

Quote: Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: Circumstances are the rulers of the weak they are but the instruments of the wise.
Author: Samuel Lover, Rory O'More

Quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.
Author: Helen Keller

Quote: People are always blaming their circumstances for what they are. I don't believe in circumstances. The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and if they can't find them, make them.
Author: George Bernard Shaw, Mrs. Warren's Profession

Quote: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.
Author: Jim Rohn

Quote: You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quote: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
Author: Jim Rohn

Quote: I cannot let the fear of the past color the future.
Author: Julie Kagawa, The Eternity Cure

Quote: Don't fear failure. — Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
Author: Bruce Lee, Striking Thoughts: Bruce Lee's Wisdom for Daily Living

Quote: Time is an equal opportunity employer. Each human being has exactly the same number of hours and minutes every day. Rich people can't buy more hours. Scientists can't invent new minutes. And you can't save time to spend it on another day. Even so, time is amazingly fair and forgiving. No matter how much time you've wasted in the past, you still have an entire tomorrow.
Author: Denis Waitley

Quote: You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: First say to yourself what you would beand then do what you have to do.
Author: Epictetus

Quote: LAW 46Never Appear Too PerfectAppearing better than others is always dangerous, but most dangerous of all is to appear to have no faults or weaknesses. Envy creates silent enemies. It is smart to occasionally display defects, and admit to harmless vices, in order to deflect envy and appear more human and approachable. Only gods and the dead can seem perfect with impunity.
Author: Robert Greene, The 48 Laws of Power

Quote: Keep in mind that the true measure of an individual is how he treats a person who can do him absolutely no good.
Author: Ann Landers

Quote: Everything is hard before it is easy
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: ...yelling doesn't make a thing any more possible.
Author: Angie Sage, Queste

Quote: It is impossible to discourage the real writers - they don't give a damn what you say, they're going to write.
Author: Sinclair Lewis

Quote: The discontent and frustration that you feel is entirely your own creation.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Sometimes it's worth lingering on the journey for a while before getting to the destination.
Author: Richelle Mead, The Indigo Spell

Quote: When you concentrate your energy purposely on the future possibility that you aspire to realize, your energy is passed on to it and makes it attracted to you with a force stronger than the one you directed towards it.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives. It's what we do consistently.
Author: Anthony Robbins

Quote: Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious. And however difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at. It matters that you don't just give up.
Author: Stephen Hawking

Quote: Do what you think is right. Don't let people make the decision of right or wrong for you.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Annual income twenty pounds, annual expenditure nineteen six, result happiness. Annual income twenty pounds, annual expenditure twenty pound ought and six, result misery.
Author: Charles Dickens, David Copperfield

Quote: Times will change for the better when you change.
Author: Maxwell Maltz

Quote: Make your work to be in keeping with your purpose
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The spirit of the individual is determined by his dominating thought habits.
Author: Bruce Lee, Bruce Lee Jeet Kune Do: Bruce Lee's Commentaries on the Martial Way

Quote: We can't undo a single thing we have ever done, but we can make decisions today that propel us to the life we want and towards the healing we need.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: The size of your dreams must always exceed your current capacity to achieve them. If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.
Author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

Quote: At school, new ideas are thrust at you every day. Out in the world, you'll have to find your inner motivation to seek for new ideas on your own.
Author: Bill Watterson

Quote: Ever Tried. Ever Failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
Author: Samuel Beckett

Quote: Grateful souls focus on the happiness and abundance present in their lives and this in turn attracts more abundance and joy towards them.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Never allow your mind to wander untamed like a wild animal that exists on the basis of survival of the fittest. Tame your mind with consistent focus on your goals and desires.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Manifesting is a lot like making a cake. The things needed are supplied by you, the mixing is done by your mind and the baking is done in the oven of the universe.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Now is the time to get serious about living your ideals. How long can you afford to put off who you really want to be? Your nobler self cannot wait any longer. Put your principles into practice – now. Stop the excuses and the procrastination. This is your life! You aren’t a child anymore. The sooner you set yourself to your spiritual program, the happier you will be. The longer you wait, the more you’ll be vulnerable to mediocrity and feel filled with shame and regret, because you know you are capable of better. From this instant on, vow to stop disappointing yourself. Separate yourself from the mob. Decide to be extraordinary and do what you need to do – now.
Author: Epictetus, The Art of Living: The Classical Manual on Virtue, Happiness and Effectiveness

Quote: ‎By reacting from fear instead of responding from love, you inject poison directly into the veins of your relationship.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Protect your enthusiasm from the negativity and fear of others. Never decide to do nothing just because you can only do little. Do what you can. You would be surprised at what "little" acts have done for our world.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Learn everything you can, anytime you can, from anyone you can, there will always come a time when you will be grateful you did.
Author: Sarah Caldwell

Quote: Look around you. Everything changes. Everything on this earth is in a continuous state of evolving, refining, improving, adapting, enhancing…changing. You were not put on this earth to remain stagnant.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Reading the Bible will help you get to know the word, but it’s when you put it down and live your life that you get to know the author.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: A very small percentage of the people in this world will actually experience and live today. So many people will be stuck on another day, another time that traumatized them and caused them to spiritually stutter so they miss out on this day.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: I hope you find true meaning, contentment, and passion in your life. I hope you navigate the difficult times and come out with greater strength and resolve. I hope you find whatever balance you seek with your eyes wide open. And I hope that you - yes, you - have the ambition to lean in to your career and run the world. Because the world needs you to change it.
Author: Sheryl Sandberg, Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

Quote: Do it first and feel about it afterwards.' - Dagny Taggart
Author: Ayn Rand, Atlas Shrugged

Quote: A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, even if it is a fake one. Surprisingly enough, everyone takes it at face value. I read that in a book.""If you keep staring at me, I'll hit you.""I only became part of your team recently when I replaced Sasuke, so I don't know everything that's going on. I don't really understand people either. But even I can tell that Naruto really loves you. Naruto's been shouldering that promise for a long time...I think he means to shoulder it for the rest of his life. I don't know what you said to him, but it's just like what's been done to me - it feels like a curse. Sasuke causes Naruto pain, but I think you do too.""Sasuke is only helping spread his darkness across the world. Letting him live will only sow the seeds of another war. He's just another criminal now. Sasuke lost all hope of coming back when his group, Akatsuki, attacked our village. Your fellow Konoha shinobi would never accept him now. Sakura's not stupid, either. She understands the position he's put us all in. That's why she came out here, to tell you herself.
Author: Masashi Kishimoto

Quote: You don't have to get it perfect, you just have to get it going. Babies don't walk the first time they try, but eventually they get it right
Author: Jack Canfield

Quote: Everyone of us needs to show how much we care for each other and, in the process, care for ourselves.
Author: Diana, Princess of Wales

Quote: The purpose of fear is to raise your awareness not to stop your progress.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: When you do what you love, the seemingly impossible becomes simply challenging, the laborious becomes purposeful resistance, the difficult loses its edge and is trampled by your progress.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped focusing on what you didn’t want and started focusing on what you do want? Let today be the day…You establish a clear intent, make a plan, and take actions towards your intent.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: You know you're doing what you love when Sunday nights feel the same as Friday nights....
Author: Donny Deutsch, Donny Deutsch's Big Idea: How To Make Your Entrepreneurial Dreams Come True, From The AHA Moment To Your First Million

Quote: The here and now is all we have, and if we play it right it's all we'll need.
Author: Ann Richards

Quote: The moment you become friends with your inner Self, you realize that the failures or hindrances that you met earlier were caused more by your disconnected status with your inner Being.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: The whole value of solitude depends upon oneself; it may be a sanctuary or a prison, a haven of repose or a place of punishment, a heaven or a hell, as we ourselves make it.
Author: John Lubbock, Peace and Happiness

Quote: If you do whatever it takes to accomplish your goals to live the life you desire, It will be worth it. I promise! But if you find some excuse to justify quitting your journey, you will regret it. This is also a promise!" -gbb
Author: Glenn Brandon Burke

Quote: I can’t think of anything more disheartening than living a life without a clear purpose.
Author: Daniel Willey

Quote: Therefore it is unnecessary for a prince to have all the good qualities I have enumerated, but it is very necessary to appear to have them. And I shall dare to say this also, that to have them and always to observe them is injurious, and that to appear to have them is useful; to appear merciful, faithful, humane, religious, upright, and to be so, but with a mind so framed that should you require not to be so, you may be able and know how to change to the opposite.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: The best way to succeed is to have a specific Intent, a clear Vision, a plan of Action, and the ability to maintain Clarity. Those are the Four Pillars of Success. It never fails!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: I promise you nothing is as chaotic as it seems. Nothing is worth diminishing your health. Nothing is worth poisoning yourself into stress, anxiety, and fear.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: When was the last time you woke up and realized that today could be the best day of your life?
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Make the most of the best and the least of the worst.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quote: What is the point of being on this Earth if you are going to be like everyone else?
Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Total Recall: My Unbelievably True Life Story

Quote: Sometimes we forget about our own advantages because we focus on what we don't have. Just because you have to work a little harder at something that seems easier to others doesn't mean you're without your own talents.
Author: Chris Colfer, The Wishing Spell

Quote: Today is yours to shape. Create a masterpiece!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: You have to lift a person up before you can really put them in their place.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: A person doesn't have to change who he is to become better.
Author: Sidney Poitier, The Measure of a Man: A Spiritual Autobiography

Quote: If you intend to change, decide what you want and live your life accordingly.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Search for contentment in each person you meet.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Change is the parent of progress.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Today stretches ahead of you waiting to be shaped. You are the sculptor who gets to do the shaping. What today will be like is up to you.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: The first place where self-esteem begins its journey is within us.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Your feelings wouldn't get hurt if you were honest with yourself
Author: Ty Gray

Quote: Although I deeply love oceans, deserts and other wild landscapes, it is only mountains that beckon me with that sort of painful magnetic pull to walk deeper and deeper into their beauty. They keep me continuously wanting to know more, feel more, see more.
Author: Victoria Erickson

Quote: You can't learn in school what the world is going to do next year.
Author: Henry Ford

Quote: How would your life be different if...You were conscious about the food you ate, the people you surround yourself with, and the media you watch, listen to, or read? Let today be the day...You pay attention to what you feed your mind, your body, and your life. Create a nourishing environment conducive to your growth and well-being today.
Author: Steve Maraboli, The Power of One

Quote: The only easy day was yesterday.
Author: US Navy SEALs

Quote: You can lose your MONEY. You can lose your FRIENDS. You can lose your JOB and you can lose your MARRIAGE...and still recover...as long as there is HOPE. Never lose HOPE.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: You're never ready for what you have to do. You just do it. That makes you ready.
Author: Flora Rheta Schreiber, Sybil: The Classic True Story of a Woman Possessed by Sixteen Personalities

Quote: Sometimes you're drowning yourself in your own words.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Because when we give too many fucks, when we choose to give a fuck about everything, then we feel as though we are perpetually entitled to feel comfortable and happy at all times, that’s when life fucks us.
Author: Mark  Manson, The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck: A Counterintuitive Approach to Living a Good Life

Quote: Never confuse someone else's inability to do something with its inability to be done.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: If a man has his eyes bound, you can encourage him as much as you like to stare through the bandage, but he'll never see anything.
Author: Franz Kafka, The Castle

Quote: It is not enough if you just live life as it comes to you like a floating leaf in a pond. Make use of the powers bestowed in you and soar like an eagle.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: The price tag you put on yourself decides your worth. Underestimating yourself will cost you dearly.
Author: Apoorve Dubey

Quote: Persistence is to the character of man as carbon is to steel.
Author: Napoleon Hill

Quote: Do not compromise yourself and put your goodness in the same impermanent category as whatever circumstance happening. Be the best you in every circumstance.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Don't be one of those who don't want others to be empowered. Share information. Try to make the next person, smarter.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: The lust for comfort kills the passions of the soul.
Author: Kahlil Gibran, The Prophet

Quote: There's only one thing that will make them stop hating you. And that's being so good at what you do that they can't ignore you.
Author: Orson Scott Card, Ender's Game

Quote: Without desires and dreams, your thoughts do not matter and you can think whatever you want to.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest accomplishment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
Author: Leo Buscaglia

Quote: Write this down: My life is full of unlimited possibilities.
Author: Pablo

Quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
Author: Henry Ford

Quote: You don't have to be a hero to accomplish great things---to compete. You can just be an ordinary chap, sufficiently motivated to reach challenging goals.
Author: Edmund Hillary, High Adventure

Quote: The problem isn’t that I think so highly of myself. It is just that you think so little of yourself. Live life BIG, BOLD and OUT LOUD!
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Have you had a failure or rejection? You could get bitter. That's one way to deal with it. Or...you could just get BETTER. What do you think?
Author: Destiny Booze

Quote: We are mathematical equations where your life is the sum of all choices you've made until now. The good news is you can change the equation so that you start making a difference in your life.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Leave your excuses and live your dreams!
Author: Paul F. Davis

Quote: A good self-esteem level is mostly dependant on how we value ourselves without any bias.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: You are where you are and what you are because of yourself, nothing else. Nature is neutral. Nature doesn't care. If you do what other successful people do, you will enjoy the same results and rewards that they do. And if you don't, you won't.
Author: Brian Tracy, Focal Point: A Proven System to Simplify Your Life, Double Your Productivity, and Achieve All Your Goals

Quote: A person today who seems to have a great sense of self-esteem has his or her childhood days to thank for it.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Your limits are somewhere up there, waiting for you to reach beyond infinity.
Author: Arnold Henry

Quote: Once we open our eyes to the infinite magic that the universe has in abundance, we are sure to be enthralled by what we see and this miraculous creation gets us closer to our dreams and to the world as a whole.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: We have come here together so that you might know, through virtue of your own pain, your own hopelessness, your own fear, your own darkness and the lie of powerlessness, the very actual power of your own will, of the will of your soul.
Author: Jennifer DeLucy

Quote: It will be better to spent our energy on reality; the tangible facts, not thoughts of the past.
Author: Durgesh Satpathy, Equating the Equations of Insanity: A Journey from Grief to Victory

Quote: Let your action manifest your thought, your belief and your passion.
Author: Mohammed Ali Bapir

Quote: Being in home is like magic moments, in a magic world, among maicians
Author: Durgesh Satpathy, Equating the Equations of Insanity: A Journey from Grief to Victory

Quote: You don't have to be good at something to be liked.
Author: Stephen Richards

Quote: 12--Lose Battles, But Win The War: Grand StrategyGrand strategy is the art of looking beyond the present battle and calculating ahead. Focus on your ultimate goal and plot to reach it.
Author: Robert Greene, The 33 Strategies of War

Quote: Every sunrise is priceless and you can experience the richness that life holds only when you live life to the full instead of just being an onlooker.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: How would your life be different if...you began each day by thanking someone who has helped you? Let today be the day...You make it a point to show your gratitude to others. Send a letter or card, make a call, send a text or email, tell them in person...do whatever you have to do to let them know you appreciate them.
Author: Steve Maraboli, The Power of One

Quote: Life’s a marathon, not a sprint.
Author: Phillip C. McGraw

Quote: Every challenge you encounter in life is a fork in the road. You have the choice to choose which way to go - backward, forward, breakdown or breakthrough.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha, Overcoming the Challenges of Life

Quote: Let today be the day that you become committed in being, in doing, in getting, achieving, in experiencing. Let today be the day that you are committed to being the change you wish to see and living the life you wish to live.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: There has never been a meaningful life built on easy street.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Prepared for the worst,but still praying for the best
Author: Lil Wayne

Quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going
Author: Billy Joel

Quote: If you always do what you've always done, you'll always get what you always got.
Author: James P. Lewis, Working Together: 12 Principles for Achieving Excellence in Managing Projects, Teams, and Organizations

Quote: But if we are talking in terms of making progress in life, we must understand that "good enough" is very different from "best.
Author: Paulo Coelho, Eleven Minutes

Quote: Whatever you lay your hands on, self-esteem is visible.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Once you feel nice about yourself, you have planted the first seed to develop self-confidence.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Time waits for no one.
Author: Yasutaka Tsutsui

Quote: You can only work on yourself. Start there.
Author: Alice O. Howell

Quote: The mind can't delete what the heart won't let go of.
Author: Peggy Toney Horton, Stop the World and Get Off

Quote: Something hit me very hard once, thinking about what one little man could do. Think of the Queen Mary — the whole ship goes by and then comes the rudder. And there's a tiny thing at the edge of the rudder called a trimtab.It's a miniature rudder. Just moving the little trim tab builds a low pressure that pulls the rudder around. Takes almost no effort at all. So I said that the little individual can be a trimtab. Society thinks it's going right by you, that it's left you altogether. But if you're doing dynamic things mentally, the fact is that you can just put your foot out like that and the whole big ship of state is going to go.So I said, call me Trimtab.
Author: R. Buckminster Fuller

Quote: I can’t help you, I can only guide you, and you are the one who can help yourself.
Author: Durgesh Satpathy, Equating the Equations of Insanity: A Journey from Grief to Victory

Quote: The realisation that limitations are imaginary will make you strong and overpowering.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: We are exactly what our history made us to be.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: For us to regard others as worthy, we have to begin by regarding ourselves as worthy.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Self-confidence is contagious.
Author: Stephen Richards

Quote: I must admit, that I have learned more from my negative experiences than I have ever learned from my positive one.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: With one kind gesture you can change a life. One person at a time you can change the world. One day at a time we can change everything.
Author: Steve Maraboli, The Power of One

Quote: Don't use yesterday's state of mind, to make today's decision.
Author: C. Nzingha Smith, Lust Have Recipes, Aphrodisiac Cookbook

Quote: Faith UP! Your purpose is GREATER than all your PROBLEMS.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: The future is greatly different than your life now, the actions that you take must also be greatly different. You cannot do the same thing and get something different.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Quote: When someone who is suffering looks to you for compassion, it's indeed a blessing; you are chosen to be their Light in a moment of sorrow.
Author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

Quote: I would rather live short and right then long and wrong.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: We need to send our words out in the direction we want them to go. In other words, we need to start talking victory when we’re staring at defeat. We need to start talking healing when we’re feeling sick. We need to start blessing and prosperity when we don’t have anything. We need to speak about marching when we feel like quitting.
Author: Jentezen Franklin, Believe That You Can: Moving with Faith and Tenacity to the Dream God Has Given You

Quote: Fear has the role we give it. We are able to empower or poison ourselves to whatever degree we want. This is the beauty of our design.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: There are two things essential if you want to enhance your Jedi self-confidence: 1/ belief that it is possible 2/ that self-help is the best help
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: The face is the mirror of the mind, and eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart.
Author: Jerome

Quote: Every great leader can take you back to a defining moment when they decided to lead
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Yet how hard most people work for mere dust and ashes and care, taking no thought of growing in knowledge and grace, never having time to get in sight of their own ignorance.
Author: John Muir, John Muir: His Life and Letters and Other Writings

Quote: Do the things you used to talk about doing but never did. Know when to let go and when to hold on tight. Stop rushing. Don't be intimidated to say it like it is. Stop apologizing all the time. Learn to say no, so your yes has some oomph. Spend time with the friends who lift you up, and cut loose the ones who bring you down. Stop giving your power away. Be more concerned with being interested than being interesting. Be old enough to appreciate your freedom, and young enough to enjoy it. Finally know who you are.
Author: Kristin Armstrong

Quote: The difference between being mediocre and achieving excellence is you.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: A failure is always in the passenger seat in his or her life.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: You be as angry as you need to be," she said. "Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. Not your grandma, not your dad, no one. And if you need to break things, then by God, you break them good and
Author: Patrick Ness, A Monster Calls

Quote: Pursue your goal. Opinions be damned.
Author: Stacy Verdick Case

Quote: A Master Jedi feels emotions, but they do not allow them to influence their reasoning. Yoda told Luke that he would know the good from the bad when he was 'calm, at peace.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Certain situations need a Jedi-like approach. One of these is when you are in a strange environment, usually where you feel unsure of yourself. You would be surprised how, if you walk with confidence and meaning, people will see this as a mark of confidence, yet you are perhaps shaking inside but outwardly you have the gait of a confident Jedi Knight.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Superhuman effort isn't worth a damn unless it achieves results.
Author: Ernest Shackleton

Quote: When something poses as obstacle to you,surmount it and use it as a miracle to move on to greater height.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha, Overcoming the Challenges of Life

Quote: Love is perhaps the only emotions that is boundless
Author: Santosh Avvannavar, Umbilical Cord

Quote: When in doubt, throw doubt out and have a little faith....
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri, Brushstrokes of a Gadfly

Quote: The difference between those who adapted and those who didn't, Gorton said, was a willingness to totally commit.
Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Total Recall: My Unbelievably True Life Story

Quote: If the painter wishes to see beauties that charm him, it lies in his power to create them, and if he wishes to see monstrosities that are frightful, ridiculous, or truly pitiable, he is lord and God thereof.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci, Leonardo's Notebooks

Quote: Uncertainty will always be part of the taking charge process.
Author: Harold Geneen

Quote: Jedi act with confidence, move with confidence, and breathe with confidence. Jedi possess a confident calmness in their looks, attitude andbehaviour.
Author: Stephen Richards

Quote: Positive belief in yourself will give you the energy needed to conquer the world and this belief is the power behind all creation.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Changes are inevitable and not always controllable. What can be controlled is how you manage, react to and work through the change process.
Author: Kelly A. Morgan

Quote: Believe with all your heart that you will do what you were made to do.
Author: Orison Swett Marden

Quote: A mind of moderate capacity which closely pursues one study must infallibly arrive at great proficiency in that study.
Author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley, Frankenstein

Quote: A true dreamer is one who knows how to navigate in the dark”.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Though money cannot acquire you happiness, it does not mean that both money and happiness cannot exist together.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: A barrier is a limitation only when you perceive it as one.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Winning is great, but if it's not enough then then you'll never have enough!
Author: Stephen Richards

Quote: Whatever belief we have actually stems from the thankfulness that we feel and this feeling further attracts more happy feelings towards us.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: The madder it makes you, the harder you need to laugh at it.
Author: Destiny Booze

Quote: Your self-confidence is simply the part of your brain that tells you whether or not you should try something different or new or believe in yourself, and just as a Jedi truly believes that it is within their power to control their thoughts and stay in the Light, so can you.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: On the other hand, if the future is not the one you chose then you may have to use your willpower to obtain the future of your liking.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: A story meant to motivate all and sundry irrespective of their circumstances
Author: Santosh Avvannavar, She: Ekla Cholo Re

Quote: One should measure their life by the faith they embrace and the relationships they cherish
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: You’ve got one life, one shot, and all the power to make it happen. Get ready to dream big and live big. It’s all up to you. And it starts now.
Author: Jolene Stockman, Total Blueprint for World Domination

Quote: A cord that remains, always. in many ways...
Author: Santosh Avvannavar

Quote: I want every girl in the world to pick up a guitar and start screaming.
Author: Courtney Love

Quote: Most people know the physical senses, but a lot of people don’t know the soul’s senses: empathy, trust, intuition, love and harmony
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: One thing I have learned from many years of watching my father is that some people, the best ones, are motivated more by the chance to prove themselves than by a command to serve. It is the work itself that calls them onward, especially if they believe they are the only ones who can do it.
Author: Rae Carson, The Shadow Cats

Quote: When life's got you down, keep your head up... you can't see the ground anyway
Author: Nicole  Rae

Quote: If you want your prayers answered, get up off your knees and do something about them.
Author: Wally Lamb, She's Come Undone

Quote: Strength wasn‘t about being able to do everything alone. Strength was knowing when to ask for help and not being too proud to do it.
Author: Karen Marie Moning, Dreamfever

Quote: In traveling, a companion, in life, compassion,'" she repeats, making sure of it. If she had paper and pencil, it wouldn't surprise me if she wrote it down. "So what does that really mean? In simple terms." I think it over. It takes me a while to gather my thoughts, but she waits patiently. "I think it means," I say, "that chance encounters are what keep us going. In simple terms.
Author: Haruki Murakami, Kafka on the Shore

Quote: The world is my church. My actions are my prayer. My behavior is my creed.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: I have learned that the harder you fall…the higher you bounce!
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Today, you have the opportunity to transcend from a disempowered mindset of existence to an empowered reality of purpose-driven living. Today is a new day that has been handed to you for shaping. You have the tools, now get out there and create a masterpiece.
Author: Steve Maraboli, The Power of One

Quote: Have faith in the universe and its capability to lead you to the path of abundance.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: A great dread fell on him, as if he was awaiting the pronouncement of some doom that he had long foreseen and vainly hoped might after all never be spoken. An overwhelming longing to rest and remain at peace by Bilbo's side in Rivendell filled all his heart. At last with an effort he spoke, and wondered to hear his own words, as if some other will was using his small voice. "I will take the Ring," he said, "though I do not know the way.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien

Quote: I may not be where I want to be, but if I stop now, I'll NEVER get where I'm going!
Author: Laura  Lynch, Mistakes Happen: An Historical Guide to Overcoming Adversity

Quote: Coming to the END of MYSELF and all SELF effort...seems to be the very point that God steps in and shows HIMSELF to be more than ENOUGH.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Pain? Yes, of course. Racing without pain is not racing. But the pleasure of being ahead outweighed the pain a million times over. To hell with the pain. What's six minutes of pain compared to the pain they're going to feel for the next six months or six decades. You never forget your wins and losses in this sport. YOU NEVER FORGET.
Author: Brad Alan Lewis, Assault on Lake Casitas

Quote: Choice forms the divider which is responsible for the formation of all futures that can be possible.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: If the world is a book, are you the hero, or just a walk-on part?
Author: K.J. Parker, The Hammer

Quote: We've also evolved the ability to simply 'pay it forward': I help you, somebody else will help me. I remember hearing a parable when I was younger, about a father who lifts his young son onto his back to carry him across a flooding river. 'When I am older,' said the boy to his father, 'I will carry you across this river as you now do for me.' 'No, you won't,' said the father stoically. 'When you are older you will have your own concerns. All I expect is that one day you will carry your own son across this river as I no do for you.' Cultivating this attitude is an important part of Humanism--to realize that life without God can be much more than a series of strict tit-for-tat transactions where you pay me and I pay you back. Learning to pay it forward can add a tremendous sense of meaning and dignity to our lives. Simply put, it feels good to give to others, whether we get back or not.
Author: Greg M. Epstein, Good Without God: What a Billion Nonreligious People Do Believe

Quote: What if not just women, but both men and women, worked smart, more flexible schedules? What if the workplace itself was more fluid than the rigid and narrow ladder to success of the ideal worker? And what if both men and women became responsible for raising children and managing the home, sharing work, love, and play? Could everyone then live whole lives?
Author: Brigid Schulte, Overwhelmed: Work, Love, and Play When No One Has the Time

Quote: All my life I've been fascinated by the precipice in all of us. When you come to it, you either choose to fall or you don’t --Alvin Ailey
Author: Kathy Petrakis, Passion and Pain

Quote: What we perceive about ourselves is greatly a reflection of how we will end up living our lives.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Stop comparing yourself with others. If they are good at something, you too are good at something else. Self-confidence is not measured by your own capabilities versus that of others, but by your own needs.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: What if I told you 10 years from now your life would be exactly the same?Doubt you'd be happy.So, why are you afraid of change?
Author: Karen Salmansohn

Quote: Each person has got a voice inside them. Communicate with it and take hold of it. Do not let it push and shove you around – you are its master!
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: You’re only responsible for yourself, Jess. And that’s the only person you can control. Other people will either get it or they won’t but you can’t define yourself by their opinions.
Author: Susan Mallery, Sweet Trouble

Quote: Concentrate more on your achievements than your failures. Learn to take the failures as opportunities to rectify your errors.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: How we relate with other people is dependent on how we rate ourselves and what we think about ourselves.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Acknowledgement is possession. When you acknowledge, think or have conviction in something, it actually will come true.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Failures can be called ‘strengtheners’ as they make you determined to reach your goal with the lessons they teach.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Always make your future bigger than your past.
Author: Dan Sullivan, The Quotable Dan Sullivan

Quote: Then holding the star aloft and the bright sword advanced, Frodo, hobbit of the Shire, walked steadily down to meet the eyes.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Two Towers

Quote: According to the Law of Attraction, the physical reality that you experience at present is drawn towards the future probability you desired when it attains more power.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Our own self-esteem is something we can actually twist in whatever way we want.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Self-belief, also called self-efficacy, is the kind of feeling you have when you have, like a Jedi, mastered a particular kind of skill and with its help have been able to achieve your set goals.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Without adversity, there would be no growth, and without growth, there would be no lesson to be learned.
Author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado, Pursuing Your Destiny: How to Overcome Adversity and Achieve Your Dreams

Quote: I don't give up. That makes me incredibly resilient or maybe stupid or just plain stubborn. Whichever...
Author: Destiny Booze

Quote: Five years from today, you will be the same person that you are today, except for the books you read and the people you meet.
Author: Charlie "Tremendous" Jones

Quote: But confining myself more to the particular, I say that a prince may be seen happy to-day and ruined to-morrow without having shown any change of disposition or character. This, I believe, arises firstly from causes that have already been discussed at length, namely, that the prince who relies entirely upon fortune is lost when it changes. I believe also that he will be successful who directs his actions according to the spirit of the times, and that he whose actions do not accord with the times will not be successful. Because men are seen, in affairs that lead to the end which every man has before him, namely, glory and riches, to get there by various methods; one with caution, another with haste; one by force, another by skill; one by patience, another by its opposite; and each one succeeds in reaching the goal by a different method. One can also see of two cautious men the one attain his end, the other fail; and similarly, two men by different observances are equally successful, the one being cautious, the other impetuous; all this arises from nothing else than whether or not they conform in their methods to the spirit of the times. This follows from what I have said, that two men working differently bring about the same effect, and of two working similarly, one attains his object and the other does not.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: There is no real world, just the one you create.
Author: Jolene Stockman, Total Blueprint for World Domination

Quote: In the spiritual world many forms of the physical universe that are potentially effective can be perceived but with regard to time, we can observe only one form.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Leaders in OVER their heads is the mere result of getting ahead of their intended SEASON.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Your only limitations are the ties you allow to bind you.
Author: Saundra Dalton-Smith, Set Free to Live Free: Breaking Through the 7 Lies Women Tell Themselves

Quote: Never let the opinion of another affect your opinion of yourself.
Author: Teresa Mummert

Quote: Encourage, lift and strengthen one another. For the positive energy spread to one will be felt by us all. For we are connected, one and all.
Author: Deborah Day

Quote: Always strive to aim for the highest peak of the goals in life you have set, this way if you manage to reach even half way toward a goal, landing in the middle is not such a bad place to end up.
Author: Victoria Addino

Quote: Limitations are like mirages created by your own mind. When you realise that limitation do not exist, those around you will also feel it and allow you inside their space.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Taking the decision-making process away from people disempowers them. It also makes them much less likely to buy into the decision, however right it may be. One’s own conscience remains the ultimate arbiter.
Author: Lama Surya Das

Quote: When you are drowned by your sorry state, and you feel as if you are carried away from the road that leads to your desires, you should know that you are the one responsible for being led away from the right path.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: One of the Secrets in Life is to Make Stepping Stones out of Stumbling Blocks.
Author: Jack Penn

Quote: If you can't be brave, be determined. And you'll end up in the same place.
Author: Lisa Scottoline, Killer Smile

Quote: In reality there are no limitations. They are vibrant and changeable to whatever form you want them to take to realise your goals.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Be mindful of the link between action and outcome. Ask yourself: If I repeat today's action 365 times, will I be where I want to be in a year?
Author: Guideposts

Quote: Strong lives are motivated by dynamic purposes.
Author: Kenneth Hildebrand

Quote: For that reason, let a prince have the credit of conquering and holding his state, the means will always be considered honest, and he will be praised by everybody because the vulgar are always taken by what a thing seems to be and by what comes of it; and in the world there are only the vulgar, for the few find a place there only when the many have no ground to rest on.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: Life would have been beautiful if there weren't any problems.
Author: Santosh Avvannavar, Black, Grey and White

Quote: Train up a child in such a way she or he should go even when she or he is old she or he will not depart' Proverb
Author: Santosh Avvannavar, God's Table: The Last Supper

Quote: We often fail to see that there is an invisible wall in a relationship - Cord 10, In Between Us!
Author: Santosh Avvannavar

Quote: You spend your TIME to make a DIME. You lose your HEALTH to make your WEALTH, but at the end it is FUNNY because you leave back all your MONEY.
Author: R.v.m.

Quote: People often try to distinguish between personal and professional life, but they end failing - Cord 8 : Are we Computers?
Author: Santosh Avvannavar

Quote: What is done is done for the love of it- or not really done at all.
Author: Robert Frost

Quote: If you take any step, no matter how small it is, towards achieving your dreams then you will surely find the right path and reach the abundance that lies in store for you.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Your core, lying deep within you, is what makes you what you are. Some call it the soul, the Higher Self, the true self, the being and so on. The name is unimportant once you realize that you are more than your looks and outward appearance.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: With every challenge you face, there is an opportunity hidden that will lead you towards the path of wealth and abundance.
Author: Stephen Richards, Be First: Achieve Every Dream

Quote: If someone does not consider those around them to be valuable and hold only themselves in high regard, they too have a very bad self-esteem.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Feeling indifferent or reserved about doing something is a signal that it is probably not correct after all.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: Pure happiness and peace are at their peak when your body is in harmony with itself.
Author: Asa Don Brown, Waiting to Live

Quote: Stop allowing your outdated ideas to hinder your progress. How would your life be different if you became open to new information that can refine, improve, enhance your way of thinking, and empower your way of living?
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: If we can acquire an attitude of self-belief, then we will surely determine our future actions and our future life opportunities.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: The Jedi is a practitioner of mind mastery. He realizes that whatever they are experiencing, they are creating and that they can change their lives in an instant by changing their thoughts, their focus and the way they are observing and engaging the energy of the world around them and the people who they’ve invited into their lives to play whatever roles they’ve chosen them to play.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Gone are the days when 19-inch biceps would once command respect. A Jedi doesn’t walk around with their arms flexed and with a thousand yard stare in their eyes. They walk with a good posture, their head held high and with a serious, yet friendly, look on their face.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Jedi are always assessing situations, actions and possibilities. Jedi don’t just think outside of the box with the help from the Force, they also adapt to situations outside of the box!
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Jedi are conversationalists and negotiators, bringing people together and solving problems. Jedi listen and feel to what others are saying.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: The gratitude that you feel leads to faith in the abundance and with every resonance that radiates from your mind more strong feelings of faith start to reside in you.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: There are two kinds of leaders, cowboys and Shepherds. Cowboys drive and Shepherds lead.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Humans, unlike Jedi, are powerfully afraid of rejection. We do not survive well alone, so humans as a species are especially vulnerable to thoughts that make us afraid the rest of the “tribe” will desert us to die a sad, lonely death.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Every minute doing one thing is a minute not doing something else. Every choice is another choice not made another path grown over lost.
Author: Jerry Weintraub, When I Stop Talking, You'll Know I'm Dead: Useful Stories from a Persuasive Man

Quote: When you act on your beliefs, the realisation that happens is caused by you and this will in turn lead to a consequence.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Tap into ‘The Force’ and soon, at any given time that you need that extra shot of high octane confidence; you will soon be like a Jedi Master at this technique.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Failing to make it to the list of the best 5 students in class or not being named the team captain should not make anyone feel like they have failed.
Author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

Quote: How would your life be different if...You didn’t wait for someone else to fix a problem or social issue? Let today be the day...You take up a cause that you feel in your heart and give your time and efforts towards that cause.
Author: Steve Maraboli, The Power of One

Quote: For young adults,the growth from silly to serious can be very fast, indeed.
Author: Dean Cumings

Quote: I m human, I m not perfect. Although, I make mistakes all the time.
Author: Chetan Bhagat

Quote: Life seems to be fashioned and formed best out of the obstacles that seem unbearable.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: I have not learned a single lesson, been inspired or impacted by another person’s life void of negative experiences.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: The real architect of a life is the hard and almost impossible circumstances one faces.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Nothing is permanent in my mysterious world, even my moments of belief - Jenifer
Author: Durgesh Satpathy, Equating the Equations of Insanity: A Journey from Grief to Victory

Quote: Small thinking and big dreams is an oxymoron
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Like everything else, we know the futility of money only when we have more than enough of it.
Author: R. N. Prasher

Quote: The time is now, the person is you; better your life and become a name to conjure with in this day and age.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha, Overcoming the Challenges of Life

Quote: We don't have to take our personality so personally.
Author: Wes "Scoop" Nisker

Quote: The Sun never sets. It is we who rise think to shine.
Author: Earle Birney

Quote: Self -pity is the worst form of poison. It kills a person without the person realizing it ~ Aarush Kashyap
Author: Kirtida Gautam

Quote: There is nothing that works out for the worst that won't work out for the better.
Author: Karldon Okruta

Quote: Live Life Fully & Abundantly
Author: Gabbriella Conte

Quote: The Sun-Dial at Wells CollegeThe shadow by my finger castDivides the future from the past:Before it, sleeps the unborn hourIn darkness, and beyond thy power:Behind its unreturning line,The vanished hour, no longer thine:One hour alone is in thy hands,--The NOW on which the shadow stands.
Author: Henry Van Dyke

Quote: How far can your imagination take you? I don't know. That's up to you, but I think you should find out.
Author: Destiny Booze

Quote: Most people think the biggest sacrifice, the greates act of love you can give is to die for someone. And probably it is. But Sometimes it is the opposite. The biggest thing you can do for someone is to live.
Author: Sarah Wylie, All These Lives

Quote: The way you live your day is a sentence in the story of your life. Each day you make the choice whether the sentence ends with a period, question mark, or exclamation point.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Acceptance makes an incredible fertile soil for the seeds of change.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Instead of bracing yourself for the perils of the unknown, embrace the joy that is here, in your present moment.
Author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

Quote: Procrastination is the bad habit of putting of until the day after tomorrow what should have been done the day before yesterday.
Author: Napoleon Hill

Quote: A life without regret can be attained by full awareness of one's actions in their present moment.
Author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

Quote: There is a thin line between the impossible and the possible - that is determination.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: ...Or we can blaze! Become legends in our own time, strike fear in the heart of mediocre talent everywhere! We can scald dogs, put records out of reach! Make the stands gasp as we blow into an unearthly kick from three hundred yards out! We can become God's own messengers delivering the dreaded scrolls! We can race dark Satan himself till he wheezes fiery cinders down the back straightaway....They'll speak our names in hushed tones, 'those guys are animals' they'll say! We can lay it on the line, bust a gut, show them a clean pair of heels. We can sprint the turn on a spring breeze and feel the winter leave our feet! We can, by God, let our demons loose and just wail on!
Author: John L. Parker Jr., Once a Runner

Quote: Spirituality is for people. It’s not just for those who you might have read about in books, it’s for people.
Author: Belsebuub

Quote: Who should we be trying to make the most proud? Our family? Our friends? Our teachers or bosses? What about the one who molded us out of the earth itself, who formed us like clay, and instilled within us the very breath of life that shaped the universe?
Author: James D. Maxon

Quote: Death is more uni­ver­sal than life everyone dies but not every­one lives.
Author: Alan Sachs

Quote: Success is within reach of all people, but you can grasp it only when you realise the power within you.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: Circumstances, knowledge or birth do not determine the realisation of your desires. It is only you who are blocking the achievement of your dreams and goals.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: The negative patterns that form as a result of this self defeating behaviour actually symbolize the negative belief that we nurture.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: This inner Being is all powerful, intelligent, indestructible and a storehouse of knowledge and wisdom. This inner core is truly who and what you are and is perpetually trying to connect with your outward self.
Author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

Quote: Just be happy that it is what it is and not what it could be because after all, it could always be worse
Author: Connor George Serbin

Quote: be who you set out to be...
Author: Gino Norris

Quote: Each man follows his own path - his own destiny, if you will. And only he is responsible for the choice.
Author: Heather Graham, Night Moves

Quote: It so happens that at times your desires tend to disagree with the reality and this is due to the fact that you have not let the two elements complement each other.
Author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

Quote: We, as human beings, enjoy freedom of choice.Your attitude is your choice!
Author: Lorii Myers, Targeting Success, Develop the Right Business Attitude to be Successful in the Workplace

Quote: I conclude therefore that, fortune being changeful and mankind steadfast in their ways, so long as the two are in agreement men are successful, but unsuccessful when they fall out. For my part I consider that it is better to be adventurous than cautious, because fortune is a woman, and if you wish to keep her under it is necessary to beat and ill-use her; and it is seen that she allows herself to be mastered by the adventurous rather than by those who go to work more coldly. She is, therefore, always, woman-like, a lover of young men, because they are less cautious, more violent, and with more audacity command her.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: True leaders bring out your personal best. They ignite your human potential”.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: The secret to strong leaders is that strong leaders are strong because they have been tempered by the negative. They have discovered the secret of combining the negative and the positive to PRODUCED their very own POWER plant!
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Everyone has too much of something, whether it’s time, talent or treasure. Everyone does have their own half, you just have to find it.
Author: Hannah Salwen, The Power of Half: One Family's Decision to Stop Taking and Start Giving Back

Quote: I figure, sometimes, bad things happen to us so we can achieve a higher purpose and attain greater happiness and fulfillment in life.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: MY FIVE DOS FOR GETTING BACK INTO THE GAME: 1. Do expect defeat. It’s a given when the stakes are high and the competition is working ferociously to beat you. If you’re surprised when it happens, you’re dreaming; dreamers don’t last long. 2. Do force yourself to stop looking backward and dwelling on the professional “train wreck” you have just been in. It’s mental quicksand. 3. Do allow yourself appropriate recovery—grieving—time. You’ve been knocked senseless; give yourself a little time to recuperate. A keyword here is “little.” Don’t let it drag on. 4. Do tell yourself, “I am going to stand and fight again,” with the knowledge that often when things are at their worst you’re closer than you can imagine to success. Our Super Bowl victory arrived less than sixteen months after my “train wreck” in Miami. 5. Do begin planning for your next serious encounter. The smallest steps—plans—move you forward on the road to recovery. Focus on the fix. MY FIVE DON’TS: 1. Don’t ask, “Why me?” 2. Don’t expect sympathy. 3. Don’t bellyache. 4. Don’t keep accepting condolences. 5. Don’t blame others.
Author: Bill Walsh, The Score Takes Care of Itself: My Philosophy of Leadership

Quote: You have pissed your last in this house . . . and I don't make velvet roses anymore.
Author: Toni Morrison, Song of Solomon

Quote: What would life be if we didn't shake and wake ourselves up once and a while
Author: Heather Richards

Quote: Strange things are always abounding. Watch and discern. There is always a lesson to be learned.
Author: Vanessa Richardson, Love Found Me

Quote: It's simple: What you put in, is what you get out.
Author: Akiroq Brost

Quote: If you dare take the challenge, you will possess the courage to conquer.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Everyone has moments of weakness. But that doesn't make you weak.
Author: Katie Alender, As Dead As It Gets

Quote: Shame and blame should have no place in our body, mind, or spirit.
Author: Asa Don Brown

Quote: If you get clear on the what, the how will be taken care of.
Author: Jack Canfield, The Success Principles: How to Get from Where You Are to Where You Want to Be

Quote: Our perceptions are influenced by our surroundings.
Author: Asa Don Brown, Waiting to Live

Quote: Reach for the sky but keep your feet on the ground
Author: Phil Limbert

Quote: You must take responsibility for removing I can't from your vocabulary.
Author: Jack Canfield, The Success Principles: How to Get from Where You Are to Where You Want to Be

Quote: I ask myself: Are Defeats necessary ?Well,necessary or not, they happen.When we first begin fighting for our dream, we've no experience and make many mistakes.The Secret of life, though,is to fall seven times and to get up eight times !
Author: Paulo Coelho

Quote: Holding on, holding out and holding fast when the going is tough constitutes a winning mindset.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, You Are a Star

Quote: Don't violate the law, but don't reject an idea because it's illegal. You might be able to get the law changed.
Author: Robert H. Schuller

Quote: Make peace with your past so you don't mess up the present!
Author: Marcia Casar Friedman

Quote: If you are not able to see your goals, they will take longer to achieve, and sometimes “longer” is "never.
Author: Honoree Corder, Tall Order! Seven Master Strategies to Organize Your Life and Double Your Success in Half the Time

Quote: It takes understanding to be outstanding
Author: Pastor Simeon Nwani

Quote: Anytime you're afraid to try something new...just remember, amateurs built the ark, professionals built the titanic.
Author: David Drake

Quote: To achieve anything, you must be prepared to dabble on the boundary of disaster.
Author: Stirling Moss

Quote: The “Warrior Ethos” emphasizes placing the mission first, not accepting defeat, and being disciplined physically and mentally. Why? Because an American Soldier is a “guardian of freedom and the American way of life.
Author: Dan Smee, Totally American: Harnessing the Dynamic Duo of Optimism and Resilience to Achieve Success

Quote: Get a grip on yourself. there's only one god here on earth, and that's you. If you don't like the world, make one you like better.
Author: Yasmina Khadra

Quote: Without inspiration the best powers of the mind remain dormant. There is a fuel in us which needs to be ignited with sparks.
Author: Johann Gottfried Herder

Quote: Shrug off the no’s – they are temporary. This is your world. In your world there is only yes.
Author: Jolene Stockman, Total Blueprint for World Domination

Quote: Trust your passion, identify your dreams, and find the courage to share them with others, no matter how many times they call you a fool.
Author: Bill Strickland, Make the Impossible Possible: One Man's Crusade to Inspire Others to Dream Bigger and Achieve the Extraordinary

Quote: Submission to what people call their 'lot' is simply ignoble. If your lot makes you cry and be wretched, get rid of it and take another.
Author: Elizabeth von Arnim

Quote: Along our chosen paths, we all meet up with demons. We must meet them, and battle them, even when they are nothing but mist in the night.
Author: Heather Graham, Night Moves

Quote: Great treasures bring out great greed in the hearts of men and great greed has been the downfall of many nations. - from "Opoponax Dreams
Author: Genieve Dawkins

Quote: Confidence can be learned - but not from a book. Confidence comes from from living.
Author: Saskia Shakin, More Than Words Can Say

Quote: ...[I]ron discipline does not preclude but presupposes criticism and contest of opinion within the Party. Least of all does it mean that discipline must be 'blind'. On the contrary, iron discipline does not preclude but presupposes conscious and voluntary submission, for only conscious discipline can be truly iron discipline.
Author: Joseph Stalin

Quote: For this reason a prince ought to take care that he never lets anything slip from his lips that is not replete with the above-named five qualities, that he may appear to him who sees and hears him altogether merciful, faithful, humane, upright, and religious. There is nothing more necessary to appear to have than this last quality, inasmuch as men judge generally more by the eye than by the hand, because it belongs to everybody to see you, to few to come in touch with you. Every one sees what you appear to be, few really know what you are, and those few dare not oppose themselves to the opinion of the many, who have the majesty of the state to defend them; and in the actions of all men, and especially of princes, which it is not prudent to challenge, one judges by the result.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: I'm not happy when I'm writing, but I'm more unhappy when I'm not.
Author: Fannie Hurst

Quote: Living life ONCE is enough...if you live life RIGHT.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Life of any real value or substance is not formed during good times merely enjoyed.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Don't go downhill just because it's easy. The view is only visible from the top.
Author: Destiny Booze

Quote: She sincerely wishes success, for her new life, and intends that no failure of effort, temper, or spirits on her part will jeopardise it.
Author: Jude Morgan, Indiscretion

Quote: Right beneath the numerous sufferings in life lies the precious gift called success.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: ... Gunpei Yokoi, asked his boss, 'What should I make?' Nintendo chief executive Hiroshi Yamauchi replied, 'Something great.'Game Over Nintendo's Battle to Dominate Videogames
Author: David Sheff

Quote: Man is not merely born to make money. But to fulfill is mission.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We cannot walk alone. And as we walk, we must make the pledge that we shall always march ahead. We cannot turn back.
Author: Martin Luther King Jr., I Have a Dream: Writings and Speeches That Changed the World

Quote: If you are going to be successful, you need to give up the phrase, "I can't" & all of its cousins, such as "I wish I were able to.
Author: Jack Canfield, How to Get from Where You Are to Where You Want to Be: The 25 Principles of Success

Quote: You can keep pondering on which thing to do first or which path to take or by simply taking action now of most any kind, you may just find yourself on the way to where you most needed to go.
Author: April Bryan

Quote: A man who has come to the full realization of his responsibility to men won't stick to one man. It will be foolhardy if he does that.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: Perform your task and I shall know you. Perform your task and your genius shall befriend the more.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: Failure does not connote that you achieved nothing. It denotes that you are on an adventure towards finding what will eventually advance you to the realization of your goals.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

Quote: When a man begins to do that which is assigned to him, it becomes as if he is more endowed and favoured than his fellows.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: When you start to accept responsibility for the results you get in life, you also take back the power to change your future outcome.
Author: Kevin Ngo, Let's Do This! 100 Powerful Messages to Help You Take Action

Quote: Just like waves in the ocean come and go, no challenge is permanent. Problems will come and go too. We must enjoy the Challenges just like we enjoy the Waves. - RVM.
Author: R.v.m.

Quote: Over the years, I've come to realize that determination makes one to punch above one's weight.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: With a decision and a defined purpose, you can begin work.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: That failure serves a purpose!
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

Quote: Live! Don't just Exist!!! Don't drag through Life...Live each day as a Celebration.-RVM
Author: R.v.m.

Quote: Let's always try to paint the truth ... our art must be made to mean something.
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri, Brushstrokes of a Gadfly

Quote: Problems are everywhere, so are Solutions. Unfortunately, we see more of the Problems than the Solutions.-RVM
Author: R.v.m.

Quote: It’s been said that legends are those who shape change into greatness shaping change is one of the hallmarks of genius.
Author: Julian Pencilliah, The Jetstream : The Rio Carnival

Quote: RVM Thoughts for Today - "Things will happen.You can't stop them from happening, but you can control your reaction from making things worse . React Positively. Live Happily
Author: R.v.m.

Quote: Wisdom comes from knowing the order of things...and you are the first order of your business.
Author: Elaine Marolakos Edelson, Aries Fire

Quote: The enemy of art is the absence of limitations.
Author: Orson Welles

Quote: I acquired courage from the masterpieces of sages. I came of age by their instructions to keep going, even in hard times. Then I learnt not to despair, even when it seemed that my world is falling apart. I learnt to possess fortitude.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: Men's best successes come after their disappointments.
Author: Henry Ward Beecher

Quote: The slogans “hang on” and “press on” have solved and will continue to solve the problems of humanity.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: Maybe the secret to continued success is as simple as knowing that your past successes could be done so much better now.
Author: Bill Loguidice

Quote: If humans can live for 100 years, why do companies die so young.
Author: Sukant Ratnakar, Open the Windows

Quote: Are you seeking to be offended?
Author: Asa Don Brown, Waiting to Live

Quote: The real beginning of influence comes as others sense you are being influenced by them--when they feel understood by you--that you have listened deeply and sincerely, and that you are open.
Author: Stephen Cove

Quote: We do not just go through life blindly,we create our own journey.Your faith has sculpted you into the human being you have become.
Author: Judie McCarty, Finding Your Wings: Unleashing Your Creative  Powers

Quote: Are you living in the moment?
Author: Asa Don Brown, Waiting to Live

Quote: What is an unconditional state?
Author: Asa Don Brown, Waiting to Live

Quote: Fool! The Ideal is in thyself, the impediment too is in thyself: thy Condition is but the stuff thou art to shape that same Ideal out of: what matters whether such stuff be of this sort or that, so the Form thou give it be heroic, be poetic? O thou that pinest in the imprisonment of the Actual, and criest bitterly to the gods for a kingdom wherein to rule and create, know this of a truth: the thing thou seekest is already with thee, ‘here or nowhere,’ couldst thou only see!
Author: Thomas Carlyle, Sartor Resartus

Quote: Ye are most strong, ye Sons of the icy North, of the far East, far marching from your rugged Eastern Wildernesses, hither-ward from the gray Dawn of Time! Ye are Sons of the Jotun-land; the land of Difficulties Conquered. Difficult? You must try this thing. Once try it with the understanding that it will and shall have to be done. Try it as ye try the paltrier thing, making of money! I will bet on you once more, against all Jo'tuns, Tailor-gods, Double-barrelled Law-wards, and Denizens of Chaos whatsoever!
Author: Thomas Carlyle, Past and Present

Quote: Look around you. Your world-hosts are all in mutiny, in confusion, destitution; on the eve of fiery wreck and madness! They will not march farther for you, on the sixpence a day and supply-demand principle; they will not; nor ought they, nor can they. Ye shall reduce them to order, begin reducing them. to order, to just subordination; noble loyalty in return for noble guidance. Their souls are driven nigh mad; let yours be sane and ever saner.
Author: Thomas Carlyle, Past and Present

Quote: We cannot put off living until we are ready. The most salient characteristic of life is its coerciveness: it is always urgent, ‘here and now,’ without any postponement. Life is fired at us point-blank.
Author: José Ortega y Gasset

Quote: Jenifer always taught me that starting a job was one thing―—and admirable―—but that following through and completing―—well, that’s where the bravery is.
Author: Valerie Estess, Tales from the Bed

Quote: North Carolina has a monument to [Peter Francisco], and no one knows that. That's the kind of stuff that drives me.
Author: Travis Bowman, Hercules of the Revolution: A Novel Based on the Life of Peter Francisco

Quote: (The subjects of What Should I Do With The Rest Of My Life) "have convinced me that past failing can as easily prove preparatory as predictive. Age does not of itself limit on enable us. The choice is ours.
Author: Bruce Frankel
