Quote: Someday you shall meet someoneWho's gonna look at you in awe-Flying high, wings all spread,And wonder how it'd be likeTo clip those wings,Tie those feet down,And cage you forever...When you hit the ground,Remember to run
Author: Sanhita Baruah

Quote: Turn your self-hell into self-help.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: When we suffer we inspire ourselves to change. Imagine we had no pain to overcome, we would not take action to make our life any more meaningful. Turn your suffering into motivation to change.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Look closely at your greatest thoughts about yourself. That's your future.
Author: Quang Nguyen

Quote: One mind, One master.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Be true to your sacred self.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Inhale courage, exhale fear.
Author: Unknown

Quote: To everyone who gets me, thank you. To everyone who doesn't, thank you too. You give me the motivation to keep succeeding just to piss you off.
Author: Shane Dawson, It Gets Worse: A Collection of Essays

Quote: When you hide your flaws you only give them the power to dominate your life. Every time that you fake who you are to cover your flaws, they become stronger and visible to your own eye. You become comfortable with working every day to hide them from everyone else's view. And maybe you try to show the world those flaws but they are rejected because you've hidden them for so long that they couldn't possibly be a true part of you. But then, you show them to the world every day, day after day, and they finally start to disappear from view because they really never were a really big deal in the first place. Accept your flaws or you will never truly be able to live with them.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Sometimes, we can't see our progress. We live our lives every day and can't see how much has changed. I think we all need a piece of reality every once in a while, some item to show us how far we have come from our past to our present. We get so lost in trying to get gratification for our work right away that we forget our small progressive steps. And then, we get a reality check, we see a piece of our past that shows us that everything we've done thus far has been worth it. Maybe you see a piece of writing that you wrote a few years ago, a sketch from the past, or even, like me, you try on a pair of pants that you haven't worn in a few months. And suddenly, everything has become worth it. Your struggle becomes your success. All those days you felt like giving up but you didn't mark the pathway to your future. So keep trying, day after day and look back to the past with a smile.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Stop changing yourself for the sake of other people. You shouldn't care what strangers think and true friends won't ask you to change.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When you start believing that you are too old to enjoy something, you lose so much joy in your life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Do not refuse to help your own relatives.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: But God demonstrates His own love towards us, in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us. Romans 5:8
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I think there’s a point in everyone’s life where they realize that despite their best efforts, they have no choice but to surrender. That carrying on will only bring them more pain or heartache. I don’t think there’s any way that we can avoid these moments. But I just want you to know that I’m not quite there yet.
Author: Tessa Clare, The Divinity Bureau

Quote: Sometimes in life, you have to take difficult steps and make tough decisions, in order to achieve something extraordinary.
Author: Saad  Salman

Quote: It pierced through me like the ray of sun through the darknessAnd I was awakened like the dawnIt hit me just as the lightning strikes in the middle of the stormAnd I'm electrified to the boneFIRE IN MEIt rushed through me like the wind in the cold desert nightAnd my heart is chilled by the fire in meThe fire that guides my wayThe fire that keeps my dreams burning
Author: Evy Michaels

Quote: When nothing is certain in your life, you have a blank canvas to work with. You can determine a new future for yourself with passionate actions. You can pursue anything that you put your mind to. When things seem uncertain it is the best time to take action.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: This time will never come again in your life. Enjoy every moment, right now, before the time is gone.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: The most important journey in your life will be the journey to find yourself. To find who you are, to find what you love, is the greatest gift in life. Look at yourself, honestly, and find who you really are. To reveal your true self might be scary but the act of learning who you really are is important to make it possible to live your best possible life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If you were to wake up tomorrow to a life where all your goals had been accomplished but had no memory of the work you put into succeeding, would you feel the happiness that you would have if you had completed your goals yourself? Probably not. Sure, perhaps you would live happily for a while given that you are suddenly living a dream life but in the long run something would be wrong. You wouldn’t have learned the lessons you needed to maintain this new lifestyle. You see, the success is found in the journey, not the finish line. You need to learn the lessons that come with working hard, failing, trying again, and, eventually, succeeding at living the life you have always wanted.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: The best way to achieve lasting change in your life is to act slowly and persistently. Do not make radical changes in your life that you have not yet learned to maintain. Act with deliberate care and decisiveness and allow yourself to make the changes you need in your life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Make a choice. Right now. Are you going to change your life or remain where you are? If you have decided to remain where you are, come back to this question in the future. If you have decided to change, be firm with your decision, do not let yourself or anyone else change your mind. This is your path now, the path of positive self-change. I cannot tell you how you must invoke change to your own life but I can say this will be the most beneficial journey you will ever make.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Release the stress you are holding. Feel the tension leave your body. Now, look at the root of your stress. Find your solution in a moment of calm, not anxiety.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When you keep telling yourself that you are going to start in the future you are really telling yourself that you will never start. The future will never come. You have to get past the excuses that you are giving yourself that prevent you from starting today, right now. If you keep letting yourself tell you lies you will never find the success you are searching for.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Live without expectations. Don’t set parameters on your life by telling yourself that something can only be enjoyed if it is a certain way. Allow life to surprise you. Keep an open mind and enjoy all of life’s treasures.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: We are always planning, telling ourselves that once we figure out the perfect system we will be all set to find our dreams. There is no planning for your dreams. Dreams are a learning process. You need to begin acting towards them or you will make no progress. You can plan the most perfect plan there ever was but with life anything can happen and you need to act as soon as possible rather than wait.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Let your mind have peace for a moment. Push away all the anxious thoughts. Release your tension and breath. Everything is going to work out. It might not be fine now but trust that in time everything will be okay. Allow yourself to rest. Put a hold on your stress. You can always pick up your stress at another time. Breathe. Be calm. Trust in yourself.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Don't believe that the day is without good. The very fact that you are consciously here today is a blessing of itself. Every breath you breathe, step you take, day you live is the greatest gift you can ever receive. Don't let those gifts fall away unappreciated. Live with joy in every moment.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Be kind to others and you will find that others are kind to you. Being positive will spread positivity back to you. If you give out a pleasant energy, you will receive a pleasant energy.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: You have to keep trying whether you feel like you can or not. Your future will thank you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When your time is gone it is gone forever. Take action before your time is gone. Live now.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When a bad thought pops into your head it has no power. Thoughts are weak until you give them attention. Your attention makes them grow stronger. If you keep thinking those bad thoughts, they will consume your life. And when you let go of them, they will leave, fading away just as they came. Focus on the thoughts that make you happy. Focus on the positive and your positivity will grow stronger.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When you commit to doing something every day it is hard. It seems impossible and you want to quit but if you just hang in there you will see it gets easier. Every day you get a little stronger. Every day you try a little harder. There will be times when you want to quit. Your mind will tell you to stop. You need to persist. You need to continue trying every single day. And one day you will notice how easy it has become to do something that seemed so hard in the beginning.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If you fail today there is always tomorrow to try again. You always have that second chance tomorrow.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: One of the bravest things you can do is take action towards your dreams. To overcome the fear that holds you back makes you so strong. Your mind will tell you no while your heart says yes and you have to choose which side you will fall on. Let your choice be to take action for the pursuit of your life goals. You may not succeed right away, but had you not taken action, you would never have succeeded anyway. Be brave.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Your actions should reflect what you feel your life should reflect. All action should be to better your life. Your life is your actions, not your inaction. It is not what you say you will do or what others think of what you are doing. It is all the positive and negative things you have done in your life. Act positively for a positive life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Do not change yourself to please others, change yourself to please yourself. You are the person that truly matters in your life. You are the person you wake up to every morning and fall asleep to every night. Your life is for you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Everyone should give their dream a chance. Don't give up before you've even started. Let your actions push you to your dreams and don't let the thought of failure be the thing that stops you. It may be hard and you may struggle, but in the end, you can have the pride in saying you tried your hardest to get what you wanted and let nothing stand in your way.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Overcome obstacles as they come rather than worry about when they will arrive.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Everything you do has an effect on your life. It may be positive or negative. If you do positive things in your life, your life will give you positive experiences. If you live a negative life, it is a sign that you must change your actions in the day. Act more positively and your life will be more positive.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If we had given up too soon, we would have miss the sunniest of today.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You'll see so much more beauty in the world if you can accept that there is good in every little thing around you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: There are two steps to achieving your dreams. Believe you can do anything you put your mind to. Put your mind to it.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Set your mark on humanity by being your own unique self and doing the things that make your heart shine. With such passion, you can make an impact on the world.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When people attempt to morph themselves into someone they are not as a way of conforming to their view of how they should be, they quell the very parts of themselves that makes them who they need to be. If we all fell under the category of normal, how would anyone ever succeed? We would all hover in the same place forever. No one would improve. Everyone would remain idle. We may even all begin to retrogress. I believe that part of being human is to have the ability to change and improve yourself. Be who you need to be, not who you think you should be.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Simply be and let your being be happy.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: I have no regrets from my past only pride over how far I have come to be the person I am today and hope that tomorrow I will be even better.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Support those that have supported you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Take care of your health. Don't look for one quick fix to cure all your ailments. Take the time every day to help your mind, body, and soul heal. It is extremely important for your daily happiness to know that you are supporting your health instead of hurting it.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Take the time today to love yourself. You deserve it.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: To become the best possible you, you must not only work on improving yourself but on improving others as well. You learn to help yourself when you learn how others need help. We are all just human and are more similar to each other than we might admit. Where others struggle you may struggle too and by seeing their problems from a different perspective you can help find the solutions that you both need.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Let the past be the past as you make your way into the future.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: The more you think change is outside of yourself the more you reinforce the idea that you do not hold the power of change inside of you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If you keep doing what you have always done, your life will never change. Change your routine.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If you hide your problems and never let yourself get help from yourself and others, those problems will always be lurking inside of you beneath the surface.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: The best investment you can make is an investment in yourself. Spend your time, money, and energy on improving your life and self.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: A life lived every day doing only what needs to be done may seem convenient but your heart and soul don't live for convenience they live for exploration, imagination and the pursuit of dreams. Do what must be done but also do what your heart and soul want done.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Stop spending your energy on thoughts you don't want and things you don't need. Spend your energy on the thoughts, people, things and dreams you do want. You only have so much energy in the day; spend it wisely.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: It's okay to be nervous, scared, angry or sad sometimes so long as you don't let those emotions rule your entire life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Shift your focus from your fears to your dreams. Let the love, passion and utter awesomeness of your dreams guide you through life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Try this:Wake up and say thank you to the universe for all the good things you have in your life. Appreciate.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Look around and marvel at the amazing world that surrounds your everyday life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When you feel that there is something wrong with your life, you must be willing to change your perspective, thoughts, and actions to fix it. Your perspective is the only thing stopping you from having a better, happier life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If you want change you must take full responsibility for yourself. No one else defines how you live. You are the only one with the power for your self-change.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Start each action with overwhelming positivity enthusiasm and each action will be overwhelmingly successful.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: One day of positive thinking won't change your life. You must actively; every day, be working to change your thoughts into positive ones. The work you put into changing your life is the progress you get out.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If you spend your time trying to become who everyone else wants you to be, you will be torn apart. There is no way to be perfect in a world with so many different opinions on the right way to be. If you want to feel whole, you have to live as who you believe you need to be.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Every action you make changes the world in a little way. Let your actions be positive and be a benefit to the world. Everything you do, say or make is an original piece added to the world; it cannot be replicated or replaced. Let your unique self change the world around you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Talk to yourself. Tell yourself you are beautiful. Tell yourself you are strong. See all the beauty that you have inside and speak it aloud. Let your mind see yourself in a positive light.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Imagination can turn any situation into a positive situation. Let your creativity run wild. Let yourself create new worlds, new times and new thoughts. Don't think yourself immature for having fun in dull times. Let that creativity flow into your everyday life and create beautiful new experiences.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Positive change doesn't come on its own. If you want something to change you have to take action and stand up for yourself. Change doesn't come without work; time and labour. No one can come in and do all the work for you. If you want change, you must make the change yourself.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Do what you can today. And keep working up until you can do everything you want to do in the day, every day.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Stop overthinking. You can do it.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Don't let bad feelings follow you from day to day. Let each day be a new start for better times.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Keep growing, even when times are tough. Learn the lessons you need to learn and keep changing. Keep growing stronger. You have made it this far and you can make it through all the hard times ahead. Stay strong.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Soar your wings high in the heavenly sky.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Never stop being yourself. When you start faking who you are, you start lying to yourself. You can lie about who you are to the people around you, and they may even believe you, but when you lie to yourself something will always feel wrong. You can't fake who you are forever and eventually, you will wear yourself down. This doesn't mean that you must remain the way you are forever. You can change yourself with time and practice. You will feel the difference between true change and fake change. True change requires work. That work is worth it.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Lay the foundations for your future now. Try to do a little bit every day and let it slowly add up. Every bit of work you do for your future is worth it.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Why is there never enough time to pursue my dreams? Yet, I have time to browse memes, laugh at cats doing silly things, and stare off into the distance. My dream is to do what I love and yet I still don't pursue that dream. When we fear failure we allow ourselves to fail every day by not pursuing our dreams.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: The thoughts that pass through your mind are merely strangers passing on the street. You can choose to stop them to have a chat or to simply pass them by, fleeting and never to be seen again. You choose which thoughts come to your home, which thoughts influence you, which thoughts change you. If you strike up a conversation with a negative thought, you get to decide how often that thought comes around or how often you let it work against you. Simply choose to pass the negative thoughts on the street. Make friends with your positive thoughts.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Do not ever think that you are too small to make a difference in the world. You may not be able to change the entire world but you are able to change the world you see and the world of the people around you. Let your being resonate as a positive influence to those that make up your world.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Always strive to be a better person. No matter what. Do not try to be better than your fellow man but to be better than you were yesterday. Compare yourself only to your past you. Any bit of progress that you make of improving yourself, no matter how small, makes a positive impact in your life and in the lives of others around you. A little bit every day. Try.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Let your life be a reflection of your bravery not of your fear. Someone who does not take risks and leave their comfort zone will remain stagnant. They will never change, never move, never leave the place they are right now. Be brave in the face of your fears.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Never put aside what you can do today. If you keep pushing your responsibilities to the side, one day they will catch up in unfavorable ways. Just do a little bit every day. If you are consistent, you will get the results you want.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Allow yourself to make mistakes. There will always be times in your life when you fail but you can make that failure into a success by choosing to learn from it. Tomorrow is another day and another chance to succeed. Try again.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If every problem you encountered was easily overcome, would you be the strong person you are today?
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Choose to regret nothing in your life. The only thing you can change is your future.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Live knowing that your choices today will create your tomorrow. Every action you make to improve yourself will improve your life. Little by little. Try.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Every day you grow stronger and the challenges become easier. Keep going.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Anxiety does not make a future situation turn out better if anything it stops you from reaching your highest potential. Relax and live in the present, not the future.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: There is no set moment in your life that will define you. Every moment is a chance to change your life for better or worse. Choose to change now.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Bad doesn't leave your life until you start consciously injecting good into your life through positive thinking.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: It is in the pursuit of a goal that happiness is found. Achievement is shortlived compared to the satisfaction found in knowing that you have consistently worked towards your goals. Dream big, work hard and find even bigger dreams to pursue.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Fear of change doesn't fade away. If you want to get past it, you must be brave and take action. It may be hard but things will stay the same way forever if you don't.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Be ready for the opportunities that arise when you have the courage to open your heart to everything your soul loves.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: What you think about is what you get. The more you think about something, the more it manifests in your life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Life is about balance. Too much work and you'll lose your spirit. Too much leisure and your dreams fall away from you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Purposefully look for something beautiful today.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: I will die, yes, that is true, but first I will live to my heart's content.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Inaction only makes a task more daunting in your eye. Act quickly, before you overthink, get anxious or give up.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: God's knows what is best for us.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Examine the energy you are sending into the world. Is it positive, loving and hopeful or is it negative, hostile and angry?
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Don't stress over being yourself. The act of being yourself is simply to be. Be without changing yourself for others. Simply be.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Expect good to happen in your day and you'll find that good things start to happen.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Do what you are passionate about. Do it for yourself, nobody else.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If you love to do something, what is stopping you from doing it? Make the time. Show your passion. Shine on.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Change is a slow process. Keep going toward your goals. When you feel like giving up, remember how good it will feel to change your life into the wonderful life you have imagined.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When the yoke is broken, the burden is removed.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I have a big heart and give with love everywhere I go, i am hungry for life and if you do me bad you will be my fucking dinner.
Author: John Maiorana (oohGiovanni)

Quote: The Stone Age didn’t end because people ran out of stones. It ended because people kept learning and improving
Author: JOHN C MAXWELL

Quote: Feed your soul; books, places, people, anything. That helps it grow.
Author: M.L. Shanahan

Quote: Simple is complicated.
Author: HEDoffice

Quote: We are all looking for perfection in our lives, but the truth is, there is no perfect. There’s just better and worse. And for what we are in this world, not being perfect is the perfect thing.
Author: Hamid Saleh

Quote: Be careful how you live your life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Be careful whose advice you heed to!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The royal power is the grace to act right.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: To be at rest is to be at peace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Experience everything but cling to what is right.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: At the end of the story of my life, I want to say it was the best book I had ever read.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: If the Opportunity is not there, You be there for it!
Author: Nabil Basma

Quote: Stop making excuses. You are not missing the tools to do what you want to do, you are missing the drive to get it done. Get started. Just a little bit every day and watch it all start to come your way. Good luck. - Avina Celeste
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Stop making excuses. You are not missing the tools to do what you want to do, you are missing the drive to get it done. Get started. Just a little bit every day and watch it all start to come your way. Good luck.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Never let your fears hold you back. Fears are not easily overcome but when you take the time to be brave it is worth the struggle.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Things will happen in your life that you have no control over but that doesn't mean you are at the complete mercy of the unknown. You will always have power over your reaction to the outside world. That is your power. It is the power that can change your life if you choose to use it. Never believe that you have no control over your life, you have so much more control over your life than you can even imagine. So be active in changing your life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Your perception of reality is not set in stone. It is flexible. If you are willing to work towards changing your perception, you can bend your reality. You can see a more positive life around you. You can see the beauty in the world. If you actively look for the good in the world, eventually your world will change. Look for the little things until the big things come into the picture.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: We can't help the way we're born. We can't help what we are, only what life we choose to make for ourselves.
Author: Leigh Bardugo, Wonder Woman: Warbringer

Quote: Our light shall burn the pathway to the stars
Author: Mladen Đorđević, Svetioničar - Vesnici oluje

Quote: You require a certain amount of insanity to make your dreams come true!
Author: Gaurav Atulkumar Singh, Advent of the Proxy

Quote: My meanness has an ego too, often bigger than my own.
Author: Angelos Michalopoulos, The man who has only one truth in him

Quote: These are things you should notice anyway. To live only for some future goal is shallow. It's the sides of the mountain which sustain life, not the top. Here's where things grow…but of course, without the top you can't have any sides. It's the top that defines the sides
Author: Robert Persig

Quote: These are things you should notice anyway. To live only for some future goal is shallow. It's the sides of the mountain which sustain life, not the top. Here's where things grow…but of course, without the top you can't have any sides. It's the top that defines the sides.
Author: Robert Persig

Quote: Do all the work you can, while you can.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Manipulative Leaders Create Distrust and selfishnessTransactional Leaders Create Mediocrity and complacencyMotivational Leaders Create Positivity and ActionInfluential Leaders Create Growth and Empowerment Servant-Leaders Create Authenticity and Explosive GrowthTransformational Leaders Create Change and Leave Legacies
Author: Farshad Asl

Quote: World is so beautiful when you look beyond your self-interest. Success and self do not work together. Rise up the ordinary.
Author: Mayur Ramgir

Quote: Dreams are for doers.
Author: T.C. Peterson, Dreams Are For Doers: Get Off The Pity Train And Get What You Want

Quote: Nobody intentionally sets out to fail or dwell in mediocrity.
Author: T.C. Peterson, Dreams Are For Doers: Get Off The Pity Train And Get What You Want

Quote: Even if you become the most perfect version of yourself, someone will find something negative to say.
Author: T.C. Peterson

Quote: I feel that luck is preparation meeting opportunity.
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Quote: Success is more than just power or not violating the rights of others it is the privilege of contributing to the betterment of others.
Author: John C. Maxwell, Be All You Can Be

Quote: Here's a good phrase for you to jot down: wherever you are, be there! Be there to absorb it. Take a picture if you can. Take pictures in your mind; let your soul and heart take pictures. Get it, capture it, absorb it. And don't be casual in getting it. Casualness leads to casualties.
Author: Jim Rohn, Leading an Inspired Life

Quote: If I don't keep complaining about my problems, it doesn't mean I have fewer of them, all it means is I can handle them better.
Author: EverSkeptic

Quote: The only difference between a happy and an unhappy person is that the former values what he has and the latter always values what he hasn't
Author: EverSkeptic

Quote: The snooze button is useless is you love life enough to get up on time.
Author: Virginia Phillips

Quote: The snooze button is useless if you love life enough to get up on time.
Author: Virginia Phillips

Quote: Being a stoic does not mean being a robot. Being a stoic means remaining calm both at the height of pleasure and the depths of misery.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, 7 Billion Gods: Humans Above All

Quote: Act and opportunities will manifest. There is no such thing as luck. There is only causality. Are you strong enough to cause something to happen – that’s the question.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, 7 Billion Gods: Humans Above All

Quote: The traveler knows the grace of travel.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.
Author: Franz Kafka

Quote: Find Meaning, Find Yourself.
Author: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

Quote: Troubles teaches the grace of the Truth.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: How could you be sad, when you can sing?
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It is better to be sorrowful than sad.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Stop talking filthy things, It doesn't help anyone.
Author: Satish David

Quote: A real life doesn't ask you to stop and move back it always says Move On
Author: Myra Yadav

Quote: When you are being tested from every angle, why, with no apparent cause. Look inwards. stand up for yourself.. it's something you need to work on that is being highlighted. Finish acknowledging the whispers from your inner self. You left no choice but to have it reflected externally for all to see.
Author: Virginia Toole

Quote: You can best write about your own experiences.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The soul suffers to the pain for the neglect of the spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Be watchful of the dangers of pleasure.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The Savior ,the Lord Jesus Christ is holy servant.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Imagine a life, full of love?
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you wish for pearls, pray always.

Quote: The treasure of a lifetime lies in the sacredness of the heart.

Quote: When you can't turn back, just keep on going!

Quote: Be joyful in tribulations.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.

Quote: Death is a strange thing. People live their whole lives as if it does not exist, and yet it's often one of the great motivations for living. Some of us, in time, become so conscious of it that we live harder, more obstinately, with more fury.
Author: Fredrik Backman, A Man Called Ove

Quote: Troubles teaches us what we fail to learn.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Life is always great, when shared in a spirit of love.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You have to be alive in order to live.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: But wether I am faking on a player piano, or striking the chords with the power of my own mind and hands, the song of my life is equally suspenseful and full of surprises as it rolls off the pulsating sounding board of destiny - a barcarole that either way will leave, I hope, happy echoes behind
Author: Eric Berne, What Do You Say After You Say Hello?

Quote: Blessed is the womb that born you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You may think I am falling, ... I’ m stronger than I have ever been
Author: Virginia Toole

Quote: Thanks to you my toughest life lessons.. it may appear that I'm falling, ... but, I' m stronger than I have ever been
Author: Virginia Toole

Quote: Only with grace, can we reach the goal.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Don't assume it will work for you because it has worked for everybody else, the singular reason is because you ain't everybody else; You should also never assume it won't work for you because it hasn't work for anybody else, the singular reason is because you ain't anybody else!
Author: Emmanuel Serenity

Quote: It is not by strength that one prevails. But by the grace of prayer in the spirit of perseverance.
Author: Lailah Gifty, Akita

Quote: Our confidence is the grace of faith in Jesus Christ.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: A man need is pain to be delivered from the pleasure of sin.
Author: Lailah Gifty, Akita

Quote: With the strength of grace, we can survive any situation.

Quote: Just for the record: happiness is not bullshit.
Author: Andrew Sean Greer, Less

Quote: Blessed your mum, who carried you in a womb for nine months.

Quote: You can fight the feelings of depression by reminding yourself of blessings in your life. You can listen to music or sing. Even getting your mind off yourself by doing something kind for someone else will help immensely. Don't forget that our moods are connected to our thoughts; therefore, I urge you to take notice of what you're thinking about when you feel depressed. You may find the source of your problem.
Author: Joyce Meyer, Living Beyond Your Feelings: Controlling Emotions So They Don't Control You

Quote: A shared life is a sacred love.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If we seek solitary retreat, you will be more often refreshed.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Rough times arouse the search for the right ways.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Our fantasies are our realities in an excuse-free world.
Author: Jen Sincero, You Are a Badass: How to Stop Doubting Your Greatness and Start Living an Awesome Life

Quote: You are not supposed to ever like your responsibilities. If you avoid them, the consequences will get to you.
Author: Aryan Chitale

Quote: The peace within is the power of the Holy Spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not harm your neighbour, who live trustfully near you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Live your desired dream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Author: Mel Robbins, The 5 Second Rule: Transform Your Life, Work, and Confidence with Everyday Courage

Quote: Salvation not shared, is salvation wasted.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: The spiritual is slave to righteousness in Christ Jesus.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I was not born with a silver spoon in my mouth, nor did I have access to information like you do today via the internet. I had to learn everything the hard way. And I had to become a scientist the old-fashioned way, which is, not through academia, but through trial and error. And my hardship opened up unforeseen gateways of perception in my mind. And through these gateways, today the whole world is able to see its inner self.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

Quote: Sanctification is rebirth of spirit of soul by the power of the Holy Spirit,
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The spiritual is a slave to righteousness in Christ Jesus.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Flee from sexual immorality. Every other sin a man can commit is outside his body, but he who sins sexually sins against his own body. 1 Corinthians 6:18
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Therefore, since Christ suffered in His body, arm yourselves with the same resolve, because anyone who has suffered in his body is done with sin. 1 Peter 4:1
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Life is a service. Serve in the grace of strength within thy soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: What God want me to be, I shall be by His grace.

Quote: Learning before working is better and cheaper than learning while working!

Quote: A smile is a sunny spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: There is a greater grace for every great sin.

Quote: It is better to be foolish wise than wise foolish.

Quote: Whoever works knows the grace of labour of life.

Quote: You may not have connections, or an education, or wealth, but with enough passion and sweat, you can make anything happen.

Quote: If you really want to dominate the competition and make big bucks, you’ve got to be the best. Do that, be that, and no one will be able to touch you. With one exception. Someone with less passion and talent and poorer content can totally beat you if they’re willing to work longer and harder than you are. Hustle is it.
Author: Gary Vaynerchuk, Crush It!: Why Now Is the Time to Cash In on Your Passion

Quote: Travelling unveils new dimensions of this world not known to the naked eye.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: don't try to be best, try to give your best.
Author: kurbhatt

Quote: Let others scream, because ultimately you know your story
Author: Prateek Tripathi

Quote: You become what you digest into your spirit. Whatever you think about, focus on, read about, talk about, you’re going to attract more of into your life. Make sure they're all positive.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Just as layoffs were making a mockery of the team concept, employees were urged to find camaraderie and a sense of collective purpose at the microlevel of the "team". And the less teamlike the overall organization became with the threat of continuous downsizing, the more management insisted on individual devotion to these largely fictional units.
Author: Barbara Ehrenreich, Bright-Sided: How the Relentless Promotion of Positive Thinking Has Undermined America

Quote: The discovery of purpose is in connection to activities that inspires you the most.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Dare to struggle and dare to succeed.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: If there is no struggle there is no progress.
Author: Frederick Douglass

Quote: Things are happening out there. Don’t waste your life in wishful thinking. Get out of your cocoon and go make a name for yourself. Life is too short to be wasted in oblivion.

Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: you have to find the words to make it sound important
Author: Dmitry Dyatlov

Quote: If you follow your heart, you will be happy.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: What I truly desire to do, I shall dare attempt.

Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: God's grace is seed of salvation through faith in Christ Jesus, the Son of God.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: She remembered who she wasand the game changed.

Quote: A woman in want must wait for the appointed time.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Acceptance is the first step in the process of change. Why? Because it gives us something solid to stand on as we reach for more.
Author: Anita Papas, The Positive You!

Quote: The Gospel of God is glad tidings of good things.

Quote: I prefer to be on the side of losers, the misunderstood or lonely people rather than writing about the strong and powerful.
Author: Núria Añó

Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The Gospel is the throne of much more grace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Without God's grace, the soul is dead in sin.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: There is a spiritual call and there is circular call; wherever you have been called, do the work sincerely.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Luxury is the enemy of growth. This is the one thing that I learnt from my father, and I approve of it fully. Abundance is neither good nor healthy for the growth of a child’s mind.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

Quote: Tallis had persevered through and unshakable feeling of not truly belonging... She understood the responsibility her family constraints put upon her, and while Lana knew Tallis's heart trembled and raged at the perceived indignity of it all, she had grown up into a charming, beautiful woman with shoulders that refused to bow to a world that demanded they should.
Author: C.E. Clayton, The Duality of Nature

Quote: If there is no door open for me, I build a door
Author: Hadi Farnoud

Quote: Only the right pain gets the right gain.
Author: Max McKeown, #NOW: The Surprising Truth About the Power of Now

Quote: The given time is the gracious moment.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: One of your friends may bored , one may tiered , one may feared , what you have to do is to make them entertained , if you can't do it , make them active , if you fail again make a small smile in front of them.
Author: Abdul khadar

Quote: The best things happen to those who don't wait.
Author: Max McKeown

Quote: If life is fast, live faster.
Author: Max McKeown, #NOW: The Surprising Truth About the Power of Now

Quote: Luxury is the enemy of growth.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

Quote: Stop wasting while waiting.....continue acting.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Non-violent resistance to evil is a quintessential element of the character of a real human being. If someone does wrong to me, I may be physically capable of breaking his jaw with one blow of my fist, but such violent reciprocation does not define the strength of my character as a real human being. If I succeed in resisting my limbic urge to do harm in return, then only can I be hailed as human being of real character.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

Quote: English is the language through which I reach hearts from various corners of the world. English is the language through which I flirt with my species. English is the language through which I make my species think.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

Quote: With peace of being, you can overcome any pain.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Good intentions aren't enough, you must take right actions.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: The Sun, the Moon, the Stars, the Birds, the Animals, the Flowers are all proof that a Universal Power exists.
Author: RVM

Quote: Every single ONE of us is a unique VIBRATION in a beautiful Symphony of Infinite CREATION.
Author: Gordana Biernat, #KnowTheTruth: Why Knowing Who You Are Changes Everything

Quote: You and your reality are ONE. When YOU change, everything changes.
Author: Gordana Biernat, #KnowTheTruth: Why Knowing Who You Are Changes Everything

Quote: You do not become outstanding by working on your weaknesses.You become outstanding by focusing entirely on your strengths.
Author: Gordana Biernat, #KnowTheTruth: Why Knowing Who You Are Changes Everything

Quote: You cannot ‘fit yourself in’ to greatness. This can only be done by embracing and pursuing your biggest dreams and desires.
Author: Gordana Biernat, #KnowTheTruth: Why Knowing Who You Are Changes Everything

Quote: Life is about peeking through the veil of forgetfulness. What is hidden awakens the joy of revealing it.
Author: Gordana Biernat, #KnowTheTruth: Why Knowing Who You Are Changes Everything

Quote: We do not observe reality, we observe our REACTIONS to it.In other words:Reality is, in essence, neutral. YOU give it meaning.
Author: Gordana Biernat, #KnowTheTruth: Why Knowing Who You Are Changes Everything

Quote: Education is the beautification of the inner world, which in turn help beautifies the outer world we lived in.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: It's time to change my life and see the world
Author: Jennifer Coletta

Quote: Life will punch you in the gut, but it doesn't mean you should stop breathing.
Author: Jennifer Coletta

Quote: What is interesting about you today, would not create new memory tomorrow braze up and create that envisage memory that is glaring you within.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: I will not add to the world’s problem, I will not live the world the way I met it; I will strife with every breadth of my life to live the world a better place than I met it.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: If you are not creative enough to create change change will be creative to create you.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: All of us must have initiative, we should not be mere imitators; we must learn to think and act for ourselves and be free from the claws of others.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Be a man of value and the universe will pay you for the value you add to it.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Problems go away because someone does something about them! What are you doing about the problems or challenges around you? Don’t just complain…..Act and now!
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Do not be discourage by the height of the mountain, one step at a time will lead you there; and now is the time to begin tomorrow may be too late.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Because a thing seems difficult to a man does not means it is impossible for another to accomplish. Don't talk him out of his dream.......during discussion a group discussion. 2009
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: If you are not taking time to set your own goals, chances are someone else is doing it for you and that someone will be in control of you sooner.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Don’t feel or believe that something is not possible; if it is a true dream, the possibility of living it is sure with your undying passion.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Tune your antenna to the highest frequency possible to attract people of substance increase your circle of influence intentionally.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Be a solution provider to challenges or issues; the more you proffer solution, the more your circle of influence grows and the more your circle of influence grows, the more wealth you will command.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: There is a part of you that believes you can change someone, but the reality is that you can't. You can change yourself, and others can change themselves, but you can't do it for them.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Once you have woken up from your slumber, help lots more others to be awaken, that is the duty you are here to play and play it well before you exit this earth.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: The secret of winning in any game of life is love.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: You're not going to get what you want out of life till you figure out what it wants out of you.
Author: Karishma Magvani

Quote: You get told to look before you leap. But if you are too careful you may end up just looking.
Author: Max McKeown, #NOW: The Surprising Truth About the Power of Now

Quote: It's time to change my life and see the world.
Author: Jennifer Coletta

Quote: Your actions prove your efficiency and your lip service proves your inability.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: You can only destroy something that I have but you can't destroy something that I am.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: Give one of your smiles, its costs nothing… but enrich others life to dream more.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: It’s very easy to blame others, but very difficult to prove your ability.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: Pushing your limits is what allows you to grow stronger, so if you find yourself feeling passive, it can make sense to dial it up a little. Get moving. Accomplish something small. Do something you enjoy. Embrace what moves you. And start again.
Author: Max McKeown, #NOW: The Surprising Truth About the Power of Now

Quote: Nothing Can Beat Hard Work, But Hard Work Itself
Author: Syed Sharukh

Quote: I’m not interested in competing with anyone. I hope we all make it.
Author: Erica Cook

Quote: Fear can be good, Laia. It can keep you alive. But don't let it control you. Don't let it sow doubts within you. When the fear takes over, use the only thing more powerful, more indestructible, to fight it: your spirit. Your heart.
Author: Sabaa Tahir, An Ember in the Ashes

Quote: How much you know it’s depending upon your action not in your lip service.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: Your actions prove you efficiency and your lip service proves your inability.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: I am not in it for the success, I am in it for the victory...nothing less.
Author: Account Closed

Quote: The simple truth is that life goes on whether we're ready or not.The question we need to ask ourselves is, do we find a way to embrace it, or do wesit back and allow it to pass us by?
Author: Lorri Faye

Quote: The person in whose presence you stay in the secrets will determine where you will stay in the open.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: It is not about the building, but about what the building can produce.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Anyone who develop his talent and or gifts will become an essential commodity.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: There is always a need for a visionary man your vision will make you relevant in the scheme of men and your relevance will birth the needed money depending on the level of your functional-ability.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: The voices you listen to and obey determine to a large extent what you become.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: The right choice often requires hard work and self-discipline, or self-sacrifice; don't be enticed by apparent short-cuts that seems right but end in tragedy.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: Negative anger that is unchecked is a fire out of control, it can burn everything in its path.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: The greatest mistake a leader or anyone can make is to stay down after falling.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: To know is the male, to act is the female, for there to be production, to know need to meet with to act.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: What are you passionate about? Use the same passion to serve others that is where your success lies.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: The organisation of your life begins the moment you start out your vision.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: The universe has different kinds of frequency for different moods and different mindsets, you attract what your moods and mindset think or produce.
Author: ANIKOR Daniel

Quote: People who create their own opportunities are more successful than people who expect opportunities to be created for them.
Author: Jennifer Coletta

Quote: You know you are getting old when yesterday turns out to be a fading memory you have difficulties recollecting, when today becomes a challenge that is hard to grasp and when tomorrow promises an uncertainty that you dread encountering.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: Never go for someone that represents something that is more of a fantasy than reality in this crazy world of lonely people, unless it is for the shortest time possible, and unless you have clearly figured out an exit strategy.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: You can’t say you love man as an individual if you have not dealt with the person’s complex personality, his or her unfamiliar habits, disturbing impulses and biological makeup.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: Jealousy and anger are two common nature of human being. As I feel there is nothing that can stop us from feeling so. So, if you take it negative way then there is nothing that can able to stop you from devil and if you take it positive way then there is nothing that can able to stop you from success.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: Prayer is a pillar.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: My death was written in that day when I was born, That is why I don’t fear about to die. I just fear that when I die who will cry?
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: I would rather listen to someone who tried and failed than someone who dreamed but never tried.
Author: Jennifer Coletta

Quote: There's just one advice for an aspiring writer write.
Author: Scifurz

Quote: If I can create something unique in the world, so can you.
Author: Scifurz

Quote: The three rules to writing a novel1) Write2) Write more3) Keep writing
Author: Scifurz

Quote: If there is something, you want to achieve, think of the way you'll pass, difficulties you'll meet, think of the sacrifice because nothing you can achieve without sacrifice and we ignore what we love so as to get what we want
Author: Ntambara Sylvestre Owen Berbason

Quote: Don’t disappoint anyone by telling them that they are weak enough to fight for their rights. Encourage them by telling that they are strong enough to fight for their rights. Because they want your support not your sympathy.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: Prime vision of my life is to help others. And if I can’t help them, atleast I do not try to disappoint them.
Author: G.K. Dutta

Quote: Prayer leads to peace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The strength is given to me by the recognition I don't waste it in vain.
Author: Anton Staroverov

Quote: Unsettling emotions are capable of messing up the most beautiful minds in this world.
Author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

Quote: Let a man radically alter his thoughts, and he will be astonished at the rapid transformation it will effect in the material conditions of his life. Men imagine that thought can be kept secret, but it cannot; it rapidly crystallizes into habit, and habit solidifies into circumstance. Bestial thoughts crystallize into habits of drunkenness and sensuality, which solidify into circumstances of destitution and disease: impure thoughts of every kind crystallize into enervating and confusing habits, which solidify into distracting and adverse circumstances: thoughts of fear, doubt, and indecision crystallize into weak, unmanly, and irresolute habits, which solidify into circumstances of failure, indigence, and slavish dependence: lazy thoughts crystallize into habits of uncleanliness and dishonesty, which solidify into circumstances of foulness and beggary: hateful and condemnatory thoughts crystallize into habits of accusation and violence, which solidify into circumstances of injury and persecution: selfish thoughts of all kinds crystallize into habits of self-seeking, which solidify into circumstances more or less distressing. On the other hand, beautiful thoughts of all kinds crystallize into habits of grace and kindliness, which solidify into genial and sunny circumstances: pure thoughts crystallize into habits of temperance and self-control, which solidify into circumstances of repose and peace: thoughts of courage, self-reliance, and decision crystallize into manly habits, which solidify into circumstances of success, plenty, and freedom: energetic thoughts crystallize into habits of cleanliness and industry, which solidify into circumstances of pleasantness: gentle and forgiving thoughts crystallize into habits of gentleness, which solidify into protective and preservative circumstances: loving and unselfish thoughts crystallize into habits of self-forgetfulness for others, which solidify into circumstances of sure and abiding prosperity and true riches.A particular train of thought persisted in, be it good or bad, cannot fail to produce its results on the character and circumstances. A man cannot directly choose his circumstances, but he can choose his thoughts, and so indirectly, yet surely, shape his circumstances.
Author: James Allen, As a Man Thinketh

Quote: I did it the hard wayMany of the big dreams I dreamt,I dreamt, when I met a failed attempt.Life taught me to believe thatGreat ideas can start from a wretched hut.Many of the strongest steps I took,I took, when I was given the fiercest look.My passion pokes me to understandThat people’s mockeries, I can withstand.Many of the fastest speeds I gained,I gained when I was bitterly stained.I first thought the only way was to quitAs I tried again, I no longer have guilt.Many of the bravest decisions I made,I made, when my life was about to fade.I was frustrated and ripe to sink.But then I strive to release the ink.Many of the longest journeys I started,I started, having no resource; money partedI relied on God my creator all dawn longAnd at dusk He gave me a new song.Many of the hardest questions I tackled,I tackled, when I was heckled.They were very troublesome to settleBut I make it happen little by littleYet, it was not I, but the Lord JesusThe saviour who gives me success.In Him, through Him and by HimI have the liberty to do everything with vim.I don’t want to enjoy this liberty alone.You too must step out of your comfort zone.It’s not easy, but you can do it anyway.Jesus is the life, the truth and the way.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Become a Better You
