Quote: It is impossible to enjoy divine protection without the word of God. You must be a word addict.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The church preach so much about power in the kingdom of God but we don't talk about wisdom. Everybody goes for power forgeting that power without wisdom can be disastrous.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Blind minds are worst than blind eyes. That you have eyes does not mean that you have vision. Visionaries do not look they see whlie people look.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Do you want to acquire God's own wisdom? Relate with the Holy Spirit. Be a seeker of divine guidance by the Holy Spirit. You can't be a man or woman of solution without God.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The world is full of problems and I bet you the problems will continue to exist but what will make you relevant to the world is when you have answers to the questions the world asks. You can only be useful when you have the answers to the questions of the world. The best way you provide solutions and answers to those challenges is through wisdom.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: I think it will be better if we can live our life as if Christ is going to return today and plan our live as if it is hundred years off. Keep living, serving and most of all be prepared.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Wherever problem persist, wisdom is lacking. There is no problem anywhere except wisdom problem. Wisdom provides solutions where there is complications.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The devil comes to steal, kill and destroy and his followers do the same. Be watchful and keep that in mind.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: When wisdom comes, transformation comes. Wisdom makes the difference between the succeeding man and the failing man.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: I love being high. High on Life, High on Love, High on Hope, and High on Faith.
Author: Imania Margria

Quote: When we can see the star of desire in our sky, we can use our wings of hope and our air of love to reach it.
Author: Imania Margria

Quote: There are so many things that we learn in our lives most of which we can't learn without seeing the hearts of others.
Author: Imania Margria

Quote: Do you know who are Awesome?Those who Believe in themselves.
Author: Mohith Agadi

Quote: Living on Faith.Striving on Desire. Flying on Hope.
Author: Imania Margria

Quote: Don't try to reach perfection. Just try to reach an inner and outer realization of self.
Author: Imania Margria

Quote: To dream is to desire, to desire is to long for, to long for is to want, and to want you must work to attain all you dream of, desire, long for and want.
Author: Imania Margria

Quote: Even though it may look like the wicked is gaining ground, God is still in control. We need to pray for our nations, pray for others, pray for forgiveness and mercy over people. We need to love no matter who we are talking to, whether they are Atheist, Moslems, Lesbians, Homosexuals or Pagans. We need to love them and share the love of God with them and not judge and see if we can rebuild our broken nations.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Poor means when we lack things in our lives. There are two types of poverty. ...those that need food and shelter and those that need God in their lives. We are called to service to help both group of people as much as we can.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Sure we all need money but what do you really focus on? It is a matter of the heart. If your thoughts are on material and worldly things, no good fruits can come out of it.Seek the kingdom of God first and the other things shall be added unto you not vice versa.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: If all you are looking for is a miracle you are wide open to follow the antichrist and the false prophets because they are going to have a big league of signs and wonders ministry.If signs and wonders do not bring glory and honour to Jesus Christ, then you must be watching a false prophet whose anointing does not come from the Holy Spirit of God.
Author: Patience Johnson

Quote: Hope, strive and try to be more like Christ until the day we will see Him. Let Him find you faithfully and in obedient serving Him. He is coming quicker than people think.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The closer we try to get to God, the more we will hate to sin in our own lives, the more we are saddened by the thoughts that runs through our minds. I also think that the more we draw closer to God, the more God will honour us and will open doors for the right things to happen in our life.
Author: Patience Johnson

Quote: I have the mind of Christ. The best life you could ever live is the one that your creator destined you for. The one He made you for. He has given us everything we need ......... to become like Him. To reach to your potentials. Worship Him in spirit and in truth.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: When we are preoccupied with wealth and material acquisitions, it chokes God's word in us and makes it unfruitful. But if we follow His plan of being prosperous you will enjoy the blessings of this life.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Our life is not in stuff, focus your attention on Christ where it should be. Prosperity and wealth has damaged the body of Christ. God takes pleasure in the prosperity of his children but don't replace him with material.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: We are so much distracted nowadays. There is so much distractions in the world today call it internet, media, football matches etc. but don't let it consume you.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Rebuilding is something that is practically difficult than starting over from nothing.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The only thing that prevents us from being happy is thinking.
Author: Kamand Kojouri

Quote: Just because you have baggage doesn't mean you have to lug it around.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: Motivating others leads to success whereas inspiring others leads to greatness.
Author: Ken Poirot

Quote: No man's advice can change you unless you speak to yourself. Bible school or seminars can't change you, going to church can't change you except you decide to change.Psalm 139:23 - 24
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: No! Leadership is not the business of people who need to be motivated!
Author: Amit  Chatterjee, Ascent: A Practising Manager's Growth Mantra

Quote: Henry Luce to his Time magazine writers: "Tell the history of our time through the people who make it.
Author: Walter Isaacson, American Sketches: Great Leaders, Creative Thinkers, and Heroes of a Hurricane

Quote: There is nothing more fascinating than the fusion between power and mystery in our great, little treasure: the human brain.
Author: Hajar Charkaoui

Quote: The Practising Manager’s Growth Mantra-Growth in an enterprise is created through remarkable achievements, not incremental achievements like efficiency or effectiveness.-Remarkable achievements are possible only in complexity.-Only volitional engagement can work in complexity. Luckily, there is no certainty in complexity. Hence, motivational engagement cannot work.-People who make choices based on the purpose can only be volitionally engaged—they are the growth managers, the leaders.
Author: Amit  Chatterjee, Ascent: A Practising Manager's Growth Mantra

Quote: Create. Not for the money. Not for the fame. Not for the recognition. But for the pure joy of creating something and sharing it.
Author: Ernest Barbaric

Quote: QUIT = Quickly Uphold Important Things
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: His constant references to the ancient world have the effect of giving ordinary soldiers a sense of their lives.
Author: Andrew Roberts, Napoleon: A Life

Quote: Perfectionism is a disease. Procrastination is a disease. ACTION is the cure.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: [WASHINGTON]It’s alright, you want to fight, you’ve got a hungerI was just like you when I was youngerHead full of fantasies of dyin’ like a martyr?[HAMILTON]Yes[WASHINGTON]Dying is easy, young man. Living is harder
Author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

Quote: Only a writer "with Bennett's craft and brass could manage to praise and insult his readers at the same time.
Author: Harold Holzer, Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion

Quote: While JFK had made the sale on a political level, he had not yet completed it on an emotional one.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: House Speaker Thomas Reed could destroy an argument or expose a fallacy in fewer words than anyone else. His language was vivid and picturesque. He had a way of phrasing things which was peculiarly apt and peculiarly his own.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: James Gordon Bennett said he aimed to be, "serious in my aims but full of frolic in my means.
Author: Harold Holzer, Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion

Quote: Public sentiment is everything, said Lincoln. With public sentiment, nothing can fail. Without it, nothing can succeed.
Author: Harold Holzer, Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion

Quote: The mid-19th century was noted for a partisan, rather than a consensus press, but this partisanship was able to turn out voters consistently.
Author: Harold Holzer, Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion

Quote: In order to be a success, you must think like success. Get up and move! You got to make things happen.
Author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Heart Crush

Quote: Weight gains aren't failures – they're learning curves.
Author: Rachel  Stevenson, Reshaping Rachel

Quote: The engine that drives all your activities is hope. What you hope in shapes you.
Author: Matt      Chandler

Quote: Growth is ugly, it's hideous, it's all the things we don't like but my god, once you walk through the fire of confusion you will feel burning passion within your flame.
Author: Nikki Rowe

Quote: Words are catch-basins of experience, fingerprints and footprints of the past that the literary detective may scrutinize in order to sleuth out the history of human consciousness.
Author: Philip Zaleski, The Fellowship: The Literary Lives of the Inklings: J.R.R. Tolkien, C.S. Lewis, Owen Barfield, Charles Williams

Quote: Stories were heirlooms in these parts.
Author: Robert Kurson, Pirate Hunters: Treasure, Obsession, and the Search for a Legendary Pirate Ship

Quote: You have a nicety of awareness of the difference between a blade's edge and its tip.
Author: Frank Herbert, Dune

Quote: Secretary of the treasury Albert Gallatin is accused of treason by war enthusiasts merely for suggesting budget adjustments to pay for war measures.
Author: Donald R. Hickey, The War of 1812: A Forgotten Conflict

Quote: He was a generous but subtly demanding boss.
Author: H.W. Brands

Quote: Presidents are also always storytellers, purveyors of useful national mythologies.
Author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

Quote: Leaders create awareness in their followers about the great potentials they carry and how to release them for the benefit of all. Leaders are motivators,
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Thank God for His daily blessings.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Leadership is built on inspirations. Inspiration does both the theoretical and the practical job. By inspiration, people are not only informed to know what is right. But they are also convinced to always do what’s right.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders don’t step on toes of dwarfs. They mount shoulders of giants.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Life is an enduring endeavour.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: When motivation flows, people see work as interesting as music. They enjoy it till they do more than they could have done. Leaders motivate people to do greater things.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Happiness is ours for the taking and take it we must without any apologies. We deserve to be happy, loved, and respected......nothing less.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: Be like Jesus. Live love, speak love, think love…..do all things in love.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: The way the rain falls then rises back into the clouds only to fall again reminds me of love.
Author: Sara Secora

Quote: There comes a time in your life when you can no longer put off choosing. You have to choose one path or the other. You can live safe and be protected by people just like you, or you can stand up and be a leader for what is right. Always, remember this: People never remember the crowd; they remember the one person that had the courage to say and do what no one would do.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: You're going to meet people in this world who are fine, quality people. They'll build your character, and you want to hang around with them. Then there are the ones who don't do right. They will tear you down. Be nice to them-never hurt anybody-but don't hang with them.
Author: Ruthi Postow Birch, How to Build a Piano Bench

Quote: If You Respect Their Preparation,You never Drop the Baton
Author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

Quote: Good values are like a magnet, they attract good people.
Author: John Wooden, Wooden on Leadership: How to Create a Winning Organizaion

Quote: I have learned that friendship without faith is useless. Friendship entails faith in oneself that you’ll remain loyal to this bond, and faith in your friends that you will be there for them at all times. The most important of all is the biggest faith in God and in making Him the center of all our relationships.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Can two walk together, unless they are agreed?’Amos 3:3‘Does This Person Belong in your Life?’A toxic relationship is like a limb with gangrene: unless you amputate it the infection can spread and kill you. Without the courage to cut off what refuses to heal, you’ll end up losing a lot more. Your personal growth - and in some cases your healing - will only be expedited by establishing relationships with the right people. Maybe you’ve heard the story about the scorpion who asked the frog to carry him across the river because he couldn’t swim. ‘I’m afraid you’ll sting me,’ replied the frog. The scorpion smiled reassuringly and said, ‘Of course I won’t. If I did that we’d both drown!’ So the frog agreed, and the scorpion hopped on his back. Wouldn’t you know it: halfway across the river the scorpion stung him! As they began to sink the frog lamented, ‘You promised you wouldn’t sting me. Why’d you do it?’ The scorpion replied, ‘I can’t help it. It’s my nature!’ Until God changes the other person’s nature, they have the power to affect and infect you. For example, when you feel passionately about something but others don’t, it’s like trying to dance a foxtrot with someone who only knows how to waltz. You picked the wrong dance partner! Don’t get tied up with someone who doesn’t share your values and God-given goals. Some issues can be corrected through counselling, prayer, teaching, and leadership. But you can’t teach someone to care; if they don’t care they’ll pollute your environment, kill your productivity, and break your rhythm with constant complaints. That’s why it’s important to pray and ask God, ‘Does this person belong in my life?
Author: Patience Johnson

Quote: Your body can be in captivity, your life can be in captivity, but there is only one thing you should not allow to be in captivity; that is your soul.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Slavery of the soul is worst than the slavery of the flesh.....
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Where you are running to is not the answer, who is with you is the power.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Do you want to grow spiritually? Build better relationships? Succeed in your career? Conquer anxiety and find peace? Break a bad habit? Be healed from the emotional wounds of your past? Then meditate on, ponder, think about, practise mentally, and verbalise the Word of God. Instead of living off someone else’s spiritual insight, study God’s Word for yourself and allow the Holy Spirit to bless you with life-transforming insights. Jesus said, ‘The Spirit takes my message and tells it to you’ (John 16:15). And you’ll experience the truth of those words when you personalise the Scripture you’re reading.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Romans 12:2What is the difference between a person born with a silver spoon that later eat with the pig and someone born among the pigs without a silver spoon in his mouth and later eat with a golden spoon? One must have changed his mind. If you can renew your mind, you can change your destiny.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Your Skin is not a deprivation, your life is not a defeat, the fact that you call yourself black does not mean that your eyes, soul and brain are black try to whiten yourself. If they blackmail you, whitemail yourself.Don't allow people's opinion to pin you down. Build yourself above the standard of slavery.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The Greek word for ‘self-control’ comes from a root word meaning ‘to grip’. It calls for getting a grip on your spending so that you don’t go into debt for things you don’t need and can’t pay for. It calls for getting a grip on your temper and not saying things you’ll later regret: ‘Better … a man who controls his temper than one who takes a city’ (Proverbs 16:32 NIV 1984 Edition). It calls for getting a grip on your desires. If Joseph had failed to say no to the repeated advances of his boss’ wife, he’d never have seen his life’s dream fulfilled and sat on the throne of Egypt. Understand this: Satan has discerned your destiny and he’s out to stop you from reaching it. So pray for self-control, and practise it on a daily basis.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: There’s an interesting story about Abraham Lincoln. During the American Civil War he signed an order transferring certain regiments, but Secretary of War Edwin Stanton refused to execute it, calling the president a fool. When Lincoln heard he replied, ‘If Stanton said I’m a fool then I must be, for he’s nearly always right, and he says what he thinks. I’ll step over and see for myself.’ He did, and when Stanton convinced him the order was in error, Lincoln quietly withdrew it. Part of Lincoln’s greatness lay in his ability to rise above pettiness, ego, and sensitivity to other people’s opinions. He wasn’t easily offended. He welcomed criticism, and in doing so demonstrated one of the strengths of a truly great person: humility. So, have you been criticised? Make it a time to learn, not lose.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: They terminate your job? Employ yourself. They retire you? Refire yourself.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: When you are busy doing something for God, God will also be busy doing something for you.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Do not let sin reign in your mortal body so that you obey its evil desires.’Romans 6:12Self-control is one of the great keys to success in life. And since God’s Word has a lot to say about it, if you ask Him He will help you to cultivate it. What you struggled with when you were young will be different from the things you struggle with when you’re older, but you’ll face temptation in one form or another as long as you live. Self-control is one of the nine fruits of the Spirit listed in the Bible (see Galatians 5:22-23). It calls for bringing every aspect of your life under the mastery of the Holy Spirit. It’s a lifestyle characterised by discipline, not impulse.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: How do we know those who are on the Lord's side?My answer: when things happened adversarily, those who stand by God becomes Testifiers.I testify that the Lord is good, I don't know about you.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The people that God will bless the most are those who stayed with God. You do not work with walmart and expect Microsoft to pay you.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Only in christanity that people that fall remain on the ground. When boxers are knocked down they refuse to remain on the ground or to accept a knock out. Even when they are bleeding with swollen faces, they still get up to fight but in Christianity even a push, not even a blow, Boxers gets up, wrestlers jumps up, Christians lie down.Do you know why? They do not fight a good fight, they expect to lose before they enter the ring. Every good fighter is an enduring person, they do excercise and training, they learn the act of endurance. You can't be a good Christian without an amour which is the word of God.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: We never look at people with the eye of God instead we look at them from their past, what they did wrong.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Don't be afraid of trial but don't die in your temptation.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: If God permit you to fall, He will definitely stand by you to rise.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Only trials can bring you triumph and only obstacles can bring you miracle.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: You are knocked down? Get up and move on....
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: What happens to you when you are not enough for yourself? The day that you will know that the second name of this world is trouble? The day that you will understand that salvation does not eliminate trials? The fact that you are baptised by the holy ghost does not send the devil to hell fire?Jesus didn't say kill the devil, He said cast him out. You may cast Him out from Germany, he may land in the United Kingdom. ..he is still there.Just bear in mind that heaven and earth may pass away but God and His words still remain the same.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: God is looking for a willing heart. He is searching for few like Easther....who will say if I perish I perish! God is looking for peopke like Ruth....your God shall be my God and your people shall be my people. With just 3 He can do more than with the crowd.God does not use all to win all.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: How do you feel when you want to stand and you see yourself on the floor?Sometimes what God will ask you to do will knock you down.What do you do when God says rise and He pushes you down?How do you feel when very many will become I alone? How do you feel when all the people you told your secrets sale you out?How do you feel when your confidant becomes your betrayal?How do you feel when the person you thought will push you forward told you, I know you will fail?Do you still remember that the bible says that not even a hair will pull of you without being noticed by God? Have you not heard that the steps of a righteous man are ordered by God?How do you handle disappointments?In every situation you find yourself, give God the glory.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Are you using your time to time God or you are working on God's timing? Don't ask God for the gift of Patience and you tell him you need it now. (A bit deep)
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The most reliable friend you have is your shadow.
Author: Matshona Dhliwayo

Quote: When you meet someone, and you find that they are prejudiced against your kind, it might be your chance, not to confirm, but to be the one to finally change their mind.
Author: Criss Jami

Quote: People come and go in this lifetime. Some merely pass us by. Some stay with us for a little while. Some leave as quickly as they come. However, when real friends come, they stay and never leave.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Do not stand at a distance and wave hands. Get closer and hug.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Leadership is never an avenue to be self-serving but,a platform to render great service to people.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: We will never know peace and stability in the world without balance. And we will never know balance without justice for all. Yet, justice exists only where there is fairness and equality -- when every man and country is treated and viewed equally. No country should be given power over another. In addition, no country should be granted privileges that are denied to others. No one country has the authority to decide which country will be embargoed, denied to protect itself, and will be favored based on the weight of their resources. Eliminate the hypocrisy.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Leadership is self-made. People who have deliberately decided to become problems solver lead better.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Don't let your fear of criticism suffocate your leadership potential. Once you begin to speak your truth, you will discover the people who have been waiting for someone exactly like you. Until you speak up, all you need is the faith that they exist. And I promise you: they do.
Author: Vironika Tugaleva

Quote: Sometimes, people don’t need our homes to live in or our bodies to lean on. All they need are our hands to lift them up.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: People who achieve marvelously in critical challenges are commended than people who achieve same things on the silver platter.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Bear it in mind that people who do not take actions are not and cannot be leaders. Leadership is action.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Good people who are always silent for bad people to gain freedom and do their worsts are the most dangerous wastes the world ever has.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Talk to people about what they want to hear, and they'll stay for more. Talk to them about what you want them to hear, and they'll soon turn away.
Author: Nabil N. Jamal

Quote: People deserve their leaders.
Author: kambiz shabankareh

Quote: People will react to you as a result of their own mindset, rather than as a reflection of your worth. Most people use others as mirrors for their own darkness. If you have been hurt by such people, perhaps you can use these experiences to become a different kind of person—one who reflects the light within others instead of using them as mirrors. Maybe your experiences of pain can lead you to being a great leader, someone who lights up the world. Your most painful struggle is ripe with opportunity.
Author: Vironika Tugaleva

Quote: Any leadership that is observant and committed to its people, will always find better ways to solve problems.
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: It's hard to lead a cavalry charge if you think you look funny on a horse.
Author: Adlai E. Stevenson II

Quote: When two brothers are busy fighting, an evil man can easily attack and rob their poor mother. Mankind should always stay united, standing shoulder to shoulder so evil can never cheat and divide them.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Oh! What honour for the female sex! It is perfectly obvious that God has special regard for it when all these wretched people who destroyed the whole Kingdom – now recovered and made safe by a woman, something that 5000 men could not have done – and the traitors [have been] exterminated. Before the event they would scarcely have believed this possible.
Author: Christine de Pizan, Ditié de Jehanne d'Arc

Quote: When we take your person into account, you who are a young maiden, to whom God gives the strength and power to be the champion who casts the rebels down and feeds France with the sweet, nourishing milk of peace, here indeed is something quite extraordinary! For if God performed such a great number of miracles through Joshua who conquered many a place and cast down many an enemy, he, Joshua, was a strong and powerful man. But, after all, a woman – a simple shepherdess – braver than any man ever was in Rome! As far as God is concerned, this was easily accomplished. But as for us, we never heard tell of such an extraordinary marvel, for the prowess of all the great men of the past cannot be compared to this woman's whose concern it is to cast out our enemies. This is God's doing: it is He who guides her and who has given her a heart greater than that of any man.
Author: Christine de Pizan, Ditié de Jehanne d'Arc

Quote: Engage the enemy more closely.
Author: Charles Faddis

Quote: If you create an environment of conflicts, I don’t think you will enjoy peace yourself.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Do you want to know what General Putnam is thinking? It’s this. He’s thinking that he can’t win the war if he doesn’t keep the people on his side. He’s thinking that he can’t keep the people on his side if the troops are running amok among the civilian population—raping the women, stealing cattle, burning houses. He is determined to scare the wits out of the troops to keep them in line. And he’s thinking that it doesn’t matter very much who he executes to do it. So many men have died, so many mothers have wept, so many brothers and sisters have cried. He is thinking that in the long run if he executes somebody, he’ll shorten the war and save more lives. It doesn’t matter to him very much who he executes; one man’s agony is like another’s, one mother’s tears are no wetter than anybody else’s. And that’s why he’s going to have Sam shot.
Author: James Lincoln Collier, My Brother Sam Is Dead

Quote: This, the only occasion in the Iliad when furious Achilles smiles serves as a bittersweet reminder of the difference real leadership could have made to the events of the Iliad. Agamemnon's panicked prize-grabbing in Book One and even Nestor's rambling "authority" pale beside Achilles' instinctive and absolute command of himself and the dangers of this occasion.
Author: Caroline Alexander, The War That Killed Achilles: The True Story of Homer's Iliad and the Trojan War

Quote: Any leader who feel the pain and fight for you. Support him or you lose but if that leader doesn't feel the pain and fight for you. Don't support him, fight for yourself, be a leader and fight for others.
Author: Saminu Kanti

Quote: What does it matter who is ruler of a realm that no longer exists?
Author: Krishna Udayasankar, Three

Quote: It is far better to win a battle through skilled leadership and wise decisions than violence and bloodshed. It may not seem as glorious to the uninitiated, but in the end it results in fewer wounds--of any kind.
Author: Frank Herbert

Quote: You cannot intimidate people with real bullets, but you can intimidate them with fake gun.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: We all have the DNA of an entrepreneur.Some are building their own dreams.While most are building other people's dreams. Entrepreneurs are Dream Builders. Are you building yours?
Author: Farshad Asl

Quote: When you do it, you are not another dreamer
Author: Hockson Floin

Quote: Sometimes the only things preventing your dreams from becoming realities is the long time it is taking you to start.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Don’t just have dreams. Take actions too. To make it possible, begin every dream with a simple action and your interest will beam out.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Be passionate about your dreams and never give sleep to your eyes until your good becomes better and your better becomes the best.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: You will never be rewarded for the dreams you slept over day in day out. You will be rewarded for dreams you stay awake and achieved.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Until you let go of that bitterness in your heart, it will find a comfortable place to destroy your dreams, your sight and most times, your sleep.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Don’t only think of which job to get and live on. Think about which problem to solve and the jobs will keep suggesting themselves.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Delusion is the seed of dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Whatever you do, do it with passion; learn new things, set new standards. If you fall down, get up; just get going, non-stop. This is how dreams come true.
Author: Vikrmn, 10 Golden Steps of Life

Quote: When in crises situation, never mourn along with the crises, rather speak to the crises saying, "Crises what opportunities are you hiding for me.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: Never let anyone take away your dreams.
Author: Victoria Justice

Quote: All humans are carrying invisible torchlights directing us to our destinies called our beliefs.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: Whatever our dreams are, we can make them happen. Some dreams may seem impossible, but they are not, in my belief. How can we know that it cannot and will not happen without even trying? It is always better to have tried than not to have tried at all.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Every great dream has no defined parameters, out of fear we set the limitations.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: When hope seems like a faded memory, remember love and hope will return stronger than ever.
Author: Imania Margria, Secrets of My Heart

Quote: Don't leave the dream, lead your dreams!
Author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

Quote: I wanted to be that,The one which was vast,The one which laughed,The one which surpassed,Yes, which also collapsed.True, it was abstract.I wanted to be that.I still, want to be that!
Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

Quote: All dreams are possible, if we work and wait for the manifest.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: When your hobby becomes your work, life automatically transforms into a never ending holiday
Author: Anamika Mishra, Voicemates: A Novel

Quote: How can I forget there's just one life & so much to do. Let me choose the best things to do & start to do.
Author: Chetan M. Kumbhar, Panasu The Golden City & The Capasstars

Quote: While you desire lasting change with positive results, it will take commitment from you to transform your dreams into a reality. Be aware that there can be tough moments when you're ready to throw in the towel. Frustrating times when you may want to quit. When it gets rough or you hit a roadblock, you must forge ahead and keep going. Despite blood, sweat, and tears, do not give up on yourself. You are worth the fight for a brighter future!
Author: Dana Arcuri, Reinventing You: Simple Steps to Transform Your Body, Mind, & Spirit

Quote: Self confident is the courage to chase your dream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It is possible to have what you wish for.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Chase your dreams with all your strength, soul and spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If it has to be done, you have to do it yourself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: My passionate leisure pursuit are reading, wondering and writing.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Fight for your dreams with all your strength, soul and spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Work hard to fulfill your dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I work for what I want.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Stay focus to fulfill your dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The pursuit of dreams comes with a cost.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Keep trying hard because there is always a next time.
Author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

Quote: All things are possible for whoever believes.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: May you find the strength to chase your dreams
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you believe you can achieve your dreams, you find the strength to pursue it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Their doubt is your fuel for dreams. You just have to drive.
Author: Criss Jami

Quote: I've got dreams and goals waiting for me to catch up to them
Author: Teresa Marie Garcia

Quote: There is no fun or glory living a dull life. You have take chance and tackle challenges to make it interesting.
Author: Evan  Smith

Quote: Do you have vivid picture of your visions in your mind?
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Hold on to thy sacred dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The past was "built", the present is "assembled" & the future - "programmed"!
Author: Vishwanath S J

Quote: Most great accomplishments do not look promising in the beginning. If you give up on a big dream too early, you have probably stepped on gold and mistook it for a rock.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: You can’t wake up one day and suddenly become a leader. You first discover that specific thing God created you for, develop it into something specific that the world will need, and then you have already leading started leading.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: When the lenses in the eyes of a leader captures tomorrow, they don't print the passport size of it. They make enlargements.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Because of fear, most people don’t dream big. Because of fear, even those who dream big do not start working on them. Because of fear, those who start working on their dreams end up quitting too early.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: If that's what you want to do, then you should go do it-and do it well.
Author: John Wood, Creating Room to Read

Quote: The competency of people you mobilize to work with will determine the output you will receive. As a leader, always look for people who buy into your vision.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: If you give up on a big dream too early, you have probably stepped on gold and mistook it for a rock.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The failure of a person is wrapped in his ignorance about his strengths.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Are you living your dream or someone’s dream?
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: A life without a vision is like a kite let loose; it is directed by the forces that be, never giving even the slightest of resistance to life's pressures, eventually ending up far away from home (that comfortable place).
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Vision

Quote: Resolutions: So many will fail; NOT because they didn't set goals, but because they didn't set behaviors.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: The true cost of following your dreams isn't what you sacrifice when you chase them, it's what you lose when you don't
Author: Simon S. Tam

Quote: If you want to rebel, rebel from inside the system.That's much more powerful than rebelling outside the system.
Author: Marie Lu, Legend

Quote: It is not about knowing, but about living.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: The greatest mistake we can make is to stay on the ground after falling.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: The dirtier your Bible, the cleaner your heart!
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: Freedom is not doing what we want, but what we should.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: The more the level of insecurity is reduced, the more the level of faith will grow.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: Freedom keeps us soaring, but quarreling destroys our ability to fly.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: The love of Christ always helps us see beyond the faults of others.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: More important than starting well in our walk with God is to finish well.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: Our expectation in ourselves must be higher than our expectation in others.
Author: Victor Manuel Rivera, In Search of True Freedom

Quote: In accordance with the prevailing conceptions in the U.S., there is no infringement on democracy if a few corporations control the information system: in fact, that is the essence of democracy. In the Annals of the American Academy of Political and Social Science, the leading figure of the public relations industry, Edward Bernays, explains that “the very essence of the democratic process” is “the freedom to persuade and suggest,” what he calls “the engineering of consent.” “A leader,” he continues, “frequently cannot wait for the people to arrive at even general understanding … Democratic leaders must play their part in … engineering … consent to socially constructive goals and values,” applying “scientific principles and tried practices to the task of getting people to support ideas and programs”; and although it remains unsaid, it is evident enough that those who control resources will be in a position to judge what is “socially constructive,” to engineer consent through the media, and to implement policy through the mechanisms of the state. If the freedom to persuade happens to be concentrated in a few hands, we must recognize that such is the nature of a free society.
Author: Noam Chomsky, Necessary Illusions: Thought Control in Democratic Societies

Quote: If your sad about your work then remember there are people who clean actual shit for a living
Author: Onkar K Khullar (Digital Gandhi)

Quote: Do we create an impact to make money or de we make money to create an IMPACT ?
Author: Onkar K Khullar (Digital Gandhi)

Quote: Endangering human life for profit should be a universal crime.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: When picking a leader, choose a peacemaker. One who unites, not divides. A cultured leader who supports the arts and true freedom of speech, not censorship.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Tighten your seat belt and enjoy the ride of life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: Consensus: “The process of abandoning all beliefs, principles, values, and policies in search of something in which no one believes, but to which no one objects; the process of avoiding the very issues that have to be solved, merely because you cannot get agreement on the way ahead. What great cause would have been fought and won under the banner: ‘I stand for consensus?
Author: Margaret Thatcher

Quote: Some leaders are born women.
Author: Geraldine Ferraro

Quote: the most improper job of any man, even saints (who at any rate were at least unwilling to take it on), is bossing other men. Not one in a million is fit for it, and least of all those who seek the opportunity.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

Quote: Men who find themselves late are never sure. They are all the things the civics books tell us the good citizen should be: partisans but never zealots, respectors of the facts which attend each situation but never benders of those facts, uncomfortable in positions of leadership but rarely unable to turn down a responsibility once it has been offered . . . or thrust upon them. They make the best leaders in a democracy because they are unlikely to fall in love with power.
Author: Stephen King, The Stand

Quote: He had learned that close-held secrets could often be cracked by going all the way to the top and there making himself unbearably unpleasant. He knew that such twisting of the tiger's tail was dangerous, for he understood the psychopathology of great power.
Author: Robert A. Heinlein, Stranger in a Strange Land

Quote: They accepted my donation, so they're aware they'd better serve my interests or I'll buy some leadership that will.
Author: Tom Robbins, Even Cowgirls Get the Blues

Quote: ...Regardless, I still do not believe that your duty is to do as the people wish. Your duty is to lead as best you can, following the dictates of your conscience. You must be true. Your Majesty, to the man you wish to become....
Author: Brandon Sanderson, The Well of Ascension

Quote: Pick a leader who is strong and confident, yet humble. Intelligent, but not sly. A leader who encourages diversity, not racism. One who understands the needs of the farmer, the teacher, the welder, the doctor, and the environmentalist -- not only the banker, the oil tycoon, the weapons developer, or the insurance and pharmaceutical lobbyist.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: In these times, a great leader must be extremely brave. Their leadership must be steered only by their conscience, not a bribe.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Leaders say "no" to corruption. Anyone playing a role in governance, and is not ready to do this is not a leader.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Having a hearing is educational. Having a hearing with television cameras is useful. Having a hearing with two rows of television cameras is Heaven.
Author: Tim Wirth

Quote: In the days when hyenas of hate suckle the babes of men, and jackals of hypocrisy pimp their mothers’ broken hearts, may children not look to demons of ignorance for hope.
Author: Aberjhani, The River of Winged Dreams

Quote: Politics is a matter of leading other people. Admittedly not where they want to go, but where they ought to go.
Author: Peter Prange, The Philosopher's Kiss

Quote: In politics, it often pays to be ahead of the curve. That holds true for corporate governance too, even more so when politics enter the equation.
Author: Mmanti Umoh

Quote: The parents of politics are lack of control and seeking to control. The parents of leadership are influence and trust.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: Politics is not leadership. It never has been. It never will be.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: At the end of the day, I do not care how many Democrats or Republicans are in office. What I do care about is whether our leader is truly serving THE PEOPLE or only his/her own pockets. Is our leader in tune with the concerns and needs of the man on the street - or only issues concerning private interests? Is this leader uniting or dividing the country? Milking or contributing to it? Building and preserving it -- or bringing it all down?
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: It takes courage with true humility and steadfastness to win confidence and admiration
Author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

Quote: No country can police corruption in other countries when it itself is not free from corruption. You cannot clean a dirty wall with dirty hands.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: People need to remember that a man who is deceptive deceives by hiding that he is deceptive. He is not going to openly validate that he is deceiving you because his aim is to deceive you.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: If we are not registering bad events in history to learn from them, then why are we even still publishing them at all? Is it really an outlandish ideal to want a peaceful and prosperous nation, one ruled only by compassion, truth and justice? As of now, there is no peace, no truth, no prosperity, no compassion - and NO COMMON SENSE. Since when did the words human and inhumane share the same meaning?
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: In a world devoid of towering political leaders, we seem to have become experts at growing idiots & elevating them to important positions.
Author: Mamur Mustapha

Quote: Once you were in the hands of a Grand Vizier, you were dead. Grand Viziers were always scheming megalomaniacs. It was probably in the job description: "Are you a devious, plotting, unreliable madman? Ah, good, then you can be my most trusted minister.
Author: Terry Pratchett, Interesting Times

Quote: Cruel people are not only people who kill innocent people with guns. Individuals who steal from government coffers to enrich themselves at the expense of the poor are grossly cruel.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Mothers and fathers are born everywhere. What the world needs are leaders.
Author: Abhijit Naskar

Quote: A nation with a thousand awakened citizens and a corrupt leader, is much more alive than a nation with an awakened leader and a thousand corrupt citizens.
Author: Abhijit Naskar

Quote: His supporters will push him to disaster unless his opponents show where the dangers are.
Author: Walter Lippmann

Quote: Leadership by deception isn't leadership. It's fraud.
Author: DaShanne Stokes

Quote: But Frances was beginning to feel that somewhere along the line, property, business, and all that contributes to the creation of wealth, must give back to government enough to guarantee adequate safeguarding of human welfare. The question would be, how to protect human beings against homelessness, starvation, and dependent old age without breaking down human initiative. She was seeing this as one fundamental problem of the government of the future; seeing too that somewhere leaders must arise who will be able to cope with this problem—honest leaders who will see the problem in its many-sidedness, and at last be able to solve it constructively.
Author: May Martin Van Wye, Eve's Tower

Quote: Politics means implementation of the best ideas for the society in the path of wellbeing and progress.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: Politics means implementation of the best ideas for the society in the path of wellbeing and progress. This is the approach that gave the world, leaders of glorious characters such as Abraham Lincoln, Martin Luther King Jr., Subhas Chandra Bose (the actual man behind India’s Independence), Vasil Levski (the man who liberated Bulgaria from the Ottoman oppression), Nelson Mandela and many more. These people were technically politicians too, but unlike the majority of the politicians ofmodern society, their approach to politics was what it should be in a real system of politics.
Author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

Quote: One of the most important qualities of a president is the ability to inspire, to bring people together for the common good.
Author: DaShanne Stokes

Quote: Integrity must become a personal goal of a growing majority in America if we want to be a major world influence.
Author: Herman L Glaess, Potentiality Enhancement Programs

Quote: Accepting fraud from our leaders means accepting fraud in our personal lives.
Author: DaShanne Stokes

Quote: If this were a courageous country,it would ask Gloria to lead itsince she is sane and funny and beautiful and smartand the National Leaders we've always hadare not.When I listen to her talk about women's rightschildren's rightsmen's rightsI think of the long line of Americans who should have been president, but weren't.Imagine Crazy Horse as president. Sojourner Truth.John Brown. Harriet Tubman. Black Elk or Geronimo.Imagine President Martin Luther King confrontingthe youthful "Oppie" Oppenheimer. Imagine PresidentMalcolm X going after the Klan. Imagine President StevieWonder dealing with the "Truly Needy."Imagine President Shirley Chisholm, Ron Dellums, orSweet Honey in the Rockdealing with Anything.It is imagining to make us weep with frustration,as we languish under real estate dealers, killers, and bad actors.
Author: Alice Walker, Horses Make a Landscape Look More Beautiful: Poems

Quote: Leaders who do not help the people must be replaced by the people.
Author: DaShanne Stokes

Quote: The great political problem in our modern democracy is how to induce our leaders to lead.
Author: Edward L. Bernays, Propaganda

Quote: Great leaders lead by example, not by making an example of others.
Author: Stewart Stafford

Quote: When the truth reaches the mass, it becomes impossible to govern by deception.
Author: Mike Ducheine, The Obama Legacy

Quote: Power is given to those who reach to take it & claimed by those who will stop at nothing to fulfill what they believe is their birthright.
Author: Saminu Kanti

Quote: A full loyalty to the leader merely fits to the dogs, not to the humans!
Author: Mehmet Murat ildan

Quote: ... The form of leadership must be the focus of constant reappraisal. Weber states, for example: 'Each new fact may necessitate the re-adjustment of the relations between end and indispensable means, between desired goals and unavoidable subsidiary consequences.' This process of re-adjustment is ultimately without resolution, for the political and ethical value-spheres are not only in constant opposition but also in permanent flux. It is the task of the politician to negotiate this value conflict and to be decisive as to the value to be pursued and the means to be employed.
Author: Nicholas Gane, Max Weber and Postmodern Theory: Rationalization Versus Re-enchantment

Quote: ... The political leader must constantly appraise and reappraise the means through which 'he can hope to do justice to the responsibility that power imposes upon him' while at the same time pursuing political values with conviction.
Author: Nicholas Gane, Max Weber and Postmodern Theory: Rationalization Versus Re-enchantment

Quote: Democracy could be worthless and counterproductive in the absence of sound moral leadership!
Author: Lennox Lampkin

Quote: The sacrifice ‘of’ self for the greater good is the greatest calling imaginable, and it is the bedrock of the greatest nations. The sacrifice ‘for’ self is the most pathetic calling imaginable, and it is the quicksand within which nations perish.
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: Discerning the difference between a dictator and a leader is quite easy. The former cannot help but see ‘leading’ and ‘serving’ as stark contradictions that by their very nature are utterly incompatible. The latter can’t tell the difference
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: The masses who complain about bad leadership must first check their unbiased choices.
Author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

Quote: You follow voice of masses, Possibly you suppress your inner voice.
Author: Bikash Bhandari

Quote: Those who are not true leaders or elders will just affirm people at their own immature level, and of course immature people will love them and elect them for being equally immature. You can fill in the names here with your own political disaster story. But just remember, there is a symbiosis between immature groups and immature leaders, I am afraid, which is why both Plato and Jefferson said democracy was not really the best form of government. It is the safest. A truly wise monarch would probably be the most effective at getting things done.
Author: Richard Rohr, Falling Upward: A Spirituality for the Two Halves of Life

Quote: Money is not as good as power, but power is as good as money.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Power is not pleasure, power is pain.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: To impart a moral responsibility to exercise fairness in leadership builds greater leaders of strong character.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: In my view, leadership is the courage to take risks in defense of a position that is both legal and moral. The politician who tries to become a wise guy by becoming friends to everybody - corrupt or not - is not a leader.
Author: Miriam Defensor Santiago, Stupid is Forever

Quote: It's beneficial to have a reputation for honesty, if only so that one can lie at crucial moments.
Author: Brandon Sanderson, Elantris

Quote: It is what it is because you let it be so.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Be thankful to those painful moments of your life, because that has what shaped you to become who you are now.
Author: Pradeepa Pandiyan

Quote: Women are not just waiting to be filled up with resources-they're waiting to put their resources on the table to be able to lead towards a different world
Author: Kavita Ramdya

Quote: Could we imagine that beauty itself doesn’t just exist in society’s version of aesthetic perfection? Beauty also emerges from places and things that tell us stories.
Author: Maureen Chiquet, Beyond the Label: Women, Leadership, and Success on Our Own Terms

Quote: I’m glad that this team has a woman for a leader,” Onoria finally said. Regina didn’t quite know how to reply. “I’m fed up with men in charge not knowing what they’re talking about.” Onoria turned towards Regina. “Aren’t you?”“I don’t like people in charge that don’t know what they’re doing, male or female,” Regina said.
Author: Alex Avrio, The Alchemist's Box

Quote: Creative thinking begins by embracing your naiveté and rejecting the obvious in favor of the unusual, the extraordinary, the evocative and or the new.
Author: Maureen Chiquet, Beyond the Label: Women, Leadership, and Success on Our Own Terms

Quote: I can understand backward patriarchal reasoning coming from a male, but from a woman - and of all people, a leader of women? It says something profound about leadership - and, if anything - what it says about followers is not very flattering at all.
Author: Christina Engela, Demonspawn

Quote: If you want to run for Prime Minister, you can. If you don’t, that’s wonderful, too. Shave your armpits, don’t shave them, wear flats one day, heels the next. These things are so irrelevant and surface to what it is all really about, and I wish people wouldn’t get caught up in that. We want to empower women to do exactly what they want, to be true to themselves, to have the opportunities to develop.
Author: Emma Watson

Quote: I sometimes wonder how powerful are those Fortune 500 CEOs who can can’t even change the way that list looks (leave aside how the world looks). And, I wonder what message do we send to our young girls, in classrooms across the world, who work as hard as our young boys but see only 20 CEOs out of those 500 who look like them.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: There is something magical and transformational about saying “yes” to God. When you take His hand, step out of that boat (your ordinary, comfortable life), and be brave. Instead of spending your lifetime living in fear and playing it safe, you boldly walk in obedience. God makes you brave.
Author: Dana Arcuri, Reinventing You: Simple Steps to Transform Your Body, Mind, & Spirit

Quote: Self-care is not selfish. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
Author: Eleanor Brownn

Quote: When girls see women in leadership roles speaking out for what they believe in, they see it is possible for them, too. Instead of a faraway dream, their aspirations become real, concrete and achievable. Womanhood starts to look more inviting.
Author: Tabby Biddle, Find Your Voice: A Woman's Call to Action

Quote: It doesn't matter to me that my leaving will cost you money. It doesn't matter that my space will take time to fill. What matters is that I'm happy and if you're not willing to invest in me, then I'm willing to cost you money.
Author: Osayi Emokpae Lasisi, Invest in people, invest in profits

Quote: Remember, this is your day and your world.
Author: Amelia Boynton Robinson

Quote: Get off of my shoulders. The foundation has been laid, now its time for you to build on it and get to work.
Author: Amelia Boynton Robinson

Quote: You must be willing to give up what you are, to become what you want to be.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: CHANGE: Don’t just talk about it, go out there and do it. Don’t just meditate about it, go out there and create it. Don’t just pray about it go out there and take action; participate in the answering of your own prayer. If you want change, get out there and live it. - Steve Maraboli
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Leadership, on the other hand, is about creating change you believe in.
Author: Seth Godin, Tribes: We Need You to Lead Us

Quote: Sudden shifts and changes are no bad preparation for political life.
Author: Charles Dickens, Oliver Twist

Quote: People who always want to be at convenient places won’t make a change at controversial places.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Five people with passion can do better than fifty people with mere desire or interest.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: It is as simple as that. Birds fly because they have wings and so when you can’t grow the wings, you can’t be called a bird. Leaders make impacts because they create new ideas and so if you can’t think of any new innovative ideas, you can’t be a leader.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Until you fall in love with positive change, becoming passionate about improving the status quo, you won’t become a leader.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: A great number isn’t bad though, but doesn’t take numbers to change the world.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: What it takes is the passion to lead and the commitment to that passion through a lifetime. A great number isn’t bad though, but doesn’t take numbers to change the world.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Be the initiator of things you wish to see, but can’t see. Be the originator of things you wish you feel but can’t feel.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: The leader’s joy is the success of change, the evidence of progress and the actualization of a better life.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

Quote: Millennials, instead of a danger, are really a reflection of the society in which they grew up in, and in which all of us now live.
Author: Crystal Kadakia, The Millennial Myth: Transforming Misunderstanding Into Workplace Breakthroughs

Quote: Great leadership involves three things. The ability to realize when you are wrong, a willingness to learn from it, and an eagerness to change course if necessary.
Author: Jeffrey Fry

Quote: The biggest roadblock to changing the world is believing that your voice doesn't matter.
Author: Adam Kirk Smith

Quote: Leaders are not the ones with the right position or a proclaimed or given title, the actual leaders are the people who start acting, who step up, who do change, no matter in what way or how small!
Author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

Quote: The action generated the possibility of a future different from the past. Bitter division was healed by way of bold, confident leadership.
Author: Rom Watangu

Quote: One of the greatest challenge in life is not having an attitude but knowing or accepting that you have one
Author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

Quote: Everything is within your power,and your power is within you.
Author: Janice Trachtman, Catching What Life Throws at You: Inspiring True Stories of Healing

Quote: Why crawl like a caterpillar when you have the wings to be a butterfly?
Author: Faraaz Kazi, More Than Just Friends

Quote: Change can only stop, if THINKING stops.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: Never feel intimidated by defeat nor death, but rather intimidate life with your dreams.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: Change becomes a waste for those who do not desire to learn from it. It pushes us to bring out our personal best. It makes us realize that we are uniquely different with the capabilities to grow and shine brightly.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: I choose to be a victor, and not a victim of change.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Change is uncomfortable and awkward at first. It has a ripping effect on those who refuse to go along with it. It is not fixed by crying, or worrying, or wallowing in self-pity and mental anguish.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Change can only work in two ways – for the better, or for the worst. Yet, regardless of whatever manner in which change comes into our lives, what matters is how we view it and how we react to it.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: I know there are days when we want to be liked by others a little more than we want to change the world. But, if we decided to speak up a little more and hesitate a little less, we will begin making ripples of change.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: When you choose to act on your problems, you cease to be a victim of circumstance and become a force of change; that's when you transition to not only being a survivor, but to being a leader or hero too, and an inspiration to those still in the victim's mindset.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Vision

Quote: I’d always heard people say and I’m sure you heard it too, “Change takes time.” But, my parents taught me the more important lesson, very silently but with even greater clarity, “Change takes time. But, it also takes people.” People who are willing to put in their everything. Change doesn’t happen by itself.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: Change needs us. Change needs people who are willing to invest themselves and their time and their energy and all that they can in making it happen. And, remember, if we don’t quit; if we choose to walk the more difficult path; if we refuse to give up, no matter how long the road or how steep the climb; we will make change happen.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: In modern time slowness is new sickness.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Coachable leaders are ready and willing to make the needed changes and adjustments in their lives.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: You can't stop Greatness; you can only try to delay it. And when you try to delay it, it just gets Greater because it gains new strength.
Author: Tiffany Winfree

Quote: Love and Hate are two of the most used, abused, and misused words of mankind.
Author: Tiffany Winfree

Quote: Whatever you are not changing, you are choosing.
Author: Laurie Buchanan, PhD

Quote: If you change your words to positive reinforcement, the negative reactions will lose their power
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: I am not a believer of the law of attraction (though I do not deny the possibilities of it to be true), but I firmly believe in the ability of making choices, the ability to take conscious decisions.
Author: Namrata Kumari, Change Your Beliefs To Change Your Reality

Quote: I think I should be allowed to be only fair, or even mediocre, for a while.
Author: Jim Bouton, Ball Four

Quote: Hell yeah! Twitter was proof that leaderless self-organizing systems could be true agents of change.
Author: Biz Stone, Things a Little Bird Told Me: Confessions of the Creative Mind

Quote: Every change comes in a challenge.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Whenever, you face a challenge, it is time for a change.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It was due to his tact, to his judgment, to his sympathetic manipulation of human beings that the atmosphere had always been such a happy one... If there was a change, therefore, the change must be due to the man at the top.
Author: Agatha Christie, Murder in Mesopotamia

Quote: Politics is motion." John Sears
Author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

Quote: If you on the wrong path, change and travel on right direction.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you want to do something that really changes someone’s life, the best thing you can do is make the person you’re trying to help a participant in the process.
Author: John Stahl-Wert, The Serving Leader: Five Powerful Actions to Transform Your Team, Business, and Community

Quote: As a leader, you will see things you may never like to see; yours is to correct those things so that next time you open your eyes, you will see better things you wish to be seeing always. Leaders learn to right the wrong of society.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders don’t give excessive vocal orders. They humbly involve people and together cooperate with them to make a change happen.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The author says one of the sources of resilience is the ability to measure and perceive early warning signs so as to adapt.
Author: Andrew Zolli, Resilience: Why Things Bounce Back

Quote: You can’t lead people if you aren’t going to focus on what’s relevant to you and them. Don’t worry about who is and who is not watching you. Consider what you have to watch.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A beautiful woman is one with a beautiful heart. She may be covered with mud or sores but only her foot fit the glass slipper.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: It is said that ‘Beauty lies in the eyes of the beholder’. I say, ‘Perfection lies in the heart of the receiver.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: There is strength in kindness.
Author: - A Starry Eyed April, An Ode to Mama

Quote: A blissful heart is a beautiful soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Growth is grace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you want a new look, get a new hair style.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Children can see the beatitudes in nature.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The beauty of souls is like blossom flowers.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Simplicity is the beauty of souls.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Peter must have thought, "Who am I compared to Mr. Faithfulness (John)?" But Jesus clarified the issue. John was responsible for John. Peter was responsible for Peter. And each had only one command to heed: "Follow Me." (John 21:20-22)
Author: Charles R. Swindoll

Quote: Let your passion become a passionate pursuit of Me. And as you follow, the sheep will follow.' (John 21:20-22)
Author: Charles R. Swindoll

Quote: Achieving great things through training, tenacity & time doesn't make someone vain. It lessens vanity! Therefore, I have one question: is @realDonaldTrump vain?
Author: Steve Cioccolanti

Quote: The most formidable way to lead is to serve. And while the perplexing oxymoron of such a grinding statement absolutely cripples us, it birthed a Savior.
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: The greatest men stand on their values and pray on their knees.
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: The drum to which we march reveals the conductor to whom we’re listening.
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: WHEN SIN HINDERS YOUR WORSHIP.God will never delay His promise.You have delayed Him."..However, when the Son of Man comes, will He find faith on the earth?" Luke 18:8b
Author: Mac Canoza

Quote: God will never delay His promise.You have delayed Him.
Author: Mac Canoza

Quote: Live life to the fullest or foolest.
Author: Mac Canoza

Quote: When listeners become leaders, the world changes.
Author: Rev. Kellen Roggenbuck

Quote: The holy country is occupied by holy citizens.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Have we forgotten the laws of God?
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Walking in close fellowship with God is a spiritual self.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Stop complaining. Be grateful for every circumstance.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: The grace of endurance is the great power of God at work within us.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: God continue to rescue us from mortal sufferings.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: We ought to know the Lord and fullness of His great grace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Our existence and our environment enclosed entities of divinity.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Love is God. God is love.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: All that I seen makes be fear the Lord, for great is wrath.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Gratitude is heavenly bliss.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: No matter what happens to you, if you have life, with faith and hope, you will live to see your situation change.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: God love to be with us. We must daily seek His presence.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: It is only by grace, the divine-self manifest.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The Lord cared for us in the wilderness. May we never forget Him in times of abundance.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: In the moment of quietness, my strength re-energized
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: In everyday life, a blessed act of saying ‘hello, a smile, word of encouragement…’ can uplift someone spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The divinity within is an endless strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: A life of faith is an enduring sacred-existence.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: There is nothing that can satisfy a tasty soul accept the living water.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: To get power is to pray.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Prayer is a sacred-utterance to God.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: It is not enough to believe. Believe must lead to change of attitude and conduct.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: With self-assured spirit, the soul is indomitable.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: who are you to teach me about life " she said"I'm yourself in just another body " he said nd smiled "but i dont know all this" she wondered "we know everything but we have forgotten our real self nd replace it with false identity, whatever you see is the extension of your self nd i hope one day you will able to relize that " he said without expression
Author: jagvir ji

Quote: Don't lose heart, we're just rusty angels.
Author: Stefan Emunds

Quote: You become free like you always dreamed, yet you realise that every land is different and you do not belong anywhere yet you live everywhere and that we all share the same lands except you seem to be the only one who realises this fact
Author: Yolanda De Iuliis, The Memoirs of 'I'

Quote: To make one think is to change a generation, to build one thought is to grow a better world
Author: Yolanda De Iuliis, The Memoirs of 'I'

Quote: Smiles show fullness of a joyful soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: A gracious soul is kind hearted.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Worry only wears the body, soul and spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: A strong soul recovers from any suffering.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Search deeply in your soul, you will find love, peace and joy.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: What is within is untouchable.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: In solitude, you will find the soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: There lies within thy soul sunshine, let it radiate the sacred light.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The warrior of the night is a wondrous soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You are a great sacred soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The greatest victory is the conquest soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Love ignites spiritual fire in the soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Good heart, good soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: May your soul be rooted in love.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: What God says I am is what I am: great soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Your soul may be trampled in times of troubles. But if your spirit is strong, you will survive.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Each soul should know the sacred spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Music communicates with the soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Look within, find strength for thy soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Ambition is soul set on fire.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Music keeps the soul alive.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not stop giving your soul-best.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Determined soul, willing spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We have shed many tears to toughen the soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Just one caress became a symphony of passion, insatiable longing, an unquenchable desire to possess.... Gasps... The sparkling touch, embrace make hard to breathe... A mere short burst of brilliance, explosive need...forbidden sweet... Beneath the warmth of a dancing rainbow summer sunset, slowly tuning into the magic night with the stars flooding the sapphire skies...the sacred emerald island wildlife listens to our song, played with loving fingertips, reflected in diving deep into each other's ocean eyes...
Author: Oksana Rus
