Bill Gates put it so well when he called the Internet the ‘town square for the global village of tomorrow’.Could you spend a week or even a day without reading your emails, using social media or going online? Someone recently joked with me that having Internet access is more important than having food or water.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, 100 Things Successful People Do: Little Exercises for Successful Living

Quote: A true leader is the one who leaves memorable footprints of nobility. A leader who is decisive enough and have all the guts to take bold and frank decisions regardless of the oppositions and the temporal adverse effect of such decision on the masses, knowing that in the end, the fruits of such decision will be sweeter enough to put joy on the faces of the masses and they shall remember such noble footprints and ponder in humility.
Author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

Quote: You need a strategy to assume leadership, but only the character can sustain leaders as who they really are.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Digital Valley: Five Pearls of Wisdom to Make Profound Influence

Quote: You do not need to be a millionaire to feel successful or be successful. Financial wealth is only one of many possible indicators of success. However, to achieve your dreams and life goals you’re going to need money. And making it requires financial planning and goalsetting. I do not know of any successful person who has been able to simply ignore their finances.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, 100 Things Successful People Do: Little Exercises for Successful Living

Quote: Being a person that others can trust is one of the most sought after qualities in the workplace today. So many leaders and their staff have shown in the recent global financial crisis a lack of trust and integrity amongst themselves and with their clients and other stakeholders.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, Secrets of Success at Work: 50 Techniques to Excel

Quote: We live in a world in which everything seems to needed now and working quickly is normally viewed as a positive attribute in the workplace...Do not let yourself become too frazzled and stressed by doing everything at high speed.As I have coached hundreds of individuals in the workplace, I have discovered that we waste precious time by delaying and procrastinating. We might know that the work is very urgent and important but we still might find ourselves being slow to start the task.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, Secrets of Success at Work: 50 Techniques to Excel

Quote: We cannot please all men but we can be a blessing to many.
Author: Mac Canoza

Quote: WORSHIP IS ACTION.""Worship is not lazy, boring and sad.Worship is zealous, famous and joyful.
Author: Mac Canoza

Quote: People before Profit.
Author: Mac Canoza

Quote: Stop worrying about what you cannot control. It’s a total waste of your energy, energy that could otherwise be used to help you focus on what you can influence. I spend large parts of my coaching sessions helping people to sift through their challenges and concerns – helping them to determine what they can change and what they have no control over.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, 100 Things Successful People Do: Little Exercises for Successful Living

Quote: The most powerful way of being able to listen to your own intuition is by being silent. Find a quiet space, slow down and calm your mind. Your goal is to eliminate all that noise going through your head – all those thoughts that appear from nowhere.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, 100 Things Successful People Do: Little Exercises for Successful Living

Quote: Fundamentally, leadership is more about the future, but starts at today.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: Success requires a focused attention of your time and energy. This is true no matter what you want to achieve – to change the world or simply change apartments. All success stories come down to one person having a focused aim – so focused at times it can look like an obsession.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, 100 Things Successful People Do: Little Exercises for Successful Living

Quote: Only those who do not practice sin can stand in the presence of the holy God." -"I NEVER KNEW YOU
Author: Mac Canoza

Quote: WORSHIP IS ACTION.Worship is not lazy, boring and sad.Worship is zealous, famous and joyful.Psalm 66:1-2Shout joyfully to God, all the earth; Sing the glory of His name; Make His praise glorious.1 Corinthians 6:20For you have been bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body.Psalm 107:32Let them extol Him also in the congregation of the people, And praise Him at the seat of the elders.
Author: Mac Canoza

Quote: Framing the right problem is equally or even more important than solving it.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: A set of excellent questions themselves is perhaps like a poem, both philosophical and intellectual.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: Vision is a future state of beings.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: The art of questioning is to ignite innovative thinking; the science of questioning is to frame system thinking, with the progressive pursuit of better solutions.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: Creative expansion cannot happen without vision.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: Leadership is all about energy
Author: Dr. Wanda Bonet-Gascot

Quote: Entrepreneurship is all about energy
Author: Dr. Wanda Bonet-Gascot

Quote: Diversity is a very popular business topic today while the negative side of diversity, discrimination, remains a touchy and sensitive topic. Even in organisations which follow the letter of the law in terms of not discriminating against any individuals, it is common for people to show prejudice and bias...Have the courage to stand out from your colleagues by being very open to and comfortable with all kinds of diversity amongst your colleagues and stakeholders. When you sense someone is being ignored or marginalized spend time with them and bring them into discussions encouraging them to speak up as needed.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, Secrets of Success at Work: 50 Strategies to Excel: Teach Yourself

Quote: True empathy is not about waiting to understand another person; it is about proactively seeking to do so. It takes effort to give another person your full time and attention; to ask others how they are feeling and if they coping well with things. And don’t overlook those closest to you. Never take anyone for granted. Avoid being too preoccupied to sit down and talk with your children, partners and colleagues.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, 100 Things Successful People Do: Little Exercises for Successful Living

Quote: Don't sabotage your energy, focus on expanding your energy bubble.
Author: Dr. Wanda Bonet-Gascot

Quote: A truly successful life is one filled with friends so it helps if people like being around you. If you suspect they don’t, have a think about how strongly you exhibit ‘likeable’ qualities such as listening well, being trustworthy, kind, generous, compassionate, fun, positive and unselfish. The good news is that you can learn such qualities even if they don’t come naturally to you.
Author: Nigel Cumberland, 100 Things Successful People Do: Little Exercises for Successful Living

Quote: It's all about energy
Author: Dr. Wanda Bonet-Gascot

Quote: To lead people, you must follow behind.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: It is not blindly pushing your own agenda that will enrich the world. It’s is your ability and willingness to understand, appreciate, anticipate, address, serve and support the lives of others that will.
Author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

Quote: Unless they're utterly heartless, people put a certain value on human life. It keeps us from killing each other off for no reason. But for leaders like you and me, a moral high ground is too absolute. There are choices to be made.
Author: Amanda Bouchet, A Promise of Fire

Quote: Success is a process, not an event.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: Rhetorical question: Did you get to where you are by accepting the status quo?I didn't.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: If you keep people down so they dont become better than you, you gotta stay there to keep them down so you dont progress yourself.What kind of wahala (Suffering) is that ?Leave them to progress so you can expand.
Author: Myles Munroe

Quote: Authenticity is the most fundamental, but challenging attribute for leadership.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: True leadership is about pulling forth the gold in everyone and believing in people before they deserve it.
Author: Michael Brodeur, Destiny Finder: A Practical Approach to Unlocking Your Destiny

Quote: Move away from the mid-set that the fulfillment of the organization's mission, vision, and strategic plan is only the work of leaders.
Author: Sue Tetzlaff, The Employee Experience: A Capstone Guide to Peak Performance

Quote: It takes healthy, resilient leaders and employees to achieve great results.
Author: Sue Tetzlaff, The Employee Experience: A Capstone Guide to Peak Performance

Quote: Business should never be merely transactional -it should be transformational
Author: Rasheed Ogunlaru, Soul Trader: Putting the Heart Back into Your Business

Quote: By leading ourselves effectively, we can learn to lead others as a whole person: mind, body, and spirit.
Author: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg, Balancing Work, Relationships & Life in Three Simple Steps

Quote: Too many leaders assume that the role of leadership is to control.
Author: Jim Ferrell

Quote: You don't need a title to be a leader, and having a title doesn't make you one.
Author: Anthony T. Eaton, LEADERSHIP CONVERSATIONS

Quote: Leadership view is multidimensional with the full spectrum of colors.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: In the world of business, being slow is a losing move.
Author: Shawn Casemore

Quote: A business that is not growing after all, is dying.
Author: Shawn Casemore

Quote: Innovative leadership is essentially anchored on the leader’s overall multifaceted resourcefulness and multidimensional competencies.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: Leaders live by reality and not by assumptions!
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Want to change the world? Get creative and solve problems. The world has too many factory workers and too few problem solvers.
Author: Kevin J. Donaldson

Quote: Money is not the result, but the BYPRODUCT, of your good leadership.
Author: Kevin J. Donaldson

Quote: Match your talent with integrity, or your talent might take you places where you lose control, and fall from grace.
Author: Kevin J. Donaldson

Quote: God’s discipline has nothing to do with rejection but more to do with refinement.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Achieving your goal is greatExceeding your goal is exceptionalExceeding your goal and teaching others is Leadership
Author: Joseph Swenson

Quote: We recognize authority based on whether we feel we could attain authority by the rules by which the authority was obtained.
Author: Clifford Cohen

Quote: Sometimes command means letting those under you do their jobd
Author: Kirsten Beyer, Children of the Storm

Quote: Sometimes command means letting those under you do their job
Author: Kirsten Beyer, Children of the Storm

Quote: The defining qualities that will distinguish great leaders from the rest are stemmed from the mindset level.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

Quote: Gratitude was never a noun; it's secretly a verb. It is not a place you accept defeat, settle in for broken dreams or call it the best life will get. Gratitude is getting out of laziness, self pity, denial and insecurity, in order to walk through that door God has been holding open for you this entire time.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Choose a leader who will build bridges - not walls. A leader who will promote peace - not wars. A leader who believes in equality - not discrimination. A leader who is transparent - not secretive. A leader who will speak for all - not just animals.
Author: Mizan Chaudhury

Quote: Money will make a leader turn a blind eye to injustice.
Author: DeAnthony Thompson

Quote: A leader is a lamp not just a sign board.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Which do you want to be: a proficient manager or a Leader of Character? The first creates compliant employees. The second leads committed followers!
Author: Dave Anderson, Becoming a Leader of Character: 6 Habits That Make or Break a Leader at Work and at Home

Quote: Becoming a Leader of Character changes lives—our lives and the lives of the people we touch.
Author: Dave Anderson, Becoming a Leader of Character: 6 Habits That Make or Break a Leader at Work and at Home

Quote: Leader of Character: someone who uses influence to achieve a moral or ethical goal.
Author: Dave Anderson, Becoming a Leader of Character: 6 Habits That Make or Break a Leader at Work and at Home

Quote: We cannot keep on blaming the past leaders about the present circumstances. We need to be mindful that if we do nothing to improve the present circumstances, our children will also blame us in the future.
Author: Gugu Mona

Quote: Authentic leadership is leadership that endures, because it exists as a function of the individual rather than a crowd of borrowed opinions.
Author: Azim Jamal & Brian Tracy, What You Seek Is Seeking You

Quote: Relinquish what you once believedwas your success limitation.Create and place your focus onwhat you want to be manifestedin your life and begin your journey.There are blessings of abundance awaiting your acceptance
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: leaders don't watch but make things happen-initiate change
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph, The Complete Leader: Jesus Christ the Accomplished Perfect Total Leader

Quote: The thing with life is that it is transitional. As such, one day, we will wake up to realise that the likes of IBB, OBJ, GEJ, PMB, FFK, LAI LAI, etc are no longer with us and can no longer manipulate or control the affairs of Nigeria.One day, you and I would become responsible for the affairs of this country in many varying capacities. Some as state leaders, others national, while some others would man ASSU, NLC, NUT etc.Truly, should the generation after us be hopeful? Hopeful that we will turn the corner for their sake?Think about it. Are you ready to lead the way?
Author: Magnus Nwagu Amudi

Quote: He has led us in here against our fears, but he will lead us out again, at whatever cost to himself.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Lord of the Rings

Quote: Leadership isn't about winning. It's about bringing people with you to the finish line.
Author: John C. Maxwell

Quote: The surest way to damage society is to call for a "great man" to lead it. The surest way to improve society is to become a great man to lead oneself and convince others to do likewise.
Author: Jakub Bożydar Wiśniewski

Quote: I'm sick and tired of it," he said, "It's the same all the time. 'These are my claws, so this is my cowslip." 'These are my teeth, so this is my burrow.' I'll tell you, if I ever get into the Owsla, I'll treat outskirters with a bit of decency.
Author: Richard Adams, Watership Down

Quote: Every growth on this planet is at the cost of loss to some one. No one can deny it or proove it wrong.
Author: Ragesh Nair

Quote: To liberate yourself from your own self-judgment is to liberate others from it as well. To love yourself is an act of love for the world.
Author: Vironika Tugaleva

Quote: Real power, is the power that empowers without corruption
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: To the degree you experience a love deficit you will also manifest a leadership deficit.
Author: Glenn C. Stewart

Quote: If your leadership is truly grounded in love, you’ll always land in the category of a good leader.
Author: Glenn C. Stewart

Quote: Love is where leadership begins.
Author: Glenn C. Stewart

Quote: Loving leaders allow for individuality in style and expression.
Author: Glenn C. Stewart

Quote: Paradoxes are what draws Wisdom like bees to honey! Hence, where there is no paradox (Complexity), there is no need for Wisdom....
Author: Amit  Chatterjee

Quote: There is a thin line of difference in being courageous and foolish!
Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

Quote: Leadership always benefits the greater good.
Author: Mark Sanborn

Quote: A code is like love, it has created with clear intentions at the beginning, but it can get complicated.
Author: Gerry Geek, Ice Breakers for Project Managers: Jokes, Quotes, and Brainteasers

Quote: Be Practical." That's probably the most stupid piece of advice I've ever received in my life.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: Success for me hasn't been about individual success. It's about the success of all those young boys and girls who I have the honor of working with.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: Very often we sit back thinking good things will happen, knowing that good things take time and hoping that someone else will do it. The world needs us!
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: I know I could’ve been on the other side of the line too. I refuse to accept injustice and inequality because I know it can be against any one of us, our brothers and sisters and friends and family. I know it’s personal. I know this is our only chance, our only planet, our only shot. And, I know this is my brick.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: I would follow such beauty, said something inside Ender. I would see as those eyes see.
Author: Orson Scott Card, Ender's Game

Quote: When a change management fails, leadership change is brought in. A leadership change will always bring in change management
Author: Peter M Senge

Quote: Management is the kitchen that produces a delicious meal, where Leadership is the Chef hooked by a purpose across the canyon of risks that adds the fragrance and taste to make it go beyond expectations.
Author: Amit  Chatterjee, Ascent: A Practising Manager's Growth Mantra

Quote: Leadership is about movement and growth.
Author: Mark Sanborn

Quote: Good leaders make heroes of others.
Author: Mark Sanborn

Quote: The test of leadership is, is anything or anyone better because of you?
Author: Mark Sanborn

Quote: I don't want to be rich and famous but I want to die knowing I stood infront of a broken man and gave him one reason to smile again.
Author: Nikki Rowe

Quote: You can continue to cry over the same pain & complain about the same situations or you can expand your mind and you can grow. Maybe im not alone when I say, sometimes we all get a little confused and feel like we owe it to the people and places to try harder when in reality, most of the time lessons become lifelong if we don't learn the art of peaceful detachment early in the game.
Author: Nikki Rowe

Quote: A leader must be a good listener. He must be willing to take counsel. He must show a genuine concern and love for those under his stewardship.
Author: James Faust

Quote: All greatness of character is dependent on individuality. The man who has no other existence than that which he partakes in common with all around him, will never have any other than any existence of mediocrity.
Author: James Fenimore Cooper

Quote: Those leaders who fail, lack the capability to resonate their idea & thoughts
Author: Aayush Jain

Quote: Progress has a steep price. Success has an even steeper price. Your team won't be willing to pay it if you aren't willing to pay it.
Author: T Jay Taylor

Quote: You can chase a bird from your porch, but you can not take away its ability to fly.
Author: Dr. Myles Munroe

Quote: Two types of leaders: there are thinkers and there are doers. Some are idea generators and others are the implementers.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: The person of creatures is living, the purpose of living is service, a service that implants legacy.
Author: Samuel Gyekye Mensah

Quote: Cooler heads prevail while things spin completely out of control.
Author: Clifford Cohen

Quote: My father taught me how to understand and be sensitive to others, which is probably the most critical aspect of leadership. Without it you are only a manager.
Author: David Morehouse, Psychic Warrior: The True Story of America's Foremost Psychic Spy and the Cover-Up of the CIA's Top-Secret Stargate Program

Quote: When people respect someone as a person, they admire her. When they respect her as a friend, they love her. When they respect her as a leader, they follow her.
Author: John Maxwell

Quote: Unlike temporal leadership, in which violence and death often proliferate, Christ’s rule signifies reunion between predator and prey, malefactors and innocents.
Author: James Mikołajczyk, Jesus the Jew, Christ the King: Exploring the Hypostatic Union Between the Jesus of History and the Christ of Faith

Quote: Spiritual authority is the direct result of God doing a greater work in the deeper areas of a leader’s life.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Behind every successful innovation, was a presentation in a closed room
Author: Aayush Jain

Quote: Unless people are convinced about what you are asking them to do, they are not going to make it happen.
Author: Ravi Kant

Quote: Leadership is the ability to help people and organizations surpass themselves.
Author: Mark Sanborn

Quote: Be the leader, not the boss.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: In the midst of desert, I found there was, within me, a beautiful lake. In the midst of night, I found there was, within me, an unbeatable morning.I realize through it all, that …No matter how difficult the challenges are, within me, there is a force that wants me to push back. The force wants me to live my personal legend there is no matter what.May the Force be with me … and with you.
Author: Utpal Vaishnav

Quote: The Leader who grows his team not just in numbers but by nurturing the roots of their success,has planted a field of dreams
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: What are you doing for others is the ultimate end of true leadership.
Author: kamil Toume

Quote: Cash flow never comes from making people redundant.
Author: kamil Toume

Quote: People cannot be managed or led, people are inspired. Think leadership again if you disagree.
Author: kamil Toume

Quote: In leadership, skills may take you where character won't keep you.
Author: Mike Ayers, Power to Lead: Five Essentials for the Practice of Biblical Leadership

Quote: Leadership amongst the crowd is often the one who has the least to gain and the most to offer......-bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: A great leader has to be flexible, holding his ground on the major principles but finding room for compromises that can bring people together. A great leader has to be savvy at negotiations so we don't drown every bill in pork barrel bridges to nowhere. I know how to stand my ground — but I also know that Republicans and Democrats need to find common ground to stand on as well.
Author: Donald J. Trump, Crippled America: How to Make America Great Again

Quote: Dream without fear, love without limits, and let your life sing its song.
Author: Dilip Bathija, The Superhero Soul: Quest for Inspiration, Happiness, Success and Greatness

Quote: The people with ideas have no power and the people with power have no ideas.
Author: Harmon Okinyo

Quote: Reading is one of the most common habit among the most successful people.
Author: Aakash Singal

Quote: Channeled correctly and integrated properly, our diversity can be our greatest strength.
Author: Max DePree

Quote: That’s the bittersweet joy of ministry. We see people healed, and then we watch them move on in victory. Sometimes, it means saying goodbye. We must learn to celebrate as our fledgling birds spread their wings and fly into freedom, even if that flight pattern takes them far away from us.
Author: Katherine J. Walden, Seasons: Reflections on Changes Throughout Life

Quote: You can take the minister out of the pulpit, but you can’t take the ministry out of the minister.
Author: Katherine J. Walden, Dare to Call Him Friend

Quote: Clarity leads to attention and attention leads to results.
Author: Henry Cloud, Boundaries for Leaders: Results, Relationships, and Being Ridiculously in Charge

Quote: So don't look over your shoulder or let fear and anxiety rule you. Go for broke. Let passion blaze your trail. Look ahead and pursue the dream that fits who you are as a person and a manager. Learn what you can, but don't get bogged down--in today's world, there's so much to know that learning can actually take the place of action and hold you back. Learn enough, then trust your gut and act. Be bold--or crazy--enough not to hold back. Take advantage of the freedom to be your own person. When the game is over, regardless of the score, you'll revel in what you've done.
Author: Edward M. Hallowell

Quote: Anyone can follow a crowd.It's the leader that follows the facts.
Author: Richard Diaz

Quote: All good leaders are optimists. They always see opportunity where others see hardship
Author: Jocelyn  Murray, The English Pirate

Quote: Ever since I became an executive producer of 30 Rock, people have asked me, 'Is it hard for you, being the boss?' And, 'Is it uncomfortable for you to be the person in charge?' You know, in that same way they say, 'Gosh, Mr. Trump, is it awkward for you to be the boss of all these people?
Author: Tina Fey, Bossypants

Quote: When leaders lead in ways that people’s brains can follow, good results follow as well.
Author: Henry Cloud, Boundaries for Leaders: Results, Relationships, and Being Ridiculously in Charge

Quote: The quickest way a person can defame your character is by taking something you said out of context. But Fear Not. Everyone that was ever Anyone always had their words taken out of context. If you can't handle having your words twisted up, then leadership is not for you. Leadership is reserved for the ‪#‎BRAVE‬.
Author: Tiffany Winfree

Quote: When you make up your mind that you want to be Great, you have to learn about the Great people of the past, the Great people who changed the world, and the Great people of each respective category of absolutely everything you can think of. You have to saturate your mind in greatness. You literally have to get a degree in it. Greatness is a journey into those who have come before you. ‪
Author: Tiffany Winfree

Quote: As a leader, you are always going to get a combination of two things: What you create and What you allow.
Author: Henry Cloud, Boundaries for Leaders: Results, Relationships, and Being Ridiculously in Charge

Quote: Whatever you do, do with integrity. Wherever you go, go as a leader. Have courage to lead. Whenever you serve serve with caring. Whenever you dream, dream with your all. And innovate, never give up. ~Curt Carlson, America's Richest Families: A Forbes Compendium Of Stories Since 1977
Author: Curt Carlson

Quote: Stop praying that God should make you a leader if you are not ready to do hard work.
Author: Bidemi Mark-Mordi

Quote: The first thing that has to be recognized is that one cannot train someone to be passionate--it's either in their DNA or it's not.
Author: Richard Branson

Quote: Every leadership role has a character driving force that will fulfill or decimate the ultimate purpose of the role.
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Jesus Christ Our Example: The Exemplary Leader

Quote: HOW TO CHOOSE A GREAT LEADERChoose a leader who will invest in Building bridges, not walls.Books, not weapons.Morality, not corruption.Intellectualism and wisdom, not ignorance.Stability, not fear and terror.Peace, not chaos.Love, not hate.Convergence, not segregation.Tolerance, not discrimination.Fairness, not hypocrisy.Substance, not superficiality.Character, not immaturity.Transparency, not secrecy.Justice, not lawlessness.Environmental improvement and preservation, not destruction.Truth, not lies.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: The body fades. A leader who would last relies on more.
Author: N.K. Jemisin, The Fifth Season

Quote: A good leader doesn’t have to know everything. Nobody knows everything that’s why you surround yourself with people who are experts in different areas.“That’s what makes a good leader.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: Effective leadership is doing important things first. Effective management is knowing what is important.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Great leaders live and leave noble and indelible footprints. Any leader can start something. Any leader can do anything but, the real hallmark and a great measure of a great leader is not necessarily what happens now but, what happens later. The noble works of a true and a great leader stand the test of time and never vanish with time.
Author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

Quote: ... I believe that he will prosper most whose mode of acting best adapts itself to the character of the times; and conversely that he will be unprosperous, with whose mode of acting the times do not accord.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: If you cannot lead, do not mislead.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: To be a real leader, serve with love.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: In the end, every startup is different. But in the beginning every startup is the same.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: Commitment precedes success. What you are committed to doing you will be successful at doing.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Our real problem is not the pervasiveness of the darkness but a failure of the light. Light always dispels darkness. The glorious light of the resurrection life of Jesus Christ is still sufficient and available to those who reject self-reliance and return to His plan for biblical leadership. This return can reignite the radiance of the Gospel in transforming power.
Author: Daniel Henderson, Old Paths, New Power: Awakening Your Church Through Prayer and the Ministry of the Word

Quote: Great companies don`t hire skilled people and motivate them, they hire already motivated people and inspire them. People are either motivated or they are not. Unless you give motivated people something to believe in, something better than their job to work toward, they will motivate themselves to find a new job and you`ll be stuck with whoever`s left.
Author: Simon Sinek, Start with Why: How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone to Take Action

Quote: Statecraft and kingship were not for the faint of heart
Author: Sharon Kay Penman, Devil's Brood

Quote: Every time we decide to use our power to influence others, particularly if we`re gleeful and hasty, we damage the relationship. We move from enjoying a healthy partnership based on trust and mutual respect to establishing a police state that requires constant monitoring.
Author: Kerry Patterson, Crucial Confrontations: Tools for Resolving Broken Promises, Violated Expectations, and Bad Behavior

Quote: Leaders are made when people discover and express their own authority. This is the powerful message of this book (Ascent: A Practising Managers Growth Mantra), spoken with honest insight by a man who has been there and done it himself. I know—Amit Chatterjee has been a student, colleague, and correspondent of mine for many years and now, with this book, he becomes my teacher too.
Author: Jonathan Gosling

Quote: We have good leadership only by chance, not by management.And we need to change that!
Author: Amit  Chatterjee, Ascent: A Practising Manager's Growth Mantra

Quote: Don't be sad that one day or another you met someone who undermined your capabilities and sapped your energy, what that person did could be the strongest crucible that forged a great leader
Author: Ahmed Elkadi

Quote: Leadership is not the loudest roar that creates change it is the consistent whisper that challenges your fears and inspires your magnificence
Author: Bluenscotttish

Quote: You must not wait to be elected into office, before you begin to serve. Begin to serve every where you are; in the home, community, school, university, work, hospital, church, market, society, nation and among many other places.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Leaders must served and not to be served as demonstrated by Jesus Christ, the Saviour.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Just because you can't act EVERYWHERE doesn't mean you don't act ANYWHERE. – Madeleine Albright
Author: Walter Isaacson, American Sketches: Great Leaders, Creative Thinkers, and Heroes of a Hurricane

Quote: Phronesis is a beautiful virtue, practise it and you shall reap the rewards…
Author: Shana Pascoa

Quote: As much as Henry Kissinger wanted to attribute historical movement to impersonal forces, he too conceded to "the difference personalities make".
Author: Walter Isaacson, American Sketches: Great Leaders, Creative Thinkers, and Heroes of a Hurricane

Quote: No true individual has existed yet, able to live, able to die. Only diseased, tragic, or dismal and ludicrous fools who sometimes hoped to achieve some ideal by fiat, by their great desire for it. But usually by bullying all mankind into believing them.
Author: Saul Bellow, Herzog

Quote: Our generation of women is clearing the path for our daughters, granddaughters, women and girls down the line, to be safe to be the woman or girl they are.
Author: Tabby Biddle, Find Your Voice: A Woman's Call to Action

Quote: A hunt leader could not show fear, or let it linger in his stomach, for others would sense it soon enough, taste that fear and become possessed by it. They would hesitate when an order was given, and uncertainty would claim their life as readily as the blade of the enemy.
Author: Raymond E. Feist, Honored Enemy

Quote: He listened to their opinions, stated his own, and supported them with reasons; and from his being constantly occupied with such meditations, it resulted, that when in command no complication could ever present itself with which he was not prepared to deal.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: Accept it as it is and be true to yourself, the real answer is in you. It is about saying no to whom and what no is due and saying yes to whom and what yes is due! A simple solution to most of the problems of mankind today is just Yes and No!
Author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

Quote: Jesus does not suffer so as to exclude your suffering. He bears a cross, not that you may escape it, but that you may endure it.
Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Morning and Evening, Based on the English Standard Version

Quote: ... From want of foresight men make changes which relishing well at first do not betray their hidden venom, as I have already observed respecting hectic fever. Nevertheless, the ruler is not truly wise who cannot discern evils before they develop themselves, and this is a faculty given to few.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli

Quote: ... Whoever becomes master of a city accustomed to live in freedom and does no destroy it, may reckon on being destroyed by it. For if it should rebel, it can always screen itself under the name of liberty and its ancient laws, which no length of time, nor any benefit conferred will ever cause it to forget; and do what you will, and take what care you may, unless the inhabitants be scattered and dispersed, this name, and the old order of things, will never cease to be remembered...
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: ... If instead of colonies you send troops, the cost is vastly greater, and the whole revenues of the country are spent in guarding it so that the gain becomes a loss, and much deeper offense is given since in shifting the quarters of your soldiers from place to place the whole country suffers hardship, which as all feel, all are made enemies and enemies who remaining, although vanquished, in their own homes, have power to hurt. In every way, therefore, this mode of defense is as disadvantageous as that by colonizing is useful.
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince

Quote: You may not lead by ordering, but you may lead by showing possibilities and the beauty of success.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: ... none of them had it. They had no qualms about stealing, but they needed to be told. They liked to be told, and Viktor Chemmel liked to be the teller. It was a nice microcosm.
Author: Markus Zusak, The Book Thief

Quote: To truly be successful you must of have a clear vision of what success means to you & then share that knowledge with others to grow a team ~bns~
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: The Leader who sets a vision and encourages others to to take ownership in their future will obtain the greatest reward of overall performance resulting in success.~bns~
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: The journey to self discovery forges many paths, the footprints left behind are the memories of what was and the belief of what is.~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: Print, it transpired, was not just an instrument of agitation and change: now it was equally necessary to win the peace.
Author: Andrew Pettegree, Brand Luther: How an Unheralded Monk Turned His Small Town into a Center of Publishing, Made Himself the Most Famous Man in Europe—and Started the Protestant Reformation

Quote: True Leaders possess good core values and will align themselves with like thinking people to grow their leadership and prosper in Integrity~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: Awesome ‪‎Leadership‬ is encouraging others to take initiative,challenge what is status quo improve it and feel pride in their commitment~bns~
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: Dynamic Leaders value and nurture relationships to create long term associations that create and achieve professional respect~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: The first thing I am going to tell my successor is, don't trust the military men – even on military matters." JFK
Author: David Talbot, Brothers: The Hidden History of the Kennedy Years

Quote: A leader does not develop leadership by gaining more followers. Great leaders make more leaders.
Author: J.R. Rim

Quote: People of the hundred," he said, using an ancient Herrani phrase Arin was surprised he knew, "who leads you?"So many cried Arin's name that it no longer sounded like his name.
Author: Marie Rutkoski, The Winner's Kiss

Quote: Leadership begins by asking how you can make things better?
Author: Jeffrey Fry

Quote: A strange feeling: as if filaments trailed from Arin's body. A thousand fishing lines snagging attention. Here and there. Little tugs. People caught on the lines. The way sometimes people couldn't look him in the eye, and when they did they become fish trying to breath air. He wished it weren't like that.He knew it would be necessary.
Author: Marie Rutkoski, The Winner's Kiss

Quote: The elegance under pressure is the result of fearlessness.
Author: Ashish Patel

Quote: It is not an overstatement to say that the destiny of the entire human race depends on what is going on in America today. This is a staggering reality to the rest of the world; they must feel like passengers in a supersonic jetliner who are forced to watch helplessly while a passel of drunks, hypes, freaks, and madmen fight for the controls and the pilot's seat. – Eldridge Cleaver, Soul on Ice, 1968
Author: Mark Kurlansky, 1968: The Year That Rocked the World

Quote: You have to imprint your own style. People like authentic personalities.
Author: Dexter Hawk, 25 Things to Say to the Interviewer, to Get the Job You Want: Being Qualified Isn't Enough

Quote: Self-leadership always precedes team leadership.
Author: Michael Hyatt, Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

Quote: When efforts that are wisely executed, the situation and condition don't affect the performance.
Author: Ashish Patel

Quote: How we lead ourselves in life impacts how we lead those around us.
Author: Michael Hyatt, Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

Quote: A leader or president that never rebukes violence, is like one that takes utter pride in it's rage
Author: Andrew-Knox B Kaniki

Quote: The world is aching for feminine wisdom to come forward.
Author: Tabby Biddle

Quote: Are you following the sheep to the slaughter house, or leading them to the pasture?
Author: Jonathan Verderame

Quote: A true leader must have enough backbone to stand alone, even when the crowd wants to take the easy road home. A true leader cannot be dependent on companionship for his or her security, but must learn to trust in God alone. Singleness can give us the kind of backbone - courage, confidence, and leadership skills that an effective Christian must learn.
Author: Leslie Ludy, When God Writes Your Life Story: Experience the Ultimate Adventure

Quote: Service is a sacred strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: A prophet is not someone who first had an idea. He is the one to first believe in it and take it to its conclusion.
Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb, Antifragile: Things That Gain from Disorder

Quote: Every leadership role has a character driving force that will fulfill or decimate the ultimate purpose of the role. Jesus our role model
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph, JESUS CHRIST:Beyond the Miracles,the Character: Lesson for Leaders (Jesus Christ

Quote: When someone makes you a priority it is Great! When you make yourself a priority it is Brilliant!~
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: Standards are not established by your proclamations they are established by your routines.
Author: T Jay Taylor

Quote: The value of someone is not determined by titles, positions and sects, but by the impact and the major contributions he/she makes in the society by digging a hole in the universe to build a foundation for the next generation that is coming.
Author: Lydor Brunice

Quote: Organizing a coup was not the same as wanting one.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: TO GROW OUR MIND- We must learn new things. We must CARE for more things. We must TEACH more things. We must SHARE more things. We must RETAIN more things. To grow our mind - We don't need education, We need a good memory.
Author: Lorenzo Victory

Quote: Every day you should wake up with the excitement in knowing that God’s plans for you are far greater than your dreams for yourself. The best is yet to come!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: John F. Kennedy responded, as he often did when at his best, skillfully mixing dollops of wit with, self-deprecation, and the principle of not-really-going-near-the-question.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Gen. de Gaulle is only concerned about history, and no jury can dictate the judgment of history." Georges Pompidou
Author: Mark Kurlansky, 1968: The Year That Rocked the World

Quote: Every day you should up with the excitement in knowing that God’s plans for you are far greater than your dreams for yourself. The best is yet to come!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Great leadership makes ordinary people into extraordinary people.
Author: Jeffrey Fry

Quote: They probably think the sun won't come up unless you're there to allow it.
Author: Larry McMurtry, Lonesome Dove

Quote: William McKinley was a man made to be managed.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: Nixon was by nature a excluder. Halderman like to exclude people. When Nixon's need met Halderman's abilities, you had the most perfect formula for disaster. – Jim Shepley
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Richard Nixon coveted, to the point of obsession, a controversy-free, stage-managed coronation.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Begin each day with a promise to self to be grateful ,be kind .be authentic your day will meet your intent ~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: House speaker Thomas read could see the trend, but he could not have changed himself.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The March of Folly: From Troy to Vietnam

Quote: Leadership is the right combination of Integrity and Repect for others.The Success of anyone worth remembering is the TRUTH in their actions~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: [That] speaks to one of the most important roles of a leader; to boil down an organization's many priorities into a simple plan, so that employees can remember it, internalize it, and act on it.
Author: Adam Bryant, Quick and Nimble: Lessons from Leading CEOs on How to Create a Culture of Innovation

Quote: JFK apparently felt genuine sympathy for his 1960 presidential opponent Richard Nixon. He felt that, with Nixon's frequent shifts in political philosophy and reinventions, he must have to decide which Nixon he will be at each stop. This, Kennedy reasoned, must be exhausting.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: The author commented that John F. Kennedy's 1960 presidential campaign team worked like a band of brothers, while Richard Nixon's campaign team worked like a band of brothers in law under the direction of a quarrelsome aunt.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Nixon wanted view and advice brought to him through intermediaries. He wanted information filtered as it came to him – and he wanted his filters to filter his will back to those whom he must direct.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Eisenhower on LBJ: "He hadn't got the depth of mind nor the breath vision to carry great responsibility.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Henry Cabot Lodge was like medicine, good for you, but hard to take. – Teddy White
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: There are really two essential things in campaigning. First, you must be in good humor. If you're going to be a raffle, you are to stay home. Second, you are to make sense in your speeches. These aren't the two things you must do. Unless you're saying, if you can be in good humor when you're exhausted. – Henry Cabot Lodge
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: The most important job of a leader is to instill the confidence to follow.
Author: Kevin T. Cunningham

Quote: Eleanor Roosevelt on the changes in John F. Kennedy that led her to drop her opposition to his nomination for president: "He has the qualities of a scholar, and a sense of history. I had the feeling that he was the man who can learn. I like him better than I ever had before because he seemed so little caulk-sure, and I think he has a mind that is open to new ideas.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: He left to do whatever editors do.
Author: Bill Bryson, In a Sunburned Country

Quote: The author's alliterative description of politics since the 1960 presidential debates: "Government by Gotcha".
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: What other country has had the privilege of making the world's heart beat faster?
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: Jack Kennedy protected a mature and presidential image – tough, yet not unduly combative.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Peace is one of the most obvious earmarks of the authority of Christ.
Author: Beth Moore, To Live Is Christ

Quote: What we saw in Richard Nixon's face was the panic in his soul. – Richard Goodwin
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: The power to influence flows to the person with the most information.
Author: Dr. Rob Pennington

Quote: Diplomacy's primary law: LEAVE ROOM FOR NEGOTIATION.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: Leadership embodies a spirit of encouragement. It is difficult to lead people where they are not enthusiastically encouraged to go.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: The world has enough deceit, decay, and despair; be different.
Author: Lindsey Rietzsch, Successful Failures: Recognizing the Divine Role That Opposition Plays in Life's Quest for Success

Quote: Superficial and emotional subject might sway undecided voters.
Author: Harold Holzer, Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion

Quote: In the 1960 campaign, Arthur Schlesinger wrote of Adlai Stevenson, who already lost twice as the party's presidential nominee, "He has been away from power too long; he gives me an odd sense of unreality, a certain frivolity, distractedness, over-interest in words and phrases.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: We need to know not only what is done but what is purposed and said by those who shape the destines of states and realms." Horace Greeley
Author: Harold Holzer, Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion

Quote: Lincoln said his spiky hair had "a way of getting up in the world".
Author: Harold Holzer, Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion

Quote: The press-savy Lincoln looked not to the future, but to the past.
Author: Harold Holzer, Lincoln and the Power of the Press: The War for Public Opinion

Quote: True leaders do the right thing when the team's success is at stake and integrity is challenged.They just commit to personal excellence~Bluenscottish
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: It remains for you to save one before saving others, to lead one before leading others.
Author: Dan Groat, Monarchs and Mendicants

Quote: Leadership is when you build the team,have the tools,teach the trade,use their skills to ready them for success.~Bluenscottish
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: Leaders who listen to their team ,encourage dreams, they inspire success by example andl ignite the passion needed to achieve ~Bluenscottish
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: The dance you take with passion and self belief While every step is in rhythm with the honor of your words and the integrity of your daily actions~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: The art of oratory was considered part of the equipment of a statesman.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: The author says one patrician English leader saw his relationship with the populace thusly: He wasn't responsible TO them. He was responsible FOR them. He was responsible for their care.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: A minister's (cabinet member's) function was not to DO the work but to see that it got done.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: A lot of people here some South in your mouth, and they automatically think you're dumb. They think if you talk funny, you are funny. – Lloyd Hand
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Duty was not untinged by ambition.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: Britain had an air of careless supremacy which GALLED her neighbors.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

Quote: In person, Mr. Desmond mixes low-key friendliness and on-message discipline.
Author: Jennifer Schuessler

Quote: In my opinion, the state of mind of a community is always directly due to the influence of the man at the top.
Author: Agatha Christie, Murder in Mesopotamia

Quote: What does sincerity mean if it is chosen as deliberate strategy?
Author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

Quote: When justice is more certain and more mild, is at the same time more efficacious.
Author: Alexis de Tocqueville, Democracy in America

Quote: The miserable man was a man of that confined stolidity of mind that he could not discuss my prospects without having me before him.
Author: Charles Dickens, Great Expectations

Quote: She led me to believe we will going fast because her thoughts were going fast.
Author: Charles Dickens, Great Expectations

Quote: The only nations which deny the utility of provincial liberties are those which have fewest of them; in other words, those who are unacquainted with the institution are the only persons who passed censure upon it.
Author: Alexis de Tocqueville, Democracy in America

Quote: Persuasion is a strong but subdued outrider.
Author: Harold Bloom, The Western Canon: The Books and School of the Ages

Quote: I am not a leader but a pathfinder and a motivator.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: The whole people contracts the habits and tastes of the magistrate.
Author: Alexis de Tocqueville, Democracy in America

Quote: King die hard, in Shakespeare and in life.
Author: Harold Bloom, The Western Canon: The Books and School of the Ages

Quote: Tolkien, lucky man, had protected a realm of his own invention to which he could flee. Robert Graves, embittered by battle, writes: The child alone a poet is: Spring and Fairyland are his… Wisdom made him old and wary banishing his Lords of Faery
Author: Philip Zaleski, The Fellowship: The Literary Lives of the Inklings: J.R.R. Tolkien, C.S. Lewis, Owen Barfield, Charles Williams

Quote: Governing is not a hero's profession. It is a profession of compromises.
Author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

Quote: Jack had an actor's control." Chuck Spalding
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Jousting with an obvious hoodlum couldn't hurt.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: From hope evolves faith. From faith evolves belief. From belief evolves expectations. From expectations evolve success. As long as you have hope you can achieve success.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Integrity is the ultimate foundation of leadership.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: When you get to the junction of double mindedness in purposefulness, remember the will of God.
Author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

Quote: An anti-politician is hardly an anti-politician once he starts winning and works to close the deal by working to sew up the Establishment.
Author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

Quote: It was not because I had a strong sense of the virtue of industry, but because Joe had a strong sense of the virtue of industry, that I worked with tolerable zeal against the grain.
Author: Charles Dickens, Great Expectations

Quote: He talks to people's grievances, but he doesn't seem mad. – Elizabeth Drew
Author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

Quote: Chronicling the mid-1970s up session with Gerald Ford's clumsiness, the author quotes a medieval maxim that the king has two bodies. The head of state has a physical body like everyone else, but he also represents the body politic, either reflecting its majesty or its weakness.
Author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

Quote: The political mind is the product of men in public life who have been twice spoiled. They have been spoiled with praise and they have been spoiled with abuse. – Calvin Coolidge
Author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

Quote: Once Trump got his hands around this promising idea, he basically strangled it.
Author: Joe Nocera

Quote: Greatness is a transitory experience. It is never consistent. It depends in part on the myth-making imagination of humankind. The person who experiences greatness must have a feeling for the myth he is in. He must reflect what is projected upon him.
Author: Frank Herbert, Dune

Quote: Delay is as dangerous as the wrong answer.
Author: Frank Herbert, Dune

Quote: You can't lead if no one will follow.
Author: Margaret Atwood, Moral Disorder and Other Stories

Quote: A thing can be fine on paper but utterly crummy in the field.
Author: Robert A. Heinlein

Quote: If virtue does not equal powers, powers will be misused.
Author: John Howard Griffin, Black Like Me

Quote: It doesn't follow that the riots mean permanent hostility toward him.
Author: Frank Herbert, Dune

Quote: My son will wear the title well, the Duke thought, and realized with a sudden chill that this was another death thought.
Author: Frank Herbert, Dune

Quote: The politics of the possible was being replaced by the politics of purity.
Author: H.W. Brands

Quote: His was a quiet but persistent charisma.
Author: H.W. Brands

Quote: The essence of leadership is not to portray yourself as some sort of know-it-all, but your ability to develop the people you are working with so they themselves can take the initiative and do the organizational drive.
Author: Pat Chambers

Quote: He understood the code of his social class enough to affect an air of indifference about life.
Author: H.W. Brands

Quote: I can see that spark coming back when he talks about the future.
Author: H.W. Brands

Quote: He made his character his platform.
Author: H.W. Brands

Quote: Such was the code: Strive for victory, but never seem to be self-involved.
Author: H.W. Brands

Quote: You can’t be a great leader if your heart is not filled with greatness.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: If you have a great vision and are ready for a passionate mission, they you are a leader.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Comfort leads to complacency, and complacency kills. For this reason, I believe that we all should be a little uncoomfortable in our jobs.
Author: Stephen R. Lorenz, Lorenz on Leadership: Lessons on Effectively Leading People, Teams and Organizations

Quote: You are a good leader when your actions inspire others to do good for themselves and for others.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: A true leader leads his people from the front and if he falls into a pit the people will surely not follow.
Author: Amit Abraham

Quote: He communicates authenticity to an electorate ravenous for it.
Author: Frank Bruni

Quote: Initial uniformity can be deceiving, warns the author, because parties arrive at that state from so many different motives which will be exposed over time.
Author: Donald R. Hickey, The War of 1812: A Forgotten Conflict

Quote: In all things... .strive for perfection - settle for excellence
Author: Jeff Dixon - Storming the Kingdom

Quote: Now even reformers needed political machines.
Author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

Quote: Leaders don't pray to God to fill their potholes. They ask God for shovels so they can do it by His grace. Pray practically.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The main way people waste time is by complaining of their past wasted time. Leaders respond even if it seems to be late.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: To leaders, one trusted friend is better than ten well known betrayers
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: What differentiates victors and victims are visions and vigor. Victims won't get the vim to step out of their situations.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Inferior and Superior life lives in the interior of a person.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Experiment participants asked to pick which politician looked more confident in a photograph picked the winner of the race two thirds of the time. This phenomenon held up even when they only glimpsed the photographs for a 10th of a second.
Author: Jonathan Haidt, The Righteous Mind: Why Good People are Divided by Politics and Religion

Quote: Leaders don't define wealth by material things they see. They define wealth by the visions they imagine and actions they take.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: He uses the nice old words so rich in tradition to be sure I know he means it.
Author: Frank Herbert, Dune

Quote: There are proven ways to win the loyalty of tough, strong, ferocious men: play on the certain knowledge of their superiority, the mystique of secret covenant, the esprit of shared suffering.
Author: Frank Herbert, Dune

Quote: Clarity repositions you to quit nice activities that take you nowhere in order to pursue risky tasks that take you somewhere.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders get to tall heights by taking short steps. Being faithful, diligent and consistent with little steps is the secret to mounting greater heights.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders with high esteem are high performers.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders let go of what they can't control. It's a matter of knowing the power of the muscles and bones in your neck so you can go for what it can carry
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders should know how fast time runs and how faster they can beat it. Poor leaders run slowly till time overtakes them.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders take actions. Attacking your plans with blows of actions will not cost you painful but temporal bruises. Never leave goals untouched.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Achievements take leaders' name everywhere. Character keeps those names wherever they reach. A leader with no trust soon fades no matter how far he goes.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Those who see poverty looking for human slaves to capture, will tell you they saw him holding the handcuffs of laziness.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Self-leadership is about digging out your hidden endowment and making them known and useful to those who need it most.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Vision unknown is self-abuse. Vision known is self-abuse discovery. But vision applied is self-liberation. Application is the key
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders reject free opportunities they don't need, so that they can have time to create the expensive opportunities they need.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Shallow are the souls that have forgotten how to shudder. Leon Cass
Author: Jonathan Haidt, The Righteous Mind: Why Good People are Divided by Politics and Religion

Quote: Talk about presidents "taking" the country hither and yon is part of the foam of presidential elections.
Author: George F. Will, The Woven Figure: Conservatism and America's Fabric

Quote: The feelings of politicians are rarely transparent.
Author: John Ferling, Jefferson and Hamilton: The Rivalry That Forged a Nation

Quote: The author characterizes Hamilton's tone in the Federalist papers by saying that he never spoke of problems but of being at the last stage in the crisis.
Author: John Ferling, Jefferson and Hamilton: The Rivalry That Forged a Nation

Quote: A person with low standards will forever be walking. A person with high standard will soon stop walking and start running. Later, they’ll soon stop running and start galloping. The next time you see him, he’s either flying or soaring.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders try every possible means to leave the world better than they found it. They make an indelible impact and society remembers them for that.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Don’t let the horrible nature of the waters prevent you from crossing the rivers of life. The more horrible the challenges we face, the sweeter the joy of conquering them.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders are raised through training and experience. Nobody was born naturally with hand-gloves of leadership. We come to life to search for it, discover it and optimize it.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Live an exemplary life as a leader. When you are gone, you will still lead from the grave because your influence, impacts and inspirations will become and information for the living.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: People do not recognize that you can do it when you merely tell them you can. Until they see you doing it, they won’t follow you. Leaders who are willing to go further alone today are those to be consulted for solutions tomorrow.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders look out for people who can criticize them constructively and rebuke them reasonably.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders create and maintain good interpersonal relationships with people they meet and work with. People who lead better relate better.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: If you have only answers and no questions, chances are high that you will never know new things.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Contrary to popular opinion, leaders aren’t created out of fame. Fame is just a shadow. When you enter dark times in, it leaves you.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders know where they can function better. They don’t cry over what they cannot do.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Innovation is the art of creating a better, a more convenient and more comfortable way for the world to pass. Leaders leave footprints everywhere they go. They are impact makers and innovators.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: There may be arrogance – and the laziness of someone who is indefatigable when doing what he enjoys, but only when doing that.
Author: George F. Will, The Woven Figure: Conservatism and America's Fabric

Quote: Leaders are optimistic. When you walk with leaders, the spirit of hope will ramble around you and you will feel like “yes, I can break barriers with few blows.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: People who have nothing much in mind for next week speak instead about the next century or millennium.
Author: George F. Will, The Woven Figure: Conservatism and America's Fabric

Quote: Who you are when you have no power to say anything, and who you become when you have power to say everything will determine whether you are a leader or not.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Your followers are interested in going where you have gone before. Take them where you have been and let them know what took you there. They’ll learn by your example.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: People who praise a leader even when he is doing the wrong things are the main reasons why his fall is near.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Whether it is in business life or in political roles, leaders rise up to offer the solutions to problems society faces. They act with the right actions at the right time.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders don’t fall in love with mediocrity. The status quo isn’t their desire to maintain but to improve.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The courageous attitude of a leader awakens the dormant attitude of followers. The dormant attitude of a leader weakens the passionate attitude of followers. Leadership determines everything.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: To know if someone can speak offensively or politely, don’t give him poem to recite; don’t give him a song to sing. Just engage him in an argument and you will know it for yourself who he is.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: People easily become familiar with what you teach them practically than what you tell them verbally. Action fixes images in their minds and they can carry those images for a long period.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A leader does not only discover what people can do better. He teaches, guides and mentor them to do it exceptionally well. When a seed comes into contact with a leader, fruits are produced.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Management informs. Leadership applies. The effective managers inform accurately. Effective leaders apply wisely.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The leader who listens is the one society needs most. They don’t force their commands on people. They pay attention to their demands and set the pace for the change that society truly needs.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: It's all right to drill your crew, but why not drill the passengers.
Author: Erik Larson, Dead Wake: The Last Crossing of the Lusitania

Quote: When you are a person people can trust, they will call on upon you, love to be around you and work with you.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The growth of an organization is not dependent on the number of employees in its register. It is dependent on the number of employees who show dedication and commitment to the vision of the organization.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leadership is about taking steps while management is about drawing the map on the steps to take. Managers simply plan, leaders simply execute!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The public personality of a leader is not what really matters. What he does out of the open stage really tells more about him than anything else.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leadership is about focus and concentrations. To be in focus, choose a clear direction. To concentrate, remain in that direction!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: People who follow you want to know in their hearts what you are willing to sacrifice for them. Your followers don’t care how much you know until they know how much you care for their welfare. Leading to succeed begins with servant leadership.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Feeling threatened by others' choices pulls us all down. Instead, we should funnel our energy into breaking this cycle.
Author: Sheryl Sandberg, Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

Quote: Women can enter (...) negotiations with the knowledge that showing concern for the common good, even as they negotiate for themselves, will strengthen their position.
Author: Sheryl Sandberg, Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

Quote: For leaders, wars are filled with guesses.
Author: John Ferling, Jefferson and Hamilton: The Rivalry That Forged a Nation

Quote: His level of experience is nearly transcendent.
Author: Davis Miller, Approaching Ali: A Reclamation in Three Acts

Quote: Everyone has a kind of limitation respectively. Leaders don’t allow their own to obscure them in a small corner.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: By means of positive imaginations, leaders bring the future to the present so that they can work on it before setting off to enter it.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Everyone in the organizations is very important. From the sweeper to the security officer; from the messenger to the manager, everyone doing well at his post is a leader. The organization becomes a leading one when it’s made up of people leading in their roles.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: You will never overcome your self righteousness if you continue to believe that God prefers you over other people. The moment you feel entitled is the moment you feel superior and distance yourself from a humble heart that believes God knows what he is doing.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: The simplest way to silence your critics as a leader is to do what they claim you can’t do. However, be careful they don’t set you up to take fatal risks to please their criticisms.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The common soldiers did not blame him for his excessive grief. They knew him. They knew his flaws. Indeed, I think they loved him all the more because he was flawed, as they were, and did not hide his passionate, blemished nature.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: As wars dwindled to skirmishes and our strength grew, so David was able to spend less time with military commanders and more with the engineers and overseers who were fanning out throughout the land, digging cisterns, making roads, fortifying, connecting, and generally making a nation out of our scattered people.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: Leaders are deep thinkers. They don’t relax for problem to lay eggs before they attempt dealing with them.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The ultimate profit from all of my businesses is to be happy and to make all of the customers happy.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: There is no greater truth than this: God created you for success. He gave you all the physical, mental, and spiritual DNA to succeed. He loves you through your mistakes and loves you enough to correct you when you step out of line. If you have not done it lately, Grab on to His great big hands of love and let Him take you places you have never dreamed of going. He’s that AWESOME!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: The greatest part of our existence enfold in service of humanity.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Resilient communities relied on informal networks of deep trust to contend with and heal disruption.
Author: Andrew Zolli, Resilience: Why Things Bounce Back

Quote: I have lived most of my life in soldiers’ camps. I know what they saw. I know how they think. Their confidence sours as sudden as curdled milk.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: I thought it best to add nothing further, to let the line of his thought lead him to his own conclusions.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: A beacon of light shining in a dark tunnel leads even the blind to safety
Author: Wogu Donald

Quote: There is no greater truth than this: God created you for success. He gave you all the physical. mental, and spiritual DNA to succeed. He loves you through your mistakes and loves you enough to correct you when you step out of line. If you have not done it lately, Grab on to His great big hands of love and let Him take you places you have never dreamed of going. He’s that AWESOME!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: He disliked the social obligations of the captaincy.
Author: Erik Larson, Dead Wake: The Last Crossing of the Lusitania

Quote: Avner had lived too long and become too canny to claim the crown of Israel for himself.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: Even though he said no store in uncanny things, he was soldier enough to value with whatever weapon came to hand.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: When a kingdom rests on it, I always expect difficulty. Then, if there is none, no blame. But if there is, one is prepared.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: No one sits, as you do, so close to a king, who does not begin to grasp how the levers of power work, and the cost of the oil that must grease them.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: This night he was a king before he was a man. At this time, this troubled me. Later, I would have cause to wish it were always so.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: David was at his best in group settings, soldier enough to join in the raucous jests, king enough to make it matter that he remembered some moments of bravery or sacrifice, and praised each man accordingly.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: He is able to put aside personal feelings and see the broad strokes. Experience counts in these things.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: David ran through concrete advantages. And then set aside the practical. The pragmatist was gone, replaced by the poet and mystic.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: A sign of a good leader is not his position but his vision.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: If soldiering did not interest him, the soldiers themselves were another matter. He loved to sit with the men and draw out their first-hand stories of past campaigns.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: You can’t lead people if you can’t lead yourself. Self-leadership qualities qualifies you to become a co-operate leader.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Perhaps Ali's most significant talent with the ability to transport people past thoughts and words to a world of feeling and play.
Author: Davis Miller, Approaching Ali: A Reclamation in Three Acts

Quote: You say I can't do it because you can't. Mohammed Ali
Author: Davis Miller, Approaching Ali: A Reclamation in Three Acts

Quote: Leaders can change the tenor of the workplace and create harmony in motion toward a favorable result. So every time you say to your team, "Let's rock and roll," make sure you have already set up the stage to where they can actually perform like rock stars.
Author: Thomas Huynh, The Art of War—Spirituality for Conflict: Annotated & Explained

Quote: She turned back to the rest of us. "They've taken it all," she said. "They've taken every last good thing in the world."Then she swung the door wide. "Now go and show them your answer.
Author: Sebastien de Castell, Traitor's Blade

Quote: I've never understood one thing: Why do all these megalomaniac dictators, secret societies, mad scientists, and totalitarian aliens want to rule the world? I mean really? Don't they know what a pain in the neck it is to be in charge? People are always making unreasonable demands of kings. "Please save us from the invading Vandal hoards! Please make sure we have proper sanitation to prevent the spread of disease! Please stop beheading your wives so often; it's ruining the rugs!
Author: Brandon Sanderson, Alcatraz Versus the Shattered Lens

Quote: Whatever his weight in pounds and ounces, he always seems bigger because of his bounces.
Author: A.A. Milne, Winnie-the-Pooh

Quote: Leaders lead by example. No leader asks more than he is prepared to give himself.
Author: David Amerland, The Tribe That Discovered Trust: How Trust Is Created, Propagated, Lost and Regained in Commercial Interactions

Quote: Notice I did not say what people can do--what we can do is merely a consequence of what we can be.
Author: Max DePree

Quote: Eradication represents a complete change of philosophy and a recognition of the equal rights of all citizens to protection from infection, no matter where they live. Eradication, by its very nature, is public health with a conscience. The public health control officer can sleep tranquilly, salving his conscience with the thought that most of his responsibility has been discharged – that he did not have enough money to do any more. The eradicator knows that his success is not measured by what has been accomplished but, rather, is the extent of his failure indicated by what remains to be done. He must stamp out the last embers of infection in his jurisdiction. His slogan must be: ANY IS TOO MANY.
