Author: Fred Lowe Soper, Building the Health Bridge: Selections from the Works of Fred L. Soper

Quote: The best friend of truth is time while the best friend of a leader is results.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: Between a plan and it’s achievement is a leader in the middle. With his one arm he makes the plan. With the other one he carries them through.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Bad timekeeping will suck the life out of your bank account.
Author: Colin Myles, 5 Keys to Doing Business With The Right People

Quote: Leaders know the great deal of productivity that comes out of a strong self-esteem. They help others to develop this esteem so that productivity can increase.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A leader does not lose focus because he wants to please his followers.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: My dear Gorgas,Instead of being simply satisfied to make friends and draw your pay, it is worth doing your duty, to the best of your ability, for duty’s sake; and in doing this, while the indolent sleep, you may accomplish something that will be of real value to humanity. Your good friend, ReedDr. Walter Reed encouraging Dr. William Gorgas who went on to make history eradicating Yellow Fever in Havana, 1902 and Panama, 1906, liberating the entire North American continent from centuries of Yellow Fever epidemics.
Author: William Crawford Gorgas, Sanitation in Panama

Quote: A sacred space is not a place to hide out. It is a place where we recognize ourselves and our commitments.
Author: Sherry Turkle, Alone Together: Why We Expect More from Technology and Less from Each Other

Quote: To understand desire, one needs language and flesh.
Author: Sherry Turkle, Alone Together: Why We Expect More from Technology and Less from Each Other

Quote: The stories that grow up around a king are strong vines with a fierce grip.
Author: Geraldine Brooks, The Secret Chord

Quote: Fortunately for the cause of science and of humanity, we had as Governor-General of Cuba at that time General Leonard Wood, of the United States Army. General Wood had been educated as a physician, and had a very proper idea of the great advantages which would accrue to the world if we could establish the fact that yellow fever was conveyed by the mosquito, and his medical training made him a very competent judge as to the steps necessary to establish such fact. General Wood during the whole course of the investigations took the greatest interest in the experiments, and assisted the Board in every way he could.
Author: William Crawford Gorgas, Sanitation in Panama

Quote: My job as a leader is to make sure everybody in the company has great opportunities, and that they feel they're having a meaningful impact and are contributing to the good of society. As a world, we're doing a better job of that. My goal is for Google to lead, not follow that.
Author: Larry Page

Quote: Time was when much of lawyering consisted (according to turn-of-the-century lawyer and statesman Elihu Root) in "telling would-be clients that they are damned fool's, and should stop.
Author: George F. Will, The Woven Figure: Conservatism and America's Fabric

Quote: Over seven billion people exist and not one has your set of fingerprints. That sets you apart from anyone who has or ever will walk the face of this earth. You bring something to the table of life that no one else can, so bring it!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: The best leaders have the ability to align people to their vision and motivate them to work passionately towards its fulfillment as if it were their own.
Author: Ben Morton

Quote: Although leaders and followers are closely linked, it is the leader who often initiates the relationship, creates the communication linkages, and carries the burden for maintaining the relationship.
Author: Peter Northouse

Quote: Leaders show examples. They have something to offer and they’ll offer it by the process of how they got it. Anyone who has no examples to show may not lead better.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The real character of leaders does not show in fair weathers. When the sun of life begins to go hot, you will see for yourself some leaders are already melting off!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The time it takes to fall from the top of a mountain to the floor it shorter than what it takes to climb from the floor to the top. Only leaders with character can maintain their trusts.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A leader who is through learning is through.
Author: John Wooden

Quote: You have to be a light to yourself in a world that is utterly becoming dark.
Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

Quote: Few of us realize our potential; because if we did, we would pursue our passion and walk in our purpose.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: The speed at which progress rolls is not determined by the number of people who started pushing it, but by the number of people who are passionate to hold on doing so.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Take a look around,” the instructor had advised. “Ask yourself if there’s anyone else who is better qualified to do the job. Not in the entire galaxy, but right there, at that point in time. If the answer is ‘yes,’ ask them to accept command, and do everything you can to support them. If the answer is ‘no,’ which it will be ninety-nine percent of the time, then take your best shot. That’s all any of us can do.
Author: William C. Dietz, Halo: The Flood

Quote: Yes, it takes two to dance. But somebody has to lead.
Author: Ellen Hopkins, Perfect

Quote: Discovering an inner history requires listening – and often not to the first story told.
Author: Sherry Turkle, Alone Together: Why We Expect More from Technology and Less from Each Other

Quote: Leaders are lovers of change. Without change, growth is static. To lead, you have to appreciate change; else change will depreciate you!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: When the qualities that now confer leadership have become universal, there will no longer be leaders and followers, and democracy will have been realized at last.
Author: Bertrand Russell, Why I Am Not a Christian and Other Essays on Religion and Related Subjects

Quote: Preferring steady progress, slow and imperfect, is a good philosophy for the defeated.
Author: Fred Lowe Soper, Anopheles Gambiae in Brazil, 1930 to 1940

Quote: The common goal of leaders is to increase the value and productivity of people. Leaders inspire others to do better than they would have done when not inspired.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: His was the strong soul, gentle, but tempered with fire, fervent, heroic and good, the helper and friend of mankind. It is such as he who make progress possible.
Author: Thomas W. Martin, Doctor William Crawford Gorgas Of Alabama And The Panama Canal

Quote: You have to make people realize your worth, else no one cares!
Author: Anamika Mishra

Quote: It is much easier to evaluate perfect rather than partial results.
Author: Fred Lowe Soper, Anopheles Gambiae in Brazil, 1930 to 1940

Quote: Over a century now after Dr. William Gorgas wiped Yellow Fever out of Havana and Panama, and by that out of an entire continent, and more than half a century after Fred Lowe Soper led the eradication of Anopheles gambiae out of Northeast Brazil, their names are unknown, their carefully-detailed, boots-on-the-ground methods that they described in detail to leave expressly for generations to study and learn from to apply to malaria - and specifically they both had the desire for the destruction of malaria in Africa on their minds - is unread. The mistakes they warned about, the assumptions that they discovered to be useless and ineffectual in the field against disease-bearing mosquitoes are repeated today, while what Gorgas and Soper found to be effective and efficient in real-life conditions are routinely ignored or unknown, avoidable errors blithely doomed to be repeated thanks to modern ignorance of their incredibly important and transformative historical successes in public health. In the battles against malaria, to be ignorant of Gorgas’ and Soper's work in eradicating the mosquito that carries it is to be hobbled by the lack of hard-earned field knowledge, practical and effective discoveries that remain completely relevant and critical to success in eradicating malaria today.
Author: T.K. Naliaka

Quote: I am sorry for you tonight, Mr. President. You are facing one of the greatest decisions of your career. Upon what you decide depends on whether or not you are going to get your canal. If you fall back upon the old methods of sanitation you will fail, just as the French failed. If you back up Dr. Gorgas and his ideas, and you let him make his campaign against mosquitoes, then you get your canal. I can only give you my advice; you must decide for yourself. There is only one way of controlling yellow fever and malaria, and that is the eradication of the mosquitoes. But it is your canal; you must do the choosing and you must choose tonight whether you are going to build that canal.
Author: Thomas W. Martin, Doctor William Crawford Gorgas Of Alabama And The Panama Canal

Quote: Leadership is influence
Author: John Maxwell

Quote: She was an experimental child but compassionate with it.
Author: Joe Cawley

Quote: In fact, second lieutenants were primary-school teachers. Sure, teachers with guns, but a platoon commander was, nonetheless, the guy who sorted out the working day for 30 men under his command, taught their lessons, helped them with their homework, sorted out their petty squabbles and put plasters on their knees when they fell over in the playground.
Author: Patrick Hennessey, The Junior Officers' Reading Club: Killing Time And Fighting Wars

Quote: Parables release the adrenaline of urgency into our bloodstream.
Author: Eugene H. Peterson, Tell It Slant: A Conversation on the Language of Jesus in His Stories and Prayers

Quote: Optimists are more qualified storytellers.
Author: Tomorrowland

Quote: Good general differ from bad generals only in the degree to which they resist the psychopathology of the very organization they serve. Norman Dixon
Author: Patrick Hennessey, The Junior Officers' Reading Club: Killing Time And Fighting Wars

Quote: It's too late to leave the future to the futurists.
Author: Sherry Turkle, Alone Together: Why We Expect More from Technology and Less from Each Other

Quote: The British Army has a fine tradition of being so distracted by what it is currently up to it stubbornly refuses to look round the corner, let alone into the future.
Author: Patrick Hennessey, The Junior Officers' Reading Club: Killing Time And Fighting Wars

Quote: The most essential requirement for leaders is neither age nor gender. It is neither certificates nor positions. It is the character that reveals trust and exemplary life.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Many ‘experts’ don’t possess the imagination or vision or any of the logistical expertise required to achieve malaria eradication. Their opinions shouldn’t be allowed to hold back men and women who do possess these qualities from achieving the ‘impossible.
Author: T.K. Naliaka

Quote: Staffers tend to mimic their bosses, to take their key from them.
Author: Chris Matthews, Tip and the Gipper: When Politics Worked

Quote: Bring it down." Veteran leader Han Solo's correction to the overbearing swagger bike which his protégé is attempting to force his will on others.
Author: Star Wars: The Force Awakens

Quote: Democracy is not simply a license to indulge individual whims and proclivities. It is also holding oneself accountable to some reasonable degree for the conditions of peace and chaos that impact the lives of those who inhabit one’s beloved extended community.
Author: Aberjhani, Splendid Literarium: A Treasury of Stories, Aphorisms, Poems, and Essays

Quote: People don’t follow you because you are nice, they follow you because they believe the place you are taking them is better than the place they are.
Author: Scott Hammerle, Lessons from the Castle: My Journey From Prince Charming to Executive Level Leader and How You Can Find The Legendary Leader Within

Quote: The best way to predict future is to create it." Abraham Lincoln
Author: Gary Chapman, Growing Up Social: Raising Relational Kids in a Screen-Driven World

Quote: A storyteller, a displaced poet, will absorb reading differently.
Author: Richard Brookhiser, Founders' Son: A Life of Abraham Lincoln

Quote: The show became its own little world, with its own internal rhythm and high standards.
Author: Dick Van Dyke, My Lucky Life in and Out of Show Business

Quote: Although it is great to know, it is better to be told, 'I love you.' Whose day can you make better today by simply saying, 'I love you?' Now do the thing you know better to do.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Young, healthy communities can afford to roll the dice.
Author: Richard Brookhiser, Founders' Son: A Life of Abraham Lincoln

Quote: We cannot afford to let the ideas of our young generation go untapped or unbacked.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: The highest goal of a leader is to help others fulfill their purposes in life.
Author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

Quote: You are a true leader if you help others to grow as leaders.
Author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

Quote: The towering genius is not apolitical.
Author: Richard Brookhiser, Founders' Son: A Life of Abraham Lincoln

Quote: He might not take their advice, but he took their temperature.
Author: Richard Brookhiser, Founders' Son: A Life of Abraham Lincoln

Quote: Lincoln was a master of small group theatrics.
Author: Richard Brookhiser, Founders' Son: A Life of Abraham Lincoln

Quote: Leaders are the human catalyst that overcomes our desire for the status quo.
Author: Scott Hammerle, Lessons from the Castle: My Journey From Prince Charming to Executive Level Leader and How You Can Find The Legendary Leader Within

Quote: You are never too old or too young to be a leader.
Author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

Quote: The author points out that the moral failure of Abigail Adams' brother focused her on disciplining her children, and herself, so that they did not come to the same end.
Author: Paul C. Nagel, John Quincy Adams: A Public Life, a Private Life

Quote: The author defines professionalism as exemplified by his subjects in their mutual unwillingness to take expected opposition personally. They would not allow grudges to get in the way of more important business.
Author: Chris Matthews, Tip and the Gipper: When Politics Worked

Quote: He was making the inevitable pivot from critic to manager.
Author: Chris Matthews, Tip and the Gipper: When Politics Worked

Quote: Sometimes servant leaders focus on the servitude part and forget the leader part. Great leadership isn't about abdication of power, it about the benevolent application of that power.
Author: Scott Hammerle, Lessons from the Castle: My Journey From Prince Charming to Executive Level Leader and How You Can Find The Legendary Leader Within

Quote: When an employee truly understands the meaning of his work and gets recognition for his efforts he performs the best.
Author: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

Quote: when u have concepts(revelation) the way u live changes
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph, JESUS CHRIST:Beyond the Miracles,the Character: Lesson for Leaders (Jesus Christ

Quote: The formula for successful leadership has changed little, if at all over the centuries. It isn’t leadership that changes over time, rather where the leaders need to take their people that changes.
Author: Scott Hammerle, Lessons from the Castle: My Journey From Prince Charming to Executive Level Leader and How You Can Find The Legendary Leader Within

Quote: He was experienced enough to spot the downside of doing the right thing.
Author: Chris Matthews, Tip and the Gipper: When Politics Worked

Quote: A person who is truly cool is a work of art. And remember, original works of art cost exponentially higher than imitations. Just take a look at the the coolest people in history. They will always be a part of history for being extremely original individuals, not imitations.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Success will teach you who your real friends are.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: We can be the very first generation which fails to see the logic or pride in defining ourselves by anything else but what is found within ourselves: our values
Author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

Quote: If you never try, you'll never know. You are what you manifest.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Confronted by menace or what is perceived as menace, governments will usually attempt to smash it, rarely to examine it, understand it, and drefine it.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The March of Folly: From Troy to Vietnam

Quote: Replace dabbling with laser-beamfocus on something important.
Author: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

Quote: The utility of perseverance in absurdity is more than I could ever discern. Edmund Burke
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The March of Folly: From Troy to Vietnam

Quote: You can actually herd cats. They can't be forced, of course. But if they sense something they want, if there enticed by something good, they'll follow, even in herds.
Author: Ron Suskind, The Way of the World: A Story of Truth and Hope in an Age of Extremism

Quote: You can't always control what happens to you but you can master how you react to it.
Author: Nikki Rowe

Quote: Moral action – humble and honest – is the tribute that power must at some point pay to reason.
Author: Ron Suskind, The Way of the World: A Story of Truth and Hope in an Age of Extremism

Quote: He was always acting, always enveloping himself in artificiality, perhaps to conceal the volcano within.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The March of Folly: From Troy to Vietnam

Quote: Life-shaping institutions tend to start with an idea or revelation. They often become mostly about the preservation and expansion of authority, something they relinquish only with the greatest reluctance.
Author: Ron Suskind, The Way of the World: A Story of Truth and Hope in an Age of Extremism

Quote: What most new entrepreneurs don’t realize is that before you can lead a business, or a family, or a ministry, or even just another person, you have to be the leader of yourself, first.
Author: Kevin J.  Donaldson, Lead and Succeed 7 Wealth Principles of Today's New Leaders

Quote: Connection" was the cement of the governing class.
Author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The March of Folly: From Troy to Vietnam

Quote: In this era of public survival through continuous storytelling, people want someone who might surprise them.
Author: Ron Suskind, The Way of the World: A Story of Truth and Hope in an Age of Extremism

Quote: He was rebuilt, reconstituted by vengeance dressed up as high purpose.
Author: Ron Suskind, The Way of the World: A Story of Truth and Hope in an Age of Extremism

Quote: If you think like a leader, act like a leader, inspire like a leader then you are a leader.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: There's nothing more demoralizing than a leader who can't clearly articulate why we're doing what we're doing.
Author: James Kouzes and Barry Posner

Quote: The nature of revolutions is to sweep the reluctant along.
Author: H.W. Brands, American Colossus: The Triumph of Capitalism, 1865-1900

Quote: If you have allowed a laborious lifestyle to suppress your dreams, then NOW is the time to take a STAND and give yourself PERMISSION to DREAM again! Now remove the clutter in your life and make PLANS to make your dreams a reality.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Perhaps the most important factor of leadership is simply taking advantage of the chance to lead.
Author: Julie F. Parker

Quote: Nothing is more honorable than a man or woman with a good reputation.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Jonathan had been around Washington long enough to know that no offer was exactly what it seemed.
Author: Stephen L. Carter, The Impeachment of Abraham Lincoln

Quote: Leaderships about transforming lives and making a difference through innovation and purpose, grounded in values and integrity
Author: Michael Harris

Quote: In order to get where you want to go in life, you have to Geeet!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Inside that Colonel, there's a private that needs to be cuddled and held just like the rest of us." Hawkeye
Author: M*A*S*H Episode Guide Team, M*A*S*H EPISODE GUIDE: Details All 251 Episodes with Plot Summaries. Searchable. Companion to DVDs Blu Ray and Box Set.

Quote: A $10,000 investment in Dell at its 1988 initial public offering would have yielded a fortune of ~$6 million at the stock’s peak.
Author: Heather Simmons, Reinventing Dell

Quote: Seek a man that doesn't ask you to prove your love. Seek a man that will prove God's love.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: As a citizen of the world, I stand only with Truth and my conscience is my only leader. This is the only way to peace and justice on earth. To always do the right thing, be the right person, and stand with whoever is right always and forever.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: Action is the bridge between thought and reality.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: A meeting is a collective tacit confession of participants’ unwillingness to work.
Author: Pawan Mishra, Coinman: An Untold Conspiracy

Quote: Listen with the will to learn.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: If you're not reaching back to help anyone then you're not building a legacy.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: anytime you speak to anybody, remember somebody
Author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

Quote: A graceless pastor is a blind man elected to a professorship of optics.
Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

Quote: All the progress in science can’t be used to build a smell receptor as capable as the one that a true leader possesses—to smell trouble or just something fishy.
Author: Pawan Mishra, Coinman: An Untold Conspiracy

Quote: Experience and wisdom are more tangible than materialism.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Tough times don't last always. Your hard times are there to shape you and develop your character. It causes you to become more aware of life and you develop an attitude of gratitude. Don't lose hope because it gets better.
Author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Release The Ink

Quote: With every step you take ask yourself, what do I really want?
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Weak leadership will always hide behind ambiguity and rhetoric.
Author: Amitav Chowdhury

Quote: The best leaders are well-rounded, able to draw on whatever skills suits the particular situation at hand. They are determined, insightful, shrewd, and, most important, able to command the attention of the people around them.
Author: Bob Rae, What's Happened to Politics?

Quote: Leadership is not a voice crying in the wilderness, aloof and apart. It requires an ability to command as well as to inspire, to learn in the process of collaboration and to build a team with a common purpose that can take action and execute the change they envision.
Author: Bob Rae, What's Happened to Politics?

Quote: An organization can only grow and set an exemplary model for development with the help of right talent pool.
Author: Amitav Chowdhury

Quote: Be true to who you are. Don't let the world tell you who to be.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: If we do not touch the heart, we will soon weary the ear.
Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

Quote: The accomplishments of the women in 'The Counselors' are a testament to the power and promise of the American Dream and are sure to resonate deeply with many young women who have the desire and the ability to make their own unique contributions to this legacy of progress. . . . Just as the women in this book were empowered by the efforts and example of those who came before them, a new generation will be inspired and encouraged by the spirit and achievements of this remarkable group.
Author: Bill Clinton

Quote: Rapport is the link between meeting and communicating.
Author: Nicholas Boothman, How to Make People Like You in 90 Seconds or Less

Quote: Jefferson determined the lodestar that lay hidden in the motivations of others
Author: John Ferling, A Leap in the Dark: The Struggle to Create the American Republic

Quote: Because their example is powerful, they're somewhat responsible for the weaklings who copy them.
Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

Quote: Failure is an open invitation to improve and engage your frustrations with a refined energy of triumphant effort.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: There will be no fear of your becoming lethargic if you are continually familiar with internal realities.
Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

Quote: Every unearnest minister is an unfaithful one.
Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

Quote: Rehnquist was just reflecting his shifting role, from outsider to the institutional embodiment of the Court.
Author: Jeffrey Toobin, The Nine: Inside the Secret World of the Supreme Court

Quote: A sense of messianic purpose makes the national interest almost indistinguishable from the political interests of the president.
Author: Ron Suskind, The Way of the World: A Story of Truth and Hope in an Age of Extremism

Quote: Knowing that an asteroid is going to hit the earth is not really useful if you are not planning to launch missiles to knock it out of the sky. You have to work massively overtime on the belief that innovation or massive change is going to happen.' — Tom Martin, former VP of marketing
Author: Heather Simmons

Quote: To the disrupters go the spoils.
Author: Heather Simmons, Reinventing Dell

Quote: Nobody thought the direct business model would work. But work it did, and spectacularly. Until it didn’t. And therein lies the tale.
Author: Heather Simmons, Reinventing Dell

Quote: If you fall into a pit, you need a ladder, not a hoe. You must climb up and not dig up. Leaders discover the right way out of limitations.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: We spend most of the time justifying the situation and not finding the real problem thus leaving minimal chance of solutions.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: One thing we entirely forget when making decisions is the fact that the results concern and throw back to the decision maker not the one it seeks to please.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: A leader who sows confidence will reap excellency and legacy. A leader who sows fear will reap stagnancy or complacency.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Engaging solely to validate your opinion takes away from the character building process.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: A goal shouldn't be limited to a title.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Leaders do not conform; they reform. If you conform, you are nurturing mediocrity. If you reform, you are breeding change.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: There is no law against delaying action to weigh it in thought.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Respect is not an obligation nor a favour, it takes a bigger person to give or show some whether it is returned or not.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: John Hay on Lincoln: "He always worked with things as they were, while never relinquishing the desire to make them better.
Author: John Taliaferro, All the Great Prizes : The Life of John Hay, from Lincoln to Roosevelt

Quote: John Hay indicates that dealing with people directly as a holder of political office "requires a stronger heart and a more obedient nervous system than I possess.
Author: John Taliaferro, All the Great Prizes : The Life of John Hay, from Lincoln to Roosevelt

Quote: Leaders don't walk in front, nor do they walk behind. They walk on completely different paths on the journey of intuition. The road that has never been taken. And so they lead.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: When everyone has a microphone, you can't hear anything. Choose one voice carefully and listen in.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: You can easily miss out on the joy of today by worrying about the “what if’s” of tomorrow. Tomorrow is not guaranteed, so bask in the joy of the day and tomorrows “what if’s” will take care of themselves.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Simply thinking creatively is not the same as being innovative, and only those who risk breaking out of their comfort zone by putting thought into action will discover the profusion of opportunity that exists.
Author: Michael Lum

Quote: Leaders do not play a "what if game". They believe it will be and work it to be! Success is scarce because fear is common.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The only relevance worth to pursue, is living your passion through your interests.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Leaders' major question is "why". If they lose, they ask "why". If they win, they ask "why". Their "whys" weave their wonders.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Get attached to your dreams; The but to that statement is, be open to all possibilities in your mission.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: The altitude of any relation is possible through discourse.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: It is easier to fall off the ladder once you on top, the balance is being aware of your environment.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: People are tired of being told that it's possible... It's time to show them how it can be possible. Leadership is demonstration.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders are interested in gains. However, they acknowledge that there is no gain without pain. They embrace the pain.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The ladder of leadership can only stand firm on the grounds of integrity. Any other ground makes it unstable till it falls.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Africa PRODUCES what it does NOT CONSUME and CONSUMES what it does NOT PRODUCE.
Author: Ali A. Mazrui, Africa, The Next Thirty Years

Quote: Leaders don't venture without vision. They don't pray without plans. They don't climb without clues. They are always prepared.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders don't climb hills of success with shoes of pride. They are slippery enough to bring a person down to the valley.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Bridges take people across rivers. Leaders take people across ignorance. With a leader, the destination of a journey is sure.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders will love to be poor and see their people rich, than to be rich and see their people poor. This is their mission.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Fear punches holes in your eyes so that you don't see the future clearly. Faith enlarges your vision to behold your destiny.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: By constant practices, deliberate repetitions and uninterrupted exercises, leaders go from zero to hero. They don't quit.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: If you're determined to stand, nothing can move you. If you're determined to move, nothing can stop you. Determination is the key!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Don't confuse one leader's bluster for muster or another leader's meekness for weakness.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: You don't necessarily need atomic bombs to destroy a nation. Politicians who value their pockets than the life of citizens always do that every day.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: So often in the church, being a pastor or a "spiritual leader" means being the example of  "godly living." A pastor is supposed to be the person who is really good at this Christianity stuff — the person others can look to as an example of righteousness. But as much as being the person who is the best Christian, who "follows Jesus" the most closely can feel a little seductive, it's simply never been who I am or who my parishioners need me to be. I'm not running after Jesus. Jesus is running my ass down. Yeah, I am a leader, but I'm leading them onto the street to get hit by the speeding bus of confession and absolution, sin and sainthood, death and resurrection — that is, the gospel of  Jesus Christ. I'm a leader, but only by saying, "Oh, screw it. I'll go first.
Author: Nadia Bolz-Weber, Accidental Saints: Finding God in All the Wrong People

Quote: Leaders do what is uncomfortable but helpful. They run away from the comfort that doesn't produce any help for the world.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Learning from failure boosts a leader's chance of staying ahead of his standards. Leaders who rise quickly after falling are always stable.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A leader does not reduce his speeds to meet the views of negative thinkers. He leaves them to do their job as he focuses.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: People either build a castle or a dungeon. The former by their virtues, pull people into positive edifices with gainful impression. The later by their vices, push people into negative huts with painful oppression.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders scan the future so it can be free of doubts and fear. They do so by not living a double standard life in the present.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Do not mistake a leader's meekness for weakness.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: Pride, anger and hatred are fruits from the same garden that poison the world when ripe. A leader cultivates no such fruits.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Every great leader once fell down from a tall ladder. You don't become a star until you get the scar. Take that risk now.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Words do less than 10 things, but actions do more than 10 thousand things. Leaders don’t talk in vain; they follow with actions.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Greed squeezes your dreams into a portable size, so that failure can easily carry them to dump somewhere.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Many self-leaders lead the world even by being invisible. The world learns from them without sitting in their classrooms.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Honesty is doing what you know or believe is right. Integrity is doing what is right and truthful.
Author: Roy  Bennett

Quote: Leaders find something to die for, not something to live on. If you haven't found something to die for yet, you can't lead.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Environment has its own ways of limiting us tightly. But leaders have their own ways of escaping those limitations narrowly.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A chief is a man who assumes responsibility. He says 'I was beaten', he does not say 'My men were beaten.
Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

Quote: The art of diplomacy is finding a reasonable route among imperfect alternatives.
Author: Robert Dallek, Camelot's Court: Inside the Kennedy White House

Quote: Leaders don't pray to God for money. They simply ask for His grace to solve problems. By solving problems, the money comes.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Your relationships will either empower you to overcome obstacles, or put fears in you so you can run away from them.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The desire to swim in deeper waters is what gives a greater experience. Nothing new comes out of being ordinary. Leaders take risks.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A leader does not deserve the name unless he is willing occasionally to stand alone.
Author: Henry Kissinger

Quote: What happens when a leader misses his steps on the ladder is what happens when a train misses the rail. Be on track.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Until you do your best, don't try to take a rest. Until you take a leap, don't try to sleep. Until you top, don't try to stop.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders are solutions conscious. They don’t complain. You would find them repeating this common question; “how will it be done, and by who?
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders inform, inspire and improve people. They educate, empower and enrich the value of their followers. They make impacts.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A leader in 10 minutes can unlock your potentials which in reality would have taken you 10 years to do without them.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders don't cry for what country can do for them for free. They dream about what they can do for country at high cost.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: People buy into leaders through the 3R's of Leadership: Relationship, Reason, and Results.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: Why ships won't use roads, is why cars won't travel on oceans. When the position is wrong, the leader won't be right.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders gather scattered people with the positive influence of intimacy while misleaders scatter gathered people with the negative influence of intimidation.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: The skills of a leader will determine how excellent he will perform. His attitude will determine how often he will do that.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: A leader isn't born after 9 months' conception. When talents are discovered, skills are mastered & values are developed, a leader is born.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: If you see a leader solving one conflict wisely, remember he is working hard to prevent 10 of such from happening!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: If you want to be a leader, don't stand on the toes of dwarfs. Mount the shoulders of giants and you will see further.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: In being able to learn from his mistakes and grow, Eisenhower "was transformed from a mere person into a personage.
Author: Lynne Olson, Citizens of London: The Americans who Stood with Britain in its Darkest, Finest Hour

Quote: Freedom is willpower to act for a change.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Almost everything a leader fails to achieve is anything he fails to try. What is not attempted is what is difficult to do.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: To become a leader, renovate your mind with painting of peace and roof your heart with ceiling of love. No love, no leader!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Teamwork is the best ever investment. If I make 3 and you make 5, together we will not make 8. We will make 15. Leaders build active teams.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: It’s is good you are about something. But wait and ask, “why and how?”. Without “whys and hows”, not every energetic movement can be called progress.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders walk their talks. They don’t give theories that do not work. They have clarity into their dreams and insight into their directions!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leaders don't fall in gutters of fear; only negative ideas flow in that canal. There, you will see filthy things like doubts and disbelief.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: I believe that we have reached a stage in life in the economic development of Africa where moving forward is perilous, moving backwards is cowardice and standing still is suicidal but we must persevere because winners do not quit and quitter never win.
Author: Patrick L.O. Lumumba

Quote: Sometimes the reason God doesn't show up to win your battles is because he already put inside of you the power to end it.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: The history of the failure of war can almost be summed up in two words: too late.
Author: Douglas MacArthur

Quote: People who sneer at a half a loaf of bread have never been hungry." George Reedy
Author: Robert A. Caro, Master of the Senate

Quote: Leaders motivate people to understand that they can do better than they’ve already done and go farther than they’ve reached.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leadership’s primary job is to enhance creative capacity by developing collectively effective leadership.
Author: William A.  Adams, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: They were following their prime minister, matching their government's mood.
Author: William Manchester, The Last Lion 2: Winston Spencer Churchill: Alone, 1932-40

Quote: Teamwork is the best ever investment. If I make 3 and you make 5, together we will not make 8. We will make 15. Leaders build active teams!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: He not only had the gift of “reading” men and women, of seeing into their hearts, he also had the gift of putting himself in their place, of not just seeing what they felt but of feeling what they felt, almost as if what had happened to them had happened to him, too.
Author: Robert A. Caro, Master of the Senate

Quote: I'm the boss. I gotta pretend to worry.
Author: Code Black

Quote: The author points out that novices to total war, and this Hitler and the British press have in common, overreact to daily events and lose sight of overall strategy.
Author: William Manchester, The Last Lion 2: Winston Spencer Churchill: Alone, 1932-40

Quote: Officers came and went and were never a part of daily life.
Author: David Halberstam, Firehouse

Quote: Now, as you well know, it is not seldom the case in this conventional world of ours - watery or otherwise; that when a person placed in command over his fellow-men finds one of them to be very significantly his superior in general pride of manhood, straightway against that man he conceives an unconquerable dislike and bitterness; and if he have a chance he will pull down and pulverize that subaltern's tower, and make a little heap of dust of it.
Author: Herman Melville

Quote: As the sun rises first on mountain-tops and gilds them with his light, and presents one of the most charming sights to the eye of the traveller; so is it one of the most delightful contemplations in the world to mark the glow of the Spirit's light on the head of some saint, who has risen up in spiritual stature.
Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Morning and Evening, Based on the English Standard Version

Quote: The men were always wary of an officer who took form more seriously than function.
Author: David Halberstam, Firehouse

Quote: The air of compromise is rarely appreciated fully by men of principle. C. Vann Woodward
Author: Robert A. Caro, Master of the Senate

Quote: You have great talent for great contribution to humanity.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: With Johnson, you never quite knew if he was out to lift your heart or your wallet. Roy Wilkins
Author: Robert A. Caro, Master of the Senate

Quote: Take for instance, a society where the prevailing value system is that you only go into politics and leadership to serve and not to make money. In such a nation, people know that those who go into politics and leadership come out of it poorer than they went in.
Author: Sunday Adelaja

Quote: The specialty in all life is expecting the exception, while ignorant of real acceptance, until unexpectedly you re-witness your own ignorance to 'be' the cause that awakens others. One does not do this yesterday, or today. You do this with expressing honesty everyday.
Author: James Emlund

Quote: Be an intentionally D.U.M.B. Person today! D-Demonstrate love to someone todayU-Understand and encourage someone todayM-Motivate someone todayB-Believe in someone today
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Politics look very simple to the outsider whether he is a businessman or a soldier – it is only when you get into it that all the angles and hard work become apparent. James Forrestal
Author: David Pietrusza, 1948: Harry Truman's Improbable Victory and the Year that Transformed America

Quote: The Bible states in Psalms 139:14 that you are fearfully and wonderfully made and that you are a wonderful work of art. That makes you uniquely special. It only makes sense for you to just be the special you that you were created to be period.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: The structure of our identity determines how we show up as a leader, how we deploy ourselves into circumstances.
Author: William A.  Adams, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: Leaders spend time reviewing their mistakes rather than having fantasies over their achievements! They look for every way to do the undone!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: True leaders spend time reviewing their mistakes rather than having fantasies over their achievements! They look for every way to do the undone!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

Quote: Leadership crisis erupt when people who have not learnt how to obey instructions are given the privilege to give commands. Leaders are experienced servants.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Great leadership has more to do with character, courage, and conviction than it does with specific skills or competencies.
Author: William A.  Adams, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: In leadership, the way up is down. Serve before you get served
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Those who serve others will be served.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The better we serve, the greater the fulfilment.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Leaders succeed or fail depending on whether or not they clarify role expectations and keep their promises.
Author: Bob   Anderson, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: Relational depth often emerges from intentional dialog
Author: Brad Lomenick

Quote: Serving God should elevate our level of excellence in every part of our lives.
Author: Brad Lomenick, H3 Leadership: Be Humble. Stay Hungry. Always Hustle.

Quote: Leaders today should be more conductors than solo artists
Author: Brad Lomenick, H3 Leadership: Be Humble. Stay Hungry. Always Hustle.

Quote: Open mind → Learning → Knowledge → Baseline for leadership
Author: Eraldo Banovac

Quote: If your endeavors result in success of the company in a continuity of atleast a few years, you are a successful manager. If other companies followyour business approach, you are certainly an important manager withleader characteristics.
Author: Eraldo Banovac

Quote: A leader is a person who knows how to act when other people don’t.
Author: Eraldo Banovac

Quote: Some of us need to put down the megaphone and just grab a shovel. Little less talk and a lot more action.
Author: Brad Lomenick

Quote: The single most important ingredient to success is Discipline.
Author: Brad Lomenick

Quote: Don’t assume meekness is weakness and those who are loud are strong.
Author: Brad Lomenick

Quote: Leaders today should be more conductors than solo artists.
Author: Brad Lomenick

Quote: Pride refuses to be taught. Humility refuses not to be
Author: Brad Lomenick

Quote: A leaders job is to shepherd, not necessarily to always shine.
Author: Brad Lomenick

Quote: If you are born to lead, be a leader!
Author: Eraldo Banovac

Quote: Pride refuses to be taught. Humility refuses not to be.
Author: Brad Lomenick

Quote: Leaders set the agenda for the future.
Author: Bob   Anderson, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: Once a good model gets inside you, it can inform and guide you throughout a lifetime.
Author: Bob   Anderson, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: A better model of leadership means more effective leadership and better business results.
Author: Bob   Anderson, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: Transformation is an acquired taste—not for the faint of heart.
Author: Bob   Anderson, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: When we step into positions of leadership, we make a whole set of promises we may not know we are making.
Author: Bob   Anderson, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: I wish you much more grace for all your works.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Leadership makes a difference in the results we create and the quality of life we live.
Author: Bob   Anderson, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: When direction and meaning are confined to Executive Leadership, value is minimized.
Author: Bob   Anderson, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: Instead I take the lead, Tobias silent at my side, and though he does not touch me, he steadies me.
Author: Veronica Roth, Insurgent

Quote: Collective leadership effectiveness drives business performance.
Author: William A.  Adams, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: When a Promise of Leadership is neglected or unfulfilled, trust is broken, engagement erodes, and performance suffers.
Author: William A.  Adams, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: Leaders have the right to expect that others will compassionately recognize them.
Author: William A.  Adams, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: Leadership is a conversation.
Author: William A.  Adams, Mastering Leadership: An Integrated Framework for Breakthrough Performance and Extraordinary Business Results

Quote: Your need to feel significant will never be met, until you can conquer your fear and manage your focus.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: When people don't know what’s going on, it’s human nature for them to imagine a version that’s ten times worse than the truth!
Author: Kenneth H. Blanchard, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: Take the high road. People will rise up to join you or fall out of sight.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Once leaders embrace the role of coach, they realize the weight of leadership is now balanced between themselves and their direct reports.
Author: Kenneth H. Blanchard, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: Some of the greatest advances happen when people are bold enough to speak their truth and listen to others speak theirs.
Author: Kenneth H. Blanchard, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: You won't benefit from diverse perspectives if you aren't open to utilizing differences.
Author: Eunice Parisi-Carew, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: As a leader, it's your job to get everyone to share what they know.
Author: Jane Ripley, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: People need to feel safe to be who they are—to speak up when they have an idea, or to speak out when they feel something isn't right.
Author: Eunice Parisi-Carew, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: We must serve each other in love and in humanity.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: When people feel trusted, they'll begin to understand they are contributors--and you'll get great ideas and happy people.
Author: Eunice Parisi-Carew, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: You are who you position yourself with
Author: Batya Maman

Quote: Map out lofty goals… include reasonable checkpoints along the way... refine, improve, and enhance your behavior in alignment with your goals…. that is the dynamic of true leadership and the formula for success.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Sometimes the best way to get other people to give up their egos is for you to give up yours first.
Author: Jane Ripley, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: The key to handling conflict is to make sure people understand it's okay to have an opposing view.
Author: Eunice Parisi-Carew, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: Collaboration begins with focusing on the collective good rather than personal gain.
Author: Jane Ripley, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: The natural result of utilizing different perspectives is that people are more engaged because they feel their opinions are important.
Author: Eunice Parisi-Carew, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: Perceive conflict as positive, creative, and issue driven. Don't allow personal attacks.
Author: Eunice Parisi-Carew, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster

Quote: If you put your heart into everything you do, you will recreate yourself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: A little self-doubt is a good thing," said Jia, "but not excessive doubt. Sometimes we live up to the stories others tell about us.
Author: Ken Liu, The Grace of Kings

Quote: Leaders find a need and quickly respond to the need.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The art of effective leadership is about navigating the dynamics of growth and success… holding a vision and leading a team, but arriving at the same time.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Stagnancy will suffocate a business… Leadership must be dynamic and evolving to ensure successful growth, enhancement, and longevity.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: With automobile accidents, mechanical failure is seldom the cause; and most often, operator error. I find the same to be true with corporate failings…. the people are rarely the issue… the shortcoming is most often found in the leadership.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Don’t just timidly swing at the problems in your life, swing hard enough to knock them out! Small efforts produce small results, big efforts produce big results!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Our deeds and actions can change the heart of men.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: John’s standard maneuver to ask someone to help him, especially in a moment of crisis,
Author: William R. Forstchen, One Year After

Quote: We can serve humanity with passionate commitment to our divine purpose.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: He is not the leader of great causes, but the broker of little ones.
Author: Robert A. Caro, Master of the Senate

Quote: Life is meant to be shared and fully lived.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: He did not falter, as long as there was a path that led toward his goal.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Fellowship of the Ring

Quote: Reliance in its most basic, daily, form is being part of a group that lives by a pact: To always have each other’s backs — no matter what — so that everyone comes out future strong.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: A leader only follows a better leader than himself.
Author: MD. Muhtashimur Rahman

Quote: Reliance in its purest, highest, form is a code to live by: That every life matters. Every future matters. Taking care of each other matters. And our shared purpose is to create amazing futures for our children’s children.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Reliance is the ultimate measure of a team’s or organization’s culture. It’s not 'Would I recommend a friend to work here?' It’s 'Would this group of people put their ass on the line for me?' And 'Would I do the same for them?
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: If you want a strong future: Becoming secure with insecurity is the best security you can have.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: If you want to lead others into a strong future: You need to be keenly aware of how your own inner truths — biases, fears, courage, values and dreams — do or do not impact the daily work of others.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: If you want a strong future: You need to get past the stories that you have told yourself and others. You need to hear the heartbeatthat’s the real you.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Me comes before we. You need to become future strong before you can help others do the same.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Your career will include thousands of opportunities to transform yourself. Many will disrupt all that you have built. Each is an opportunity to choose to be vulnerable, to let go, to be reborn.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: All the statistics about how many jobs you’ll have over your lifetime… (15-20) and how many companies you’ll work for… while true, completely miss the point! From now on, treat those numbers as red herrings — crucial only to HR directors, leaders and companies who are stuck in the past. The Rule of Disruptive Personal Transformation: Every year, you will experience about 100 significant transformative moments. Most will be thrust upon you by the disruptive churn of our times.Driven, focused people know which 3—5 to seize each year	as crucial to their future.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong individuals will not take on personal sacrifices, hardships and corporate crap that sidetrack them from their dreams and goals.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: To be future strong, you will face difficult hardships. Usually, there is no absolutely right or absolutely wrong choice. The key is to be intentional: Choosing the best hardships for your best future.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: People should not have to sacrifice so much of their personal lives, hopes, dreams and goals just to keep up with corporate pressured morebetterfaster. And tomorrow’s workforce won’t.
Author: Bill Jensen

Quote: Future strong cultures and relationships are built upon intense 'I have your back' bonds.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future Strong leaders are driven by a core question: What do I want my legacy to be? That requires a lot of searching one’s inner truths, and being brutally honest about how that compares to one’s daily actions.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Working for a company must help individuals achieve their dreams and goals more efficiently and effectively than they could achieve them elsewhere.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Calling upon our crucible moments allows us to transcend our own limitations. Those moments create completely new possibilities within each of us.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: You talk to leadership in China, and THEY are all the engineers. They get what is going on immediately. The Americans don't because they're all lawyers.
Author: John Doerr

Quote: Leadership is more about purpose than it is about position.
Author: Michele Jennae

Quote: Tomorrow’s workforce is flopping the relationship lens: They see companies as vehicles to achieve their goals and dreams — vehicles that can amplify their passions, achievements and community relationships beyond what they could have done on their own or elsewhere. Companies that they will join are seen as communities that explore and resource and fund making a difference in the world in ways that align with their personal approach and values.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Making heroes out of celebrity CEOs is at the heart of the crisis in corporate leadership.
Author: Bill George

Quote: He had been around politicians for a long time, and he was prepared for some outburst.
Author: Stephen L. Carter, Back Channel

Quote: They loved the sound of their own voices. No decision would be reached anytime soon.
Author: Stephen L. Carter, Back Channel

Quote: In spite of his Cold War credentials, Kennedy still believed in the power of words.
Author: Stephen L. Carter, Back Channel

Quote: Future strong is adventurous self-mastery. Unlocking your future by running toward the unknown, with the wondrous soul of a child and the drive of a force that will not be stopped.
Author: Bill Jensen

Quote: You need to have the means to impose yourself
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Leadership is a mindset in which one is unapologetically driven towards their goals and in behaving accordingly, inspires those around them to join in.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Leadership is the bridge of integrity that connects goals, desires, and actions.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: The biggest, toughest competition in the future will be the battle for your time and attention. Your one thing — your call to adventure — is your best tool in that battle.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Loyalty — deep, intense, devoted loyalty — to a leader or a culture, to any group, brand or idea, goes far beyond being engaged or having our needs met. We see our emotional selves in that connection. We see our future, our best selves and our better angels in that connection.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Do not wait for vulnerability to be thrust upon you by your company or the marketplace. That is when you lost control of your own destiny. Choose to disrupt yourself. Seek vulnerability on your terms, no one else's.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong leadership means being willing to stand alone. Often, the times we feel most vulnerable are when we stand alone, before others join us. When we choose to be the first voice echoing above the silence. Standing strong, alone.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong is grace, kindness, and gratitude within a pressure cooker.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future shackled is when tomorrow is anchored, boxed and managed to maximize the minimizing of uncertainty.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: The one thing that's missing to create a fundamental shift in work capacity: courage. Leadership courage.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Less than 10% of the mainstream workforce can achieve their dreams where they currently work.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: The current relationship between companies and the workforce is like marrying into a dysfunctional family. Only you don't get to escape when the holiday meal is over.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Instead of getting the leaders we deserve, we can an abundance of ShitRollsDownhill Shovelers, ShitCatchers, and NewShitCreators.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: We each must do a better job of choosing which hardships are best for our future, not just for the company's.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Most corporate infrastructures are massive time-wasters and demoralizing energy suckers.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Most companies are not respectful of each individual's time.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Far too much corporate stupidity is disguised as cost-saving efficiencies.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Far too much horrific wast of human capacity is disguised as order, predictability, and minimizing uncertainty.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: The future is personal.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: The future of work revolution begins one person at a time.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Embracing personal vulnerability is required if you wish to work, play and succeed in the future.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Before tomorrow becomes your legacy, come the choices you must make today.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: The choices you make create your future.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: To understand what makes you future strong, and what being strong means, is to understand how and why you make choices.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong is being focused enough and mindful enough and courageous enough to search for patterns and order when all others see chaos and noise.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong is letting go of what no longer serves you. Quickly.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong is as focused on the success of every individual as it is on organizational success — creating an environment where people can achieve their dreams and full potential.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong builds actions upon reflection, questions, curiosity, seeking to understand root causes and systemic connections.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong strives for simplicity for all:Least amount of individual effort, energy and time to create maximum impact by each person.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong is relationship-driven and joyful.Its best bet is on people. Its outcomes create joyfor others and ourselves.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: We must stop destroying human capacity. Now.Too many of today’s leaders are holding back the future because it comes wrapped in risks.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: If you are a senior executive, you need to embrace each individual’s right to choose his or her own hardships — and you must talk about that openly, candidly.
Author: Bill Jensen

Quote: Everyone has a right to a strong and independent future: All of us have the right, and personal obligation, to choose whether or not company-driven hardships and sacrifices, overall, are shackling or strengthening our future. And to keep that right, each of us must be our own best advocate.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Leaders step up, even when they feel like hiding. And they do so because they care.
Author: Michele Jennae, CHARGE! The Patchwork Rhino

Quote: You live, work and lead others in the most exciting time, ever! Are you strong enough?
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Your past is handing you a tool you can use to leap into your future: the crucible moments from your own life. The power you need is in looking back to look forward.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: What will you do today so tomorrow becomes the legacy you wanted to leave?
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: If we don’t communicate, we certainly can’t get much done and if we don’t communicate authentically, what we get done is less effective.
Author: Michele Jennae, CHARGE! The Patchwork Rhino

Quote: No matter how crazed you get, no matter what pressures you're under, no matter who needs what by yesterday... Always remember: everything you do uses a portion of someone else's life.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: People will change their habits quickly IF they have a strong reason for doing so.
Author: Thomas L. Friedman, The World Is Flat: A Brief History of the Twenty-first Century

Quote: You will experience 100 transformative moments every year.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: We each must select the best hardships for our best future.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: It's time for you to be the hero of your own journey.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Your choices are where your future begins.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Significant is the doer, the rest just watch!
Author: Gunbir Singh

Quote: He was more than comfortable with the language of imperious persuasion.
Author: Dan Jones, The Wars of the Roses: The Fall of the Plantagenets and the Rise of the Tudors

Quote: The king's "only interest in government was a pious but simpleminded desire for reproachment
Author: Dan Jones, The Wars of the Roses: The Fall of the Plantagenets and the Rise of the Tudors

Quote: It's time to consider: What are the toughest choices you face as you lead yourself and others into the future?
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Consistency in right thinking and right doing is how you stay up in a down world.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Future shackled is when uncertainty is the enemy that must be beaten into submission.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Future strong is filled with disruptive heroes. Are you one?
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: We all deserve the best possible future.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: YOU are the next big thing.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Who have you chosen to become?
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Who will you choose to have your back?
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Leaders: Your job in the future is to create a space where others feel save being vulnerable. Where fears and failures are openly discussed and used as lessons moving forward.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Despite several millennia of building best business practices, despite all the analysis and planning, and forced discipline and structure, what makes us human will never be cleaved from how work gets done.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: The key difference between captain and coach? The latter’s opportunities for influence come at moments when play isn't happening,
Author: Carolyn  Taylor, Walking The Talk

Quote: Much of the outward business of kingship came naturally.
Author: Dan Jones, The Wars of the Roses: The Fall of the Plantagenets and the Rise of the Tudors

Quote: Always remember: everything you do uses a portion of someone else's life.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Choosing to know yourself deeply hands you a torch to see beyond yourself, into the future. Into a strong future.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Building a strong future is living at the intersection of today and tomorrow: where living in the moment and who you have chosen to become dance together as one.
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: What's your one thing? When you pause long enough to hear its heartbeat, your one thing will take your breath away. When you pause long enough to feel it, your eyes will tear up or you won't be able to stop smiling, dancing and having a blast!
Author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

Quote: Don’t allow your thoughts of frustration allow you to make decisions out of desperation.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Striving for successful goals will have a tendency at times to be discouraging, thankless, and mentally draining. You are entitled to these feelings, however you are not entitled to give up.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: When manipulation flutters around everywhere, neither pull nor push anyone. Just do one thing - don't trust anyone!
Author: Ashish Patel

Quote: The only principle which will make you more content, less bitter is to live a life that has "Less excuses, more results. Less distraction, more focus. Less me, more we. Live with "Gratitude" not with "Greytitude
Author: Abhysheq Shukla, The Reflection "Success or Stress"Choose Wisely

Quote: Leaders inspire accountability through their ability to accept responsibility before they place blame.
Author: Courtney Lynch

Quote: Regardless of whether people have free will, human flourishing requires that they live in an environment in which they are treated as if they did.
Author: Charles Murray, Coming Apart: The State of White America, 1960-2010

Quote: Any goal, no matter what size, can be achieved if it is tackled with courage, initiative, perseverance, and integrity.
Author: Angie  Morgan

Quote: Cronkite is not a genius at anything except being straight, honest, and normal.
Author: Douglas Brinkley, Cronkite

Quote: Your friend Plato holds that commonwealths will only be happy when either philosophers rule or rulers philosophize: how remote happiness must appear when philosophers won't even deign to share their thoughts with kings.
Author: Thomas More

Quote: Having a team deliver standards and performance is much easier when they want to be there and want to be led by you.
Author: Tony Curl

Quote: All progress begins with a decision. Effective leadership requires decisive action. Embrace the process of deciding, yet recognize when you have reached a choice point.
Author: Angie  Morgan

Quote: Focus your thoughts today on HOW ‘You can!’ instead of accepting that ‘You can’t.’ Amazing ideas will come your way.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Each decision you make today has the potential to unlock and open doors of profitable benefits or close the doors to great opportunities. Think before you act and make your decisions wisely today.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Trust and believe in the vision of your mind that others cannot yet see. While others abide by the creed that seeing is believing, you must know that believing is seeing.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Expect progress, not perfection.
Author: John F. MacArthur Jr.

Quote: Leadership … is a collective and constantly redistributed function, and not the private property of the few or The One.
Author: Harrison Owen

Quote: The challenge for us is to find some response that actually inspires change rather than clinging to the old ways that cause resentment, and more importantly, distract from the real problem.
Author: Adele Faber, How to Talk So Kids Will Listen & Listen So Kids Will Talk

Quote: A leader is someone who influences outcomes and inspires others.
Author: Courtney Lynch

Quote: At Lead Star, we believe that leadership can help you create a better workplace, a better life, and a better you.
Author: Courtney Lynch

Quote: It begins with the natural feeling that one wants to serve, to serve first. Then conscious choice brings one to aspire to lead. That person is sharply different from one who is leader first, perhaps because ofthe need to assuage an unusual power drive.
Author: Robert Greenleaf

Quote: We have to work and serve humanity while we have the grace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Around the world, the perception and reality of corruption and bad governance in public places remains very high. But it isn’t just in governments that these are found; they can permeate through society, where they are rampant in private enterprises and even religious institutions. We need to deal with the causes, not just consequences. You will need to play your role, both as a good example as well as part of the social police force. Cultures and beliefs must change at a personal level as well as at institutional levels.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You manage things, you lead people.
Author: Admiral Grace Hopper

Quote: No man is educated for statesmanship who cannot see his time from the perspective of the past.
Author: Will Durant

Quote: True leadership is not defined by notoriety, power, prestige, status, or job title.
Author: Angie  Morgan, Leading From the Front: No-Excuse Leadership Tactics for Women

Quote: Selflessness is the highest goal of good leaders.
Author: Todd Stocker, Becoming The Fulfilled Leader

Quote: Just imagine the strides Africa would have made if all the resources being channeled towards conflict resolution were going into construction of power generation plants and irrigation capacity. Can’t we promote our own peace? What are we doing to seriously focus on other eco-friendly energy sources like wind and solar?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: It's not only the politician that can govern and lead a nation
Author: Goitsemang Mvula

Quote: Creating the right mind-set and a positive attitude today, will help you to start crafting a clear plan of how you intend to make your life a success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: A leadership comfort zone brings stagnancy, deprives one of innovation, stifles growth and frustrates both the leader and the team they lead. Your personal preferences like leadership style, communication style, prejudices, habits and mannerisms must be effectively managed so that they do not work against you. You have to be careful that your strengths do not end up becoming a hindering comfort zone. Seek to lead, driven by a cause.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Realise your Stewardship role as a parent – you raise children to offer a quality gift to society. Even your spouse should not be treated as an object or possession you own; support them to be the best of what they were created to be. Do your part and trust God for the rest. If you have empowered them, trust them to be responsible.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Empower your children - Allow self-discovery and self-awareness (their own key to success), Facilitate an environment for learning through experience (practice of knowledge acquired). Remember, this exploration will take place whether you approve or not – it’s inevitable, that’s why YOU MUST be in charge of providing awareness and exposure to improve the quality of decisions made during exploration and experimentation.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Having a succession and legacy plan in place will make you ready for forced changes due to circumstances beyond your control, like death, any form of incapacity, sudden changes in laws and regulations and even corporate scandals and moral failure.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Passing the baton - Oh what a challenge this has proven to be in many societies, families, businesses, governments, religious organizations and obviously in every other relay race! Why do this? - for starters, you will not live forever – how about that? After a given mileage, even a car will need new tyres!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Leadership success means your mission and vision must outlive you, but this will not happen by accident. We have enough stories around us to prove that lasting legacies have to be well managed, planned and structured for continuity. If not, you will carry your name, success and influence to the grave, only leaving short-lived memories of your achievements and impact.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Start planning from your internal or spiritual view of things. The external view always has a way of distorting, discouraging and limiting your dream.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: When you have pictured and defined your desired legacy, allow your present life activities and efforts to begin reflecting the future you desire. Begin to do what you want to see, become involved in the causes you want to be a part of. Show your legatees how you want and expect things to be done after you are gone. This will enable them to fit the vision into their own as they make their own individual unique mark.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: A leader, who divides his own people, contaminates his platform and begins to destroy his own territory.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Consider your will to be the vision of your influence on earth after you cease to be a part of it. Crafting a lasting legacy means you start planning and making it possible now.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate
