Quote: You sort of start thinking anything’s possible if you’ve got enough nerve
Author: J.K. Rowling

Quote: Surround yourself with people that love you and accept you exactly for who and what you are. The only explanation you owe is the one you give to yourself, for not living your authentic life with the love and purpose you were meant to live.
Author: Luis Almonte

Quote: Success means leaving everything behind and standing persistently towards our aims with great determination.
Author: Rajasaraswathii, I Want to be a Millionaire

Quote: As writers, we should remind ourselves, and each other, that Jane Austen and JK Rowling got rejected by publishers, too.
Author: Joanne Van Leerdam

Quote: Clear out the past, layout the present and prepare for a much better and brighter future.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: Try something new out of your comfort zone. If you lose you will get an experienced, and If you win you will get an achievement.
Author: Salman Mansuri

Quote: You were only meant to be a stepping stone on my journey across the sea.
Author: Sara Secora

Quote: Unapologetically be yourself everyday in every way.
Author: Sara Secora

Quote: EVERYONE IS A KING OR QUEEN, YOU DONT NEED A CROWN TO SHOW IT.
Author: Genereux Philip

Quote: Each day, compel yourself to do something you would rather not do.
Author: Justin Bienvenue, Opium Warfare

Quote: Never ever wish to be SUCCESSFUL like SOMEONE else. You don’t know their STORY. You are aware of their STRUGGLE. Behind that make-up, people hide their SCARS and injuries. Behind those expensive sunglasses, they hide their TEARS. And behind that positive outlook and attitude, they hide their FEARS. Be yourself. Write your own story.
Author: Sanjeev Himachali

Quote: Our external results are merely a reflection of our internal reality.
Author: Joan Posivy

Quote: Only your Willpower can fight the bad influences around you.
Author: Mohith Agadi

Quote: You are only Half Happy unless you love them both equally: Friday & Monday!
Author: Mohith Agadi

Quote: When you need motivation, look no where! Just say "YES, I CAN DO IT
Author: Mohith Agadi

Quote: Learn to uncrumple yourself, for life and people are always gung ho to crush you.
Author: Vikrmn, Corpkshetra

Quote: i WILL reach success because i will not accept anything less
Author: Nick Macri

Quote: When you aim for the stars even if you fail you’ll be a falling star, and that’s wish-fulfilling material.
Author: Kevin Focke

Quote: If you love somebody, go get them. Deal with the mess later. They are important more than anything.... You don't know what tomorrow will bring.......... and sometimes tomorrow never come ........
Author: Bharat

Quote: Passion to a person is what gas is to a car. Without it, you won't go anywhere!
Author: Alex Haditaghi, Softly, As I Leave Her

Quote: Take the path less traveled and learn from your mistakes. Don’t just let life happen around you; control your future. Learn to ask questions, set small goals, and dream of big ones. Absorb any criticism and let it fuel you. Convince others that you are worthy of your dream, and show them that you are willing to put up a damn good fight for it.
Author: Matthew T.  Cross, The Resume Design Book: How to Write a Resume in College & Influence Employers to Hire You [Color Edition]

Quote: A pat on the back can often motivate more than currency notes!
Author: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

Quote: Let's burn our masks at midnightand as flickering flames ascend,under the witness of star-clouds,let us vow to reclaim our true selves.Done with hiding and weary of lying,we'll reconcile without and within.Then, like naked squint-eyed newborns,we'll greet the glorious birth of dawn;blinking at the blazing, wondrous colorswe somehow failed to notice before.
Author: John Mark Green

Quote: If you don't put anything in place, do not expect miraculous results to appear.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: The world needs more dreamers, more peak performers, more people who aren’t content settling for mediocre. It’s time to stand up and create the future and life you love.
Author: Michelle McCullough

Quote: Once you believe that you can do something, there is not a single person in the universe who can convince you otherwise.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: The success in the information age depends upon an important strategies and tactics...
Author: harry vested, harry s vested, harry s vested jr., harry vested lawsuit, harry vested gravity collect

Quote: Let these 2 quotes sink in. In tandem together. "A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves as something to aim at." - Bruce Lee "Gentlemen, we will chase perfection, and we will chase it relentlessly, knowing all the while we can never attain it. But along the way, we shall catch excellence.” - Vince Lombardi The key here is thing to take away from the tandem of these quotes is that even those you will never achieve perfection, the fact that you will aim towards unfathomable goals you will along the journey catch greatness.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: Some people quit when victory is around the corner
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: I was ready for huge transformation, emerging from the chrysalis, like the butterfly, a true metamorphosis, alive in all my beauty.
Author: Leeza Donatella, The State of Being Love: Steps to Raise Your Vibration for a Joy Filled Life

Quote: Too many people want to have mountaintop experiences at rock-bottom prices and that just doesn't work. Greatness doesn't come at a discount. If you want true greatness, you have to pay the full price for it.
Author: Damilola Oluwatoyinbo

Quote: Beware of people who tell you it can't be done. They want to remain on the market alone
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: People who are afraid to become gods say “it's impossible
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: The day you were born you were given power to create yourself
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: The goal is essential to getting what you would like." ##
Author: Harry S. Vested Jr.

Quote: Fortune is a goddess that reveals herself only to people who seek her
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: When a protector leaves you, it looks like the end of the world. But you gradually learn to walk by your own feet
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Even if everybody says it’s impossible, with determination, there is always something you can do. The last thing is to give up without trying
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Design and produce yourself according to your dreams
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Fate does not expect to be fought and will reward those who dare to fight against it.
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: A perfect work of art is not the one that has no mistakes. It is the one people will like. Creation is not perfect but god is praised for having created it
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Miracles are waiting for you. All you have to do is go and meet them
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Anything does not exist until it is created. You create it
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Opportunity is always coming but never knocks on the door. You have to get up and meet him
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Failure is an opportunity to learn again
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Don't fear mistakes, they are your stepping stone to success
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: You don't have to finish today, what is important is that you finish. But remember today might be the last day of your life.
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Even if you can't win show defeat it can't get it the easy way.
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Don't expect it to be given to you. It is there already. Get it if you want it.
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: The gatekeepers are not there to prohibit you anything, they just want to frighten you away, if you are courageous enough to go through them, they will let you , thinking you are the owner or his so
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: We often wait for that knock of opportunity, though I've found it's better to just grab a chainsaw and cut open your own fucking door.
Author: Don Roff

Quote: If you want to be extremely important in people's lives, give them extremely good services they can't find anywhere else
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

Quote: Do not pursue a life that looks good. Pursue a life that is good.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Nothing is more compelling than the power of choice. You can choose good over evil and right over wrong. Choose right!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: God’s forgiveness is greater than the devil’s hate.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: The Bible is the greatest book ever written. It is absolutely amazing the tremendous amount of joy, peace, and success one will experience simply by applying its admonition. If you truly want the “Good Life” follow the Good Book.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Real hope is a real sense of knowing that your best days are yet to come, so dream on. What you can conceive is what you can achieve.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: The metamorphosis of your life begins with your mental appreciation for the cocoon stage of your journey. The adversities, the struggles, the perils of life are what either destroy your motivation or encourage your transformation to become what you were truly born to be. A WINNER!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: I’ve heard it said that a thousand mile journey to success begins with the first step. Anyone feel like taking a walk with me today?
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Embrace today! Embrace the new day! Yesterday is gone forever. Tomorrow is not guaranteed. All we have is now and a great day to look forward to. Today is the day the Lord has made. Rejoice and be glad in it!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: God gave you purpose, the devil can’t stop it, so the person in the mirror must choose success or failure. Choose success!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: If you only focus on what is, you may never attain what could be. Focus on the possibilities.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Here is something good to remember. You were formed by God to become a beacon of light that shines brightly within the darkness of this world. You have a purpose!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Here’s how to create an inspired vision for your life: Change the scope of your thinking from seeing is believing to believing is seeing.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Time is your most valuable asset. Money you can spend, lose, and get back. Once time is spent, you can never get it back. Spend your time wisely today.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Sometimes we take leaps of faith, and sometimes we take tiny steps. Even the tiniest step can require a lot of courage. Like climbing out of denial and admitting my real need for help. Like trusting someone who said I wouldn’t die from eating a bowl of pasta, and taking another bite. Like reaching for a pen or a yoga mat when what I really wanted to do was reach for a cookie. Like searching for a smile in my heart when my mind was busy screaming about how sad and serious I should be.
Author: Shannon Kopp, Pound for Pound: A Story of One Woman's Recovery and the Shelter Dogs Who Loved Her Back to Life

Quote: Because the truth is, while bulimia is a devastating illness I would wish upon no one, it has taught me about the fragility of life and the vital need for compassion. Today, I’m quick to love and throw my arms around any girl who has ever stared at a puddle of her own vomit and questioned the point of her life. Or who has ever let a Photoshopped image on a glossy magazine preach to her about her own self-worth, her own beauty. Or who has ever been afraid to face the pain and suffering, within and outside of herself.Today, I’m quick to love.
Author: Shannon Kopp, Pound for Pound: A Story of One Woman's Recovery and the Shelter Dogs Who Loved Her Back to Life

Quote: So many nights, I stared out at the inky black ocean, believing that if I could only learn how to eat again and keep my hands out of my throat, that would be enough. I prayed hard and desperately to God and the sun and the moon and the ocean and the universe and every shelter dog I’d ever met, as if they were all genies, that I wouldn’t ask for anything more.But perhaps God isn’t a collection of genies, and perhaps it’s okay to hope for more than relief. To hope big. To hope for Sunny’s limitless capacity to love.
Author: Shannon Kopp, Pound for Pound: A Story of One Woman's Recovery and the Shelter Dogs Who Loved Her Back to Life

Quote: When I was around Sunny, there was no time to dream about some easier, prettier, more comprehensible, less fucked-up existence. Now was all we had: Sunny lifting her eyes to meet mine. Cupping water in my own hands to rinse the blood off her head. Sunny’s tongue on my nose, her tail thudding on my leg. The reach of my hand across her spine. The words of comfort and rage and fear and sadness and hope that I spoke only in her presence.
Author: Shannon Kopp, Pound for Pound: A Story of One Woman's Recovery and the Shelter Dogs Who Loved Her Back to Life

Quote: Show me a man who mistakes patience for weakness and I’ll show you a fool.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Live in the moment! Yesterday is gone forever, tomorrow is yet to come, but you have right now. Live in the moment!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: It’s amazing how when we were young we wanted to know what it felt like to be older and when we are older we want the feeling of being younger again.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: The ultimate winner in life is one who receives the grace given to us by Jesus Christ and lives life accordingly.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: God is the creator of love. He demonstrated His love to you through the sacrificial death of His Son. The closer you draw to God the more you will demonstrate your love for others by becoming a living sacrifice by putting others before yourself.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: At times we must forgive others even when they don’t deserve it. We forgive them because we deserve it. Free yourself.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Your failures are not determined by how many times you fall down. Your failures are determined by how many times you stay down, so get up and continue to strive!
Author: DeWayne Owens, How to Get Rich on Purpose: Secrets to Prosperity and Controlling Your Destiny

Quote: Patience is the key that unlocks the door to perseverance that unlocks the door to endurance that unlocks the door to the sustaining power of true success.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: You can go as far as you believe it, but through prayer you can exceed it.
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: GOD made you a masterpiece, stop treating yourself like a shattered piece.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Don't You Get it? This very second you could be doing something you love and dream about doing. So do it! Now!
Author: Anonymous

Quote: The root of identity crises: we seem to know a lot about ourselves, but we can't tell who we are. Realize your self!
Author: Stefan Emunds

Quote: A masterpiece is a piece that masters things.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: As long as you feel comfortable losing, you will never win!
Author: Mignon' Talise Padilla

Quote: I can and I will! Just watch me!
Author: Mignon' Talise Padilla

Quote: Confidence scares off whatever stands in your way.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: This day and every other day, listen from within, GOD lives there.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: The simplicity of life never ceases to amaze me, and the many ways we complicate it blows my mind.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: [D]oing nothing meant leaving things exactly the way they were, and that was unacceptable.
Author: Caroline Goode

Quote: What is right is the ultimate law and trumps the law of the land.
Author: Bohdi Sanders, Modern Bushido: Living a Life of Excellence

Quote: Take those praises with a level head, you must not be distracted by them. After all, purpose still awaits you.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: You are never in lack, you are always in fullness, realize it and live it.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Whatsoever you set your hands on doing, do it in such a way that your work will always stand out.
Author: Bien Sufficient

Quote: Keep your mindset strong, your heart pure, your intentions kind and your dreams big.
Author: Nikki Rowe

Quote: Facing problems? Good. Even cocoon does. It makes the wings stronger you know.
Author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

Quote: The moment to make your dreams come true is day before tomorrow, same time, called NOW.
Author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

Quote: Dream high, beyond the sky; no matter wings so small, keep vision bright; just dare to learn, for you are born to fly.
Author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

Quote: Being lucky is in your hands as it’s outcome of your deeds.
Author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

Quote: It’s better to stand alone and feel strongthan standing with people who make you feel weak
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: Be impatient enough to start going after your dreams now but patient enough to watch them manifest.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: After failure, don't worry much. There will always be more opportunities and second chances.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Be a master of your dreams, not the slave of your sorrows.
Author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

Quote: If life gives you nuts then be a nut cracker.
Author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

Quote: Seeds strive to become plants by forcing their way through the soil. We can learn from this and push through the struggles we face in life. If they can survive, we can do much more. Keep pushing and pressing forward. Your best is yet to come!
Author: Kemi Sogunle

Quote: Without making mistakes, there won't be lessons learned. Without getting hurt, there won't be knowledge gained. The only way we grow is by learning from the past. Always be willing to learn and grow daily. It's how we come to know who we are and what we are made of.
Author: Kemi Sogunle

Quote: As you become more present in your own life, you will begin to enlighten others by your example.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Will Smith > Quotes > Quotable Quote“The only thing that I see that is distinctly different about me is I'm not afraid to die on a treadmill. I will not be out-worked, period. You might have more talent than me, you might be smarter than me, you might be sexier than me, you might be all of those things you got it on me in nine categories. But if we get on the treadmill together, there's two things: You're getting off first, or I'm going to die. It's really that simple, right?You're not going to out-work me. It's such a simple, basic concept. The guy who is willing to hustle the most is going to be the guy that just gets that loose ball. The majority of people who aren't getting the places they want or aren't achieving the things that they want in this business is strictly based on hustle. It's strictly based on being out-worked; it's strictly based on missing crucial opportunities. I say all the time if you stay ready, you ain't gotta get ready.
Author: Will Smith

Quote: If people are jealous of you, it means you are worth something.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The truth which has been spoken too late is more damaging than a lie.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: A lamp cannot play the role of the Sun and the Sun cannot play the role of a lamp.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Ocean is not supposed to be scared of the drops.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Able hands' are more favorable to business than 'adorable hearts'.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Good luck' is like the shadow of a tree, for some time it gives comfort to a traveler but it doesn't go ahead with a traveler.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The meaning of life is not celebrating your birth, it is celebrating your work.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: A doctor, a teacher and a politician have no caste.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: True leaders don't give consoling answers, they take constructive actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Wherever there is peace, there is progress.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: At all times an empire is more important than emperor and empress, prince and princess.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You are the mirror image that reflects the attitudes which took in your life with what you have learned during the journey.
Author: Da Anunciação Marco

Quote: Gods revelation to you is a classified info.
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Divine Immunity

Quote: If you do not manage power, it will burn you.
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Insight for Fruitful Living: Bible Faith Nuggets Series - Book One

Quote: May God grant children who will fear and revered Him.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Experiential truth comes by obedience.
Author: Jane Bulos

Quote: Kind deed is a seed of love.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: There is no greater love than the love of God.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Jesus Christ saves the sinner.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Cry to Christ!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Perfect God, Prince of Peace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The strongest anchor is hope.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Relax and rejuvenate your sacred-spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Life means Live in faith existence.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: I walk on my sacred path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The spirit of God dwells in you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: You must live the life of your dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Hope is a flowing stream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Embrace the miracle of the sacred moment.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: God is spirit. The spirit dwells in a body. We are the Holy temple.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The righteous shall blossom.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: May you wait for God’s timing.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Talk a walk with me through nature and let’s gaze on the marvelous wonders of creation.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The word of God is our glorious light for any dark situation.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: God holds the right key to every door.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: The sacred writing gives instructions on how to live life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: How wide, how long, how deep is the love that Saviour extends to all humanity!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Life is a long travel. The end of the journey is often unpredictable.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The most valuable treasure God has entrusted a shepherd with, is his sheep. No sheep is perfect but if shepherd despises them or adopts a scornful outlook for them then he has already began his downward plunge into faith which if He does not repent instantly, may eventually find himself warring against God himself who is our Good Shepherd.
Author: Santosh Thankachan

Quote: Go ahead and pursue your God-given dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: The Creator power is in you. Let your awesomeness glow.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Believe in yourself and power of your dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: May the Lord give you grace to handle life’s challenges.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Never live a day without saying ‘Thank you’ to God.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: May we graciously accept our responsibility.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Serve one another with great humility.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: God is our great helper,shelter, provider and protector.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: May God guide and lead us to a glorious future.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: What you are seeking is yourself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: The courage to dream, the courage to act.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Gracious words revived our spirit and restored our soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: May our lives be transformed by the power of the Holy Scriptures.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: God’s power supersedes any power.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: I am so grateful that I have my family and friends on this journey. They are my blessings! I need them; and just the same, I know they need me too. That is why I have never thought of giving up.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Live a Nomad Family lifestyle to broaden your horizon and create a more suitable lifestyle for your family
Author: Brenda Brave

Quote: The best don't start at the top; embrace every struggle, mistake, and obstacle you overcame to get there! Persistence and Faith = Success
Author: Zoe Woods

Quote: Since our yesterdays are gone and our tomorrows are never promised, TODAY I want to thank all my amazing friends and family for being in my life.
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: On the road to success there are determination, real hard work, perseverance and challenges to tackle.
Author: Ahmet Adam Asar

Quote: A life dedicated to family, friends, community, and whole humanity is a life well spent.
Author: Ahmet Adam Asar

Quote: Almost all the times advices from your loved ones are for your safety, not for your success.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Let today mark a new beginning for you. Give yourself permission to say NO without feeling guilty, mean, or selfish. Anybody who gets upset and/or expects you to say YES all of the time clearly doesn’t have your best interest at heart. Always remember: You have a right to say NO without having to explain yourself. Be at peace with your decisions.
Author: Stephanie Lahart

Quote: At the end of the day, it’s your life. If you turn out good, the world celebrates you and with you (not minding how you achieved it). If bad, they abandon you (even if they gave you the advice that led you to doom). Just be you and follow your heart.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: There will be this colossal moment in your life when you'll rampage all your mind disturbers and pin that one moment forever. Don't crave or pray for that moment though. Go out and strive hard, believe. Focus and be aware for the moment will just pass by. If you catch it, you are colossal.
Author: Chetan M. Kumbhar, Panasu The Golden City & The Capasstars

Quote: I live in the paradise of my imagination.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Be control of your mind.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: One of the most valuable gifts that a person can give (or receive) is a productive mentality. It is with a productive mentality that people change their lives for the better, in ways profound.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Vision

Quote: Thoughts can be such slippery things sometimes,Very hard to handle.But to a well-trained mind,They are easy to bind
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Reality Check: A Collection of Poems

Quote: Om is the things, Om is the ingredient, Om is the container and the content of this universe.
Author: Banani Ray, Glory of OM: A Journey to Self-Realization

Quote: Om is that God of love. Like a loving mother Om cleans us of our clutters collected through many incarnations.
Author: Banani Ray

Quote: Great leaders die empty. They live to offload everything they put in them! Don’t die with your books in your mind unpublished!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The brain is the coast of many great monuments. Your ability to exploit the power of your brain is what makes you a leader. Leadership emerges from a positive mindset!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Great battles that prevail in actions had been won or lost earlier in thoughts. When the mind resists change, it’s in vain the legs chase it!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: It works...conditioning your mind to see something positive in anything! Anything that happens to you, anything said to you, anything said about you.I have the choice to INTERPRET it in a way that is positive.Surefire way to imbibe Pollyana attitude !
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: Do you want to know what you think about most of the time? Take a look at the results you're getting. That will tell you exactly what's going on inside.
Author: Bob Proctor

Quote: You think you're losing your mind, but do keep in mind, as long as you may, that the ability to go on thinking such a thing means it's not all gone.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: Free time is a terrible thing to waste. Read a book.
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri

Quote: While you keep ageing, your experience compensates for your lost brain power.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Entrepreneur, if your going to start up, make sure you start up with excellence in mind.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Creativity is the new currency, so, are you credited with new thoughts or overdrawn in old thinking?
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Remember you are the perfect reflector of your mind.
Author: Richmond Akhigbe

Quote: Don't just create a change for yourself, be a centre of change to others.
Author: Richmond Akhigbe

Quote: Winning is an inside job. A person who achieves victory is the one that first wins his or her internal battles.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Develop an affirmation today, and start getting instant confirmation in all works of like.
Author: Richmond Akhigbe

Quote: Creativity means bringing simplicity to the existing.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Creativity is just an attraction to the second rate minds but simplification to the first rate minds.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The key to happy living is that Mind should be at rest and body must be exercised and active, but in the disillusioned pursuit of happiness during current times we reverse the mantra and ignorantly fly away from it.
Author: Hiyamedia

Quote: Premature satisfaction with half-success is a dream-killer of ambition , nobody should indulge in it.
Author: Osunsakin Adewale, The Hour of Temptation

Quote: You endure what is supposedly unbearable, and before you know it, you would have done the impossible by bearing the unbearable.
Author: Donovan

Quote: Creative minds don't follow rules, they follow will.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: The difference between impossible and possible is a willing heart.
Author: Lolly Daskal, Thoughts Spoken From The Heart

Quote: Purpose drives the process by which we become what we are capable of being.
Author: Lolly Daskal

Quote: A true leader leads for the sake of love and his knowledge of the path, a bad leader redirects his followers to the path of destruction.
Author: Michael Bassey Johnson

Quote: Be natural at heart and new in mind.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: When the positive mind takes the lead, the legs are safe to follow without any shaking!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Crowd is just a bunch of heads, it is their leader who is the mind.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: See the life through your heart, understand it by your mind and love it like your soul.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Don't overestimate your emotions and underestimate your intelligence.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: People in love overvalue their heart and undervalue their mind.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The function of a heart is to keep the body alive, I genuinely believe it is mind which takes care of everything else.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The mind is more sensible than heart, if you are sure listen to your heart, if you are confuse listen to your mind.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Patience Always Gives You The Best Reward When The Time Is Right....
Author: Muhammad Imran Hasan

Quote: Don't behave like your heart and mind are strangers to you; they are yours, don't depend on others to understand them, you got to understand them.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Thinking before taking actions is useful only if you are going to take action, otherwise you are wasting time and insulting your mind.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: You can not have empty or neutral mind, as long as you work the mind will contain dreams, if you stop working it will contain regrets.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: My left foot is the wisdom from yesterday, my right foot is the vision of tomorrow and my mind is focused on the work of today and this is how I stand a winner.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: An individual who has in his mind that he can accomplish a certain task is far more likely to succeed than the individual that has it in his mind that he will fail.
Author: Daniel Willey

Quote: It's not about how smart you are--it's about capturing minds.
Author: Richie Norton, Résumés Are Dead and What to Do About It

Quote: I am Not, but the Universe is my Self.
Author: Shih-t'ou

Quote: DETOX your mind, body, AND your contact list.
Author: SupaNova Slom, The Remedy: The Five-Week Power Plan to Detox Your System, Combat the Fat, and Rebuild Your Mind and Body

Quote: Power without compassion is like a giant that blocks the sunlight.
Author: Criss Jami, Healology

Quote: Don’t believe everything you think. Our minds are thought-creating machines. Most of these thoughts are fear-based. Our authentic self has the power to pick the thoughts that best serve us and those we lead.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: One day My father taught me a ‎lesson "never compete with someone who sold the world for his ‎dream"... I have learned the lesson and decided to be this one so, no one can compete with me.
Author: Ahmed El Sokkary

Quote: By all means be submissive in the bedroom (if you are that way inclined), but don't be submissive to life. Being life's bitch is no fun at all. Life may play up in many ways, but it's up to you to take control, take charge and put life in its place.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: A positive attitude creates a passion that wakes a leader up. To the leader, attitude is more powerful than an alarm clock. Positive attitude in true leadership is what makes an alarm clock unnecessary!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The power in people is stronger than people in power.
Author: Saji Ijiyemi

Quote: The greatest power we have in life is not external, but internal.
Author: Steve Knox

Quote: Might without right makes blight
Author: Agona Apell, The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock

Quote: I am afraid, I cannot and will not 'surrender' to Orthodoxy!!My life in itself is an 'Epic experiment' of nature and new living!!And I am living the 'Great Adventure'..this moment..NOW!!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: There is always a storm. There is always rain. Some experience it. Some live through it. And others are made from it.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: The weak can't bear to face their weaknesses in the presence of our strength.
Author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading

Quote: Where everyone wants to be a leader, it makes one a follower to want to be a leader, and a leader to know what to follow.
Author: Criss Jami, Healology

Quote: To be undefeated, to primer is to learn the game for not just your talents but for the game itself.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Do not settle; open up yourself by surrendering to creating your own kind of success ALL THE WAY! Whether you have superior or less-than-average skills, you will cultivate your success story through determination and consistency.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Entrepreneurs are innovators, visionaries—generators of new ideas turning into coinage
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Implore yourself to continue to Action Past Your Devil’s Advocate.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: As I am an honest man, I thought you had received some bodily wound. There is more sense in that than in reputation. Reputation is an idle and most false imposition, oft got without merit and lost without deserving.
Author: William Shakespeare, Othello

Quote: Through action anti-advocates are made believers, even though that isn’t a goal, Right! Your goal is and should always be to fulfill your own expectations and exceed them.
Author: Through action anti-advocates are made believers even though that isn t a goal Right Your goal is an

Quote: Be true to your authenticity and innovate with brave ammunition.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Be thankful for your achievements; be thankful for your accomplishments, no matter how big or small. Be thankful for the mind to complete the accomplishments. Be thankful for your past, present, and future. And know that if you are creating success stories you will find that average is how you began, above average is then where you will stand! Lest you forget the strong develop and improve; the weak get frantic, digress and deviate.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: There are opportunities for all of us, we just have to open our eyes and hold ourselves completely accountable
Author: K. Aberanthy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Lest you forget the strong develop and improve the weak get frantic digress and deviate
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: ..be able and willing to action regardless of all trauma, all the No’s, and non-supporters one could headache and pain on.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: We all have a little entrepreneur inside of us. Wanting to leverage it is what gives us an entrepreneurial spirit and an entrepreneurial mind. Actually doing it makes one an entrepreneur.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: if you are not a fan of great consumer service, then you are not a fan of business ultimately not making you a fan of money.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Ultimately, having what we want is our liability. It is no one else’s. Purge the blame game. Everyone has a legitimate reason why they CAN’T get something done. It’s the will to get it done REGARDLESS.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Exceed, succeed, outdo, overdo, all with a smile.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Entrepreneurs, let’s begin to turn our desire and design into reward.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: Pick the paper off the floor, throw it in the trash, study—even if you think you already know the subject, say thank you for an act of kindness, and be the support you want to receive. You want to become a master of the mundane, making it easier to be a sorcerer of success.
Author: K. Abernathy Can You Action Past Your Devil's Advocate

Quote: The lion does not need the whole world to fear him, only those nearest where he roams.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: The strong will always rule the weak.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: Power and influence: things that should be obtained not for means of greed, nor pride, nor ego, but rather to ensure that in the right moment, when your wisdom and benevolence are required to keep humanity strong and united, you can deliver and orchestrate others toward the greater good.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: The vanities of life:pleasure, possession, position and power.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: A problem is nothing more than a solution outstanding.
Author: Phumi Ngwane

Quote: If you can remember why you started, then you will know why you must continue.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: You may bend, but you will not be broken.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: People will have their opinions of you, but you must be able to distinguish theirs from yours.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: Your greatest disappointment will often lead you to your greatest appointment.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: What you feel, and what is real – all just a matter of perspective.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: Don’t give someone the credit for holding you back. Give yourself the power in continuing to move forward.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: All the power in the world, resides inside you.If you let it.
Author: Krishna Sagar

Quote: Being powerful or powerless is a habit.
Author: Krishna Sagar

Quote: Most people's greatest regret is not living the life they knew they could live.
Author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders

Quote: Leadership is the ability to make things happen.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Don't worry, keep at it, you will soon shock the world
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Dream and dare the world to object
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Kill your fear and rule the world.
Author: M.Rehan Behleem

Quote: The biggest loopholes created in the world become evident when people who were born to lead do not eventually become leaders and never know it!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: You may abuse your energy when you do not know what it is meant to help you carry. An undiscovered self is an easy way to rob the world of leadership impacts.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Maybe the real issue here is that we were not created to do life by ourselves. We were not given a sentence of solitary confinement and placed in a world of isolation, but from the moment we entered this human experience, it was clear there was a world waiting to be discovered, creatures which were there for our interaction. And the spark inside us often has to be spoken to, to be touched by the soul of another. It’s as if the spark is only visible through the lens of night vision, a set of goggles which only another human being can hand to us.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: Money makes the world go round; however, happiness greases the axle. Without this lubricant, life will seize.
Author: Paul Van Der Merwe

Quote: Teams that spend a lot of time learning the tricks of the trade will probably never really learn the trade.
Author: Yuri Boganov

Quote: What happens in you is more important than what happens to you.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Those who fixate on what could have been are bound to miss what already is.
Author: Sara Secora

Quote: We all choose our way of life, and that makes us who we are. We're not a reflection of our choice, we're a choice.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: You'll never be completely sure about the first move, but do it anyway.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: Don’t try to make life fair, instead, be on the side where life is extra good.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: Never ever let a stupid criticise you. And as we already know, everyone is stupid.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: Spend your time with family and people you love. Don't wait for festivals be with them, each moment you're with them, that's a festival.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: Love is just a mask. All we search is a Comfort, Acceptance. Consolation. Affirmation. Assurance. Indulgence. Isolation. Absolution and Remission.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: Talking with someone at four in the morning, that's not the thing most people have a simplicity to enjoy.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: In the world we live, either everyone is stupid or no one is.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: The difference between lonely and lovely is only of one single alphabet. That single alphabet is called Friends.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: If I've learned one thing about a woman: they'll get over every damn single tragedy without losing the charm of their smile.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: Tragedy makes you disable, but your attitude towards tragedy keeps you disable.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: When was the last time you kissed somebody new. If you can tackle that fear, you've nothing to fear.
Author: Sarvesh Jain

Quote: To get change, you must first pay for it.
Author: Timothy Joshua

Quote: Even before you start regretting it, it is already in the past.
Author: Harshvardhan Malpani

Quote: The best way to accomplish something is to just do it, and then find the courage afterwards.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: People become successful the minute they decide to.
Author: Harvey MacKay

Quote: When you think you can't revisit a previous triumph.
Author: Jack Canfield

Quote: While you're waiting on opportunity, it might be waiting on you to come to it. Get up and go get it!
Author: Yvonne Pierre, The Day My Soul Cried:  A Memoir

Quote: Aspirations without preparations will simply give you life full of frustrations. Develop yourself today!
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Negative people feed off of your anger, let them starve.
Author: Samantha M. King

Quote: Your purpose has the capacity to employ and enrich you for a lifetime.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Entrepreneur, your message, mindset and mandate is connected to your brand, business and brain.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: With the world now a global village, your vision has to transcend different races and faces in different places around the world.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: If all it takes to motivate you is a quote then this quote has nothing to say – except to go soar with the freakin’ eagles.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Leadership is relationship.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: ... and you might say “no, you will never do that, that’s not you, not who I know, not who I thought you were”and I will say“watch me”for I never did this to fit inor stand outbut to live.
Author: Charlotte Eriksson

Quote: You’ve got to have confidence in the very thing that makes you unique – then wait for the world to catch up
Author: Lindsey Stirling

Quote: The pathway to a truly successful life is to yearn, learn and earn.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: They sky is never falling...thing will work out, they ALWAYS work out. Stay focused, accept everything as perfect and keep moving forward toward the direction of your goals.
Author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Edge

Quote: When you don't see nothing wrong in anything you do, then you are doing everything wrong.
Author: Richmond Akhigbe

Quote: Come forward as servants of Islam, organize the people economically, socially, educationally and politically and I am sure that you will be a power that will be accepted by everybody.
Author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

Quote: Nothing is Impossible. The word "impossible" itself reads "I'm Possible"!
Author: Mayowa Ajisafe, Eagle Success

Quote: What's the bigger risk: Taking the risk, or not taking the risk? What will you accomplish by not taking the risk? What will you accomplish by taking the risk, even if you fail?
Author: Kya Aliana

Quote: Without ambition, no goal can be met.
Author: Kya Aliana

Quote: You should holistically build yourself to be the best you. The evidence of your glorious life should be an inspiration to many . You create your world yourself in your own positive way. You are stronger than ever and bolder than you think. Brave the odds and initiate new imprints for all to aspire and follow your footprints.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s dream was a manifestation of hope that humanity might one day get out of its own way by finding the courage to realize that love and nonviolence are not indicators of weakness but gifts of significant strength.
Author: Aberjhani, Illuminated Corners: Collected Essays and Articles Volume I.

Quote: I needed to realise my role in the drama and it was only then that I could learn and be better for it, and it was only then that I could move forward. I needed to move forward and had to look at each day as a way of becoming a better me. And when I got better, the people around me reciprocated.
Author: Tony Curl, Seriously Simple Stuff to Get You Unstuck

Quote: Only a bet on the impossible makes sense. It is an act of faith and courage requiring an irrational leap over reason. A man wins simply by making such a bet.
Author: William  Kennedy, Roscoe

Quote: Master the courage to conquer any mountain
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Courage is strength of a strong soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You can strive in life with courage, faith and hope.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The greatest conquest is the courage to be yourself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Confident in spirit, courageous in soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You have the courage to take chances.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Fear of failure is deceptive.Don't do it, you'll fail, it says.Courage is inceptive.It's where success starts.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, This Is My Life

Quote: The brevity of life is grace to walk on your own path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Don’t cry for them to be happy. Find courage to overcome the circumstance.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: We ought to live life by faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Be bold as a lion.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Intent matters. Integrity matters. Courage matters. If you have the three, nothing else matters
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: Doubt is the limit of progress.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You can courageously conquer any challenge.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Keep an eye on your responses. Strong responses are about you more than them.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: The leaderly response to personal irritation is to relax and open up not push, run, or close down.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Just because those around you do not constantly tell you what they are going through in their personal life, it does not mean they are living in a fairytale.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Everything meaningful encounters resistance, don't get scared of whatever comes your way, just go with the right strategy and plan, their you'll overcome it at last.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: You ought to find all your might, to climb a higher height.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Without an anchor, we can be drifted to any shore. May you find hope as anchor.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Self-liberation is the greatest victory.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: There is no limit to what you can do.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: The courage of one can change the course of all.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: Everyone has to start somewhere. So get out there and start.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: I want you to believe in yourself, and take chances, even if it is scary and even if you don't know what you are doing yet.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Never undervalue who you are, and NEVER underestimate what you are capable of.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: If you can endure, if you can persevere, if you can work and not grow weary, if you're both obsessed and talented, well, you might have a shot.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Never think twice, when you have decided once.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: True leadership can only be achieved when one looks within oneself and commits to authenticity. It gives us the courage to stand at the front and influence others to willingly follow; it gives us the courage to learn, inspire, demand the best and shape the future.
Author: Sameh Elsayed

Quote: Even if someone is already dead in front of you, knock twice on the heart who knows they might answer.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Whenever it comes to doing anything. Remember the part about having confidence.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: How simple it is to acknowledge that all the worry in the world could not control the future. How simple it is to see that we can only be happy now, and that there will never be a time when it is not now.
Author: Jonathan Harnisch, Jonathan Harnisch: An Alibiography

Quote: You have to conquer every obstacle to realize the goal.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Confrontation was the stuff of daily life.
Author: T.J. Stiles, The First Tycoon: The Epic Life of Cornelius Vanderbilt

Quote: Action gives a decision power and finality.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: To be fearless you must fear less
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: If you must catch, you must not fear what is being thrown.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: The secret is in listening to our own inner voice.
Author: Holly Elissa Bruno, The Comfort of Little Things: An Educator's Guide to Second Chances

Quote: I do not subscribe to the abuse "victim" or "survivor" labelling mentality. I have experienced every kind of abuse imaginable and I am and always have been the most happy-go-lucky, positive and life affirming person around. Your labels do not serve you, so don't use them as an excuse to be miserable. You have a beautiful life to live, so accept the beauty and start living.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: When you see an obstacle approaching, grab your courage and speed up.
Author: Angela Lynne Craig, Pivot Leadership: Small Steps...Big Change

Quote: Worry has never solved a problem.
Author: Stefan Emunds

Quote: So often we quit on the first failure. We must persistent long enough to achieve success.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You are a leader when your actions encourage someone to reveal himself with hope, courage, confidence and trust.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: When someone is walking beside us, we have more courage to walk into the unknown and to risk the dark and messy places in our journey.
Author: Karen Kimsey-House, Co-Active Leadership: Five Ways to Lead

Quote: Whenever you hear yourself or others telling you you cannot do something, do that particular something, and notice how quickly everyone shuts the hell up.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi

Quote: Prove yourself and others wrong everyday by redefining who you THINK you are, through performing actions you would normally deem impossible or uncharacteristic of you.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi

Quote: People might consider you eccentric for being different, but this is good. Leaders and visionaries are not conformists afraid of standing out.
Author: Fennel Hudson, A Meaningful Life - Fennel's Journal - No. 1

Quote: Missional leaders not only feel the burden of God's mission but they also act on the burden and act upon it sacrificially. Leading a missional church is not for the faint of heart. It takes courage to push yourself beyond your comfort zone and to lead the church beyond it personal limits. Brokenness, inner turmoil and sacrifice will always be part of the missional leader's life.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Next Steps For Leading a Missional Church

Quote: Leading a missional church is not for the faint of heart. It takes courage to push yourself beyond your comfort zone and to lead the church beyond it personal limits.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Next Steps For Leading a Missional Church

Quote: The courageous attitudes of leaders ramble around coward followers and sooner or later, they become courageous too!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: A bold attitude is what true leaders use to crash down failure before they venture with their visions!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The lift is about SPEED and COMFORT, but the stairs are about CERTAINTY! The lift may go wrong but stairs seldom do, you can always take the stairs. They are BOUND to take you UP and to the END as long as you continue to climb!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: You might lose battles in your life time. However, every person that stands bravely on the side of justice, for people that have no voice, wins the true battle---Gods.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Courage injures the strong ones who have no wisdom, but it motivates the brave ones, to always win.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: You cannot become a peacemaker without communication. Silence is a passive aggressive grenade thrown by insecure people that want war, but they don't want the accountability of starting it.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Decisions of character come from understanding that they are accountable to God only, not to family, spouses, religious leaders, corporations, public opinion or your own ego.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Without courage, little is done and accomplished.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: One of the best confidence builder is experience.
Author: Jaymin Shah

Quote: A great leader fights with great adversity, suffers greatly, but courageously, and never forget to help others is his ultimate duty.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Greatness demands great courage.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: For a leader, courage, love, and passion for service are the virtues of life.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Courage is like magic, courage vanishes crisis.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you don't know what it is you're looking for you're NEVER going to find it. You have to be clear on what it is you're seeking.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Social Media begins with a story - your story.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Inferiority intentions are sample chapters of defeated stories... Courageous beginnings are examples of true leadership values!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: If a person cannot protect you, it is because you were meant to perfect them.If they cannot perfect you, you are meant to protect them.
Author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

Quote: Success = Wisdom + Courage + Discipline. KNOW what to do, be BRAVE enough to do it, and LEAD YOURSELF to doing it again and again.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: If there is to be any hope for the world, indeed if you really want to find satisfaction and happiness in your life, you must regard the return you will receive as a secondary consideration, if a consideration at all ……seek money first and you will ruin your land, or betray your profession…
Author: Sir James Darling

Quote: God has a way of picking a “nobody” and turning their world upside down, in order to create a “somebody” that will remove the obstacles they encountered out of the pathway for others.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Risk may bring pain, but risk also brings freedom and reward.
Author: Shandel Slaten - Clarity Focusing On What Matters

Quote: We all were courageous in the starting moments, few of us stayed courageous till the final moments and the world called them successful men.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Leadership begins inside of you. Leadership is about you, the people you influence and a belief that you can make a difference and have an impact. Leadership starts with a condition of the heart – the desire and passion to make a difference before it moves to the brain to implement a plan to make a difference. It is an inside-out process and is shaped by your values, character, choices, opportunities, experiences and your worldview
Author: Thomas Narofsky, F(X) Leadership Unleashed!

Quote: We need leaders who can meet and adapt to new challenges, build strategic partnerships, build and sustain human capital organizations, and have the courage to act and react to the challenges
Author: Thomas Narofsky, F(X) Leadership Unleashed!

Quote: As long you are still living, you can achieve far more than you could ever imagined
Author: Benjamin Suulola

Quote: It's not your end goal that gives life to your required actions, it's your required actions that give life to your end goal.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: What do you love to fulfill in life?
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Explore your special skills.
Author: Laillah Gifty Akita

Quote: The only thing that satisfies the soul is passionate life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Turn your fears into excitement.Your anxieties into enthusiasm. Your passion into energy.
Author: Sanober  Khan

Quote: New adventures enrich one’s life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You ought to live life with great passion.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Begin to live, love, laugh, kiss, smile, hug…!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Use your special gifts to create work for yourself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Doing what you love is a sacred life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: I live life with a daring curiosity.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: But if we do not try, the dream will remain a dream.
Author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

Quote: I have found a higher calling; inspirational-writing!I can’t imagine myself doing any other work, when I ought to write and transmit, awe-inspiring-words, to the souls longing for it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Curiosity is a daring faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Love your work and rejoice in all your accomplishments.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Relaxation is good, holidays are necessary, but there is nothing as rewarding and healthy as doing what you love and loving what you do. Our honest toil should inspire and satisfy us.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: What drives your passion?
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You must fall in love with your job, over and over again, to own it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Without passion, nobody can truly commit to anything and without optimism, positive outcomes become scarce.
Author: Miguel Reynolds Brandao, The Sustainable Organisation - a paradigm for a fairer society: Think about sustainability in an age of technological progress and rising inequality

Quote: Democracy is more vindictive than cabinets, the wars of peoples will be more terrible than those of kings.
Author: Winston S. Churchill

Quote: Reach out and fulfill your divine passion.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Nothing matures a Man like RESPONSIBILITIES,Nothing humbles him like MISSED OPPORTUNITIES,What makes him are his CHOICES,And nothing changes him like LOVE.Nothing defines a Man like his CHARACTER,Nothing teaches him like his EXPERIENCE,What drives him is his VISION,And nothing weakens him like BETRAYAL.Nothing scares a Man like losing his EGO,Nothing pursues him like his PASSION,What interests him is his GAME,And nothing intoxicates him like his DESIRES.But above all, NOTHING FAVOURS A MAN LIKE FINDING A GOOD WOMAN.
Author: Olaotan Fawehinmi, The Soldier Within

Quote: Your passion may determine what you can do, but your attitude redefines how far you can go while you do what you can. Your attitude leads you and you lead other people!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: You are likely to lose the heat of your passion irrespective of how hot it was when you surrender yourself to a leader with lukewarm attitude.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: You can’t perform well in what you don’t love to do well. You can lead in what you can’t perform well. To lead well, be sure where you are, is where you supposed to be!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Look yourself in the eyes in a mirror each day. You can ignore the small voice still inside you, but your reflection will always have something to say.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Progress across the time axis is passive. Progress up the results axis is passion.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: The death of a dream is the day that you stop believing in the work it takes to get there.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: The heart pointed to the brain and said with great disdain, “Those who live their lives in here live the lives most full of fear.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: To become a distinguished entrepreneur, you need to have an undeniable, unquestionable and unmovable passion for your vision.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Mind can be your best friend or worst enemy.
Author: Kabira, Birthplace of Happiness

Quote: Pride grants you a happily never after.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Great romantics are granted lots of slack.
Author: Pat Conroy, South of Broad

Quote: Those without passion are often passed and shunned.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Resolving to influence and persuade others will require a degree of personal passion and a depth of caring that you are willing to express and act on. I can tell you this: it will make you feel very vulnerable. The only antidote is to believe you are after a worthwhile change and that you are likely to be the right one to lead this particular charge.
Author: Charlotte Beers, I'd Rather Be in Charge: A Legendary Business Leader's Roadmap for Achieving Pride, Power, and Joy at Work

Quote: To perform you need practice, to practice you need passion.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Our decisions are influenced by our beliefs and this is why we say our reality is what we believe in.
Author: Namrata Kumari, Change Your Beliefs To Change Your Reality

Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: A man can build a home but it needs a woman to run a home.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Lovers tend to be philosophical, achievers are practical.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: When it comes to creating things, I compete with nature not with men.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: After I leave the earth my work is anyway going to belong to the world for centuries but till that time I want to work freely.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People become followers of the God because of his fear, but they become a fan of a hero because of his work.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Ordinary men earns responsibility towards their family, extraordinary men earns duty towards their nation.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Pragmatism is good prevention for problems.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Let people stick to their philosophy, you stick to your passion.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Responsibility and duty are different things, you can sacrifice your responsibility for your duty but you cannot sacrifice your duty for your responsibility.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: A civilization must be judged by its standards not by its expenditure.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People enjoy convincing others, if others are wrong they convince them towards right, if others are already right they still want to convince them towards wrong.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Nature has created countless number of wonders, we got a long way to go as man have created only seven wonders.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People with responsibility and people without responsibility are sorry for each other.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: My artificial creations will be better than nature's natural creations.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I can lend you my money not my books.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: To your parents you are still that innocent baby, and sometimes even you will need your father's hand and your mother's lap.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People never forget two things, their first love and the money they wasted watching a bad movie.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The primary feature of women is not a 'beauty', it's a 'mystery'.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I don't understand this irony - valuable things like cars, gold, diamond are made up of hard materials but most valuable things like money, contracts and books are made up of soft paper.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: A borrower who doesn't returns is a beggar.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Reading is the noblest of all the hobbies, that is why people mention it so frequently in their resume even if they don't read much.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Audience can live without a movie but a movie cannot live without an audience.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Emotions manipulates the man more than habits do.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Two kinds of people have many friends, one with bank balance and other with boldness.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I don't expect congratulations for successful beginning, what I want is the applaud at successful ending.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: At home I am a man, at work I am a machine.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Beliefs are stronger than mere ideas, thoughts and notions, be careful about what you believe.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: When you are a grown up your brothers become your neighbors and your unconditional brotherhood become your conditional neighborhood.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Never believe a friend who offered you his friendship just because he was getting bored.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: There is enough knowledge in the books to explain the existing, your knowledge must inspire what is possible.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People fear nothing as much as boredom and they will do unimaginable things to make it go away.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People won't respect you until you achieve the respectable goals.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Be bold, don't be boring.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: In modern times, beauty is more trusted than goodness.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Negotiation is permissible for mediocrity not for excellence.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: My 'passion' is my priority.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People come to me for the solution of their problem, if my knowledge and experience is not enough to solve the problem, I go to my library read the relevant book and provide the solution.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People are crazy about food, smoking, drinking, girls but not about their dreams.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Check the history, more people died for freedom than love, people need freedom before they need love.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Be the love of your love, not the slave of your love.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Dreams can only be seen with open eyes, what you see while you asleep are nightmares.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Your personality should be described in poem not in paragraph.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Worship the work not the God, because work is God.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Children who are ill, in their innocence and plight, teach adults many lessons, and one of those lessons is that ‘Life must go on. Face it. Live it. Enjoy it. Despite all the odds.’ That is bravery, in the eyes of a sick child.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Children are great observers.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: All of us were once children, but only some of us remember that
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: Every child gets a good mother, but not every mother gets a good child.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The problem with a man is, he is no more a child.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The children are the future, so, let's tell them about tomorrow's hope rather than yesterday's despair.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Children imitate their parents, employees their managers.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: So many people think that they are not gifted because they don’t have an obvious talent that people can recognize because it doesn’t fall under the creative arts category—writing, dancing, music, acting, art or singing. Sadly, they let their real talents go undeveloped, while they chase after fame. I am grateful for the people with obscure unremarked talents because they make our lives easier---inventors, organizers, planners, peacemakers, communicators, activists, scientists, and so forth. However, there is one gift that trumps all other talents—being an excellent parent. If you can successfully raise a child in this day in age to have integrity then you have left a legacy that future generations will benefit from.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: A harvester ant never quits and she never, ever gives up.
Author: LaDene Mayville, Hallie the Harvester Ant: Never Give Up

Quote: When I see an evil person, I cannot believe that once he was an innocent and sweet baby.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: It isn't the amount you spend today, it's what you want to invest in for the future!
Author: Tyler J. Suiters

Quote: If you could stay as stubborn as when you were a child then you need not to compromise on your dreams.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: First you be a hero and then raise your child to be a hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You will come across people who always affirm by everything you say, but at the hour of need, they simply disappear! Stay away from such people or simply don't fall for their promises.
Author: K. Hari Kumar

Quote: a true leader must be able to command with an iron fist, not just a humble heart.
Author: Evan Meekins, The Black Banner

Quote: A true leader is not meant to be greeted with unanimous praise by his people. A leader is meant to be questioned, to be suspect, to be hated. If he is not, then one can easily assume that either he has not challenged his abilities as a leader by making a decision that creates a split between the people, or he is forcing his subjects to bow before him.
Author: Evan Meekins, The Black Banner

Quote: They think the recipe for a 'home-maker' is- a woman who isn't smart enough, lacks skills and above all isn't ambitious enough! Well she is every bit as smart as the woman who puts on a suit to go to work in a man's world to prove- times have changed! She is every bit as intelligent!
Author: Mrinalini Mitra, Belief

Quote: I like being a woman in a man's world. After all, men can't wear dresses, but we can wear the pants.
Author: Whitney Houston

Quote: We are endowed with different kinds of gifts for different kinds of services.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: ‪#‎STEREOTYPES‬ ‪#‎SOCIETY‬ ‪#‎COMPATIBILITY‬ ‪#‎BREAKTHROUGH‬Stereotypes?? What are they?? WE ARE SOCIETY, WE MAKE SOCIETY..WE ARE NOT MARRIED TO SOCIETY,WE LIVE IN IT!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: Providing employment is the best form of social service, as it serves you, others, your country, your world - the entire society.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: But a society in which pluralism is not undergirded by some shared values and held together by some measure of mutual trust simply cannot survive. Pluralism that reflects no commitments whatever to the common good is pluralism gone berserk... ..Leaders unwilling to seek mutually workable arrangements within systems to their own are not surviving the long-term interest of their constituents
Author: John W. Gardner, On Leadership

Quote: The easiest thing for a person is to accept everything as it is and adjust with everyone in the surroundings by sacrificing or compromising originality, but it's also the worst thing if he proclaims that he has changed himself.
Author: Testy McTesterson

Quote: The unity of Nigeria will only come if we overcome and overgrow tribe, materialism and selfish human nature.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Not just charity, even corruption begins at home.
Author: K. Hari Kumar

Quote: Your dreams can change the environment which was not conducive for it at first! However it is a good initiative for the dreams that would change one society to be nursed in another environment, before being transplanted to strive in its original environment for the change process to begin!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: For our society to be better, we must revive our conscience and do Godly things.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha, Overcoming the Challenges of Life

Quote: To find stability within the world, one must first find stability within.
Author: Tyler J. Hebert

Quote: You're FAT - and don't try to sugarcoat it, because you'll just eat that, too.
Author: Phillip C. McGraw

Quote: I stare past her at the inspirational kitten posters. There's one of a soaking-wet kitten climbing out of a toilet with the caption "it could be worse!""Just tell me whatever it is you're thinking," Mrs. Paulsen says. "Whatever is going through your mind right now.""I hope they didn't actually drop a cat in the toilet to get that picture," I choke out. "...Pardon?""Nothing. Sorry.
Author: Robin Stevenson, The World Without Us

Quote: Excerpt from my lecture Sunday at Soul-Esteem Center10 Commandments - God knew when he gave us choice some would make the wrong choices, but God wanted his creation, man, to have free will and felt later it necessary to write the 10 Commandants as a reminder of how God wanted his creations to perform. The 10 Commandants contain 5 positives and five negatives
Author: I. Alan Appt, The Strength in Knowing

Quote: We may not be able to control life’s circumstances, but we always have a choice about how we use our minds to respond to them.
Author: Elaine Moran

Quote: We can only bring about change in our lives when we clearly see two truths: that the pain of remaining the same is greater than the pain of fighting our toughest battles, and that by taking the biggest risks, we gain the most valuable rewards.
Author: Elaine Moran

Quote: Your current body is the only body that can take you to your new body—so be kind to it.
Author: Elaine Moran

Quote: While most people are playing it safe and doing everything they can to avoid pain, successful people know that they must face their fears and do what needs to be done regardless of how they feel. They don’t necessarily like the hard work, but they’re willing to do it because they like the results.
Author: Elaine Moran

Quote: While your ego is always trying to figure out its place in the world, your true self knows that your place is always right here, right now.
Author: Elaine Moran
