Quote: Believe it or not, your body has nothing but unconditional love for you. The proof? Without any effort on your part, your heart is beating, your lungs are breathing, and the rhythm of life is graciously flowing through you every second of every day—unconditionally.
Author: Elaine Moran

Quote: The reason we have such a difficult time losing weight permanently is not because we are making bad choices, but because we are not stopping our automatic subconscious programmed behaviors in their tracks.
Author: Elaine Moran

Quote: Never trust the one who praise you frankly
Author: Ansaf Nilar

Quote: Sometimes we motivate ourselves by thinking of what we want to become. Sometimes we motivate ourselves by thinking about who we don't ever want to be again. Everything we do is part of who we are. How we choose to use those memories, to motivate or to submit is entirely up to us.
Author: Shane Niemeyer - The Hurt Artist

Quote: The person following is never in control, which she knows full well and which is exactly why she does it.
Author: Sara Gruen, Flying Changes

Quote: More is less, less is more
Author: J Ali

Quote: The worldly comforts are not for me. I am like a traveler, who takes a rest under a tree in the shade and then goes on his way
Author: Anonymous

Quote: The best richness is the richness of the soul
Author: Anonymous

Quote: A father gives his child nothing better than a good education
Author: Anonymous

Quote: When two persons are together, two of them must not whisper to each other, without letting the third hear; because it would hurt him
Author: Anonymous

Quote: The best of you are those who are best to the women
Author: Anonymous

Quote: If you do not feel ashamed of anything, then you can do whatever you like
Author: Anonymous

Quote: It is difficult for a man laden with riches to climb the steep path, that leads to bliss
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Who are the learned? Those who practice what they know
Author: Anonymous

Quote: The next time the world tells you “Stop”, “Don’t”, or “You can’t do this”, the next time the world beats the living daylight out of you, hit it back with a knock just as strong and say, “No, I want to do this.
Author: Joud Tabaza, No, I Want To Do This

Quote: If you accept the situation, you will find strength for strategic adaptation.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Only the strong soul can accept the truth.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Jesus Christ gives strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We write to shed our sorrows and give strength to our spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not waste your life over working. Live a fuller sacred life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Positive thoughts give positive energy.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Self confident is a sacred strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Spirituality is the strength of existence.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The survived souls give strength to the suffering souls.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Thank God for the grace to work.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The strength of survival in life lies in strong-minded soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Believe. Believe. Believe in thy soul!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Encouragement gives strength to every soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The secret in any situation is the strength of spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Rest leads to renewal of spirit, soul and strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Your life is a show and you're the star so don't let anyone walk on set and treat you like an extra.
Author: Lucas Mascotto-Carbone

Quote: You will find the limit of strength with every new situation.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: With strong heart, you will survive life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: In suffering, we trust the Saviour to be our strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: With strong heart, you will survive any hardships.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The Lord is the strength of my heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: May your spirit be strengthened.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you cannot sleep, put the sacred energy to use. You can pray, read and write.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: God gives strength to the weak souls.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: That's the thing about rocks--they don't break easily. When I held them, I wanted to be like them-strong and steady, weathered but not broken.
Author: Ellen Dreyer, The Glow Stone

Quote: O Lord, Thy Word, heals my wounds.O Lord, Thy Word, gives me hope. O Lord, Thy Word, strengthens my spirit.O Lord, Thy Word, revive my soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Encouragement is strength of the soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: As long as grace abounds, I will work with all my strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Every new day brings new strength, new dreams and new opportunities.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Your self-imposed prison. That think called your COMFORT ZONE. Challenge it, stretch it. You will thank yourself.
Author: Tony Curl

Quote: Running away, avoiding life's battles or giving up robs you of the opportunity to grow and be stronger.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: Leadership was not an act of bravery but rather forbearance and the strength to move forward with humility in the belief of what is righteous
Author: Soroosh Shahrivar, The Rise of Shams

Quote: I do not subscribe to the abuse "victim" or "survivor" mentality. I have experienced every kind of abuse imaginable and I am and always have been the most happy go-lucky, positive and life affirming person around. Your labels do not serve you, so don't use them as an excuse to be miserable. You have a beautiful life to live, so accept the beauty and start living.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: My life might not turn out to be easy I thought. I just hoped I'd turn out to be strong.
Author: April Sinclair

Quote: Balance hangs in the fingers of Peace
Author: James Butler

Quote: May we continue to encourage one another, so that we will increase in strength and in wisdom.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Look Fabian, the world is full of sheep, don’t settle for being a sheep, even if you do reside over those creatures, act more like a Ram.
Author: T.A. Uner, Stone Ram

Quote: Shit happens. You can either stand their and complain about the smell or you can wipe your shoe and keep walking.
Author: Tommy Cotton, Just Went Out for Milk

Quote: Politics doesn’t mean playing deceitful and trickery games against the people, it means playing resourceful and organized games for the people.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Public strengthens politics but politics weakens public.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Never overestimate the strength of the torchbearer's arm, for even the strongest arms grow weary.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: There isn't a soul in this universe with the same gifts, strength, level of intelligence and as good as yourself!
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Today's effort is the strength for tomorrow
Author: Muhammad Saad Mansoor

Quote: Strong leaders are not the ones who do everything right. They are the ones to put a plan together, take risks, make mistakes, humbly admit their mistakes, take responsibility for failures, make necessary changes, do not fear correction, and with the trust of their followers and the team of which they were leading! -Clarity:Focusing on what matters / Week 40
Author: -Shandel Slaten

Quote: It takes strong, sound leadership, that correspondingly rare commodity, which is afflicted with neither an excess of pity nor callousness, to stand against the insipid tide of superficiality that is sweeping the world.
Author: Tim Macartney-Snape

Quote: Confidence is that internal alignment between what you know, what you believe and what you portray.
Author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders

Quote: Let out your heat!Unleash your imaginationLet the burning fragrance of your unimpeachable imaginationsparkle through the morning’s you.At night, let the stoical sweat of your day ease your musclesRelax your feet.You will need them to walk again tomorrow
Author: Priscilla Koranteng, Trails to the Stream: Poetry and Inspiration for Everyday Living

Quote: It's impossible, that's for sure. So let's start working.
Author: Philippe Petit, Man on Wire

Quote: The wreckage of stars - I built a world from this wreckage.
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Dithyrambs of Dionysus

Quote: A nation is not defined by its borders or the boundaries of its land mass Rather, a nation is defined by adverse people who have been unified by a cause and a value system and who are committed to a vision for the type of society they wish to live in and give to the future generations to come.
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Withheld potential is a "CRIME TO HUMANITY
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Great men have great discipline.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: One thing I've learned in life is that I can speak for myself, that I can fight my own battles. I don't like anyone telling me how I'm supposed to feel or think or what I'm supposed to say.
Author: Hope Solo

Quote: How you survive on earth is only known to you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Living life is my greatest miracle.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The grace of existence is the power of giving.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Life can only be live with grace and gratitude.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not just exist, be fully awake.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We survived life by adaptation to the changing situation.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not fear to live thy sacred life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The living dead do things without putting life into it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Goodness is an open gate to a great life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Living life is the greatest miracle.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Live fuller life while you can still breathe.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: There’s no rerun of life. Rejoice while there’s breathe.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Seek the miracles in sacred moment.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Overworking leads to exhaustion.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Exercise promotes positive self-image and good well-being.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Revived spirit, restored strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Your craft is comprehensive if it represents you.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: It's courage, not luck, that takes us through to the end of the road.
Author: Ruskin Bond

Quote: When everyone believes they are the life coaches, who are the players?
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: With limited money you can survive, with more money you can live.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Even a brick wants to be something.A brick wants to be something.It aspires. Even a common, ordinary brick... wants to be something more than it is.It wants to be something better than it is.
Author: Louis Kahn

Quote: Your purpose will be clear only when you listen to your heart.
Author: Lolly Daskal, Thoughts Spoken From The Heart

Quote: No matter what, you can only live this moment.
Author: Krishna Sagar

Quote: Only those who have tasted the bitterest of the bitter can become people who stand out among others. -Guanchang Xianxing Ji
Author: Matthew Polly, American Shaolin: Flying Kicks, Buddhist Monks, and the Legend of Iron Crotch: An Odyssey in the New China

Quote: Stop complaining and start living.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: We forget the good people do, but remember the not-so-good they might have intentionally or intentionally done !Be Brave and Forgive !
Author: Sham Hinduja

Quote: As a child, my clothes were always tailored to be oversized, because I quickly outgrew them and then needed bigger ones. As an adult, I still don't cut my coat according to size
Author: Sola Kosoko

Quote: Silence is a beautiful story.
Author: Kulpreet Yadav, The Girl Who Loved a Pirate

Quote: Listen to Glisten !If your not willing to listen,How do you expect to glisten ?
Author: Sham  Hinduja

Quote: Aspire to do anything, start something and stop at nothing.
Author: Kayambila Mpulamasaka

Quote: A responsible person accepts the results of his choices, attributing blame or praise to himself; that is what makes you happy with the way you turned out.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

Quote: Shake up your life a bit. Get rid of the cobwebs. Take the road less traveled. Most people live within the confines of their comfort zone. Yogi Raman was the first person to explain to me that the best thing you can do for yourself is regularly move beyond it.
Author: Robin S. Sharma

Quote: They say live it how you want toOr else someone else will.This is my life, and I willLive it.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, This Is My Life

Quote: What a person want in life ?1. Simple, steady life.2. Self satisfaction and craziness from work and life he live.3. Luxury/Royal life.Choice is yours, in which way you want to live.
Author: kurbhatt

Quote: Take control of your future by taking a choice of starting it right now.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Making it happen, It's just something you gotta do.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: You can only see progress when you start doing something, so don't expect anything without your efforts.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: With success, if you don't plan and just take each day as it comes, there will come failure.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Sometimes the 'day' you're dreaming for never comes. Take control of your future and start now.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: As soon as you start wanting something, then your eyes can see; your mind will be open to identify all the possible ways of obtaining it.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: I remember all of it, not because I meditate on it. No. I remember it because with each step I make toward my goals, I am reminded of how they said I couldn't do it. The more I achieve, the more they are proved wrong, in my mind. It's like motivation. Attacks on your dreams are never forgotten because they become your fuel.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: Not knowing what to do with your life is a painful thing.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: Life is in a constant state of change and by evolving in the present with change - Matthew Donnelly
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: The boundaries of your abilities are set by no one else but yourself, ultimately, and it is up to you when they will be pushed.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: If you are humble enough to admit to your flaws then you are capable of correcting them.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: Persistence is key when you want to achieve. You can't afford to quit just because you don't feel good about failure.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: The joy of success outweighs whatever negativity you might get from failing a couple of times.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: One of the most liberating things a person can do is to admit that he or she is human and is flawed.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: What they say doesn't matter because it can be lies, but it's what they do that matters because it always speaks truth.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: What I’ve always insisted on from myself is to do as well as I could, and keep doing better until I’m at least competent. Long ago I learned that to achieve anything, one must start where one stands. Or spend eternity waiting for the right moment. Which never comes.
Author: Victor Milán, The Dinosaur Lords

Quote: It's all about how you feel, not how you look
Author: Sean Covey

Quote: Everybody must be given the opportunity for self liberation and development.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: 2.	Evolve and Be God: As we invoke the presence of Source, holding the focus through our mantras, we are drawing more and more proximity to the object of worship and gradually, we attain all the attributes we are invoking, i.e., we slowly evolve to be Angelic, invoking the presence of God/Source.
Author: Nandhiji, Mastery of Consciousness: Awaken the Inner Prophet: Liberate Yourself with Yogic Wisdom.

Quote: I thought you might appreciate this.....“Excerpt from my lecture Sunday February 22, 2015 at Soul-Esteem Center10 Commandments - God knew when he gave us choice some would make the wrong choices, but God wanted his creation, man, to have free will and felt later it necessary to write the 10 Commandants as a reminder of how God wanted his creations to perform. The 10 Commandants contain 5 positives and five negatives”― I. Alan Appt, The Strength in Knowingtags: motivational, philosophy, psychology, self-helpPeace to all,Alan Appt
Author: I. Alan Appt, The Strength in Knowing

Quote: When our thoughts, at times, wander into darkness... remember we are human and have been imbued with free will to choose the light.
Author: Christopher Earle

Quote: When we repay unkindness with unkindness, we perpetuate the cycle of negativity within which our world is embroiled. We have the right and responsibility to choose differently.
Author: Christopher Earle

Quote: In life, you get what you believe you deserve.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: We must humble ourselves before [others] so we may learn from what others have lived. It is only when we have added their expertise to our own that we can truly excel towards our most ambitious goals and reach our fullest potential.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: A life spent at the edge of the pier is a life full of regret, a life full of fear.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Unwavering incremental change can create remarkable and monumental results.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Change occurs when excuses pivot to execution.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: No obstacle is so big that one person with determination can't make a difference.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: At the heart of all sales and marketing is the ability to create demand even in the absence of logic.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: The real challenge is for each of us to determine where we feel we can make the most impact.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Pivoting is not the end of the disruption process, but the beginning of the next leg of your journey.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Success doesn't teach as many lessons as failure
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: To be successful, innovation is not just about value creation, but value capture.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: No one who ever led a nation got there by following the path of another.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: You'll never know how close you are to victory if you give up.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Most startup failures result from entrepreneurs who are better at making excuses than products.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Every threat to the status quo is an opportunity in disguise.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: A free and open Internet is a despot's worst enemy.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: The best big idea is only going to be as good as its implementation.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Smart entrepreneurs learn that they must fail often and fast.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Our world's future is far more malleable and controllable than most people realize.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: The customer is always right...even when they're wrong.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Those that recognize the inevitability of change stand to benefit the most from it.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: The joy of disruption comes from accepting that we all live in a temporal state.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Billions of dollars worth of research knowledge lie dormant at American universities waiting for the right disruptor to come along and create a business.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Only a coward will not make the necessary changes in his or her life to make it a better one.
Author: Jonna Erlandson

Quote: Crowdsourcing is the ultimate disruptor of distribution because in a most Zen-like fashion, the content is controlled by everyone and no one at the same time.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Great things often start out small, and only open minds can perceive their inception.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

Quote: The power of crowd sourcing always remains with the crowd, not the technological implementation.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: Lifelong learning is no longer a luxury but a necessity for employment.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: Speed to fail should be every entrepreneur's motto. When you finally find the one idea that can't be killed, go with it.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: Your energy is a valuable resource, distribute it wisely.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: An average idea enthusiastically embraced will go farther than a genius idea no one gets.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Insight and drive are all the skills you need. Everything else can be hired.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: The most important tool you have on a resume is language.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: Be the best at what you do or the only one doing it.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Starting each day with a positive mindset is the most important step of your journey to discovering opportunity.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: The difference between successful and unsuccessful people is that successful ones know that the most unprofitable thing ever manufactured is an excuse.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: If life, you get what you believe you deserve.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: A career is just a longer trip with a whole lot more baggage.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: You will have more regrets for the things you didn't try than the ones you tried and didn't succeed at.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Building a career or a company is about living a few years of your life like most people won't so that you can spend the rest of your life living at a level most people can't.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: You can truly have it all, just not all at the same time.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: If you don't know where you want to be in five years, how do you ever expect to get there?
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: Plan for ways to get more enjoyment into your life and you will get more joy out of it.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Accepting that the odds are against you is the same as accepting defeat before you begin.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Whether driven by ambition or circumstance, every career gets disrupted.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Corporate planning cycles are a classic example of generals fighting the last war over again instead of preparing for what might lie ahead.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: A disruptor finds opportunity and profit from his misfortunes.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: A dream with a deadline is a goal.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: A negative mind will never find success. I have never heard a positive idea come from a person in a negative state.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Problems are just businesses waiting for the right entrepreneur to unlock the value.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: The most successful people have the same twenty-four hours in a day that you do.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: If you can imagine a solution, you can make it happen.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: It is not incumbent on the world to conform to your vision of change. It is up to you to explain the future in terms that those living in the past and present can follow.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: CEOs will gladly overpay for a company if the acquisition enables them to keep their jobs.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: There are two types of people in this world: those whose look for opportunity and those who make it happen.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: The business world is littered with the fossils of companies that failed to evolve. Disrupt or be disrupted. There is no middle ground.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: You have a choice: pursue your dreams, or be hired by someone else to help them fulfill their dreams.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: All businesses -- no matter if they make dog food or software -- don't sell products, they sell solutions.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: There is a difference between failing and failure. Failing is trying something that you learn doesn't work. Failure is throwing in the towel and giving up.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: There are riches to be found simply by capturing the value released through others' disruptive breakthroughs.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: The majority of people are not willing to risk what they have built for the opportunity to have something better.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Would you rather work forty hours a week at a job you hate or eighty hours a week doing work you love?
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Disruption isn't about what happens to you, it's about how you respond to what happens to you.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: All Disruption starts with introspection.
Author: Jay Samit

Quote: Disruption causes vast sums of money to flow from existing businesses and business models to new entrants.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: Self-disruption is akin to undergoing major surgery, but you are the one holding the scalpel.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: In life, you have two choices: Do you control your life… or not? Are you the driver or the passenger? Do you make stuff happen, or let stuff to happen?
Author: Justin Young

Quote: You gotta make it a priority to make your priorities a priority.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: You don't feel like your best self when you fall apart, but you have to fall apart to become your best self.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: How you respond to what is happening in your life can make a difference. Your conduct in the confusion, your resolve while enduring pain and your positive thought process during the tribulation can help you handle what is happening in your life. Those are the proskairos moments that make the difference as you are maneuvering the waves of life. Those moments are filled with the presence of God and how you respond and behave in those moments makes all of the difference.
Author: Dr. Glen A. Staples

Quote: Use wisdom when developing relationships and establishing new alliances. There are people who do not have pure motives as it pertains to developing relationships. They only want to be seen with you because they want to establish association. These people want the recognition affiliated with your success but they are not willing to go through what you did to achieve it.
Author: Dr. Glen A. Staples

Quote: Your faith is designed to operate outside of your emotions. When you operate in faith, how you feel has no bearing on how you respond. Faith does not need your emotions to confirm what you are believing God to do in your life. We should understand what we are feeling and why we are feeling it but we should not be distracted or controlled by how we feel. Have faith.
Author: Dawn M. Harvey, Unlocking The Presence of Power

Quote: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
Author: Napoleon Hill

Quote: Don't Settle for Mediocrity. Strive for Excellence
Author: Mac James

Quote: You change the future by taking control of the present. Know how to use your minutes and hours.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: If your story is not inspiring you, it’s time to change it.
Author: Isaiah Hankel, Black Hole Focus: How Intelligent People Can Create a Powerful Purpose for Their Lives

Quote: The only doors that open are the ones you knock on.
Author: Scott Marquart

Quote: Divorce = Rebirth: forget the past, replan your life, improve your appearance & REJUVENATE!
Author: Rossana Condoleo

Quote: Do the things you like to be happier, stronger & more successful. Only so is hard work replaced by dedication.
Author: Rossana Condoleo

Quote: If we could eliminate the concept of town and return to live in small villages, all world problems were solved.
Author: Rossana Condoleo

Quote: Divorce is the start point for a brand new life. Don't lose the chance to redesign it upon your dreams!
Author: Rossana Condoleo

Quote: If you talked to your friends the way you talk to your body, you’d have no friends left at all.
Author: Marcia Hutchinson

Quote: Let your projects be independent organisms. They will develop their own beautiful architecture.
Author: Rossana Condoleo

Quote: The happiest people in the world are those who feel absolutely terrific about themselves, and this is the natural outgrowth of accepting total responsibility for every part of their life.
Author: Brian Tracy

Quote: The only way to follow your path is to take the lead.
Author: Joe  Peterson, Help Me Live... As I Die, Cancer vs. the Power of Love

Quote: If you cannot do great things in life, make sure you do the small things in a great way.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: The mirror it was and life it spelled,The road ahead, and the time past stepped,All gathered in one; one to all paired,My life is so different from all the world’s threads.My breaths are mine, my woes are too,If my life were put through you,You sure would unlikely pursue,It should be left for me to gather,I am its sculptor, mine would be the hammer.
Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

Quote: Almighty God guide us to the right destination.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Destiny has answered it call!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Write like you have many readers.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: We are God’s inheritance by grace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Your destiny is shaped in your moments of decision.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: The obstacles were intended to be a distraction from the goal.You must keep a persistence focus to realise the goal.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: May you find grace to accomplish your God given-goals.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You must want a thing enough to chase for it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: We are always people that are in the making, constantly adapting to accommodate the roads we walk. As we learn, it changes us. As we go about our course, we grow, and prune everything around us; friends, beliefs, desires. Our past experiences plant the seeds needed for our future roads, with all its turns, speed, and treachery.
Author: Kat Lahr, Nature Of Occurrences

Quote: I admire successful men and women who endured and overcome unusual circumstances to fulfill their dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Leadership is inherent in our nature and is fundamental to our origins, our human makeup –and our destiny.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Every woman is called to lead somebody somewhere to do something great!
Author: Gail Hayes

Quote: If you refuse to accept what is, and choose to see what could be, then you set a course for yourself that makes others take notice of you, respect you, revere you. It is then that they become objects of your destiny instead of you playing a support role in theirs.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: Luck comes and goes; you have to seize it. Bad luck comes and goes; it must be overcome. But I will never, never sit at the side of the road showing my wounds and shouting, 'It's destiny'!
Author: Jean Van Hamme, Dutch Connection

Quote: We're not reinventing the wheel. We're just rolling it down our own path.
Author: D.R. Pedraza, The Solomon Chronicles (Book  II )- Revisions

Quote: One of the most deadly causes of destruction of divine destinies is when a leader is failing, but he or she does not know it. Ignorance about your role is a death plot against people's successes.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: It takes your knowing to decide on your going. If you know where you are going, you will keep going because you have already seen yourself gone
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: There's something AMAZING about you. You owe it to yourself to fulfill your destiny. You were put on earth for a reason. Don't betray yourself because of other people opinions of who you should be. God has already implanted within you who you MEANT to be. Trust your gut instincts.
Author: Yvonne Pierre, The Day My Soul Cried:  A Memoir

Quote: As artists, we are constantly becoming.
Author: Creativly, A Passion and a Dream: Inspiring Stories of Actors, Writers, et. al., on the Eve of Their Big Break

Quote: The journey of life, creates my art!!!
Author: Michael Judkins

Quote: Positive energy is unleashed when leaders give themselves permission to connect and express themselves from the core of who they are. When leaders practice authenticity, creativity, engagement, confidence, and a sense of inner resourcefulness emerge.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: Authenticity is our natural state of being. The authentic self is a state of being where we are centered, creative, adaptive, and inspired.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: Great things often come from actions and decisions taken by others, that are deemed wild, stupid or unreasonable at the time, but later prove to be very useful.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: The future is a direction, not a destination.
Author: Edwin Catmull

Quote: Human beings are not separate from nature. We are nature. The beauty of the sunset is your own beauty. The power of the ocean is your power. We are inseparable from the beauty of the mountains, rivers, and forests that surround us. The more that you can allow your natural self to come out – to honour your natural beauty, your natural creativity, your natural thirst for leadership and compassion – the happier and healthier you’ll be.
Author: Vironika Tugaleva

Quote: Leave Your Comfort Zone, If You Want To Accomplish Something.
Author: Palash Chowdhury

Quote: Genius moves to creation, not to destruction. Only a very few have combined both.
Author: Edith Hamilton

Quote: Creativity is a basic biological drive to engage in meaningful conversations with ourselves & the world around us.
Author: Sara Saltee

Quote: Entrepreneur, take a bite out of Apple's innovation so in turn you can bear fruits of creativity.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Culture is the sum of the values, beliefs and assumptions of human groups.
Author: Max McKeown, The Innovation Book: How to Manage Ideas and Execution for Outstanding Results

Quote: Innovation can start with wanting what does not yet exist - and finding a solution - or seeing what does not yet exist - and finding an opportunity.
Author: Max McKeown, The Innovation Book: How to Manage Ideas and Execution for Outstanding Results

Quote: Knowing failure is part of our process, and leads to new ideas, stronger work, and more honest questions, liberates us to peer, a little less frightened, into the unknown.
Author: David duChemin, A Beautiful Anarchy, When the Life Creative Becomes the Life Created

Quote: If your looking to write a book, your creativity, originality and simplicity is what will distinguish you.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: The best way to encourage out of the box thinking is to draw the box correctly in the first place.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: Many of the cataclysmic leadership failures were failures of rationality. The pendulum of leadership development needs to swing back toward the rational: strategy, creativity, foresight, decision-making, and analytics.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: Creativity isn't meant to introduce complexity it is expected to add simplicity.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Don't just think out of the box, stand on the box to see new possibilities and opportunities in becoming distinguished.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Everybody starts small. We all begin life as a single cell. Every business starts as one person with an idea. How fast you go, how far you get, is in your hands. The bigger your vision, the bigger your achievement will be. Will you stumble on the way? Perhaps, but we cannot let fear keep us small. We have to be brave to be big.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: impossibility exist only in the weak minds
Author: Hassan Choughari

Quote: Your only limitation is the limits of your imagination so dream big.
Author: Artika Tyner

Quote: I am pushing you, even if it’s off a cliff, to create. Write that book, that song; pore over the concept of redecorating your life. I meet people all the time who say they’re not creative. Bullshit, motherfuckers, you are creative.
Author: Nikki Sixx

Quote: You are responsible for everything you post and everything you post will be a reflection of you. [Social Media]
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: When there is silence, Give your voice. When there is darkness, Shine your light. When there is desperation, Offer hope.
Author: Tim Fargo

Quote: Slow down. Calm down. Don't worry. Don't hurry. Trust the process.
Author: Alexandra Stoddard

Quote: The knowledge of the Spirit is the true secret of creativity, leadership and happiness. It is spiritual intelligence that makes an ordinary person a genius. When a genius loses his spiritual intelligence, he becomes quite ordinary.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, Practising Spiritual Intelligence: For Innovation, Leadership and Happiness

Quote: Disruptive innovation is entrepreneurs changing their industry with unique creativity.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: The sooner you finish procrastinating, the sooner you can get back to your art.
Author: Stephanie Lennox, The Authorship Program

Quote: People ask me how to start writing. I tell them that 'Creating Creates Creativity'. Put your notes and outline aside. Start with one anecdote or conversation, and that will lead to another and another. It's the steps, the path, not the final destination that drives the process or writing.
Author: Dick Sederquist, Inside and Outside: Messages of Hope from a Life Long Hiker and Depression Survivor

Quote: Think of your passions as you do food, water, shelter...a necessity. If someone told you to give them up, would you listen?
Author: Shelley K. Wall

Quote: Very few managers know how to effectively tap the biggest source of performance improvement available to them: namely, the creativity and knowledge of the people who work for them.
Author: Alan G. Robinson, The Idea-Driven Organization: Unlocking the Power in Bottom-Up Ideas

Quote: An entrepreneur is a leader of excellence, trailblazer and pioneer who constantly brings change to their generation.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Work as if there's no one to help you, and learn as if everybody is with you.
Author: saransh garg

Quote: Strategy was first used in Athens (508 BC) to describe the art of leadership used by the ten generals on the war council. Some argue for the more creative, human side, while others argue for the more analytic side of strategy.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: Your thoughts define the boundaries of your life. Think big.
Author: Kulpreet Yadav, The Girl Who Loved a Pirate

Quote: Choose to put yourself first and make you a priority. It's not selfish, it's necessary.
Author: Keysha Jade

Quote: If you haven't failed you haven't tried anything new...
Author: Reshma Saujani

Quote: Your personal thoughts carry so much power. It’s important to be mindful of what you spend your time thinking about. Make sure that your thoughts aren’t defeating you or your purpose in life. Fear, doubt, and a negative attitude will continually hold you back. Your journey may be a bumpy one, but I encourage you to never give up! Giving up only does one thing: It keeps you from ever knowing what could have been. Don’t allow your uncertain attitude to be the reason why you don’t succeed. It’s a very sad thing to live your life with regrets. So therefore, giving up is NOT an option for you. Don’t even entertain those thoughts. KEEP MOVING FORWARD, no matter what!
Author: Stephanie Lahart

Quote: Everyone is a business person. You must be in the business of managing your time. Managing your time means managing your life. Good time managers are good life managers, and vice versa.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Serious businesses and lenders will tell you that managing your cash flow is one of the most important aspects in the health of any business. Managing you time flow is key to a healthy and successful life, because, Time is equal to Life. The quality of time expenditure is in direct proportion to the quality of life enjoyed.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: It must start by knowing Time = Life. Spending your life on impulse will lead to a broke life, just like impulse buying leads to an empty wallet! How much value you place on your time reflects in the activities that consume your time.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: So why don’t we take the step of setting goals for ourselves? One reason that stands out is that we aren’t willing to accept full responsibility for our lives. If we don’t set goals, then we don’t have to reach them. Another excuse is that goal setting has never been part of our lives or culture. As a result, we may end up mixing with people who have no clear idea where they are headed, becoming a person who “follows the followers.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The reward for goal-setting is that as you achieve each goal, you feel in charge of your own destiny, with every moment taken up productively. Self-esteem increases and it becomes easier to remain motivated. So set those high goals and make clear plans for their execution.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Stop judging yourself on the basis of your appearance or condition of present circumstances. You may have an old car, in debt, job stress, and a troubled relationship, but they are not a true reflection of you as long as you are working on the vision of what you will be years from now.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Concentrate on your strengths and talents to change your situation, and avoid those pity-parties. Absorbing the blows and present pain is a quality of greatness. Measure yourself against the goals and standards you have set for yourself, rather than comparing yourself to others and feeling discouraged or useless.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your age reflects or measures the rate at which you have been spending life. Every one born into this world is given life and that life is measured in units of time. Spending time means spending life, wasting time means wasting life. Getting value out of time means, getting value out of life. Time does not stop moving because we stopped working with purpose, meaning life does not stop or take a break even when you plan to go on vacation. You never stop spending time, even when you don’t have a penny in your pocket.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The question is, do you have deliberate plans for your life? Do you have intentions with you time? God planned that there should be a time for everything and for every season, meaning you can plan for everything and every season in your life! You may ask, 'Is that possible?” I say, “It’s up to you!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You make the plans - otherwise you will die thinking it is not possible to plan to have time for work, for exercise, for sleep, for relaxation, for recreation, for eating, for entertainment, for love, for family, for spirituality, for friends, for personal reflection, for personal development, for business, for charity all in one life!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: There must be a season for everything that measures what success means to you, there must be a deliberately scheduled time slot for the things that are important to you. Wishing is not enough, deliberate plans followed by deliberate actions make it possible.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Not planning for your time expenditure simply means deliberately intending to fail.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Consistently turning up for meetings late, is a statement saying you have no respect for the person you are meeting or for the purpose of the meeting, or both. You are sending a clear message that this person or the reason for your meeting is not important to you.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Everything you love, enjoy, respect or value will somehow find top priority, even without excessive conscious reminders. Show respect through the way you manage time, especially when others are involved or affected.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Some people choose to lead, others to follow. Success is not primarily a matter of circumstances or native talent or even intelligence — it is a choice. Your beliefs, passion, values, enthusiasm, relationships, interpersonal skills and how they are blended, will move you further ahead towards success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Without clarity and motivation, your vision will remain a wish in dream-land… It takes an action-centred and results-driven work ethic to execute your duties and responsibilities, to make your success more deliberate.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: A mission without action is equally ineffective and futile as action without mission. Use the “power of precision,” and remember language shapes thought and thought shapes action.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your new challenge is to redesign your time allocations. Your strategic focus determines where your time resources will be mainly invested. Prioritise acting out your own script, make your own movie instead of spending too much time watching others at work through the TV. It is surprising the number of unsuccessful people who spend all their time resources on the social media platforms following the lives of the successful. Make the news, be the leader and let others follow you. Align you priorities and balance your activities.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The setting of SMART goals has been written about extensively over the decades, but will only be as useful as the extent to which its principles are used.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: There is need to focus on selling an emotional experience instead of a mere product or service - the impression you make on others must be lasting and permanent. These experiences have to be positive and worth remembering. This will increase the chances of repeat business and referrals, guaranteeing customer loyalty. And that is what sustains businesses, brands and careers for generations! The principle remains the same for comedians, actors, footballers, musicians, sales executives or any other area of specialty.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You cannot offer quality experiences as an isolated island. Learn to work well with others on the success train. Respect those you work with and appreciate their contribution in making you the best at what you do.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your life is connected to other key support structures that you must never neglect, including family, fans, supporters, affiliations, professional associations, religious membership and others. Your membership to such groupings must add value to others whilst you equally get the benefit they are supposed to provide their members.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: No matter how great you are at what you do, as long as you remain known only within your own family circles, then you and your talent will die in obscurity and irrelevance. Position yourself to influence the masses by having a media, marketing and communication strategy.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Tactical use of the media can be equated to power behind your skill or special ability. It is in the power of the media to help market your brand. You just need to look at Hollywood, European football, Bollywood, Nollywood, Global fashion & modeling, showbiz and even humanitarian efforts, to appreciate that the making and destroying of stars, initiatives and legends is to a greater extent influenced by the role played by the media.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The key questions and challenges that we must all continue to pose and remind this key sector (the media) should be, 'Do you realize the power you have, to build and to destroy; to promote success or failure; to bring life or death to a cause or talent; to give a platform or take it away?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If the African stars do not rise, are not known, remain obscure, their stories are not told – who and where is the African story teller? Your challenge if you are in the media is to continually ask if you are doing enough, using the appropriate strategies and at the right platforms. Let’s create and promote international and global stars with the talent and skills in our people, no one will do it for us.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Work is simply, “force x distance” or the product of a force applied to an object and the displacement of the object in the direction of the applied force…holding an object in the air does not involve any work, no matter how painful your hand will be after a few minutes… reflect on your daily activities and the results from them. Are you really working or just increasing your potential without progress or desired results? Your work must produce some movement, progress and change, by effectively using all your energies whether intellectual or physical.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If you are going to grow in personal effectiveness, you must become an excellent communicator. Achieving your goals and fulfilling your mission calls for communication excellence verbally, vocally and non-verbally. As you grow in this regard, you make forward strides towards significance – the capacity to make contributions that count and matter.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: People and organisations should want to be associated with you as a brand. A sign of a depleted and irrelevant brand is unwillingness of your market or peers to associate with you.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If you can listen to yourself and obey yourself more, then you have increased your chances for attaining personal effectiveness.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Why do people seek one and not the other? It is the majorities that are led and they normally follow those who can help them meet their ever-present and growing needs. Question is, do you possess the kind of solutions they want? Are you well positioned to reach them or to be reachable by those who can benefit from your solution to their challenges?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: To achieve your desired success you have to be effectively selling something and to be significant in impact, you must be teaching somehow. How effectively are you selling and how well are you teaching?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The world is always throwing challenges and questions - which ones does your mission and purpose respond to or seek to solve? Do you know your mission and have you clearly defined the life-issues you intend to address?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Selling and teaching demand that you develop your intrapersonal and interpersonal communication skills. You must be able to communicate with yourself as well as with others in a way that makes them buy your offering or benefit from the knowledge you want to impart.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: So many voices are out there, both excellent and mediocre, do you have a credible solution for the needs of your target market or audience? … prove the authenticity of your substance. Do you have what it takes to make a difference? Whilst some come as talents, their development to excellence and maturity will not come without passion, resolve, productive work ethic and opportunity.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Who are you’ is a question of both substance and position. In other words, what is the authority of your voice, service, product or performance in relation to the needs of those you intend to serve? Secondly, have you defined and demystified yourself enough to be accepted as the solution of choice?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Have you positioned yourself to be reachable and accessible by those you seek to serve and make an impact on? Do they know where and how to find you, either physically or in the cyber realm? If they cannot reach you for whatever reason, then you have not done your homework, because you are supposed to have a strategy to reach them before they can even look for you! Otherwise someone else will meet them along the way as they look for you.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Sometimes you may feel like your life is submerged in life's relentless challenges, but you can develop the kind of internal substance in you that displaces every negativity, fear and self-doubt. Even if the challenges were bigger and heavy on your soul and life, the new attitude and belief within will displace every challenge before you - then the law of buoyancy will begin to force your challenges to be ejected out of your pathway to success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: At times the challenges will displace us or some of the things that are important to us. If we strengthen our belief system from within – those challenges must inevitably begin to float away and not take root or force us to sink.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Make a deliberate effort to feed your conscious and subconscious mind to achieve a well programmed mind frame, ready to succeed. Read the right material, watch the right material and listen to the right material. Practice and expose yourself to the right material so that you can form positive attitudes, positive feelings and positive habits. For each person, the right material is defined from their unique vision, mission, beliefs and values.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You feed the requisite substance through personal development efforts and position yourself strategically to allow the forces around you to create the path for your relevance and significance. You are not lifted by air, but by the substance inside you hitting the springboard of opportunity.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Making success deliberate means that you must make success a habit; and habits are a product of the subconscious mind. We call them habits because we can actually do them without being conscious of what we are doing. Things we end up doing without sitting down to think because we have done them so many times, thought about them so many times they are now imprinted onto our subconscious mind. If we could think about success so much, practice it so much more, then we imprint thoughts and seeds of success onto our subconscious that it becomes a habit.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Even if you bury me underground and put a concrete slab over the hole – one day you will wake up to find a crack in the concrete with a tiny green sprout shooting through. When you see that shoot – that will be me!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Skills and special abilities will only grow if you practice more. You become a star-performer by doing. Let performance and production of desired results become a consistent habit associated with your personal brand.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: After you acquire knowledge and skill, aim to be a practitioner. Time for practice on the job or in life will still test your authenticity. Knowledge is one of the greatest sources of confidence, and you will need that confidence to do your work and demonstrate you know what you have been trained for.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You cannot bury someone with the Shereketa spirit for long. Even if they are thrown into problems, they will rise back up.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You are only as authentic as the substance you have inside you. Having others take your examinations or doing your assignments and projects is to reduce the level of authenticity of your qualification as well as your personal brand. Master your chosen area of study to the highest level and demonstrate that you have full knowledge as a specialist. Let the depth of your knowledge make you sought after and respected. Define yourself and be authentic.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your life as an effective person must always have productivity surrounding all your efforts, there must be a sustained forward and upward trajectory in every area of your life. This is where the Shona Shereketa meets the Japanese Kaizen - you are moving and shaking past mediocrity on the basis of small but continuous improvements that will ultimately result in positive quality changes to your life.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Make sure your reading, studying or research are always adding value to the defined vision, mission, beliefs and values that form your unique personal brand.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your growth and involvement must begin to show lasting footprints as you exude maximum effectiveness and significance. Your leadership influence must translate into a source of inspiration for your peers and those who look at you as a leader.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The question is what kind of stuff do you immerse your mind in? What kind of food does your brain feed on? What kind of exercise does it get and for what purpose? What do you spend time listening to? What thoughts do you entertain? All these are the processes that form the conveyor belt into your subconscious mind.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: To succeed and create change, you must be willing to take the risk, with an understanding of a number of key elements. Please begin to understand that an entrepreneurial spirit is not only essential in business enterprise. We all have a business to run in our different areas of specialty. Your life is your business and your family is your business – you have multiple businesses.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: An entrepreneurial spirit makes you someone who organizes, manages, and assumes the risks of a business enterprise, talent or calling to become an agent of change.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Entrepreneurship is the process of discovering new ways of combining resources to create change – in whatever area of life.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Money might be a reward (by-product) but should not always be the only goal of your efforts and enterprise.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Dreams are difficult to measure if they remain wishes – crystallise them into measurable goals with specific targets and action plans. Goals/objectives are easier to measure when broken down into tasks with clear targets and deadlines.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Choices and decisions must be supported by your passion, resolve and a productive work ethic. If these meet opportunity - your success has finally come!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Learn from mistakes and set-backs (yours and other people’s), pick yourself up, make necessary changes and try again. I once came across a saying that went something like, “The wise learn from the mistakes made by fools!” So at some point we all have been fools, I suppose, since we all make mistakes.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Take your mission and yourself very seriously. Stick to your schedule and keep time. Cut expenditure of time and money from non-core activities and redirect to those that give more value to the pursuit of your purpose. Never embark on your work or a project without a plan, even if it’s just a mental plan. Use the old carpenter’s rule – “Measure twice and cut once.” Do not leave room for substandard results.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Seek to develop your skill and talent to a level of relevance. Create a platform to shine and make sure you are bringing a difference to the areas that require your expertise. A pastor who does not teach or pray for people, a football player always playing pool, a body builder who doesn’t eat but sleeps all day, a student who studies only towards examinations, a politician without a cause and a business without a customer service culture all have one thing in common – sooner or later they will all become irrelevant. Never miss the chance to practice the call of your mission, even if you are not getting paid for it.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Every effective person must be able to sell and teach, whether in private or to a group in public. This applies equally to skills and talents as it does to products and services.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Always remember that every word you say contains power and you must ask yourself a few questions about your words; Are these words true and kind? Are these words relevant and necessary? Are these words effective for intentions? Reflect on what your words carry, they are a life-changing container!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Be stimulated to become significant. This might be your back-slap moment. New-born babies born with weak signs of life are given a slap on the back to “stimulate” them. It is a knock to wake them up to the reality that they must now take charge. In this world, they have to do their own breathing and their own eating otherwise they will not survive. It’s the same in your adulthood and your quest for success, you must take charge because no one will wake up every day to do things for you and make a success out of a life of excuses and laziness.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Positioning yourself and effective branding should not be left to sports and movie stars. Your need a personal coach, manager or mentor otherwise your expertise, skills or talent will not go far. You might have what it takes but sometimes you lack strategy and some finer elements.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your personal development is your personal responsibility. No one can study or acquire knowledge for you. There are things only you can do, to bring the change or the results you require to make progress in life.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If you want to excel in any endeavour you must pay attention to detail, know exactly what you want, have the detail on how you want it done and how you will get it done. You must realize the importance of definitions and love defining things in your life and about your life – Define your mission, define your problem, define your future, define your path and the finer details of your vision. Use your sense of imagination and creativity.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your attitude should not settle for the average when you have what it takes to become the best. You excel by choice and you must be focused like a laser beam. Even the sun, powerful as it is, will not be able to burn a hole into a piece of paper until a magnifying glass is used to channel the power of its rays onto one spot. Focus your intellect and your knowledge to get excellent results.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: No matter how much I care for you I cannot grow for you, you have to do your own growing – it’s your personal responsibility. Make a plan on how you will get the skills and experience required to become a practitioner of note in your area of choice.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Do not lose focus because of small wins or temporary set-backs. You can only score if you keep your eyes on the ball and be certain of where you want to place it even if you are not in physical sight of the goal. Visualise the dream but never take your eyes off the dynamic plan of action.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You must be willing to be disciplined as well as make personal sacrifices. It takes discipline to go through rigorous training and study programs. You need a coach or coaches and sometimes mates to help you stick to your planned program in execution of your responsibilities. To be excellent and effective, the non-essentials must give up time and space in your life – some sacrifices have to be made. Work hard and work smart.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Even if you are counted amongst the best, you will slip into mediocrity by remaining comfortable being the worst of the best. You might be relevant, but because your level of effectiveness is in the bottom tier and your impact minimal – you will soon become obscure as your relevance begins to wear off.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Shift from mediocrity to excellence. Mediocrity and Excellence are like jealous suitors fighting for a partner and competing to please him/her, to the extent they do all they can to reproduce in sets of twins. Mediocrity gives birth to Irrelevance and Obscurity, whilst Excellence breeds Relevance and Significance. These sets of twins cannot inhabit the same life, only one compatible pair can co-exist.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Review and question what you already know or have. In most ball sports and games, you confirm whether you have scored by checking whether the ball has gone into the goal or hit its target. So evaluation of results means that you must look at your goal to see if the ball has hit its target. Look at your educational aspirations or dreams and say “am I on track to meet my 2020 PhD target?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Make adjustments and improvements to enhance the effectiveness of meetings or surpassing of your target. Learn to define, quantify and be specific about what, how and when you want to succeed in each area of your life.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Shereketa” is a Shona word ordinarily meaning to fidget, to be restless, and to show discomfort. Whilst this word has largely been used negatively, the Shereketa principle channels it into a different dimension to be used positively for success. Shereketa re–defined refers to deliberate movements, actions and adjustments inspired by the calling to excellence & success, driven by a conviction against and a growing discomfort with mediocrity. The movements and actions take place in two realms - the inner spirit/convictions of your heart and the outer execution platforms of your physical and material world (Shereketa within and Shereketa without).
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Deliberately and purposefully schedule meetings with yourself. These are the most important meetings in the life of one who intends to make their success deliberate. During these meeting you do much of the quality and honest communication with yourself. This is besides the conversations you are always carrying on with yourself in your own head or audibly. That doesn’t mean you are crazy, we all do it and we just need to improve the quality and positivity of those conversations.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Be disciplined enough to choose your network and be willing to sacrifice the circles that reduce your effectiveness and make you unproductive.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You are in obscurity when you are still needed but no one cares a lot what you say or think, or even where you are working from. You have no voice or presence that makes you relevant. Grow your voice.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The biblical preacher talks about the poor man’s wisdom that saved a city but he was immediately forgotten. A poverty of ideas, contributions, uniqueness or influence, will overshadow the visibility of good potential. Keep those ideas flowing and you will not be forgotten.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Some people are known, they have the platform and presence, but still remain irrelevant. They know you and what you do, but they don’t need you or your offering. I see too many people with a platform but without substance, again this is not sustainable. Lack of substance can only relegate your talent or skill towards the league of the mediocre, if at all you become much by superficial branding then you will become the best of the worst. You don't have what it takes but you depend on your ability to sell substandard offerings to the market. It will not last for long, but quickly become irrelevant.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Understand that every ‘voice’ has the spirit to influence. Watch your tone, accent, volume and speed. Be careful that you don’t sound angry or argumentative whenever driving an important point. Equally important, is not sounding serious or sounding playful when the message being conveyed needs to be taken seriously.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The obvious signs of a brand gone wrong are the levels of negative headlines it consistently attracts. People talking about you for all the negative and wrong reasons. You begin to shoot yourself in the foot and you have become your own enemy. The gospel about you should be good enough to create relevance and significance - or rather to confirm that.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You must learn to accept that humans make mistakes, but when the same issue is repeated over and over without corrective strategies to plug the holes, then you must expect negative impact on your definition of success. It is normal to make a mistake, but learn, face the consequences, get back up and march on. If you want to be different or stand out as a brand, then your actions, habits, behaviours and decisions must reflect that 'you care about what people think or say about you.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The results you are churning out are a direct or indirect reflection of what you allowed into your life. Unlearning what you already know and practice is no easy task, but sometimes it’s necessary for the programming or re-programming that must take place for success to be made deliberate.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Study to acquire knowledge - not just to get a certificate or promotion. Acquisition of knowledge is key to the programming or reprogramming of your mind and expanding your frame of reference. Choose the areas of study in line with your vision and mission as well as your strengths and interests. Make sure you seek opportunities to practice and implement the new information and knowledge you gain from your study.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: It is imperative that you grow, because your personal growth and development is one of the most important things to you. Your growth is good for you – it must be deliberate.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: No matter how much I care for you, you have to do your own growing – it’s your personal responsibility. Muscles do not grow by reading but by lifting weights. Exam grades do not improve by wishing but by studying.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Connect by listening well and speaking relevantly without being prejudiced or sarcastic. Learn to listen with your eyes as much as you listen with your ears. Generate interest in the person and subject, that way people will become more interested in you.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Don’t do things or act out your posture and gestures to impress people, just be yourself and portray the confident ‘you’ with that high self-esteem. So relax because you are ‘you’. Be sincere, be authentic. That will be impressive enough.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Appearance matters, we see your presentation before we get a chance to sample the substance within. You might miss a chance for the latter.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Don’t be intimidated and at the same time don’t intimidate.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Bathing is not negotiable! So is brushing your teeth and washing your underwear, so that you always have a fresh inviting scent around you. People should want to be around you, not avoid you because of unfriendly odours coming out of your mouth, shoes or armpits. Do the best with what you have; even the old can be made clean and hygienic to improve your image.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate
