Quote: The trusted quality and power of the believed sponsor of your words will have a big impact on the power released in and through your words. You should have sufficient sponsorship to counter the kind of words you do not want to influence your life, thoughts and mission. Contrary words and convincing voices will encounter you on the route to your destiny and they need to be countered with strong conviction and authority.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Never underestimate the power of thought. It takes days and nights of pre-meditating ideas, thoughts, pictures and visions of what you would call success. Allow your mind to be pregnant with the thought of success and how you want to achieve it. This will enable you not to be shocked by your own success when you finally achieve it, because you would have lived it countless times before.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: When your own success shocks you, you fail to sustain it and it becomes a curse instead of a blessing. Think through issues and make considerations before you encounter the real situation. Companies invest billions in research and development, including models and simulations to increase chances of success – all in an attempt to make success deliberate for a particular project.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Whilst your memory is as sharp as the most reliable computer, it is always wiser to write things down. Pre-meditation helps the refining process, taking out the undesirable elements from a dream or vision, even mounting the courage to face and overcome challenges before they appear in reality.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Deliberately feed your subconscious mind by acquiring quality input through the conscious and sensory mind. You need to be aware of your need to be successful in life or any of its endeavours. You need to be aware of your potential and possess the strong desire to succeed. Success is possible and you deserve to succeed.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You must succeed! Not by accident, but deliberately! You are able to succeed – now you must be willing to succeed and this must reflect in the way you spend your life.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The accumulation of beliefs, knowledge and experiences contribute to our level of success and progress in life, however they also introduce the reality that we are all prejudiced. If not well managed, our personal prejudices can become the mental prison we lock ourselves inside or we use to shut others out. You need to deal with this likely impediment to a success-driven lifestyle.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: First accept the reality that we are all prejudiced because we have things and issues we have biases towards or against, based on our beliefs, thoughts and experiences. Accept that it is possible to differ on opinions, beliefs and philosophies without necessarily becoming inhumane or acrimonious towards each other.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Doubt is a result of more than one internal voice giving differing and contradicting instructions and suggestions concerning a situation or a phase of your success journey. The triggering suggestions may be internal or external factors igniting internal conflict and uncertainty in the face of adversity. Yet inside of you must rise up a voice of authority which silences the disempowering shouts of unbelief. You need to have a deliberate plan to develop that internal voice of authority.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Leave no room for fear and excuses. Be strong in spirit and possess unwavering convictions. Choose to be an optimist and commit to succeed.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Train your emotions to listen to your fundamental empowering beliefs. Be principle-centred and values-driven.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Never stop asking questions. Always take time to reflect and find answers. Stop, Think and Use Your Brain!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your words are powerful containers, carrying blessings or curses depending on what is inside of you. If you harbour bitterness in you, you will speak spitefully and create hurt and hatred in those you speak with. If there is love inside of you, you will release pleasant and caring words that create appreciation, gratitude and warmth in those around you.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: There should always be a deliberate crafting and packaging of the words you speak so that they produce the kind of results you desire. Enough research has been done in every religion and belief system to support the truth that words have power to create or destroy. This is the reason why all major religions say their prayers. However, your words can only be as powerful and as effective as their sponsor. The words must possess the right substance.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Let your resolution and confession be, 'I will change these things because I want to succeed, and I want to succeed because it will bring me the happiness I seek and desire.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Slipping into bad attitudes and habits is like a beautiful queen growing older and uglier compared to the defined mission and personal standards. Time and again everyone who is serious about making their success more deliberate needs to stop by the mirror in their own mind and ask, “Mirror, mirror in my mind, am I still on course to succeed in life?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You should be able to criticize and evaluate yourself before others do it. Check for congruity between your defined mission, vision, values and your practiced attitude, behaviour and habits.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The best way for reflection and self-assessment is to hold meetings with yourself. I will pardon you for missing some other meetings, but you must never have an excuse for missing the board meetings you need to hold with yourself – I call these “board meetings between me, myself and I”. The three of us in one place, in a no-holds-barred meeting, where life-changing resolutions are reached to craft my journey to success. As board members we give each other honest feedback.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Once you make the requisite personal commitment to make your success deliberate, that commitment must translate into a definition of higher personal standards meant to depict the true impression of what you have become or are becoming within.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You first compete with yourself before competing against others; if you cannot beat your last best result, do not be surprised if it seems difficult to compete against external competitors.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Generate great impressions. This is a direct result of setting higher standards for yourself in your speech, dress, living environment, grooming, etiquette, study, research and commitment.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You must first become – before you are appointed, conferred or pronounced. Unfortunate challenges and failures are likely to be manifested whenever conferment precedes becoming what you aim to be. Be ready to maturely handle success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: It is amazing, the number of business executives and senior leaders who get to be appointed and elevated to positions of authority on the basis of technical competences whilst lacking essential grooming on basic good manners and customs of conduct that must come from the home training process.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Are you conscious of the scent or odour emanating from your mouth, arm pits, stockings or elsewhere? Are you friendly to your environment? Is your dressing, hair style and make up in line with your defined mission and values? How can you start managing your image and brand for a consistently good impression all the time? Does your image reflect your aspirations?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If you just want to do something because it is a customary new year resolution, then soon enough the year will get a bit older, and the strength of your decision will also begin to wear off.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Build relationships and friendships by finding common experiences or interests instead of getting discouraged by noticeable differences.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If you are not sure or you don’t know something, politely ask. Asking is not a sign of being daft, but of confidence.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Allow others to talk about themselves instead of being obsessed about telling them or bragging about yourself and your possessions and achievements. Show a genuine interest in others and allow them to tell their story so you can share the conversation.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Emotions or feelings stem from your attitude and they become the basis on which you decide or act. All decisions, choices and actions have some kind of underlying emotional influence. To change the way you feel about someone or something you must first change the way you think about them.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: It will take faith, to know success can still be attained regardless of unfairness or disadvantages availed by any system you operate within.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: In life, all things are not constant or equal, the inequalities are so loud; change and uncertainty are the order of the day. It is these changes, inequalities and uncertainties that make it more imperative that you deliberately plan your way to success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You can use and see the power of words contributing towards your success, and this comes from having an empowering belief system. Living and functioning from an empowering belief system is the spring board for making your success more deliberate.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Without faith, it is impossible to succeed. It takes faith to grow, change or move out of your comfort zone. All external interventions become futile without the personal and internalized buy-in from the spirit-man who needs to change towards a given success destination.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: When you face challenges, threats and prospects for failure, when you are out of money or job, when health is deteriorating and death seems to beckon – any hope for success against all those odds takes a solid empowering belief system that will believe – hope is still there. You must choose to adopt positive and empowering beliefs.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: At a higher level you are influenced by deity and the spiritual. Even atheism is based on the belief that there is no God or gods, without deity-acknowledging religion it has no foundation or basis. What is your divine influence, doctrine and reservoir of inspiration to tackle or create the tangible out of the realm of the unseen and the spiritual?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You need to realize there will always be beliefs that seek to limit and others that seek to stretch you to your highest potential. Just because you cannot see or do something, does not mean it is not there or cannot be done.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Programming means your mindset, thought processes and frame of reference must be correctly wired and mapped to enable the incubation of thoughts and ideas that lead to success. Your subconscious mind is key in this process and will always look for ways and means, night and day, to fulfil and implement the thoughts that are always fed into it. It is your faithful servant. I call it the connection between God and man. It is an essential part of the human spirit.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Positive empowering beliefs will enable you to solidify a vision and mission that can bring you to a life of relevance and significant impact. Remember whatever you believe is true - to you. These beliefs must be programmed into your mind – by you (though you will still get input outside your own initiative).
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your values, as guiding principles, will influence your attitude towards yourself, life, other people, work and even challenges or success itself. Your values are a product of your beliefs.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Attitude is the mind-set, the kind of thoughts you process and meditate on, to generate the kind of feelings you have towards life, people and issues. This is what makes you do what you do in the way you do it.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: No one can change your attitude or another person’s attitude – only you can decide to change your own attitude by influencing the whole value chain from programs running in your subconscious mind to beliefs and values you strongly hold.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: We don’t have the same backgrounds, we do not possess the same skills or talents, we are not from the same generation, and neither do we have access to the same platform to shine. Things are not equal and life is not constant – there will never be the so-called level playing field.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Behaviours and habits are therefore the end result of the entire value chain and cannot be changed in a sustainable manner by scratching the surface - you have to dig deeper. This is why jail time, threats and sanctions without appropriate rehabilitation programs will not change a person unless they embark on a personal journey/program to initiate the process of change from the inner core – how the programs in their brain are wired to influence their beliefs.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Identify and replace any limiting deep-rooted beliefs that are like a solid mental prison, including thoughts like, 'I’m not worthy,' 'I can’t do this,' 'I’m too old to start,' 'I don’t have the qualification or skills to become a better person,' 'I’m always the unlucky one,' 'I have nothing to give/say or contribute
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Because it took you years to become so negative, doubting and dis-empowered – it must now become your daily journey to a life-time of positivity and empowering thoughts, words, actions and beliefs.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Deliberately plan to be exciting and to be excited.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Be deliberate about what you choose to read, watch or listen to – these are source codes to your internal programming.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The deep desire for success must cause a dream to rise to the surface and inspire you to action. The dream must be supported in the physical and natural realm to help you believe more and more in the possibility of its realization.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You must first move from mediocrity to relevance in the realm of your dream, before it can translate into a driving passion that fuels your success. There are no impossibilities in a dream, there are no figures that are too big or obstacles that are unscalable, no distances too far or expertise considered too small – there is unlimited possibility in a dream. Your dream must be bigger than you and inspiring enough to outlive you.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Call your personal board now and discuss the important questions. You cannot invent, re-invent or show creative brilliance without asking pertinent questions. You must demand answers from your life, from your present circumstances or from any challenge you may face. Why can’t you change? What does it take to get different results? What else can you do or try?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: There must be a clear distinction between wishing and believing. A wish is a hazy thread of desires that leaves room for the winds of doubt to toss it about, meaning it might happen by chance or not. A belief has no equivocation; it is clear, stubborn and deliberate in taking hold of what remains yet unseen by the physical eye. If there is no visible way, a belief will draft the way, create the way, walk the path and reach the desired destination.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Positive belief leaves no room for excuses; it questions why the feats and quests cannot be attained. When your beliefs are strong enough, you will not define yourself on the basis of past and present limitations or life events. Your success can only be as big as the size of your beliefs, for it is the size of your beliefs that will either limit your dream or allow it to explode.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Make the difficult choices and adopt the discipline regime required of a person who has set their mind to succeed, kiss mediocrity goodbye and translate an ordinary life to the extraordinary. It takes personal commitment of time and resources, and a sacrifice of non-essential pleasures to move towards success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The challenge therefore, as you strive for success, is to make it a habit to live your life on purpose. You must learn to make deliberate plans and then practice the art and science of doing things on purpose.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The aim is to produce specific results by your actions, so you begin to do things on purpose. If I leave things to chance, I am losing the plot to make success deliberate, meaning I am increasing my chances of failing in any given task.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: He is a trouble causer who acts without intent. In other words, living on purpose means you must act with known intent. Develop an objective sense that asks the why questions as you pull out action thoughts. Why do I want to do this? Why do I want to do it now? Why do I want to stop this? Why do I want to enter into this agreement? Why do I want to change? You will discover that when you have a known intent, you have enough motivation to sustain the success of your decision.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You need to use you imagined view of the future you dream of, then paint the statement in words, to state that clear dream of your desired future.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your vision must state the end result and must be stated in the positive so that it will be a constant source of inspiration. Begin by, “I will…
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You need to change the questions you ask yourself and of your situations, in order to change the trajectory of your life. These are questions that will help you define and refine your purpose.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: We can only continue to promote invention, creativity and success by asking of ourselves, our situations and problems some key questions. What questions are you asking today?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Values are the guiding principles through which you make choices and decisions. They are influenced by your beliefs, and will help you uphold a higher standard of personal character.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Aligning your values and beliefs to your behaviour, increases your chances of being effective at living a fulfilling life without the stress of guilt-consciousness, internal strife or internal conflict
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your personal brand must exude who you are, what you stand for, specifies your target market, what value you intend to add to them and the unique offering through which you will do that.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Whilst you can be a stepping stone to help others succeed, you are not a dirty mat to be abused by others.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: There should be a healthy ‘stubbornness’, assertiveness and confidence that comes from knowledge of your clear vision, mission, values and personal brand.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You can and should stand up for who you are and what you represent, without fear or prejudice. You take the promises you have made to yourself and to others very seriously.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The major purpose of defining and understanding yourself is to be able to come up with an objective strategy to map your success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Leveraging your personal strengths means you will also need to become clearer about those strengths. It is easier to build on what you are already good at than start from your weaker areas. Take time to list down your strengths and reflect on them.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Personal growth by tackling the ‘big-picture” through focusing on the things you have power to influence is more effective and less stressful.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Remain aware of your weak points; not knowing or choosing to ignore them, means creating dangerous ‘blind-spots’ in the path to your success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The ostrich-approach of burying your head in the sand, when confronting your areas of weakness, becomes a self-set trigger for failure.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: What are the obvious temptations and inclinations that consistently call me or entice me to go against my personal beliefs, values and standards? You don’t need a prophet for this!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If you check your personal blind spots, you can be able to guard against focusing on what you cannot do, but reduce the areas of weakness by taking their space with more of your strengths.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Reprogram your life and mind-set by replacing the bad with the positive, the weakness with the strength.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: There is no point knowing your mission if you cannot see the area of need for that mission.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You will only become significant in life, by solving the unique set of problems only you and your mission are meant to solve.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: There remains unique questions calling for a unique mission like yours to answer – and that is your key to significance. Find them and be the answer.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Self-discovery is a journey of questioning yourself.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Just like watering the field will cause both the desired seed and the undesirable weed to germinate, the opportunities for your mission in life will be equally presented with real-life threats.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Whilst the greatest threat to your mission is the internal aspects within you, the external circumstances need to be covered against as well. Scan your external environment and circumstances.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The wisdom that comes from being conscious of the real threats to you and your mission will sharpen your deliberateness in decision & choice-making, associations and positioning.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Begin to grow in wisdom and develop an informed approach to more global issues around you and along your path to success and significance.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Everyone has the Capacity to Succeed…Ceteris Paribus!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The truth is that we all have what it takes to succeed and the fact is that not everyone will attain what they define success to be.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The reality of life and an imperfect world dictates that things cannot be held constant to guarantee your success; you have to wiggle your way through a planned path within a maze, to attain your goal.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your success must never be left to others. You must be able to visualize it and see it through your own eyes, whilst others assist you to see it better and make it clearer.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If you cannot see it in your mind, then it becomes difficult to get. If you can personally visualize it, it becomes easier and more realistic to achieve.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Just because you cannot see it now, does not mean it is not there or not possible. See yourself succeeding and own that vision through all your planning and hard work.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Internalising success means that even if a misfortune takes away all the evidence or traces of success, yet what made you successful, remains. Soon enough, the evidence will return.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: What makes you succeed must be possessed where it cannot be taken away. The internal capacity to succeed is more important than the external and temporal manifestation of success.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: When success is internalized, no situation, no matter how bad, can convince you that you will not be able to attain your goal. You become adamant and refuse to give up.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You must not end your life because you failed an examination. Failing an examination or making a mistake does not make you a failure at life. The context of life is broader than that.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Taking your own life could become the ultimate failure, because you will be killing and closing the existing door to a chance that might have been waiting to lead you into another path.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Do not define your success in the context of just one situation or challenge you are currently battling or pursuing.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your mind must be prepared to face some kind of ‘failure’ or mistakes – take the lessons, face the consequences even if embarrassing, and march on.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You do not reduce or eliminate your concerns by crying, shouting or proving you are the victim of whatever happened in your life.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: As you grow and develop your talent and skill – you must begin to create a demand for what you possess as a personal brand.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Whatever you possess as an advantage over others, must be meticulously executed to produce desired results and progress.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Work, and not wishing, is what brings motion and results from your vision. Don’t be lazy. Try and try again, learn and practice, review and refine, then go back to implement again.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: You must practice the discipline of a champion before you win the actual contest. The appointment and opportunity must then come to confirm what you have already become.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Roll-up those sleeves and work until you see the fruit of your labour. It takes Passion, Resolve and a Productive Work Ethic, meeting with Opportunity, for you to succeed.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Your unwillingness to change to my view point is purely on the justifiable basis that you have your own strongly held beliefs about important life issues.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Whatever you believe in, is true – at least to you! The question is, “How positive and empowering is it, especially in the face of adversity?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Even if the creative brilliance sparks only once, it needs to be accelerated and developed so it has self-sustaining strategies to continue adding value to both the initiator and those it serves.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Poverty might make you obscure, but if you continue churning out wisdom to solve more problems and challenges, you will neither remain poor nor die in obscurity.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Consistency and acceleration are both key to sustaining success. One-day-wonder persons who slouch back to mediocrity will soon be forgotten.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: What are the beliefs that give life, spirit and passion to your dream and which values will guide your decisions and actions for you to be fulfilled by your own success?
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Have a clear plan or strategy to translate your success philosophy into desired results. Adopt an effective work ethic, with a laser-focus and requisite execution strategies to produce results.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Don’t waste time. Avoid the company of wasteful people who lack the desire to achieve. Become assertive and action-oriented.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: All around you, production must be taking place to bring you closer to realizing your defined success. Adopt a personal responsibility attitude to enable the realization of your dreams.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Be in love with what you do. Love wisdom. Love life. Love people. God is love.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Do not seek success just for the sake of succeeding or for self-gratification. Seek a life of impact and significance.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Plan for the sustainability of your success so that you do not drift back to failure and mediocrity.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Do not plan to die, do not plan for the death of your name or your influence - rather, plan for the resting of a life well lived. Make an eternal mark.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: There is more fulfilment when sharing with others than enjoying on your own - whatever success you achieve.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The unfairness of judging others comes in that we judge them on the basis of our own values and beliefs, yet we can never exactly stand on common ground.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The key to success is to first know thyself. The definition of success by another person must not paralyse you or make you think less of your potential to succeed in your own way.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: The person who will end up enjoying success, is the one who planned for it and who knew why they are seeking to succeed.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Most of the things to guarantee your death have already been done so you can spend the rest of your time focusing on the things that can guarantee your success and happiness.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Plan from your internal or spiritual view of things. The external view always has a way of distorting, discouraging and limiting your dream.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Beginning to work your plan means movement and action. The success of your movements and actions can only be guaranteed if they are well calculated.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Success must be personalised, contextualized and internalized. Success means something different to each one of us. We each have a unique and peculiar mission in life.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Who are you? Where are you coming from? What are your strengths and ambitions? What makes you happy and fulfilled? What are your inherent gifts and talents? Clearly define yourself.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Stop, think and use your brain! Don’t’ rush through life. Take time to reflect as you define what success means to you. Always remember you are one of a kind!
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: To become successful, do the little extra things that ordinary people refuse to do. The little extra hard work, little extra practice, little extra studying and the little extra positive attitude.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Defining what success means to you requires important meetings – board meetings with yourself. When the “me, myself and I” committee meets and passes transformational resolutions.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: People are different and it is this uniqueness that also makes it imperative for the definition or meaning of success be left to each individual to determine.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: If your belief system, mission, values and attitude are poisoned or contaminated, then expect whatever you enjoy and perceive as success to be short-lived.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: To succeed, with or without money, have deliberate plans to make success out of opportunity. If you are totally dependent on chance, then chances are that you will fail.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Never fool yourself, success will not come by accident – it must be deliberately planned for. If opportunities don’t come on their own, they too must be created or attracted.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Those who succeed after a rare opportunity, only succeed on the back of a plan they already had or one they craft and begin to pursue after receiving the windfall.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Personalising success means defining it in line with your defined mission and beliefs. This will help ignite a passion for the dream as well as develop underlying values and attitudes.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Cease from envy, prejudice and unhealthy competitiveness. Never abandon your own mission and brand to pursue the seemingly exciting mission or vision of another.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: Success can never be enjoyed if there is no congruity or alignment of your beliefs, values and how you behave in attaining your achievements.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: No one can become successful for you. It takes personal definitions, personal decisions, personal convictions, personal actions and personal responsibility to succeed in life.
Author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

Quote: On the journey to self discovery be grateful for the fools along the way. Their lack of kindness fueled your success ~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: You have immense power--power to overcome, power to achieve, power to possess, and power to prosper, making you incredibly irresistible.
Author: Anitra Shelton-Quinn, Becoming Incredibly Irresistible: A Guide to Living the Abundant Life

Quote: When you fail, get hurt, feel bad, but act on it! Everybody fails, but the ones who act are the ones who change the world!
Author: Vishwas Mudagal

Quote: A new week means new goals. New goals means new success. No goals mean no success and no success means a wasted week.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: The outcome is not up to you. The outlook is.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: You are special individual. Never envy others.You never know what they go through.Seek and be inspired by the works of others. Learn their secrets for success.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Leaders are made not born. They are the results of persistent effort. Thus, leadership involves much more than just shouting. Effective leadership requires a human focus and reflects a servant and transformation mentality. It is about the nuts and bolts of execution. Leadership is an everyday activity. It is a process that begins but never ends.
Author: Vishwas Chavan, Vishwasutras: Universal Principles for Living: Inspired by Real-Life Experiences

Quote: An Appreciative inquiry Conversation is the catalyst for strengths based innovation.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Only the faithful God knows the future.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Embrace the future with enduring hope and faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Whatever you went through in past equipped you for today. What you experience now prepares you for the future.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not be bitter over the past. Believe in a brighter future.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The past informs our present and our future.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: Give today to get better tomorrow.
Author: Ashish Patel

Quote: To show our commitment to the future means to dedicate our time, efforts, resources, saving nature and to develop nice thoughts for better thinking.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: The future is for everyone, not far, it's just tomorrow.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: The future does not wait for hesitant people. The more we achieve, the more we realise how much more we can achieve.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: The choices that you make in life will determine the person that you become. Life is all about choices.
Author: Benjamin A. McKinney

Quote: I have hopein who I am becoming.I have belief in every scar and disgraceful wordI have ever spokenor been toldbecause it is still teaching meand I have hope in who I am becoming.They say it takes 756 days to run to someone you loveand they also say that the only romance worth fighting foris the one with yourselfand I know by nowthat they say a lot of things,people talking everywherewithout saying a word,but if it took me all those years to learn myselfor teach myselfhow to look into the mirrorwithout breaking itI know for a fact that it was a fight worth fighting.I stood up for my own head and so did my heartand we are coming to terms with ourselves.Shaking hands, saying ”let’s make this workfor we have places to goand people to seeand we will need each other”So I have hopein who I am becoming.It’s Julyand I have hope in who I am becoming.
Author: Charlotte Eriksson

Quote: Today you are no longer a victor nor victim of the past and future, today is completely independent, there are no restrictions; except for the ones you place upon yourself.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: What you don't deal with today, will live to deal with tomorrow.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: What you don't deal with today, will live to deal with you tomorrow.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: I am not doing anything special,Just struggling with my Present to make my Future enjoyable.
Author: Shashank Rayal

Quote: Reading is learning: Secure Future and earnings
Author: Syed Sohail Ahmed

Quote: The future is shaped by young people foolish enough to believe they can topple a mountain. And yet, when we stand among the rubble, we wonder why no one tried sooner.
Author: Mitch Rowland, Eternity's Redemption

Quote: Let us make sure that future generation writes our biography.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you honor the moments by not wasting them, the Time will honor you back by remembering you as the hero, for the rest of the time to come.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Future will always remember the heroes, its because of them there exist a future.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People are so busy polishing their past, that they forget to paint their future.
Author: Himanshu Vassanpal

Quote: We all have scars & deep pain. It'swhat makes us human & vulnerable.
Author: Anshuma Sharma

Quote: Everything we think we know, everything we think we see, everything we believe we feel, taste, smell, or hear, everything we “remember” (our pasts), everything we want to happen (our futures), everything that has ever existed or will ever exist, only exists right now. All of these things are nothing more than electric signals being passed through our brains and bodies, right now. It is all energy flowing through us right now. “The past” exists only in our minds. We are the ones who bring it into reality. We are the ones who bring it into the present. We are the ones who make it “real”.
Author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

Quote: TODAY is the PAST of your FUTURE. So, make TODAY count for the sake of your HISTORY. Use your words, time & choices wisely
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Every man is the craftsman of his future, whether he hone it himself or allow fate do it.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: Living in the past kills your future.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: There are two days in the year that you cannot do anything: YESTERDAY & TOMORROW: Only TODAY you can Be Happy, Smile, Dream, Love, Feel, & Be Thankful…
Author: Pablo

Quote: I’ve got a question for you… Are you the person who you thought you’d be by now? I know I am not. The fact is that life may not be what you thought it would be by now (If It is, I congratulate you & applaud you) You may feel stuck in a job you don’t like, not making enough money, jobless, or maybe you are in a bad relationship/marriage, or unhappy because you are out of shape…but don’t let that get you down.The key is 2 focus on what you have (Health,Fam,friends etc) instead of what you don’t have. And also in the things that you have done (Finished a Race-College/Got that Diploma/Raise a Family etc) Instead of the things you haven’t done. yetIF where you are now, it’s not where you want to be…know that where you’re going is far more important than where you are now or where you’ve been.Forgive yourself, Accept the current situation & MOVE ON, knowing that from now on you will focus your time & energy on the possibilities & opportunities that lie ahead 4 you in the near future.
Author: Pablo

Quote: I am about tribal feminine power. As a leader, I may stumble but my essence lives to the future-- of my people, of my literature, of my art. And when a tribesman turn against its leader, that tribe will become two. It may faulter my course, but it will not stifle my ending. I rule only among my believers.
Author: Kristie LeVangie

Quote: You can, and you will. If you’re going to carry any belief, carry one that empowers you. Believe in your unlimited potential.
Author: Akiroq Brost

Quote: There is diversity of belief but it is the same God at work.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The mighty miracles of the Lord are marvellous!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We are a blessing to each other.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: If we love God, we will love another. Love is God.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: When we dwell on the God’s promises; we find the faith, hope and courage to survive life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: All dreams are realities waiting for us to believe in them.
Author: Gillian Duce, Magic and Mayhem

Quote: The great GOD is a tower of refuge to the poor.The great GOD is a tower of refuge to the needy in distress.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Leaders think it’s possible. They inspire followers to believe in the same good news and it becomes a blessing to them. Leadership is all about inspiring people to believe in what becomes profitable to them!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Environment provides us with many cultures. From each we identify our beliefs that give us our values. From our values we pick up our choices and our choices bring out our character. Our characters make us to lead!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: We all have that divine moment, when our lives are transformed by the knowledge of the truth.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: If you want to be a successful writer you have to put your butt in the chair and your fingers on the keyboard and put words on the page. Even shitty words are better than no words. You can go back and fix them later.
Author: Liliana Hart, The Naked Truth About Self-Publishing

Quote: Understand that by giving something a name, you own it. I find that by naming it, you give yourself a sense of purpose. Like wanting to become a doctor or lawyer or writer for instance, don’t hide in the shadows and wait for it to happen, because the chances of it spontaneously happening are next to none, trust me. You actually have to put yourself out there and commit to it by giving it a name. And you achieve this by simply saying, I WILL become a ‘this’ or ‘that’ or whatever it is that you want. Because you see, if you own it, nothing anyone can say or do will be able to take it away from you; because YOU gave it a name and thus, it belongs to you.
Author: Charles Mackriel

Quote: When all help is stopped, when your loved ones started doubting your competence, when failure seems almost confirmed, but no matter what, if you make one more attempt, that final step will fetch you the victory.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: To give value to others, you have to begin by valuing yourself.
Author: Tim Fargo

Quote: To make 2013 (or any other)your year, keep it simple:1) Count your blessings first2) Whatever you did last year, Do it better3) Go step by step, One day at a time.4) Create/make your own opportunities.5) Believe in your abilities at all times,6) Qutting is not an option. Keep Going.7) Finish what you started
Author: Pablo

Quote: I will never see the day where I choose to fall upon my own sword of refuge. In knowing this, I also know that you will never ultimately defeat me; for my life is my own, and I will see to it accordingly.
Author: Danish Sayanee

Quote: In politics no permanent friends, no permanent enemies but permanent interest.
Author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

Quote: The sacred words penetrate the heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The thoughts on the mind come out of the mouth.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You are judge by your words
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: To often we speak just to hear the sound of our own voice, when we should speak only when the words are sweeter than silence.
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: Words alone can effect great good as well as evil. A few apt words have swept candidates into office, ended as well as started wars, paved the way for peace and carried with them both hope as well as despair. Words alone have ruined lives, but have also brought forth healing. It is well known the harm words can cause, but the good they can bring is equally impressive.
Author: Steve Goodier

Quote: A person’s words reflect the image of his character and the amount of truth and lies in it is always visible to the human heart than ordinary eyes.
Author: Testy McTesterson

Quote: If you are not good at speeches, be good at your actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: My words are not the inspiration, I am the inspiration.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You can lead and motivate people without a certificate or title, what you need to do is to tell people a compelling secret that was only known to you.
Author: Michael Bassey Johnson

Quote: Choose to live...then live through experiences!
Author: Sheila Tiller-Tooks

Quote: Life crumples me like paper,Tight, smashed, discarded. But crumpled paper soon unfolds, Opening slowly, sharing what was once hidden inside,Allowing my story to be revealed.
Author: Robert Clifton Storey Jr

Quote: You were never created to live depressed, defeated, guilty, condemned, ashamed or unworthy. We were created to be victorious.
Author: Joel Osteen

Quote: Don’t underestimate your tears. They have the power to strengthen your commitment to your life’s purpose and to direct you towards your goal. So, when you cry because of the people who mock or taunt you, be positive and make promises with yourself that you will prove them wrong.
Author: Saad  Salman

Quote: Magically, hopelessness gives rise to profound hope.
Author: Stefan Emunds

Quote: Being in home is like magic moments, in a magic world, among magicians.
Author: Durgesh Satpathy

Quote: God is a creation of human brain
Author: Durgesh Satpathy

Quote: It's amazing the things that the heart and mind can endure. No one ever told me that growing up, so I often spent my childhood thinking something was wrong with me.
Author: Yassin Hall, Journey Untold My Mother's Struggle with Mental Illnesses: Bipolar, paranoid schizophrenia, or other forms of mental illness is debilitating for everyone including the families left to try to cope

Quote: There are only two profound ways to reach enlightenment: Laugh by yourself, or get tickled.
Author: Saurabh Sharma

Quote: Always remember, child... that to think bad thoughts is really the easiest thing in the world. If you leave your mind to itself it will spiral you down into ever increasing unhappiness. To think good thoughts, however, requires effort. This is one onf the things that discipline - training - is about.
Author: James Clavell, Shōgun

Quote: Even the demons are encouraged when their chief is "not lost in loss itself.
Author: John Milton, Paradise Lost

Quote: There was, however, a difference between his mood and that of the rest of the cabinet. They felt desperate; he felt challenged.
Author: William Manchester, The Last Lion: Winston Spencer Churchill: Visions of Glory 1874-1932

Quote: She felt happy these days, yet there was always an undercurrent of sadness just below the surface
Author: Diane Chamberlain, The Lost Daughter

Quote: Like if Leonardo from the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles started being all bummed out about everything. How were we going to kick arse if our Leonardo was wearing a black eye-band instead of a blue one?
Author: Dougie Poynter, McFly: Unsaid Things... Our Story

Quote: Prayer is communication. You talk, God listens. You listen when God talks.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: Practice brings better results than prayer.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: May Saviour set us free from every evil spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: May the Lord heal every sick soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: O Lord, I commit my plans into thy mighty hands, guide me along straight path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: I carry my burdens to the Lord. He lightens my shoulders.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: In times of trouble, may the Lord keep you safe.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: O Lord saves us from overworking! Grant us grace to rest awhile.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Grace is God-divine favour.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: God’s presence is the gift of prayer.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Pray to God, pretending as God is only yours.
Author: Saad Salman

Quote: Hearing God’s voice is indispensable to moving through or around closed doors.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Father, help me focus on my strengths and trust others to fill the gaps of my weaknesses”Every leader knows the skills in which they excel. They also are aware of those tasks that they maintain a certain level of competence along with those duties they struggle in accomplishing. In my experience there are "want to’s" and the "have to’s" of leadership. The "want to’s" energize a leader and the "have to’s" zap the leader’s creativity and time. The quicker a leader can find those around them that will fill the gaps of their weaknesses, the more effective they will be in achieving God’s mission.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Next Steps For Leading a Missional Church

Quote: Leader discover themselves through a continuous fellowship and relationship with their sources of their life and wisdom. Self-discovery is the key to true leadership!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Starting the morning without prayer is like starting a car without gas.
Author: Todd Stocker, Dancing with God: First Year Thoughts on the Loss of My Daughter

Quote: Praying always means praying through things and not giving up. It means being ever-watchful and persevering in prayer in order to see breakthrough.God wants us to be persistent in our praying. Don’t forget to spend some quiet time praying to your Heavenly Father today.
Author: Stormie Omartian, Prayer Warrior: The Power of Praying Your Way to Victory

Quote: Taking actions will fulfill your dreams and wishes, not the prayers and blessings.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: But being overborne with numbers, and nobody daring to face about, stretching out his hands to heaven, [Romulus] prayed to Jupiter to stop the army, and not to neglect but maintain the Roman cause, now in extreme danger. The prayer was no sooner made, than shame and respect for their king checked many; the fears of the fugitives changed suddenly into confidence.
Author: Plutarch, Plutarch's Lives, Vol 1

Quote: My best trip is yet to come.
Author: Tushar Saxena

Quote: Tomorrow is not a day. It's an attitude. It's a symbol of the human spirit's desire to keep getting better. It's that curious mind that asks 'what's next'?Tomorrow is not ushered in by the cock's crow. Tomorrow dawns when today is better than yesterday...when we create something new.
Author: Sola Kosoko

Quote: Great struggles make for great stories.
Author: Sanober  Khan

Quote: While you’re hating your life just because you can’t get what you want, someone is praying to have a life like yours..!!
Author: Aagam Shah

Quote: Any situation is new adventure. Tighten your seat belt and enjoy the ride of life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The opinions of souls are their state of being.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: When someone hurts you over and over, ask yourself, WHY DO YOU LET THEM?
Author: Karen  Gibbs

Quote: Life is a sacred journey.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You can find three species at any defind area.... Stray animals, pet animals and SOCIAL animals... I wonder where HUMANS are..!!!
Author: Mayank  Sharma, A Cocktail of Love

Quote: Error is human,perfection is divine!You are not God! Your mistake is normal.So forgive yourself.
Author: Paul Gitwaza

Quote: Life is hope.Hope is faith.Faith is believe.Believe is possibilities.Possibility is miraculous.Miraculous is divine.Divine is supernatural.Supernatural is spiritual.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Recipe for friendship:2 cups of TRUST, 1 dash of CARING, 2 cups of UNDERSTANDING, 2 spoonfuls of SHARED SECRETS, 1 cup of MUTUAL AFFECTION, 1 spoonful of CRAZY, and a whole bag of FUN
Author: Karen  Gibbs, A Gallery of Scrapbook Creations

Quote: Life is BETTER when you're SMILING!
Author: Karen  Gibbs, A Gallery of Scrapbook Creations

Quote: We Are All Capable of Great Things
Author: Angie-Marie Delsante, Holistic Life Journey: Break Free From Your Cocoon & Reach Your True Potential

Quote: Life is full of uncertainties. Ye must grasp the moment.
Author: Various

Quote: I have absolutely no regrets in life except regrets for the things I didn’t do when I had the chance ~ Donald Pillai
Author: Donald Pillai

Quote: A picture should capture a moment, a place in time you can return to again and again.
Author: Brendan T. Kelly, Beyond the Image: A Collection of Visual Tales

Quote: Don’t be depressed if you feel like a victim of abuse. It is because the abuser knows that your action can get you out of that situation and without depending on anything, live a life within your expectation and beyond.
Author: Denny A

Quote: A problem isn't a real problem till you decide to make it a problem... so what's the problem again?
Author: Runa Magnus

Quote: Learn the rules. And play by the rules.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Passion for books is the desire to read.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Failure is a natural part of learning and developing, and it teaches us to be resolute and steadfast in our endeavors.
Author: Henry Kimsey-House, Co-Active Leadership: Five Ways to Lead

Quote: The greatest fulfillment, personal development.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: While there may be various tips, pointers, ingredients, and strategies to success, there is no one formula that always guarantees it other than to keep learning from failure itself.
Author: Criss Jami, Healology

Quote: Come to the edge, He said.They said: We are afraid.Come to the edge, He said.They came. He pushed them,And they flew . . ."— Guillaume ApollinairetFrench poet
Author: Guillaume Apollinaire, Poesie

Quote: Leaders are passionate learners. Leaders are always seeking ways to improve themselves by sharpening their skills. They fully embrace the fact that growing leaders lead growing organizations.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Spiritual Conversations: Creating and Sustaining Them Without Being a Jerk

Quote: Raise, Awake and take stand. Draw the path for others. Be a Leader.
Author: Vivek Modi

Quote: Curiosity is always good if it is aimed at learning.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: A person's integrity develops early in life. Once formed, it is difficult to alter, change, or improve.
Author: Scott K. Edinger, The Hidden Leader: Discover and Develop Greatness Within Your Company

Quote: Walking the walk is one thing, but it is so much more powerful if you can talk it as well.
Author: Robin Hoyle

Quote: Of course we'll win. And even if we were to lose, we'd win at losing.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: You learn from mistakes so the best leaders are constantly making new mistakes on their success journey.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: There is enough mystery in human nature to keep the world stuck in a perpetual state of righteous speculation. Only the wise and compassionate will rise above it, with enough vision to see that inconsistency is a normal occurrence, during the spiritual battle of forgiveness and justice.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: To inspire others, you must first inspire yourself. Only true passion can awake passion in others
Author: Daniel Delgado F.

Quote: You don't know what you don't know
Author: John  Stein, Building the Pyramid

Quote: The truth to succeeding at leadership is recognizing that it’s a never-ending journey of discovery and learning.
Author: Tanveer Naseer

Quote: Cutting my roots and leaving my home and family when I was 18 years old forced me to build my home in other things, like my music, stories and my journey. The last years I have more or less constantly been on my way, on the road, always leaving and never arriving, which also means leaving people. I’ve loved and lost and I have regrets and I miss and no matter how many times you leave, start over, achieve success or travel places it’s other people that matter. People, friends, family, lovers, strangers – they will forever stay with you, even if only through memory. I’ve grown to appreciate people to the deepest core and I’m trying to learn how to tell people what I want to tell them when I have the chance, before it’s too late. …
Author: Charlotte Eriksson

Quote: ... because one day, maybe one day, if I learned how to write clear enough, sing loud enough, be strong enough, I could explain myself in a way that made sense and then maybe one day, one day, someone out there would hear and recognise her or himself and I could let them know that they are not alone. Just like that song I had on repeat for several nights as I walked lonely on empty streets, let me know that I was notaloneand that’s how it starts.
Author: Charlotte Eriksson

Quote: In a human development sense, our understanding of leadership has essentially “grown up” and moved past personal ego and a self-centered view of things.
Author: Linda Fisher Thornton

Quote: Your vehicle of leadership is fueled by your willingness to learn. You can't lead if you can't learn!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Even if you have achieved everything, there is Perfection, still left to be achieved.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You can find humor in everything. everything.
Author: Krishna Sagar

Quote: If people are not making mistakes, they are not trying new things. If they are making the same mistake twice, they are not learning new things!
Author: Walter C. Wright, Relational Leadership: A Biblical Model for Leadership Service

Quote: May the sacred light shine on your path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: There's a light, a light of hope, to break, destroy, recreat, unite and reform grounds of a future, our sustenance. And until that light shines so bright, we the people, our generation will forever March on to failure, otherwise eternal victory is assured!!!!!!!!
Author: Samuel Gyekye Mensah

Quote: Light shines but why do many souls desire to stay in darkness?.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you follow the light of the world, you will never walk in darkness.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The light extinguishes all the flaming arrows of darkness.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The light shines brighter on our path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Shine brightly thy inner light.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Love radiates the full beam of light.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: The more you live in the light, the more you will flourish.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Only one spirit, either good or bad, can operate at a time.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Deep darkness precedes the dawn of brightness light.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Love is divine. Love is light.Love is life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Darkness is perhaps the only reality, the only truth, both of which have only one property; they are eternal. What we call light is a mere temporary absence of darkness, untruth, a mere temporary absence of truth. Vedas point to this absence by neti, neti; not this, not this. Both, darkness and truth overcome light and untruth and start becoming manifest, sooner or later, mostly sooner than later, once we believe and strive to experience. Sages, down the ages, have emphasised the learning path to The Truth; prevent light from entering your eyes by shutting them or sitting in a darker area, to make it easier. And a last word; there is no perfect darkness and no perfect truth. These, just two names for the same absence, are goals to which we may get ever closer, without reaching. And priests and scriptures make God so complicated!
Author: R. N. Prasher

Quote: Sometimes, there is a lot of darkness in this world. As I see it, you have two choices. You can be a part of that darkness or you can be the light. Be the light.
Author: Tom Giaquinto

Quote: Letting go of the security of what is commonly understood requires a big leap of faith and a willingness to fall.
Author: Henry Kimsey-House, Co-Active Leadership: Five Ways to Lead

Quote: Some of us don’t trust others unless there’s a reason to trust them.I prefer to trust others until they give me a reason not to.
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: A true leader doesn't lead it's pack but gets followed by those who respect.
Author: Noa.C.Kings

Quote: Humble leaders trust more easily because they realize that the world does not rest solely on their shoulders.
Author: -Shandel Slaten

Quote: Get to the next level by learning the art of investing in people.
Author: -Shandel Slaten

Quote: Trust is a two way street.
Author: Krishna Sagar

Quote: Great leaders build trust from their team because the leader is willing to put his/her people “first.” Once the team believes that, they will put their leader, and the company, first as well.
Author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

Quote: For me, doing the actual work to fulfill the vision is the easy part. It's the emotional journey that I go through as I am free falling into the unknown that is the hard part. But each time I jump, I'm learning to trust that God will continue to guide me and help me to land safely.
Author: Yvonne Pierre, The Day My Soul Cried:  A Memoir

Quote: I saw the figure of 178 Billion wasted/stolen from the people of a country by its corrupt and inept government. Such a figure could truly transform the entire country; education, health, roads, schooling, entrepreneurial environment... of millions of people, rather than be secreted away as a few more 0000's in global bank accounts for the greeders.We need to Rethink Public Service, Values, Ethics and Leadership.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Great leaders are most wanted. They are most wanted for what they do with their gifts and talents. Their dreams are so unique in such a way that their presence becomes a source of hope and courage for others to thread on along. Why won't they look for them?
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Integrity is the soul of leadership! Trust is the engine of leadership!
Author: Amine A. Ayad

Quote: Presidents don't make new friends. That's why they've got to keep their old ones." Adm. Fitzwallace
Author: Aaron Sorkin, The West Wing Script Book

Quote: Trust. And be trusted.
Author: Richie Norton, The Power of Starting Something Stupid: How to Crush Fear, Make Dreams Happen, and Live without Regret

Quote: We develop trust when we show that we are reliable, by doing what we say we are going to do to take care of that treasure, and then stepping it up by doing more, by anticipating problems and handling them before they even happen.
Author: Michele Jennae, The Connectworker

Quote: The first job of a leader—at work or at home—is to inspire trust. It’s to bring out the best in people by entrusting them with meaningful stewardships, and to create an environment in which high-trust interaction inspires creativity and possibility.
Author: Stephen M.R. Covey, The Speed of Trust: The One Thing that Changes Everything

Quote: God desires your increase in your leadership, stewardship, relationship, and business
Author: Sunday Adelaja

Quote: I always have my own opinion before my boss says his.
Author: Gerry Geek

Quote: Even though men and women are different in our thinking, we all share the need and desire for compassion, compliments, and companionship.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Before someone will get the guts to monitor your life, he must get the keyboard of humility. To be a humble person, is a priority in leadership!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: The major factor that makes a great leader to fail emerge from the decision of people who surround him/her.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: The 10 ever greatest misplacements in life:1. Leadership without character.2. Followership without servant-being.3. Brotherhood without integrity.4. Affluence without wisdom.5. Authority without conscience.6. Relationship without faithfullness.7. Festivals without peace.8. Repeated failure without change.9. Good wealth without good health.10. Love without a lover.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: You are created with a mandate! You have all you need to fulfill it.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Legacy: Supreme leaders determine where generations are going and develop outstanding leaders they pass the baton to.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Effectual Change: Good leaders value change, they accomplish a desired change that gets the organization and society better.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Reproduction: Distinguished leaders impress, inspire and invest in other leaders.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Influence: It takes an influential leader to excellently raise up leaders of influence.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Successful Results: Renowned leaders strive for victory and outdo their previous successes, they do what it takes to recognize an opportunity and pounce on it rightly to achieve great results.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Development: Surpassing leaders progress advancely from a lower to a higher state of leadership through leading other leaders the right way.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Advancement: Notable leaders chart the course of action that causes other leaders to progress toward reaching a goal and raising the status of power.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Prosperity: Great leaders teach other leaders the infinite intelligence that enables them to have plenty of all things and live the good life.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Anyaele Sam Chiyson Leadership Law of Responsibility: Great leaders greet their geniuses through their greatest power of choice, principle-based living and highest means of expressing their voice.
Author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson, The Sagacity of Sage

Quote: Accept responsibilities for all your actions. Learn from your past and your mistakes.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Desire to give and not always receive.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Drown those degrading thoughts.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Desire to impact lives! Change destinies and make dreams come true.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Build up your faith while starving the fears.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Avoid conflicts, Embrace cordiality.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Ride higher in life unto the higher life.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: The giver is the blessed! The receiver stands still.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Don`t turn around in circles for making circles do not equate making progress.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Light is life and always wins.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Choices, options, decisions abound. Choose right, take the best option and decide well.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Sow the right words! Think the good thought.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Life is beautiful if you take the best option.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Move forward for forward is progress but circles are movement.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Forget yesterday, Act on Today and Get a hold on tomorrow.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: It turns out horrendous when you choose the wrong options.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: You have been called to a life of blessing, don`t descend to that of curses.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Have the best course for all your actions.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Sow good seeds for a good yield.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: There is seed time and harvest, choose to sow at the right time so as to have a bountiful harvest.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Always contend for the good!
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Shine forth your light before all beings.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Shout out for Joy! Don`t scream out in fear for victors shout and victims scream.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Decide to be rich! Hate poverty strong.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Stand out tall amidst challenges! Dwarf all irrelevant voices.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Shun darkness and evil vices for they that embrace them wear off with time!
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Don`t descend to the lowest ebb.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Eschew evil and it`s machinations.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Relish what is good and expedient.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: In your emotions: exercise Joy over sadness.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Be positive at all times! Leave out the negatives.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Options abound world over, Options to choose from and be the best.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: God takes us through life`s journey. Always nudging our Spirits to go for plus and shun the minus.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: There is a ladder to Success! Choose to climb it.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: A confident woman knows her worth and so doesn’t fret when her man is highly placed or is often found amidst other women in the course of his business or assignment.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: A woman that is patient has the ability to endure provocation, pain, annoyance etc, with much calm and strength.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: A responsible woman is one who sees opportunities of service and responds to them quickly. In her dwells the ability to see and respond to opportunities.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: A responsible woman sees and accepts only the best in a given situation.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Ladies, get confident about yourselves, build up your self-worth and esteem, love yourself and be proud of your achievements and your man will adore you for life.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

Quote: Courage is the ability to execute tasks and assignments without fear or intimidation.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: A woman can tolerate delays knowing they are not denials; she is diligent, and composed. She is not easily irritated like love; she endures all things, beans all things and can be stretched to any limit.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Maturity of a woman is not in her age or size for age is just a number and size is figure.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: A matured woman is therefore a responsible woman irrespective of her age, status and qualification.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Confidence thrills men for it means you won’t be fidgety or excessively jealous when the man is in the midst of people especially those of opposite sex.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: A responsible woman doesn’t see opportunities and needs and look the other way pretending not to see them rather she gets to work to ensure things are done properly and her man succeeds in his endeavours.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: A responsible woman guides, controls (albeit subtly), directs with superior knowledge that is higher than that of her contemporaries!
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Ladies, get confident bout yourselves, build up your self-worth and esteem, love yourself and be proud of your achievements and your man will adore you for life.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Don't just float through life; don't just agree to anything and everything, have a course you are known for at all times.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: You can change any status quo, stand out, walk by faith and not by sight and things will definitely go well with you.
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: remember when God has answered you, it no longer matters who has been against you but for Him to answer you and change your story, you have to make up your mind to disobey the wrong order, change the status quo and BE DIFFERENT!
Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: Cultivating spiritual intimacy is essential for leaders to live a vibrant missional life.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Next Steps For Leading a Missional Church

Quote: ...keep your eye on the shore and know that you are a little closer to it today than you were yesterday. Just know that this too shall pass and one way or another, you will move on from this place. It is inevitable.
Author: Liberty Forrest, Soul Food: 101 Inspirational Messages to Nourish and Heal Your Spirit

Quote: Love yourself.Love who you are.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The moment you start to resent a person,you become his or her slave.He controls your dreams, absorbs your thoughts,robs you of your peace of mind,and takes away the pleasure of your life.You can never have efficiency or happiness.He influences even the tone of your voice.So, if you want to be a slave, harbor your resentments.and don't want to Forgive and have Peace of Mind.The choice is yours !
Author: Sham Hinduja

Quote: Unforgiveness is so much stress, I tell you. You just keep going round in circles instead of taking a straight path which forgiveness offers.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: Do hugs, not drugs. Spread love, not legs. Respect, don't judge. Listen more, talk less. Understand, don't assume. Forgive and forget..!!
Author: Aagam Shah

Quote: Without forgiveness, there is no healing.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You fall flat on your face, and it's not the first time you've done it, Never let your past press you down.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Yesterday is done. Today has just begun. I am not going let anyone's negative issues do anything to me other than inspire me to do better.
Author: Gillian Duce

Quote: Almost alone among successful politicians, he took slights personally.
Author: Rick Perlstein, Before the Storm: Barry Goldwater and the Unmaking of the American Consensus

Quote: Forgiveness and restoration are two difference acts. Forgiveness can lead to restoration but restoration is not hinged to forgiveness.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Forgiveness means that you are willing to give someone else a second chance to breathe in new life in his body. That is one of the greatest attribution of a Leader.
Author: Indy Bissessur

Quote: Deny yourself nothing in life.
Author: Jennifer Pierre, Traveling Souls

Quote: I think forgiveness is a missing key to corporate success.
Author: -Shandel Slaten

Quote: Forgiveness is not about letting anybody 'off the hook.' Forgiveness actually has nothing to do with the person you are forgiving. It does, however, have everything to do with you.
Author: Mario J. Rocchetta, Make It Happen

Quote: Sin builds up. Forgiveness cleans up.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: People are already disappointed by their acquaintances, they can not handle anymore hate from stranger, so show some instantaneous kindness and forgiveness to them.
