Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: We may not have the power to move mountains, but if we have the power to take someone's hand and named them loved and forgiven we have power enough.
Author: Dianne Astle

Quote: Lay down an unforgiving spirit, because there'll be no peace until you do.
Author: Anita R. Sneed-Carter

Quote: The only person you should ever fear losing in a relationship is you yourself.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: It was a tragic end to a heroic life.
Author: Chris Kyle

Quote: With the ambitions, to seize the opportunity to win is your big loss.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: The fearful have lost faith while the fearless allow faith to lead the way.
Author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

Quote: To better handle grief, become the passenger, not the driver.
Author: Todd Stocker, REFINED: Turning Pain into Purpose

Quote: I work so hard for profits because my dreams are expensive.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Listen with your heart, not your brain. the heart only knows TRUTH!
Author: Sherri Bridges Fox, I Will See You Again: A Mother's Story and Sacred Journey After Finding Her Son's Lifeless Body

Quote: There is nothing to lose in this life. The only loss is death.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Always have a 'Plan C
Author: Zoltan Andrejkovics, The Invisible Game: The Mindset of a Winning Team

Quote: Explore new sacred land.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Trying is better option than giving up..
Author: Sher E Yazdan

Quote: We all have faced fearful times.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: In every aspect of your life, try to balance the imbalances to make your life more happier and try to imbalance the balanced ones to make your life full of adventures !
Author: Bhavesh Gandhi

Quote: Start from where you are. Empower yourself. Adjust habits. Triumph over those habits -- this is how we EAT folks! This is how it's done!
Author: Nancy S. Mure, EAT! Empower, Adjust, Triumph!: Lose Ridiculous Weight, Succeed On Any Diet Plan, Bust Through Any Plateau in 3 Empowering Steps!

Quote: There is good in every year.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Every New Year brings its sacred blessings.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Since we have to make choices in life, why not choose the good ones?
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Life is beautiful dream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You must make time daily to care for your mental, physical, spiritual and emotional health.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: We write from soul of the heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Relax and Recreate yourself!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The future will be better tomorrow.
Author: Dan C. Quayle

Quote: Great deeds, great blessings.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: To wake up each morning is a blessed gift.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Life is the greatest grace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: You are special creation.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You ought to move onwards!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Womanhood is a flourishing flower.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: We can achieve our goals either by human effort or by the power of God. The dependence on God’s power is the best choice.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Dreaming big is very easy, but the anticipation one feels when the dream is almost fulfilled, is unsettling. It is like starving for the cake which you can see on the table, but an unknown fear makes you feel sick and prevents you from taking it
Author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

Quote: No one should be forced to be something they aren't.
Author: Sara Raasch, Ice Like Fire

Quote: There is always a next time
Author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

Quote: He who want to be served must first know how to serve.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: A strong positive mind is an unbreakable shield against all negative forces and experiences. It never bargains for anything that goes against its true destiny in life. It sees life as an inevitable journey of happiness and success in abundance. Therefore, you should make it your daily ritual to introduce your subconscious mind to some deep inspirational and motivational quotes and sayings from great inspiring and uplifting deep self-help authors. Positive words and beliefs are the core foundation of a positive life.
If you thinks right the right things, then the right thinks will make the things right.
Author: Sandip Thapa

Quote: If you find a community with less production and less inspiring inventions, then know it is a sign of lack of Business Leaders and full of General Managers do not know what they can manage or what they are managing.
Author: Sameh Elsayed

Quote: The final test of a leader is that he leaves behind him in other men the conviction and will to carry on." Walter Lippmann.
Author: Ignatius  Fernandez

Quote: Challenges lead to Growth,Grow matures ones daily living,Living a good life expedites....Wisdom
Author: Vernetta Norman

Quote: Dare to DreamYes, if you can dare to dream.Surely you can catch the sunlight's beam.While all else seems to fail.Truth shall forever prevail.(Copyright excerpts from the poem and published poetry book 'From the Silence Within
Author: Madhavi Sood

Quote: Take too much time, and time will take you.
Author: Lisa Kleypas, Love in the Afternoon

Quote: Leadership is an art expressed by the demonstration of characters worthy of immitation, emulation and inspiration. It is neither a title nor a postion.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Leadership potential is in everyone; we all have it, but we all don't know it until we have a direct individual encounter with the Holy Spirit of God. The principal source of leadership influence is the Holy Spirit.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: A mere motivator sees potentials in people and tells them to take actions. A true leader sees the same potentials in the same people and influences them to optimize them under his God-lead inspirations.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: It is not about whether you call yourself a leader or not. It is about what you have to show to people as a leader. Leadership is contagious, you carry it and share it.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: You will never be satisfied with anything less than the highest you can attain.
Author: Apoorve Dubey, stupid and rubbish

Quote: The real power of effective leadership is maximizing other people’s potential which inevitably demands also ensuring that they get the credit. When our ego won’t let us build another person up, when everything has to build us up, then the effectiveness of the organization reverts to depending instead on how good we are in the technical aspects of what we do. And we have stopped leading and inspiring others to great heights.
Author: John Dickson, Humilitas: A Lost Key to Life, Love, and Leadership

Quote: We're all made the same but then born to change. Which then don't make us the same.
Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett, Neglected But Undefeated: The Life Of A Boy Who Never Knew A Mother's Love

Quote: Mourn with those who are sorrowful.Be happy with those who are joyful.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: I gave her love she gave me words to write
Author: RazaZaidi

Quote: My chest tightens: seeing him so upset breaks my own heart. 'Don't you ever wish you could make that bit go away?" I say, feeling angry at the past. 'That you could erase those painful memories, forget they every happened, just remember the happy times you had together?''You must never say that,' he reprimands sternly.'But why not?' I look at him in surprise.'Because it's the bad memories that makes you appreciate the good ones. Don't ever wish them away. it's like your nan always used to say, "You need both the sun and the rain to make a rainbow".
Author: Alexandra Potter, Don't You Forget About Me

Quote: The more you learn the biology behind your every action, emotion and behavior, the better you become at accepting others the way they are.
Author: Abhijit Naskar

Quote: The longer the waiting, the longer the wondering.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: njoy the ride of life. It is irreplaceable.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The inner peace can block any windy weather.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Kids want to be grown ups, adults want to be young and careless again.Single people desperately want a relationship, but those who are in one still complain almost all the time and wish for freedom.The poor want money, the rich want more of it.This means that changing your situation doesn’t prevent you from suffering, doesn’t make your desires go away.So you need to change something on the inside.
Author: Lidiya K., This Moment

Quote: Every morning is a fresh breath and blessings.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Similar to theory of relativity, view towards life changes with passage of time!
Author: Malik Pommy

Quote: Make every day count, because you're never promised a next day.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Don't be afraid to go after what you want to do and what you want to be, and don't be afraid to pay the price to get it.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Education is acquisition of intellectual knowledge to be what we ought to be.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: May we recognise the uniqueness of every individual and seek to complement each other.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Motivation always sparks a fire within us.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: It's great if you can help others, but seriously ... don't lose YOURSELF in the process!
Author: Karen  Gibbs, A Gallery of Scrapbook Creations

Quote: We've all felt the pain inflicted by hurtful people...Just remember it's NOT your problem so don't waste any energy stressing about it. It doesn't necessarily follow that because you are kind, others will be kind to you. Just keep moving forward and be the best you can be because the greatest impact and growth will occur wherever your FOCUS is
Author: Karen  Gibbs, A Gallery of Scrapbook Creations

Quote: Living well is dying well.
Author: Fakeer Ishavardas

Quote: Do what you love and love what you do, with excellence.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: You are worthy of your wildest dreams.
Author: Nicole Guillaume

Quote: We write to embrace the sacred thoughts.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: He had always had a gift for conjuring images in his mind's eye. It was one of the secrets of his military success.
Author: H.W. Brands, The Man Who Saved the Union: Ulysses Grant in War and Peace

Quote: He's got to have the ability, and it seems to be fairly rare, to see things as they are and at the same time as they might have been. What we mean is the eye of an artist.
Author: Jack Finney, Time and Again

Quote: The daring leader helps the people see a future state, greater than their own imagination, and worthy of pursuit.
Author: Cheryl A. Bachelder, Dare to Serve: How to Drive Superior Results by Serving Others

Quote: Because “we human beings are imaginative by nature, we cannot choose to live by the routine of the ant-heap. If deprived of the imagery of virtue” — imaginative depictions of the truly good life — “we will seek out the imagery of vice.
Author: Russell Kirk, The Conservative Mind: From Burke to Eliot

Quote: Radio was theater of the mind.
Author: Ronald Reagan

Quote: Imagine our imaginations were limited only to the limitless. Still, it wouldn't matter without a motivation to move.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: The only seed that needs regular watering is our imagination.
Author: Diriye Osman, Fairytales for Lost Children

Quote: Whatever thing the mind can imagine, the eyes can see, the hands will soon handle.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: Every friend we have represents a new world, a world that may not have existed had they not come into our life.
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: Always dare to be in the company of those stronger than you. Sooner or later, you will be stronger than those who were once stronger than you, but unfortunately, they joined the company of those who are weaker than them!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The survival rate of your passion depends on the kind of person that leads you!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Friends are won through personal contact, but admirers are won through their contact with our works
Author: Agona Apell, The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock

Quote: There are no self made heroes or leaders. No matter how rugged or self assured, everyone requires a cast of players - friends, mentors, lovers, critics, villains and supporters - who call, invite, seduce, goad and encourage them to finally step into their true power. We are all heroes and leaders in some way, and we all need each other.
Author: Jacob Nordby

Quote: There's some things in life that matter more that others but just remember that when ever you lose someone its the small things your gonna miss. Some things some people do might be annoying but if you ever lose them as a friend those annoying little things where the little things that made there company lovely. Never forget.
Author: Cheyanne Doiron

Quote: I am not stopping till my enemies become my friends.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: For my success I am immensely grateful to God, my parents, my family, my friends, my teachers and to the books I read.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Don't compete with your friends to win a date with few beautiful girls, but compete to win few beautiful goals.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I am not stopping till my critics become my fans.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Heroes don't have friends, they have fans.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: By exchanging quality time for 'turn-up' times, what many of today's wayward youngsters have become - men and women of the village have failed them.
Author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

Quote: They say “as brave as lion”, they say “as clever as fox”, they say “ as friendly as dog” but nobody says “as something good as man”.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Banning the word bossy doesn’t promote anything, especially leadership. In fact, it would actually show that being bossy works. We don’t need to ban the word bossy, we need to get rid of bossiness. The best way to do that? Be a real leader. How poetic.
Author: Darrell Cheney

Quote: As far as I can tell, kids are called bossy when they behave in a dictatorial and domineering fashion. They’re called bossy when they try to order people around and refuse to listen to authority figures. Here’s a suggestion: instead of telling us not to refer to them as bossy, why don’t we teach them not to be bossy? We concentrate so much on eradicating negative words while forgetting to address the behavior that the words describe.
Author: Matt Walsh

Quote: Bossy means “given to ordering people around, highhanded, domineering, overly authoritative, dictatorial, abrasive.” ...Could it be that girls are called bossy when they’re… well, bossy? Could it be that boys are also called bossy for the same reason?
Author: Matt Walsh

Quote: The only reason nice guys finish last is because they think they’ll finish last. You don’t win the race by walking around the starting line saying ‘I’m not going to win this race’.
Author: Mitch Rowland, Eternity's Reach

Quote: Goals doesn't leave you like men, goals wait, they wait for their achievers.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: His emotions are not for men, they are for his vision.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: No man is ordinary, only their performances are ordinary.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: In the men I love heroes, in the work I love heroism
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The beauty of obedience is that what God expects you to do, He also enables you to do.
Author: Jim George, One-Minute Insights for Men

Quote: Behind every great man is a man greater, his father.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Commitment shows up before results do!
Author: John Di Lemme

Quote: If you stop fighting for what you want, what you don't want will automatically take over
Author: Gordon Attard

Quote: Don't look for the next opportunity. The one you have in hand is the opportunity.
Author: Paul Arden, It's Not How Good You Are, It's How Good You Want To Be

Quote: If we ask the right questions, we can change the world with the right answers.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: I would give up, but that will teach my kids that it's okay to be a failure and I refuse to ruin their lives like that!
Author: Mignon' Talise Padilla

Quote: There are no keys to success - only tools.
Author: Criss Jami, Healology

Quote: We must practice consistent, reliable, predictable, effective, thoughtful, compassionate and even courteous communication every single day to successfully sustain, develop and grow our business.
Author: Kip Tindell

Quote: Sometimes, as in a game of chess, we must strategically regress so that we might progress toward our ultimate objective.
Author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading 2

Quote: Every true leader is in the business of God. The good news is that God’s business does not yield loses. Most leaders fail because they claim to be in a business whose owner they never know!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Every morning I look in the mirror and remind myself: "No one owes you sh*t!" In this way, I am never disappointed. Never placing blame.
Author: Brandi L. Bates

Quote: You remain a follower for life when you pay for what people do while nobody pays you for what you do. Do something impressive and become a leader!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Practice holding labels lightly as leaders so you have greater range in your behaviors and are more adaptable and effective in a greater range of situations.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: Intentions do not insulate us from the consequences of our actions.
Author: Jon D Harrison

Quote: Meet your people where they are. They may not be as good as they can be, but they are as good as they believe they can be. They are waiting for you to lead them.
Author: Susan C. Foster, It's Not Rocket Science: Leading, Motivating and Inspiring Your Team To Be Their Best

Quote: Because discipline is misunderstood or not as valued as it has been, the United States—and some might argue the world—is experiencing a cultural leadership crisis.
Author: John    Manning, The Disciplined Leader: Keeping the Focus on What Really Matters

Quote: I believe a leader is inspired by his/her team to lead them.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Scout out competitors’ websites. Everything your competitors think is important or relevant usually exists on their website.
Author: John    Manning, The Disciplined Leader: Keeping the Focus on What Really Matters

Quote: If you don't get any motivation from your team, there is nothing wrong with those you lead but your form of leadership.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: If the people in an organization think the company is small, they will act that way. If they think the company is big, they will act that way.
Author: David J. Greer, Wind In Your Sails

Quote: Your personal growth, how you show up, and the ways you lead ultimately determine the success of your business and your life.
Author: David J. Greer, Wind In Your Sails

Quote: Have the courage to walk away from a fantastic deal, if the person on the other side is disprepectful or trying to pull a smart one on you.' Temptation should never rule a deal, the value should, fairplay should and acceptance on either side that the deal is being made for the value being created for both!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: Don’t buy into the campaign that people don’t like change. We are built for it.
Author: Stacy Feiner, Talent Mindset

Quote: When success is your only option, positivity has to be your only choice.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Business is boss, politics is servant.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If the reason of your sleeplessness is competition, then you will make a successful businessman.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If leadership is the way forward, vision is its walking stick.
Author: Nkem Paul

Quote: Do not compromise on the quality and your customers will not negotiate on the price.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Entrepreneur, if you're going to start up, make sure you start up with excellence in mind
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: To be an ethical leader is indeed to be different. This kind of leader acknowledges the complexity of running a responsible business, yet tries to do it anyway.
Author: Andrew Leigh, Ethical Leadership: Creating and Sustaining an Ethical Business Culture

Quote: Reputation is an outcome; but it is also a valuable, strategic asset.
Author: Andrew Griffin, Crisis, Issues and Reputation Management: A Handbook for PR and Communications Professionals

Quote: Inspiring leadership communication is not about great oratory or great charisma; rather it is about getting others to believe in themselves and believe in your cause, and then achieve more than they thought was possible.
Author: Kevin Murray

Quote: If you're not called crazy when you launch something new, it means you're not thinking BIG enough.
Author: Linda Rottenberg, Crazy Is a Compliment: The Power of Zigging When Everyone Else Zags

Quote: For individuals and organizations alike, a reputation is far easier to destroy than it is to build.
Author: Andrew Griffin, Crisis, Issues and Reputation Management: A Handbook for PR and Communications Professionals

Quote: The house you built can cave you in if you didn't do it right.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: During rough time in a Business, a Leader should act like a ship captain. His first and foremost priority should be to put his employees to security before thinking of his own welfare.
Author: Indy Bissessur

Quote: Leadership is an unlimited resource and as such, is a lifelong pursuit of learning. That learning must be to transform 'leader of position' to 'leadership with moral purpose'.
Author: Hilarie Owen

Quote: Manager! Have brain - use it!
Author: Gerry Geek

Quote: Any idiot can point out a problem. So, bosses do.
Author: Gerry Geek

Quote: It doesn't matter what your boss thinks as long as he doesn't cry.
Author: Gerry Geek

Quote: Have an attitude of positive expectation.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: 1164At the end of the day, we all live in this world together and to practice bringing peace onto social media is a huge step into bringing peace into our world.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: At the end of the day, we all live in this world together and to practice bringing peace onto Twitter is a huge step into bringing peace into our world.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: At the end of the day, we all live in this world together and to practice bringing peace onto social media is a huge step into bringing peace into our world.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: I can’t control who follows me, but I can control who I follow.[Social Media]
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Your Twitter Profile is your business card.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Twitter is not just for Journalists. You don’t have to be a writer to Tweet.[Social Media]
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Points of views that are expressed on Twitter don’t intend to offend, but rather defend and open the conversation up to everyone so that no one has to pretend.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: In a sense, discouragement does not have to exist. Allow it to be rather the encouragement to honestly reconsider all the options, then, as necessary, shine on.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: No matter what the odds say, be even with who you truly are.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Being a solution and not a problem proves progression.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Shape your mindsets or your mindsets will shape you.
Author: Mindy   Hall, Leading with Intention: Every Moment Is a Choice

Quote: The number one way culture is shaped is by what leaders model.
Author: Mindy   Hall, Leading with Intention: Every Moment Is a Choice

Quote: The problem with your company is not the economy, it is not the lack of opportunity, it is not your team. The problem is you. That is the bad news. The good news is, if you're the problem, you're also the solution. You're the one person you can change the easiest. You can decide to grow. Grow your abilities, your character, your education, and your capacity. You can decide who you want to be and get about the business of becoming that person.
Author: Dave Ramsey, EntreLeadership: 20 Years of Practical Business Wisdom from the Trenches

Quote: It is much more rewarding to get to the top of the mountain and share your experience with others than to show up by yourself, exausted.
Author: -Shandel Slaten

Quote: Leadership is a skill learned through many venues.
Author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders

Quote: If all the businesses in town are run like country businesses, You are going to have a country town
Author: William Faulkner, The Sound and the Fury

Quote: Entrepreneurs don’t ask for permission. They act per a mission.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: TO BE AN ENTREPRENEUR,  BE A DOER FIRST.IT TAKES “YOU” TO BE THAT!
Author: PRIYANSHU JOSHI

Quote: Let’s form a committee tasked with exploring why committees are so ineffective. Then we’ll stand-back and watch it argue and self-destruct.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Great partnerships should benefit us all
Author: Marcel Fuursted

Quote: It is the leader’s job to lead by example and enforce the values and the behaviors to set the culture for any company or work group. Show me a company in rapid decline, and I will show you someone in charge who doesn’t give a _____.
Author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

Quote: They call it "business" because it does not become successful by a person's "idleness". Go get busy if you want to do business; but be busy for the right reasons!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Studies consistently show that happy companies are way more productive, creative and service-oriented than unhappy ones. Therefore, the happy companies will beat the pants off the unhappy ones in the market place. The future of business is happy! It’s inevitable.
Author: Alexander Kjerulf, Happy Hour is 9 to 5

Quote: Happiness at work is not about eliminating all the bad stuff from your job. It’s about being happy at work even though some of these bad things are present. It’s about building your skills and your energy to fix the problems, and to create more and more positive experiences at work.
Author: Alexander Kjerulf, Happy Hour is 9 to 5

Quote: The path to happiness at work starts with a simple decision: You must want to be happy. If you don’t commit to being happy at work, you won’t be. You won’t make the choices that make you happy. You won’t take the actions needed to get there. You won’t change the things that need to change.
Author: Alexander Kjerulf, Happy Hour is 9 to 5

Quote: See, happiness at work is an emotion. It comes from inside of you, and like all other emotions it is difficult to define, but inescapable once it’s present. Or not present. Can you define love? Poets have tried for thousands of years and aren’t getting much closer. But when you’re feeling love, you’re acutely aware of it, even though you have no formal definition.
Author: Alexander Kjerulf, Happy Hour is 9 to 5

Quote: Seriously: Do you want to spend your working life simply being satisfied? When you look back on 50 years spent in business, do you want to be able to say, “Well, I was satisfied"?? No! Make happiness your goal. As in, “Let’s make this a workplace where people are happy to work." As in, “I’ve been working for 50 years now, and it absolutely rocks! To me work is challenging, stimulating and just plain fun.
Author: Alexander Kjerulf, Happy Hour is 9 to 5

Quote: Consistency matters. You must learn that giving people a consistent high-quality product is of importance, like building trust across your brand. This build relational wealth - people want to know what they are about to step into and with whom.
Author: Nicole Dominique Le Maire

Quote: You don't need a million dollar to start a business. You just need a simple idea to make Billions
Author: Yusuf Al-Qaradawi

Quote: You can’t be happy at work every day. No matter how much you love your job, there are still going to be bad days. And that’s cool—it’s always OK to have a bad day at work.
Author: Alexander Kjerulf, Happy Hour is 9 to 5

Quote: Life is all about exploring yourself, discovering yourself and grooming yourself, then you will surely stop negative thinking.
Author: Ehabib

Quote: Unlearn your knowledge about what WAS working to understand what is working NOW
Author: Roger James Hamilton

Quote: Its easier to start a global business than a local one, make your business one where you can work from anywhere in the world
Author: Roger James Hamilton

Quote: No Matter What, When, Where or Who … He is Forever My Daddy ~ MJ
Author: Michael S. Joyner, Forever My Daddy Denied

Quote: Do what you love but do what it takes to do what you love.
Author: Todd Stocker, Refined: Turning Pain Into Purpose

Quote: World can run without money and currencies but not without business and trade.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: One of the greatest skills—and gifts—is to focus on a person. Make them feel as though they’re the only person in the world.
Author: Rhonda Rhyne, Keys to the Corner Office: Success Strategies for Women by Women

Quote: It’s through diverse opinions and perspectives that a dynamic organisation can drive innovation and create its competitive advantage.
Author: Craig Dent

Quote: Most of the people are nice to live with, but not to do business with!
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Your money is just a condition to get my business, your professionalism is the price.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: In business 'professionalism' is not a tactic but a moral value.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: I don't beg for those things which can be earned.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: They copied my product, they copied my strategies yet they failed miserably in the business, because they couldn't copy my professionalism.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: I don't waste food, water, money, time and talent.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: No kind of social system can make you more happier and secure than your own money.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Remember, before they promoted to the chair of CEO, they were the best employees of their companies.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Targets are achieved sooner out of need, than out of greed.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Whatever begun with planning, ends in a victory.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: This is what made the difference, they used social networking for entertainment and I used it for business.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: In the professional world of leadership ambition and potential are the most excessive commodities.
Author: Noel DeJesus, 44 Days of Leadership

Quote: When you empower your people, your business will be grow.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Redundancy is my favourite business strategy.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: There is no blueprint to leadership, quite the conundrum in a business world where standardization is celebrated.
Author: Noel DeJesus, 44 Days of Leadership

Quote: If you think rightly, every problem is financial problem or eventually becomes one.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: When you empower your people, your business will grow.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Successful companies are built by investing large amount of money and hundreds of litres of sweat.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Successful companies are built by investing lare amount of money and hundreds of litres of sweat.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The world of romance and business works on this principle - You may be rejected several times, but not everyone will reject you.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: To the issues of friendship, love, business and war, "surprise" is the optimistic solution.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Few teams sometimes fails miserably because team members wish to work in the team but they want to be recognized individualy.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: In the business always talk to decision makers only, it will save your time and will get you the deal.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Treat your clients with high professionalism and they will no more negotiate with you.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You need a team for war, not for negotiation.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Through your influence, vision, ethics and authenticity you create a better reality for your family, community and organisation, where those around you and those who follow you are inspired to dream, learn and act
Author: Craig  Dent

Quote: The real rich people doesn't have bank accounts, they have treasures.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Starting and profitably running a business is not just some achievement, it is heroism.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Let's get one thing clear, there may be few or many successful people in your profession, but there is going to be only one hero in that profession.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Success is an addiction. Once you get into the habit of success, you can’t stop.
Author: Ehab Atalla, The Secrets of Business

Quote: People leave companies for two reasons. One, they don't feel appreciated. And two, they don't get along with their boss.
Author: Adam Bryant, The Corner Office: Indispensable and Unexpected Lessons from CEOs on How to Lead and Succeed

Quote: Vision without an Action is Illusion. Action without a Vision is Confusion.
Author: Sunny John

Quote: We can't all be bakers or chefs. Many of us have modest ambitions. But we can all buy a piece of the pie.
Author: Amah Lambert

Quote: Many in business feel they have to live up to a machismo archetype of the big-swinging-dick business leader
Author: Jon Miller

Quote: Don't wait to be compelled to do great work.
Author: Richie Norton, Résumés Are Dead and What to Do About It

Quote: A plan that is not written is just an idea.
Author: Dwain Siady

Quote: Leadership must come from all of us -- the private, public, and civil sectors.
Author: Eric Lowitt, The Collaboration Economy: How to Meet Business, Social, and Environmental Needs and Gain Competitive Advantage

Quote: Careers are developed one conversation at a time - over time.
Author: Beverly Kaye Julie Winkle Giulioni

Quote: Good leaders know who they are—their strengths, weaknesses, passions, talents, and values. And, developing leaders always starts with self-awareness.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Fearful leaders side-step issues instead of dealing with them, cover up mistakes instead of owning up to mistakes; they skulk back into the shadows and hope that the crisis—whatever it is—will somehow blow over instead of facing their fears. Worse, they resort to lies and deception to cover up the truth.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: To guard our character with unwavering commitment, our best protection comes from being humbly aware of our vulnerability.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Courage is leaning into the doubts and fears to do what you know is right even when it doesn’t feel natural or safe.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: An honorable leader must demonstrate a willingness to reveal his or her ‘inner self’ to their team. It builds trust and trust is essential. It’s also a sign of strength and authenticity, and people are attracted to those who are ‘real’ and authentic.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Leaders can choose to grow and change, but generally the most powerful predictor of future performance is past behavior. Evaluate them realistically.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Affirming others isn’t ‘flattering’ them—it’s when you genuinely and consistently acknowledge their efforts and accomplishments, both large and small. Make affirmation a habit and watch what happens!
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Leaders devoid of crucible experiences are likely to be overly confident about their ideas, and surprisingly more susceptible to fears; this is also true of children who are overly sheltered from facing challenges and experiences that help build their character. Courageously facing our fears in the difficult times gives us both humility and real confidence.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Voters—here’s the real challenge: we don’t need empty promises made by politicians whose only goal in life is to get elected or re-elected. We need leaders with attributes that qualify them to lead us through the difficult challenges we’re facing.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Over-communicating is the glue that holds a high-performing team together and keeps them focused in the same direction. And, it circles back to clarity. Without good, consistent communication, you don’t have clarity.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Good teams are committed to the team mission and to each other personally. Good leaders inspire and build this commitment and trust.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Persistence is important in every endeavor. Whether it’s finishing your homework, completing school, working late to finish a project, or “finishing the drill” in sports, winners persist to the point of sacrifice in order to achieve their goals.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Professional accountability is a good thing. Without it, excellence is merely a pipe dream and even average performance isn’t a realistic expectation.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: We all want to ‘count for something’–to make a difference. And, accountability helps us get where want to go in terms of achieving our goals and fulfilling our responsibilities.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: As is often the case with children, the rule of ‘monkey see, monkey do’ plays out in the workplace. It’s hard to be good role model, and it’s one of the greatest challenges of leadership.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: …some leaders don’t want to celebrate with their team because they are afraid—yes, afraid that if they celebrate, people will quit working hard and lower the standards. I say don’t let your fear take you out.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Leaders must be good listeners. It’s rule number one, and it’s the most powerful thing they can do to build trusted relationships.
Author: Lee Ellis, Leading With Honor: Leadership Lessons from the Hanoi Hilton

Quote: Perhaps the ultimate test of a leader is not what you are able to do in the here and now - but instead what continues to grow long after you're gone
Author: Tom Rath, Strengths Based Leadership: Great Leaders, Teams, and Why People Follow: A Landmark Study of Great Leaders, Teams, and the Reasons Why We Follow

Quote: What great leaders have in common is that each truly knows his or her strengths - and can call on the right strength at the right time.
Author: Tom Rath, Strengths Based Leadership: Great Leaders, Teams, and Why People Follow: A Landmark Study of Great Leaders, Teams, and the Reasons Why We Follow

Quote: To make a decision, all you need is authority. To make a good decision, you also need knowledge, experience, and insight.
Author: Denise Moreland, Management Culture

Quote: followers have a very clear picture of what they want and need from the most influential leaders in their lives: trust, compassion, stability, and hope
Author: Tom Rath, Strengths Based Leadership: Great Leaders, Teams, and Why People Follow: A Landmark Study of Great Leaders, Teams, and the Reasons Why We Follow

Quote: Practice transforms a skill into an art
Author: Siddharth Joshi

Quote: The best way to kill competition is to partner it
Author: Siddharth Joshi

Quote: A dream business that doesn't make money is a living nightmare.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: There has to be a way to redirect employee's driving ambition and to channel it more productively. There is. Create heroes in every role. Make every role, performed at excellence, a respected profession.
Author: Marcus Buckingham

Quote: Strategy is about shaping the future.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: Think continally about what you want, not about the things you fear.
Author: Brian Tracy

Quote: If you first take a minute, an hour or a month to let go of feeling annoyed, frustrated or critical of the person or situation that may be driving you crazy, you set yourself up for much greater leadership and personal success.
Author: John Kuypers, Who's The Driver Anyway?  Making the Shift to a Collaborative Team Culture

Quote: Our mind is a garden, our thoughts are the seeds. We can grow flowers or we can grow weeds. Don't forget to water it!
Author: Alston Gray, How to Own a Car on the Cheap (without sacrificing quality)

Quote: If you believe you can, you can; if you believe you can't, you can't.
Author: Alston Gray, How to Own a Car on the Cheap (without sacrificing quality)

Quote: Leaders believe that falling is not failing, but refusal to rise up after falling is the real form of failure!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: If you haven’t found yourself yet, it’s difficult to help someone to discover himself. False leaders make more false leaders!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: It’s unfair to see managers buying brand new cars for themselves when the salaries of their workers still remain unpaid! Good leaders are not selfish thinkers!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Leadership is about inspiration with character, not manipulation with position!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The reason why nothing happens is because nothing was done. Something will happen when something is done. Leaders take actions!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Knowing God is not enough; you must make Him known to others. Through your living character, you tell more about the living God!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Just as every crop performs on its specific type of soil, and not all fishes can grow in every kind of water, so is leadership. You can’t lead where you can’t thrive; you can lead where you can survive!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The worst ever offence you can commit against your time is to think that “time spent making plans is time being wasted!” Leaders don’t think that way!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: To a leader, reputation is an option, but true character is a necessity!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Honour comes and goes, influence comes and stays, but none of them safeguards us against danger than the mentor of true leadership; Jesus Christ!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Never be anxious about maintaining the position you occupy. Be anxious about maintaining your good character and you will never lose your leadership influence!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: People will know you for who you are, but will remember you for what you have done. True leaders make long lasting impacts!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Opportunities loiter in every corner. Everyone may see them, but it’s only great leaders that stop by to give them lifts!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Leaders don’t settle for less. When you do so, you rob humanity of what you are supposed to deliver!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: You break the legs of your leadership chair when you chase after other people’s assignments instead of pursing yours!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: It is not the person who is being taken out of a trouble that gains experience on how to deliver people from troubles. It’s the person who does the deliverance that gains more experience. Leadership is service!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: God has buried your leadership roles in your gifting. To take the lead, you got to unzip the gift bag. It’s your responsible to make it happen!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Leaders create a conducive environment for followers to accomplish their respective dreams. True leaders never fall for anything inferior!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Service introduces you to the leadership throne. Service to mankind is the vision on which leadership is mounted. You serve and in your service, you train more leaders by becoming an example!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The bottom line is that you can’t lead the person you can’t serve!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: He who cannot serve cannot lead. It is by being a servant that you recognize that followers also have needs. True leaders are service oriented!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: There is greatness in everyone already. The job of the leader is not to put greatness in anyone. The job of the leader is to make people discover and exploit the greatness already existing in them!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: There are four types of environments; the one that can help destroy you, the one that can help improve you, the one that can destroy the improved you and the one that can improve the destroyed you. Watch out and be vigilant!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

Quote: When you know every well what to do and how to do it, your attitude determines how well you will have it done!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: True leadership is an attitude that naturally inspires and motivates others, and it comes from an internalized discovery about yourself.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Leaders fail when they begin to fall in love with negative mindsets of other people!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Great leaders are great servants because the only way of setting an example is by demonstrating an example. Service to mankind is the key to true leadership!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Preparation is the key to leadership success. The more prepared you are the less your struggle to make it happen and the more your effectiveness!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: True leaders are ready to sweat when making rehearsal, than to cry tears when actually practicing. To save the tears, be ready to sweat!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Jesus’ promise of resurrection of believers came with a demonstration. He did it and said His followers who die will do same. This is leadership! It’s based on truth!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Leadership is not a raw gift given to a group of people. It is the product of any type of gift everyone one has. It therefore means, any kind of gift is a leadership gift!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: To know the purpose of a product, you must pay attention to what the manufacturer said about it. What God said about you is that you must have dominion over all other creation. Just pay attention and take the lead!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The leader’s job is to show the way. The bottom line is that you can’t tell anything about the condition of the way if you've not traveled on it yourself!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Sometimes it is difficult to different between leaders and misleaders. However, with the measurement of true service to mankind, the evidence is very clear!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The fact that a seed is viable is not a proof that it’s going to bear good fruits. Some good seeds are destroyed by bad soils. So is leadership; everyone was born to lead, but not all become leaders!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: The sweeper of the street is a leader in his own respect provided he does his job well with all love, diligence and attention than anyone would do when given the same broom sticks.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Many people know themselves but hardly believe what they know. To be a leader, knowing yourself is not enough; you must believe what you know about yourself!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Everyone can be a leader irrespective of their age, race, creed, nationality or political affiliation. Once you can figure out your talents and optimize them very well, at the right place and at the right time, you are a leader.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: A compassionate government does not need to pay too much attention to those who don't have needs. True leadership is to fulfill a need of the needy. People who have needs need attention indeed! Be a true leader!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Defend your leadership roles with your true character. Never attack your own aspirations with corruption and unfaithfulness! Keep calm and be honest!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: You never win unless you win the hearts of people.
Author: Syed Bokhari

Quote: If I am to choose between "sleeping" and "being part of a leadership that pursues irrelevant agenda", I will choose "sleeping". Chasing of irrelevant agenda by a leadership sect is what made Nelson Mandela to call it "Long Walk to Freedom!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: True leaders do not make choices with reference to the opinion of the majority. They make choices based on the opinion of the truth and the truth can come from either the majority or the minority!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: True leaders are like statues, whether it rains or it shines, they never bend their necks to look backwards! They never run away from challenges!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: You may gain a position, but that does not mean you've gained leadership. You may lose position, but that does not mean you've lost leadership! When you gain true character, you can leadership and when you lose it, you cease to be a leader!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: I observed that when a footballer is about to make a threatening strike to score a goal, there comes a big shout from spectators at the field. He could either get detracted to miss the opportunity or motivated to make it happen. Such is life!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: This is what you can do to be called a true leader; know the truth, love the truth, speak the truth and repeat the cycle over and over again and again! Let the truth reign!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: ...21st century leaders use their brain cells more than their muscle tissues!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Christ is my model of leadership because he faced similar challenges we also face on earth today, but through it all He was victorious. To leaders are not overcome by challenges!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Unfortunately, most followers do not know that they can also become leaders because to them, leadership is confined to an "assumed" category of people who have authority or social prestige as their background pillows.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Your character and attitude is what takes the lead in your leadership role and you follow them as a true leader". Poor character and attitude is eventually poor leadership.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: One of the most common areas where we fail is when we begin to think that genetic make-up of a person determines how far he can lead". Leadership is learnt and practiced!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: ...while some communities are chasing visions out, others are chasing one another away. ....while some leaders love breaking records, others love breaking constructed buildings. Good leaders deserve golden trophies while gas cylinder is o.k for the bad ones!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Say "no" to corruption; it does not fit you! Say "no" to bad leadership; you don't fit there. Say "no" to immorality; it will only fake you! Be bold to say "no" if that is what will take your breakfast away; you will get a sweeter lunch pack for compensation sooner.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Real kings and queens are people whose heads are crowned with dreams as they sit on the throne of passion. They rule with visions in the regalia of inspirations!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: You cannot climb up to a true leadership position unless you use the ladder of integrity!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: It is said that if you want to change the world, take pen and write. I want to add that if you want to maintain that change, then be the ruler to rule the pen's lines. True rulers are true leaders; they maintain a change!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: A leader without a clear vision and plans only abuses his power because visions, dreams and plans are the fulcrum along which the loads of success will spine by your own efforts. And where power is abused, there is manipulation instead of inspiration.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: If the problems you have this year are the same problems you had last year, then you are not a leader. You are rather a problem on your own that must be solved.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: You are your own leader. Where are you driving yourself to now? You can't afford to go wayward! Rise up and break new territories and live life so well.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Yes. Oh no! I don't subject myself to a leadership that does not break new territories! It is the job of leadership to succeed in landing its limbs on new grounds.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: We need Wisdom to seek for the Kindom and we need the Kingdom to have the Freedom to posess all other things!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Authority confined in you does not make you a leader. It is the authority created by you that makes you influence people with your purpose.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Ballot papers do not define leaders. Leadership is defined by conviction, vision, passion and inspiration.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Your title is what you are; your visions are who you are. When you know who you are, then you will know where you can be useful most.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: The fact that people are in positions does not justify the means that they are leaders. A leader can be blind and to know this, check his sense of vision.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: As good surgical doctor works on a patient in the theater with varied kinds of surgical instruments, so a true leader also needs a clean bag of leadership characters that vary from task to task. One-way leaders are obvious failures!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: If you want to wait till your black hairs turn grey and your teeth start pulling out before you become a leader, you are either too fast to prove your ignorance, or you are too late to know who you are made of.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Leaders are not known by their positions; they are known by their roles in those position. You have many gifts as a leader, but your dominant gift is what you will use to lead.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: What if there were health food stores on every corner in the hood, instead of liquor stores!?
Author: SupaNova Slom, The Remedy: The Five-Week Power Plan to Detox Your System, Combat the Fat, and Rebuild Your Mind and Body

Quote: True leaders are willing to die for their dreams. They don't oppress with ignorance; they impress with visions". They live like Martin Luther King Jr, Nelson Mandela...
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: A happy life is a virtuous life.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: The purpose of our life is to serve not to observe.
Author: imahmedyounis

Quote: Endurance precedes success.
Author: Wayne Chirisa

Quote: If you can think about it, you can achieve it. The difference between your thought and achievement are your self-doubt, and fear of failure. The longer you will take to start, the longer you will take to reach your destination. Seeds of everything that we see around were first sown in the mind.
Author: Sanjeev Himachali

Quote: Don't work only hard to make i in life.Always work smart. Because people who work hard only end up with that.
Author: Uchenna Durugo

Quote: To realize your dreams, you must first take action towards those dreams.
Author: Teresa Marie Garcia

Quote: In a daily life, reach out to others with sacred act of saying ‘hello, a smile, word of encouragement….
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Live passionately.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: YOU ARE WHAT YOU TWEET!
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: When you walk in distinction, even the photocopying machine can’t replicate your unique quality.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Get your GAME ON some how.
Author: G-MAM

Quote: Motivate yourself, you can be great.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Express Yourself to Design your Life, you are here to "be you" not someone else...
Author: luvic

Quote: Play More, Pray More; Get More, Give More... Live More!!!-RVM
Author: R.v.m.

Quote: If you dream of the stars the heavens are yours - rjs
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Don’t tell me you have OCD about this?”“OCD, ADHD—pretty sure if they come up with some new acronym tomorrow I’d have it.
Author: Cyma Rizwaan Khan, I See The Devil

Quote: When things don't happen, people get Sick. They see time Tick and they want it Quick. They forget that Success happens brick by brick.
Author: R.v.m.

Quote: Life is a Game you play only once you don't get the second chance and if you get you will never come in the same identity. So perform well.
Author: Sandeep Kakkar

Quote: Let us keep on dreaming and instead of saying “I wish” and waiting for it to happen, have the courage to say “I will” and make it come true.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Dream, live it and make it happen! As impossible as it may look and sound, this kind of thinking and attitude are what will keep us going.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Keep on dreaming. Keep on believing. It is free. And it is a choice.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: As long as I dream, that is enough for me to keep moving forward.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: 35	“Everyone has a dream, a vision, a goal and a desire. Just because we have bigger dreams than others doesn’t mean they don’t have one. Sometimes we just too lazy to make it happen or are scared of failing.”But trying is better than not doing anything at all.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Everyone has a dream, a vision, a goal and a desire. Just because we have bigger dreams than others doesn’t mean they don’t have one. Sometimes we just too lazy to make it happen or are scared of failing.”But trying is better than not doing anything at all.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Everyone can dream and as impossible as it may look and sound, this kind of thinking and attitude is what will keep us going.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: You are capable of fulfilling your dream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not lose the enthusiasm of your youth.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Never get tired of dreaming no matter how failed you got. the more you fails the more it gets you wiser the more you will achieve what you're hoping for ...... Be positive
Author: rahul kushwaha

Quote: Life is a beautiful dream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: You don’t have to stop dreaming.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: When you find yourself in the thickness of pursuing a goal or dream, stop only to rest. Momentum builds success.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: The greatest success is to live the life of your dreams.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: There is no limit to what you can do. Go forward and fulfil your dream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Hard work precedes great success.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: When you dream, you activate the possibility of what some call impossible.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: The opportunity cost of an unlived dream is not only that dream, but also the dreams the dream was meant to inspire.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Entrepreneurs see what others can't, do what others won't, and accomplish what others dream.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Don't simply dream, create. Don't simply create, ship. Don't simply ship, dream.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: How can you use what most excites, angers, or upsets you to achieve what you want to be, do or experience?
Author: Julie Connor, Dreams to Action Trailblazer's Guide

Quote: A dream conceived from the inside-out eventually becomes reality. But a dream desired from the outside-in is subject to spoil and tragedy.
Author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

Quote: Give as much as importance to your goal as you give it to your first girlfriend, with that much importance your girlfriend might still leave you but your goal will definitely come to you.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Some individuals have the courage to make it, even feel the need to do so; for them the quest is a necessity, not an option. Most people setting out on such journeys are never heard from again, but part of the romance of any field lies in keeping the dream alive, in not settling for what is familiar and comfortable.
Author: Gino Segrè, Ordinary Geniuses: Max Delbruck, George Gamow, and the Origins of Genomics andBig Bang Cosmology

Quote: Dream is a window to the other realm
Author: okorie deborah

Quote: Leaders must see the dream in their mind before they will accomplish the dream with their team.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: The beauty of today may not be realised until it becomes tomorrow’s memory
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: Today and every day, live and lead the memory you want to leave behind.
Author: Jon Mertz, Activate Leadership: Aspen Truths to Empower Millennial Leaders

Quote: Consult your memory to know what matters most in your life.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Forgotten hero was never the real hero, real hero can not be forgotten.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The magic to attain victory is simple…..Just believe.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: The magic of everyday life is the sacred moment.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: No institutional arrangement will ever contain all that they church is. Don't look for it institutionally; look for it relationally. Certainly the New Testament talks about the priorities of that church -- Jesus as its sole head and focus, daily encouragement among believers, plural and lateral leadership, open participation, and an environment of freedom so people can grow in him.
Author: Wayne Jacobsen and Dave Coleman

Quote: Today you are planting seeds to your dream. Be patient because it will be a large harvest.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: He (Peter) doesn't know if he's looking into the eyes of a madman, or the eyes of a King.
Author: Roma Downey, Son of God

Quote: If you're looking for an excuse to quit you will find it, but if you are looking for the reason to continue you must fight for it.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: God has taken you from something in order to get you to something.
Author: Chris Burkmenn

Quote: God is the leader of your team. As you follow Him with all your heart, you will be leading your team in Jesus’ steps.
Author: Jim George

Quote: When a wise woman speaks, her words are gracious. Ask God to help you find words that speak life to those around you.
Author: Stormie Omartian

Quote: Jesus modeled true leadership as both personal and hospitable.
Author: Adam LiVecchi

Quote: Never embarrass a student in front of others. Embarrass yourself often to relieve the tension, but do not paint them into a corner.
Author: Harry Gilbert

Quote: Mostly we think of people with great authority as higher up, far away, hard to reach. But spiritual authority comes from compassion and emerges from deep inner solidarity with those who are 'subject' to authority. The one who is fully like us, who deeply understands our joys and pains or hopes and desires, and who is willing and able to walk with us, that is the one to whom we gladly give authority and whose 'subjects' we are willing to be.It is the compassionate authority that empowers, encourages, calls forth hidden gifts, and enables great things to happen. True spiritual authorities are located in the point of an upside-down triangle, supporting and holding into the light everyone they offer their leadership to.
Author: Henri J.M. Nouwen, Bread for the Journey: A Daybook of Wisdom and Faith

Quote: I remember a time in a class on a cold winter morning a Japanese girl came with a surgical mask & I thought “wow people would go to extremes NOT to get sick in Japan” afterwards on a break I approached her & asked in a cynical manner: why the mask? Are you afraid of catching a cold? & then she said “in Japan you use it when YOU are under the weather & you don’t want other people to get sick, it is the polite thing to do” wow! that's a lesson I will never forget
Author: Pablo

Quote: In life I've learnt to CHERISH the moments with those I meet in life, CONQUER my fears, CLIMB the ladder of opportunities, COUNT my blessings, and CARE for the needy.
Author: Goitsemang Sandra Mvula

Quote: I'd always follow Nixon's orders, but you can't order somebody to be happy.
Author: Charles W. Colson, Born Again

Quote: Perhaps a seemingly dull, boring person is not a person who lacks personality, but rather a person with so much personality most other things bore them.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: Being a leader is not about finding ways to get others to serve you, but knowing how to serve your followers.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: A saint or monk can afford to be compassionate to all, but a leader or boss cannot always be kind. He may soon be without a job himself if he is unduly compassionate, and chances are, no one would show him any compassion then.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: He keeps his voice kindly but remote. A cross between a pedagogue, soothsayer, and a benevolent uncle – that should be his tone.
Author: Margaret Atwood, Oryx and Crake

Quote: Lead with honesty, total integrity, compassion, patience and tolerance — toward yourself!
Author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

Quote: Patience is not a natural gift of a leader, it is a learned one. The more you broaden your awareness, understanding, and compassion, the better results you will get out of your people.
Author: -Shandel Slaten

Quote: You can unlock spiritual things only from within.
Author: Richard Rohr, Adam's Return: The Five Promises of Male Initiation

Quote: The three jewels of Tao: compassion, moderation, and humility. Balthasar said compassion leads to courage, moderation leads to generosity, and humility leads to leadership.
Author: Christopher Moore, Lamb: The Gospel According to Biff, Christ's Childhood Pal

Quote: Success follows those who champion a cause greater than themselves.
Author: George Alexiou

Quote: One-time rival and subsequent usurper Secretary of State Seward finally settled into an assessment of Lincoln that, "His confidence and compassion increase every day.
Author: Doris Kearns Goodwin, Team of Rivals: The Political Genius of Abraham Lincoln

Quote: A visitor asked Lincoln what good news he could take home from an audience with the august executive. The president spun a story about a machine that baffled a chess champion by beating him thrice. The stunned champ cried while inspecting the machine, "There's a man in there!"Lincoln's good news, he confided from the heights of leadership, was that there was in fact a man in there.
Author: Shelby Foote, The Civil War, Vol. 1: Fort Sumter to Perryville

Quote: Tomorrow's leaders will not lead dictating from the front, nor pushing from the back. They will lead from the centre - from the heart
Author: Rasheed Ogunlaru, Soul Trader: Putting the Heart Back into Your Business

Quote: The universe is not for man alone, but is a theater of evolution for all living beings. Live and let live is its guiding principle. 'Ahimsa Paramo Dharmah' - Non-injury is the highest religion.
Author: Virchand Gandhi

Quote: A good tree never seizes to bear good fruits.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Whatever you sow, you will reap. Sow the seeds of love, kindness and peace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Be kind to yourself and others.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: We can only diffuse kindness, to the souls filled with bitterness
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: We must encourage, support and comfort one another.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is kindness.
Author: M. Howson

Quote: Kindness is a currency that can cover a multitude of interpersonal debts.
Author: George Alexiou

Quote: Explore new adventures.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Your Eyes Travel a Thousand Miles,But your mind will travel even more
Author: AnnaBella Cavanagh

Quote: Every travel is sacred.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: May you walk on the path of light.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Travel on your define path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The world is full of wonderful things you haven't seen yet. Don't ever give up on the chance of seeing them.
Author: J.K. Rowling

Quote: Sometimes a bus is your bus, and sometimes it ain't, and it's important that you can tell the difference.
Author: Steven J. Carroll, The Road to Jericho

Quote: Ram-fication of Ravan-ous thoughts is what Dussehra all about.
Author: Vikrmn, Corpkshetra

Quote: You are as powerful as your thoughts.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: She had realized that she was not as weak and helpless as thought she had been – she was willing to fight for her dreams and do whatever was necessary to make them come true.
Author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

Quote: The thoughts you think every day determines the life you lead tomorrow
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: I learnt to test the size of my brain..by trying this simple thought ! Look out for the good things, not the faults.It takes a good deal bigger sized brain to find out what is not wrong with people and things than to fins out what is wrong!!!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee

Quote: All your THOUGHTS, are either an 'investment' to your well-being or a 'cost' to your well- being! Are your investments growing or the costs are too high..Think about it !
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: There is something great in whatever you look at. Many people look but few people see;to leave a distinctive footprint, do not just look but see for seeing will make you different
Author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Distinctive Footprints of Life: Where Are You Heading Towards?

Quote: Thoughts are free, talk is cheap, and action is expensive. What's your worth?
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: You create wealth by what you give.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The worst kind of poverty is the poverty of vision.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: You will miss a normal life while living a successful life, but not as much as the craving for a successful life while you were living a normal life.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you have money but not love you will somehow manage, but if you don't have both then you are in serious trouble.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Not obedience or feelings or respect, there is only one thing which people take seriously at all time and its "money".
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Apart from the economic value, money does have high moral value.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: With some money in your pocket you walk confidently, you talk confidently and you work confidently.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You will get your father's wealth one day but not his legacy.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: To an optimist loneliness is freedom, to all others it is prison.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Be strong in spirit, you can conquer every circumstance.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Good heart, good spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Our strong spirit will survived every situation.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The spirit of a man can survive a sick body.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I move onward, through the colors and cheers and music, floating into my future, and it is a clear, open space that stretches wider that the sky and higher than the Andes.
Author: Laura Resau, The Queen of Water

Quote: In the matter of spirit follow the Gods, in the matter of work follow the heroes.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Some people when they have taken too much and have been driven beyond the point of endurance, simply crumble and give up. There are others, though they are not many, who will for some reason always be unconquerable. You meet them in time of war and also in time of peace. They have an indomitable spirit and nothing, neither pain nor torture nor threat of death, will cause them to give up.
Author: Roald Dahl, The Wonderful Story of Henry Sugar and Six More

Quote: To overcome something great you must first learn to overcome your own fears.
Author: Nikki Rowe

Quote: Feeling uncomfortable is the first step towards growth.
Author: L.K. Elliott, Confessions of an Ex Hot Mess

Quote: Comparison kills...There will always be someone ahead of you and someone behind you in life...When you see someone behind you...feel blessed for you are ahead of them...When you see someone ahead of you...feel inspired for your own growth...Compare yourself to YOU of yesterday, if that's what you like to do...so you can become better today !
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: The ability to live in a stable, safe environment that gives us the opportunity to create, grow and nurture our talents is sadly denied to many in the world today. I am proud to be able to say – as a leader – I can offer this to my people.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

Quote: Another great example of the power of vulnerability -- this time in a corporation -- is the leadership approach taken by Lululemon's CEO, Christine Day. In a video interview with CNN Money, Day explained that she was once a very bright, smart executive who "majored in being right." Her transformation came when she realized that getting people to engage and take ownership wasn't about "the teling" but about letting them come into the idea in a purpose-led way, and that her job was creating the space for others to perform. She chracterized this change as the shift from "having the best idea or problem solving" to "being the best leader of people.
Author: Brené Brown, Daring Greatly: How the Courage to Be Vulnerable Transforms the Way We Live, Love, Parent, and Lead

Quote: Find a new and better leader within yourself, for yourself.
Author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

Quote: Knowing your feelings won't change the facts, but knowing the facts can change your feelings.
Author: Marlene Chism, Stop Workplace Drama: Train Your Team to Have No Excuses, No Complaints, and No Regrets

Quote: By your choices you reveal your commitments.
Author: Marlene Chism, Stop Workplace Drama: Train Your Team to Have No Excuses, No Complaints, and No Regrets

Quote: Purpose expresses most deeply what makes you a unique individual. Your purpose defines who you are, how you live your life and how you lead. Your purpose provides you with inner strength and drive to live and lead each day. It equips you with what you need to face the challenges of the day and of life. Your purpose provides context and meaning to your life.
Author: Thomas Narofsky

Quote: With the right MINDSET, you can Survive, Thrive & Grow... Even in the Midst of turbulence and change
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: The foundation of all long-term success lies in building a Resilient and Growth oriented MINDSET.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: 21st Century Managers must change their thinking because they are now in the business of managing Mindsets & thinking, which impacts actions and behaviors.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Even the best Mindset will become contaminated and eventually blunted in a toxic organisational culture.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Never make someone a priority when they only see you as an option.
Author: Mary Mihalic, Made to Make It

Quote: Happiness is a state of mind and not a state of possession. Be as you are and you will be happy, if you try to be someone else you will be miserable.
Author: Apoorve Dubey, The Flight Of Ambition

Quote: All times are treasure-able.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Peaceful mind is Masterpiece.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not deny the truth.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Every man is defined by his deeds.
