Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Every country has its sacred culture.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Priceless virtues are love, peace, joy, kindness, gentleness, goodness, long-suffering, patience faithfulness and self-control.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not allow hate to take root in your heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Learn the rules of the game and become a better player.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Hating creates a hole in the heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Can a bad tree bears good fruits?
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It is sad to see people do things without putting their soul and heart into it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Accept yourself for the person you are, for all the mistakes you did and also for the transformation you’re about to experience in the future. Love your future version from this moment.
Author: Lidiya K., This Moment

Quote: Let your heart be filled with love.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The essence of life: be good to all souls like you seek them to be good to your soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not allow anyone to dim your light.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You have time to do what needs to be done.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Explore and experiment your lifetime on earth.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I stand secured in the Lord.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The best remedy in situation is calmness.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I will sow my seed. The sacred time will determine the harvest.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It is better to live with faith than fear.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not too late to tell me, I love you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: In quiet moment, the Lord refreshes my soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The Lord is my comfort, my hope and my peace.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The greatest duty is to know, love and obey God.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Faith gives strength to my bones.Grace gives power to my spirit.Hopes give anchor to my soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The only failure is giving up.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Life is a journey. Choose your journey.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Sacred existence fuels the heart of gratitude.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Every great soul had a great mentor.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Life, time and nature are the three greatest gifts to mankind.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: You ought to pray for grace to handle the uncertainties in life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: A conscience without regrets ~ to live life without having to say you're sorry.
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri

Quote: Your personal brand determines the kind of leadership influence you’ll provide.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Shaping the dream

Quote: The main factor that makes leadership potentials to become abused often is ignorance. Many people can merely spell their names in alphabets, but cannot pronounce their brands!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: Don't be a pleaser of people just because of the fear of the losing your position. You cease to be a true leader when you do so!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

Quote: God is not interested in your ability. He isinterested in your availability. When you availyour ability to God, you become a faithful leader.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: A “self-leader” is the positively influence you have on yourself and on others without any influence with your titles and positions. You must be able to lead yourself before you can lead others.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Every failure is a step to success.
Author: Teresa Marie Garcia

Quote: Begin to learn.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The annoyance you ignore today only gets worse tomorrow. Solve it now.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: All ways will lead and take you there as long as you know where you want to go.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: All successful people learn to navigate diverse personalities. So don't loose hopes after failure, try other ways and you'll reach there.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Move towards your dreams inch by inch or suffer the pain of regret.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: The only thing tougher than developing leadership skills is attempting to be successful without them.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: The ability to continue moving when you are feeling scared, fearful or lazy is the sign of true mental strength.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: Champions learn how to develop empowering beliefs and invest a substantial amount of time solidifying those beliefs, mostly through their own self-talk.
Author: Steve Siebold

Quote: World Class leaders know the secret to motivating themselves and others is discovering what they will fight for when the going gets rough.
Author: Steve Siebold, 177 Mental Toughness Secrets of the World Class: The Thought Processes, Habits and Philosophies of the Great Ones

Quote: Now you must journey inwards to what you really fear it's inside you... there is no turning back. Your training is nothing. The will is everything. The will to act. If you make yourself more than just a man, if you devote yourself to an ideal, you become something else entirely. Are you ready to begin? - Batman Begins
Author: Henry Ducard

Quote: There are two key areas that boil down life. Our relationships with people and the relationships with ourselves.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: In order to have different things we must become someone different.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: Compared to Eternity, The seconds of "Now" are more valuable than all the money and valuables in the world combined.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: You're going to find the people that make it work NEVER quit, quitting is NOT an option.
Author: Bob Proctor

Quote: Always ask yourself the question "Is this going to help get me to my goal or not?
Author: Bob Proctor

Quote: We can't fully encompass our motivational and inspirational awareness without fully understanding our purpose in life.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: If you can't stand the heat in the kitchen, keep cooking. Success comes from repeatedly doing things that make you uncomfortable.
Author: Monica F Anderson, Success Is a Side Effect: Leadership, Relationships, and Selective Amnesia

Quote: Organisations often appoint leaders for their IQ. Then, years later, sack them for their lack of EQ (Emotional Intelligence). Common Purpose argues that in the future they will promote for CQ - Cultural Intelligence.
Author: Julia Middleton, Cultural Intelligence: CQ: The Competitive Edge for Leaders Crossing Borders

Quote: Some people are busy working on their pose instead of their purpose.
Author: Saji Ijiyemi, Don't Die Sitting

Quote: Life is not meant to be easy. But it can be simple.
Author: Tony Curl, Seriously Simple Stuff to Get You Unstuck

Quote: You're not given a big dream, without the ability to achieve it
Author: Jana Kingsford

Quote: Your image is your brand and you have only one opportunity to make that first impression. Choose to make a positive first impression.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Project a confident image through good body posture.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Stand tall and be proud. Realize confidence is charismatic and something that is something money can't buy, it radiates from within you.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: A great attitude toward your approach to an interview—demonstrated by your good posture—is everything.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: It does not take the striking pose of a high-fashion model or the strict stance of someone in uniform to earn respect and admiration.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Healthy posture is based on natural positions that balance and support your skeletal system’s curves and weight-bearing abilities against the force of gravity.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Take your time, but don't waste your time. There's a difference.
Author: Philip Wang

Quote: Posture Power, when interviewing for a job remember. Poor posture shows uncertainty and a lack of confidence and ability. Good posture conveys confidence and an air of capability.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Working conditions at the computer and long seated sessions can lead to weakness and pronounced posture problems.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Stress can also lead to poor posture because it causes you to breathe more shallowly, which leads to slumping.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Good posture can be beneficial to your health.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Posture and Social Status...During the 18th century in European and American society, aspects including station in life, status and dress could easily identify those of financial means. In fact, the garments of this era would hold the wearer in a position that would support and require proper posture. Women, and sometimes men, wore stays in order to shape the torso. Among the more privileged, even children wore stays since people believed these improved their posture and enhanced straight spinal growth. Certain movements were constrained by the cut and design of many garments, including details of the sleeve and back that would hold the person in proper posture.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Good posture is the correct alignment of body parts supported by the right amount of muscle tension.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Think of good posture as your body’s projection of a positive message to those you meet.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: It is still relevant today to project a confident image through good body posture.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Sometimes in life, you have to take difficult steps and tough decisions, in order to achieve something bigger.
Author: Saad Salman

Quote: Your posture can have a great deal of influence on your personal presentation and image, revealing your attitude toward yourself and others.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Good posture is important for health reasons, as well as for your appearance, because it reflects your personal attitude.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: More than attitude, posture has also been used throughout history to communicate one’s status in society.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Motivation may be what starts you off, but it's habit that keeps you going back for more. Are your habits working for you or against you? Are your habits helping you to achieve your goals or hindering the process?
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: Your obstinacy towards your goals gives you ignition which leads to your success.
Author: omer dar

Quote: Struggle for Your Goals, because its too much better than Struggling for Your Life.
Author: Fahad Rashiq

Quote: It is not important who the leader is. Its important where they lead you to.
Author: Amit Abraham

Quote: Resurrect the dreams that you allowed to be killed by those who never dare to dream
Author: Saccheen Laing

Quote: Don’t set your sights low, just because someone else has a limited view of life’s possibilities. One person's comfort zone may be another person's cage.
Author: Eleanor Brownn

Quote: Don't let people get the best of you they say what they want but don't let that distract you from accomplishing your goals.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: By connecting and being part of a community with a shared vision and goals, we can create great things.
Author: David J. Greer, Wind In Your Sails

Quote: The only day you should never write and achieve your goals is when the day ends with the letter y.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: When you decide to be all you can be you will be better for it
Author: Blake L. Higginbotham

Quote: A person who values their goals actually values their achievements.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: One of the things I’ve learnt about goals is people will write them or wrong them.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: There is no good envy, except the one that motivates us to reach higher goals and be better than the person we were yesterday.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: In order to reach our goals we sometimes need a plan B. Other times we go all the way through to plan Z.
Author: Jo Linsdell

Quote: Leadership: Converting dreams into goals and goals into success.
Author: T Jay Taylor

Quote: You set goals in order to become the person it takes to achieve them
Author: Linda Deir

Quote: The sky is never falling...things will work out, they ALWAYS work out. Stay focused, accept everything as perfect and keep moving forward toward the direction of your goals.
Author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Edge

Quote: Stop using, "easier said than done", as an excuse to not change! Bringing your life to a higher level is challenging; get over it and rise to the challenge!
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: To spend your time wanting things is to smother your time for achieving things beyond your expectations.
Author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

Quote: Results fuel belief which causes us to take more action and get more results.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: Get out of your own way... stop the paralysis by analysis... dream your dream... then, WAKE UP and bring it to life!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Every day is precious. You will never live THIS day again. It is ONE event in human history. Why not make it count? Time is a nonrenewable resource.
Author: Kristen Lamb

Quote: Starting a new way is never easy so...keep starting until the start sticks.
Author: Tim Fargo

Quote: I chase goals, not girls.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Obsession and desperation for your goal, gets you the goal.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Success is not certain until you are obsessed by your goal
Author: Vijay Dhameliya

Quote: Don’t choose to walk the well-worn path to regret. Be amongst the few who dare to follow their dreams!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: You can’t reach the destination which you don’t know. So what’s the use of hard work when you don’t know where it’s taking you?
Author: SuccessCoach Nilesh, Go for Success: Be a Champion by 6 Effective Steps

Quote: Be amongst the few who dare to follow their dreams.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Keep your standards even when everyone around you is losing theirs.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: When you wake up each morning with a burning passion to accomplish a goal, you've already won the day.
Author: George Alexiou

Quote: Sometimes in this life, only one or two opportunities are put before us and we must seize them no matter the risk.
Author: Andre Dubus III, House of Sand and Fog

Quote: Cemeteries are full of unfulfilled dreams... countless echoes of 'could have' and 'should have'… countless books unwritten… countless songs unsung... I want to live my life in such a way that when my body is laid to rest, it will be a well needed rest from a life well lived, a song well sung, a book well written, opportunities well explored, and a love well expressed.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: It is necessary to look forward to a harvest, however distant that may be, when some fruit will be reaped, some good effected.
Author: Charles Darwin, Voyage of the Beagle

Quote: TAKE ACTION! Wanting is not enough; Act upon your goals! If somebody was watching your day-to-day behavior, would they be able to see what you’re working towards; what your goals are? If the answer is no, FIX IT!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Don’t make excuses; rather, find support and resources to make good things happen for yourself, your family, your businesses, your community, and the world you live in.
Author: Anna   Stevens, Turn Your Dreams And Wants Into Achievable SMART Goals!

Quote: It’s called an ‘accomplishment’, not an ‘intent-ishment’. You’ve got to BE it to SEE it. NO MORE EXCUSES - Decide what you want, create a plan, and get your ass out there!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: The smart strategist allows strategy to be shaped by events. Good reactions can make great strategy. Strategy involves competition of goals, and the risk is the difference between those goals and the ability of the organization to achieve them. So part of the risk is created by the strategy.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: Every step towards your dream today is a step away from your regret tomorrow.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: The greatest achievement is self awareness.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Be still my soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You are precious and special possession of God.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Never give up on yourself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Master Yourself and you master your environment! Such is the nature of wisdom.
Author: D. Nicole Williams, Change Your Posture! Change Your LIFE!: The Passion Fruit of Purposed Pursuit

Quote: When something is truly meant for YOU, you won't have to force it, rush it, or manipulate it.
Author: Stephanie Lahart

Quote: I 'OWN' some part of the evolution...I want to make my SHARE 'relevant' 'meaningful' and 'miraculous'!!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: ‪#‎TRUTH‬ ‪#‎BEREAL‬We must be ruthlessly honest with and about Self..Self Assessments are often inflated or deflated or just imaginary..
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: God gives much grace for great work.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: All professions have some element of theater to them.
Author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

Quote: In every age there comes a time when a leader must come forward to meet the needs of the hour. Therefore, there is no potential leader who does not have the opportunity to make a positive difference in society.
Author: Winston S. Churchill

Quote: Teddy Roosevelt "had relished "every hour" of every day as president. Indeed, (he was) fearing the "dull thud" he would experience upon returning to private life.
Author: Doris Kearns Goodwin

Quote: A call to duty, a call for service.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: If you're not grateful for what you already have, why should you be blessed with more...
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Sometimes we exist long enough to lead the next generation; other times, only to plant a seed and let its resonations of our time here on Earth ripple into new waves.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: Exercising will builds esteem from within through action on one's own behalf; it disproves the premise that only another person can provide it. The result, long in coming and always worth the effort, is the experience of authentic agency in your own life, a sense of self that cannot be destroyed because it is not dependent on anyone else.
Author: Jeanne Safer, The Golden Condom: And Other Essays on Love Lost and Found

Quote: Your actions are viewed by observers through prisms shaped by their own interpretations, and sometimes misinterpretations. All you can do is strive to be your best self. Let the chips fall where they may.
Author: Cathryn Louis

Quote: Begin to love thyself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You cannot break me.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Your thoughts and words will either acquit or condemn you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: What you believe of yourself is what you will become.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Because that saying about sticks and stones is a pack of lies. Unkind words hurt more than anything else. You end up carrying them around in your head, wondering if they’re true. Bruises fade, but self-doubt follows you forever.
Author: Kate Lattey, Triple Bar

Quote: Every soul has the potential of a great spirit.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: When admiring other people's gardens, don't forget to tend to your own flowers.
Author: Sanober  Khan

Quote: The feelings is both the biggest poison and the greatest remedy. The wisdom and good sense define the best use.
Author: Da Anunciação Marco

Quote: God sees us differently. We see where we are but God sees where we can be.
Author: Jamie Larbi

Quote: A leader helps others to reach their full leadership potential.
Author: Artika Tyner

Quote: Stop waiting for creative inspiration. Start creating and inspire yourself along the way.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Just because your feet are on the ground, doesn't mean you weren't born to fly.
Author: Justin Young

Quote: Self leadership requires us to lead and motivate ourselves. But it looks a heck of a lot like schizophrenia during a ropes course.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Things are changing, but this time I'm not afraid. This time I know who I am. This time I've made the right choice and fighting for the right team. I feel safe. Confident
Author: Tahereh Mafi, Shatter Me

Quote: Try not to be in a hurry to get older because youth happens once in your life. Thereafter, old age stays with you forever.
Author: Chris Jirika

Quote: Sometimes the only way to move forward is to revisit the things in your past that were holding you back. You have to deal with them head on, no matter how scary they may be. Because once we do, you will see that you can go further than you ever imagined.
Author: Barry Allen "The Flash"

Quote: If we should be blessed by some great reward, such as fame or fortune, it's the fruit of a seed planted by us in the past.
Author: Bodhidharma

Quote: May the Lord comfort the lonely and suffering souls.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: To all my enemies, I will destroy you.
Author: Frankie Boyle

Quote: I don't want to grow old thinking ''what if I had done...''. I avoid the ''should have's'' and take ACTION.
Author: Rachel Smets, Awaken Your Confidence: 15 People Share Their Journey To Success

Quote: Negativity pierces determination like rust. Stay coated with faith and confidence.
Author: Vikrmn, 10 Golden Steps of Life

Quote: It takes faith to hopelessly pursue hope.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: GOD is determined on you.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: The treasures in you must never be threatened by the gifts in others.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Those of us who have overcome so many adversities from a very young age, are privileged to be able to communicate profound insights and advice to others, speaking from a place of genuine confidence and knowing.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: If there's one thing I know for sure,is that I will be successful.There's no doubt about that . I can see it!I am determined,I am willing and I am able! I'll go through ups and down but that will make success even sweeter . I will lose friends but am prepared but again I got nothing to lose. You don't lose when you lose fake friends.The road is time.Confidence is a magnet to success.
Author: Cerella Sarry

Quote: The more we can embrace failure, the more we will be able to open to it and the more confident and resilient we will become.
Author: Karen Kimsey-House, Co-Active Leadership: Five Ways to Lead

Quote: Confidence is being scared to death but getting the job done anyway.
Author: Todd Stocker, Becoming The Fulfilled Leader

Quote: One asset every leader, shouldn't risk anything to lose at all cost, is team confidence.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Confidence matters a lot than what you want to say, if you are not bold enough.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: A strong confident person can rule the room with knowledge, personal style, attitude and great posture.
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

Quote: Overcoming challenges purifies you like gold to become bold.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Confidence confers on you the courage to conquer challenges.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Stop living the life with possibilities and probabilities, live the life with certainties.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The most self-damaging words in the English language are: try, might, and if. These are words of uncertainty. Will you fail? That is possible. But continue doubting your abilities and you’ll never succeed.
Author: Dannika Dark, Gravity

Quote: …It's as if they actually think that what other people think of them somehow doesn't matter. I mean, I know we're all supposed to believe that, but obviously, none of us actually do. And nor should we, because it does! It does matter! And the people who genuinely believe it doesn't tend to be the very people who ought to care most what other people think of them, because what the other people are thinking is, 'No, actually, I don't think the Chinese are "up to something,"' or, 'You should use mouthwash,' or, 'Your mania for the collective socialization of agriculture will surely cause the deaths of millions,' or, 'Forty cats is too many cats.
Author: David        Mitchell

Quote: I don't believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process.
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Quote: I begin to understand that failure is its own reward. It is in the effort to close the distance between the work imagined and the work achieved wherein it is to be found that the ceaseless labor is the freedom of play, that what's at stake isn't a reflection in the mirror of fame but the escape from the prison of the self.
Author: Lewis H. Lapham

Quote: Today’s experience prepares you for better tomorrow.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Today’s experience prepares you for a better tomorrow.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you fail at something, it means you have not mastered the art. With persistence practice, you will be master and eventually succeed.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Failure is only an experience. We learn from trials and errors.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We only need grace to get up, whenever we fall.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Go out and do your thing knowing that rejection and failure is an inevitable and integral part of the process to achieving your dreams.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: If you can't do it, just laugh about it instead of blushing or being embarrassed.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: I don't believe in failure. Whenever you take action and do something, irrespective of the outcome, you have succeeded by simply doing and trying. The universe rewards action. So believe in yourself and do whatever it is you want to do.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: Most people fail in leadership b/c they think when they should be working and work when they should be thinking.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: Things don't always go as planned, but it's when you make a plan out of the unplanned and make the best of the unlikely things In life.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: The end always doesn't justify the means you used to reach there.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: A sad fact in life is that you cannot have winners without losers, no matter what you do, it's up to you to make out which one you are.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Sometimes you just have to know when the battle you’re fighting is one best walked away from, than fought to the cold, bitter end.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: If you plan for failure, then you are expecting to fail. If you plan for success, you’ll be successful. Once you start making a ‘Plan B’, you distract from ‘Plan A’, and the moment you start believing there are other options, you start settling for less.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: People fail 2 ways: 1) don't know what to do 2) don't do what they know; therefore, great leaders must educate and inspire.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: Wanting to win is what keeps the trade on, If you win, you lose the trade.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: All people who made it at one time thought they could never make it.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: I keep a vivid memory of failure in my back pocket, so no matter how much I accomplish I stay grounded.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Success is mesmerizing, and blinding. Sometimes you need good old fashion failure to open your eyes.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Relax your fears, let your ambition take the wheel for a while; it'll take you somewhere exciting that you've never been.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: As a leader, I am there to make the best decisions possible with the evidence at hand and to be able to justify that decision. If it goes wrong, we add to the evidence for making the next decision, but there is no reason for regretting failure, as failure is just the production of evidence.
Author: Michael A. Wood Jr.

Quote: What matters more than where you are is the direction you are heading.
Author: Cameron C. Taylor, Does Your Bag Have Holes? 24 Truths That Lead to Financial and Spiritual Freedom

Quote: Those who envy the success of others are normally ignorant to the sacrifices, failures, and dedication that it took for them to get there.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Let your experience be not one of failure but one that has taught you new things which you would not have known had you not tried
Author: Epiphana Lewis

Quote: The successes and failures of yesterday are gone, today is a new day.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Dreams aren't only an illusion to put you into a subconsciously pleasurable state of mind for the time being, but also a pathway to gain complete contentment.
Author: Mehek Bassi

Quote: Failure is the ultimate motivator, the supreme teacher, and the definitive guarantee of life. Failure is what makes success so addictive.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Get out of failure-o-phobia to enjoy success-o-mania.
Author: Prerak Trivedi

Quote: If you adjust first time, compromise second time, failure is what you will get third time.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Stress builds character and failure breeds motivation. I guess I'm a Optimist.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Emotional pain, physical damage, financial weakness are the reasons to stop for a while and not forever.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Don't overestimate your emotions because emotional injuries can disturb you but it can not defeat you.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The road to success is full of pit stops, pitfalls, and self pity; my advice is simply don’t stop!
Author: Noel DeJesus, 44 Days of Leadership

Quote: Don't live your life like an attempt, because if you fail there is no second attempt.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Giving up doesn't make you a quiter, a loser or a failure.It makes you wise enough to stop holding on to what refuses to be held.Hence i say, letting go hurts,but holding on to what is no longer therehurts even more.
Author: Nomthandazo Tsembeni

Quote: When I rise uplet me rise up joyfullike a bird.When I falllet me fall without regretlike a leaf.
Author: Wendell Berry

Quote: Great leadership produces great success. Weak leadership produces failure.
Author: Ellen J. Barrier

Quote: The enemy doesn't warn its target. Emergencies do not make appointments, and the greatest battles of life are often surprises.
Author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

Quote: Sooner or later, the man who learnt lessons from his failures will be the one to be sought first for guidance, counsel and formula on how to be successful in life's endeavours.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

Quote: Do you know the opportunity you get when you fail? It is starting again - an opportunity to perform better.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

Quote: Failure gives the bald hairs; equips the novice with experience. The learner, sooner or later, becomes a teacher by it.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

Quote: Your desire shall be your delight.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If we don't currently have what we so desire, then we must become a different person. Beliefs and thought patterns is the road to victory.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: When a desire is deep, it reaches the subconscious mind and calls for cultivation of qualities that will help fulfill desires, and this is what transforms an ordinary person into a great leader.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: When man is finally able to see himself and the world around him with clear cognition, he finds a picture far more pleasant. Visible in unmistakable clarity and devastating detail is man’s failure to be what he might be and his misuse of his world. This revelation causes him to leap out in search of a way of life and system of values which will enable him to be more than he has been. He seeks a foundation of self-respect, which will have value system rooted in knowledge and cosmic reality where he expresses himself so that all others, all beings can continue to exist. His values now are of a different order from those at previous levels: They arise not from selfish interest but from the recognition of the magnificence of existence and the desire that it shall continue to be.
Author: Clare W. Graves

Quote: It isn'y explanations that carry us forward, it's our desire to go on.
Author: Paulo Coelho, Brida

Quote: The truth is -- we are always highly motivated when something means a great deal to us. If I fell into a deep lake and I didn't know how to swim, I would become highly motivated in an instant. Climbing from the lake would mean more to me than anything else in the world. My effort would be no less than astounding and I would suddenly become one of the most excited and enthusiastic persons imaginable.
Author: Steve Goodier

Quote: Humanity needs heroic leadership from those who see all life as precious.
Author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

Quote: In the history of a soul’s evolution there is a critical point of the human incarnation that decides for us whether we stay there, go down or progress upwards. There is a knot of worldly desires impeding us; cut the knot by mastering desires and go forward. This done, progress is assured.
Author: Virchand Gandhi

Quote: The motive of man is a mystery.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: True change doesn't happen overnight; it has to happen gradually. You first have to have a change of heart, then a change of mind, and then your actions will follow.
Author: Kaiylah Muhammad, Out of the Cage

Quote: Unforgiveness is a shadow of the past; it is behind you, but you always know it is there. Sorrow and bitterness covers your heart like the darkness covers the night.
Author: Deborah Brodie

Quote: We want to change our surroundings, but we don't want to change ourselves. We are so quick to point out others' flaws, but can't admit our own. We complain about the problems with society, but don't offer a solution or acknowledge that we could be a part of the problem. And once we feel like we've outgrown a problem, instead of sharing what we've learned from our experience, we act so enlightened and better than the next man.
Author: Kaiylah Muhammad, Out of the Cage

Quote: Change leads to growth. Resistance leads to rigidity. Rigidity leads to ...
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Here’s what I believe. We have control over ourselves at every single moment. We don’t control the world. We don’t control other people (or at least, we shouldn’t.) But we are in control of our experience at all times.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: It happened to me just this year with a beautiful boy I started hanging out with. Call me a hormonal teenager if you want, but evidently I haven’t grown out of this experience. His name, his voice, his face, his laugh - anything was enough to make my heart start beating faster. It’s the spark.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: Live that way long enough, and you will literally find yourself addicted to the acceptance of people. You will constantly need verbal affirmation. You will depend on always receiving a steady stream of invitations to events you don’t even want to attend. You will feel as though you need a significant other in your life at all times. I’m not exaggerating - this need for external acceptance will literally become an addiction. And that turns every one of your relationships - personal, professional, and romantic - into a codependent one. You are not in the relationship with a full heart able to give love away. You are in the relationship because you NEED it. You don’t know how you’d survive, much less thrive, without it. You are using every person to fill a void in your heart that you simply refuse to fill yourself. This is a mess.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: You have a spark. It is real. It is you. And right now, it is being activated. You cannot ignore the spark any longer.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: When a feeling hits, keep breathing. Let air flow through your body. Let your heart beat as it always faithfully does. And let the feeling pass through you. Maybe it will be momentary, or maybe it will spend the night. But it will not last forever. If you can be with it, sit with it, even if “it” brings a lot of discomfort, that feeling will keep moving. It will move through you, and you will move on. You will move forward.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: A belief is nothing more than a repeated thought which you have chosen to embrace and implement in your life.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove

Quote: Tolerance is the essential starting point for compassion. That’s why it is so emphasized in our society right now. In a world full of discrimination, prejudice, and marginalization, people need to be taught to tolerate people who are different. Tolerance, at the political, social, and cultural level, will prevent us from choosing speech or actions that harms other people groups, which is a definite win.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove

Quote: It’s easy to think that if we had a different house, different car, different job, different relationship, different city, everything would be different; that we would feel different then.The problem is, you are the main character in the story that is your life. No matter how much you alter the setting of that story, you can’t escape from yourself. There are many factors which contribute to your experience on this planet, but ultimately, you are the one creating your experience here. In order to get to the life you are here to live, you must begin by becoming the person you are here to become.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: My goal is to be the most magical person you know. I say that all the time, because it’s an idea that really does shape my daily life. But you might not have met me, or maybe you aren’t familiar with me at all. Still, I know that you have a person who has given you that feeling.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: A beautiful, majestic, and awe-inspiring sea awaits you. And you are welcome to enter however you see fit - to wade, to walk lightly, to swim for your life, or to sail. The decision is yours. No one will stop you from returning to the sandy towel on the shore if you desire. But I’d like to think you chose to come to the sea for a reason. You have been called to the sea. There is something here that you need, and it has awaited your arrival for quite some time.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: You are a soul. You are a creator. You are an individual, absolutely and positively one of a kind. You are an energetic being of love with enough power inside of you to change this entire world forever.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: I knew who I was now. I had figured out how to love myself. And more and more each day, I was learning to be myself in the world. Life felt completely different, like I was sipping the perfection of a made-to-order drink that was exactly what I had imagined. As I looked up at the stars right then, I found myself saying, “This is what it was supposed to be like all along.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: The biggest mistake people make in life is trying to be someone else. They never find themselves, so they never love themselves. Instead they find somebody else who they like a lot and try to be them.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: You have not been given the task of creating something brand new from the vast world around you. All you are called to do is discover what is inside of you right now, the life you have been given. Once you find that, you can begin creating something external that aligns with and affirms your spark.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: The wisdom of hindsight would reveal that I had no clue how to find myself, no idea how to love myself, and no ability to be myself. Mix all of those three dilemmas, and you’ve created a cocktail that will knock anyone out. Even though I couldn’t name those specific issues that night, I did own where I was to the best of my ability. That’s often all we can do in a crisis. So that night, I looked myself in the eyes and said, “It isn’t supposed to be this way.
Author: Stephen Lovegrove, How to Find Yourself, Love Yourself, & Be Yourself: The Secret Instruction Manual for Being Human

Quote: Most good decisions that a person make are a result of reflection and the will to change.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: All leadership begins from inside a person and must be developed and grown as they grow into emerging and enduring leaders
Author: Thomas Narofsky, F(X) Leadership Unleashed!

Quote: Your life plays out as a reflection of your genetic makeup and potentiality as expressed through your environment and choices. Love yourself enough to create an environment in your life that is conducive to the nourishment of your personal growth. Allow yourself to let go of the people, thoughts, and situations that poison your well-being. Cultivate a vibrant surrounding and commit yourself to making choices that will help you release the greatest expression of your unique beauty and purpose.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Make sure your subconscious knows you love it by stroking it until it purrs.
Author: Teresa Sue McAdams

Quote: Just be you. That's the best advice I can give. There are seven billion people in this world and there is no one like you.
Author: Ed Sheeran, Ed Sheeran: A Visual Journey

Quote: Take the risk, and just be.
Author: Dean Del Sesto, Shift Your Thinking: 200 Ways to Improve Your Life

Quote: It's your mind you have to train, like your mom said that one time, you have to separate yourself from all the crap, get down to the core, focus.
Author: Cynthia Hand, Unearthly

Quote: Begin to write.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Life is holy endured faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: What is yours will be yours without any fight.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Define yourself. Define your passion.Define your success.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: An advice is truly valuable when people not just give it their ears but also their obedience.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Take the next 24 hours and just relax with the knowing that everything is okay. Let go of the stress and worry for one day and see what happens.
Author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Edge

Quote: Your life is up to you, You only be what you want to be
Author: GoalsRider

Quote: Don't worry about how something is going to happen, just know that it is all unfolding perfectly, whether you can see it or not.
Author: Mike Basevic

Quote: When we have done our best, we should wait the result in peace.
Author: John Lubbock, The Pleasures of Life

Quote: Treat your advices like your money, don't give it to others unless they ask for it.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: I speak less because my words are precious and my advices are priceless.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Let's go invent tomorrow instead of worrying about what happened yesterday.
Author: Steve Jobs

Quote: When you start something, make sure that you're willing to take the time to finish it right because, honey, the work you put into it will be more than worth it in the end. The best things always are.
Author: C.M. Stunich, Losing Me, Finding You

Quote: You say you've a life, but i see it as movie being directed by someone else, being edited often here and there. life is when you've the remote control of it, and its been controled by the person you love.
Author: Yaqub khan

Quote: Teamwork is the secret that make common people achieve uncommon result.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Everyone has a price”, as they say. So let the price on your tag say “PRICELESS” “INVALUABLE” “IRREPLACEABLE”.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: Never force yourself on another. If you do this, then this is you trampling on your own dignity without the external help.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: Do not deceive yourself
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do not forget to love yourself.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I know who I am.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Holy existence.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Every man must nurture is spiritual soul daily.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: We should not look for more in others,Rather find more within ourselves
Author: Morris R. Gates

Quote: There is a self-love solution for every challenge.
Author: Abiola Abrams, The Sacred Bombshell Handbook of Self-Love

Quote: Love cannot come from where love is not. We cannot express love from within us for another if there is no love for ourselves within us.
Author: O Shakoor

Quote: With time, scars turn into wisdom.
Author: Shilpa Menon

Quote: Do not find faults, only forgive.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Hope is firm belief.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Tchingis, if you determine this is to be so, who can withstand you? You are poetry after an ugly day, and heal wounds I didn't know I had.
Author: Bryn  Hammond, Amgalant Two: Tribal Brawls

Quote: Your darkest moments are not meant to be swept under the carpet, hidden from the world in the silent pursuit of perfection. The darkness you've overcome is your ticket into leadership. It's what you're meant to light up in the world.
Author: Vironika Tugaleva

Quote: The most beautiful, amazing and inevitable fact about life- Everything has a natural healing process.
Author: Sanober  Khan

Quote: All things are possible to those who believe:
Author: Bible. New International Version Mark 9 23

Quote: Through depression and many other dark low emotions, our Light dims and our immune system declines along with it. White blood cells are the physical Light of our body.Colors can be used to heal, restore and to uplift us.
Author: Jacqueline Ripstein, The Art of HealingArt: The Keys to Power and Awareness

Quote: Healing can be a long and winding road or a straightforward march to the finish line.
Author: Alice McCall

Quote: Alternative healing does not always offer a quick fix of a symptom, but it does offer a permanent healing that resonates beyond physical well-being. It creates a total uplift in attitude, enhanced spiritual awareness, and so much more that will change the way you appreciate life everyday. Embracing alternative healing by focusing on the cause and trusting the process as it unfolds will be a journey that can be trying or difficult at times, but it will always be extremely rewarding.
Author: Alice McCall

Quote: Never let a man determine the woman you want to be.
Author: Maranda Evans, Troubled

Quote: East or West, Home is BestNorth or South, Hand to Mouth
Author: Doctor You

Quote: Whenever I'm running an hour late for for work, it always makes me feel better when I can leave an hour early at the end of the day to make up for it.
Author: Mark W. Boyer

Quote: If you focus on the sunshine in life, you will see the darkness fade.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You can only diffuse light in dark places.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Make a commitment to serve the needs of the ‘least of these’ and give voice to the voiceless.
Author: Artika Tyner

Quote: All over the world there are students, teachers and parents that face serious challenges every day. They need help with real problems that have life-altering consequences—and a group of intelligent professionals brought together to advise and educate stakeholders in need of help ought to be able to do so without behaving like a middle school drama queen.
Author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

Quote: Thoughts don't have time and space, one need to hold them. The one who succeeds at them becomes a writer.
Author: Santosh Avvannavar

Quote: A hammer made of deadlines is the surest tool for crushing writer's block.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: For a writer, it seems a help rather than a hindrance to be at least a little crazy. Who but a crazy person would carve out a very private, quiet place in the world, only to pour his/her innermost thoughts and emotions onto a page for the entire world to examine? Even in fiction, we give a map to our most secret feelings. Why do writers do it? Perhaps because we'd be crazier still if we didn't.
Author: Leland Dirks

Quote: Life is an experimental field. You can explore by faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You can conquer fear with faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: I'll tell you what you want to hear. I mean, what I need to hear. I'll tell the truth.
Author: S.A. Tawks, Misadventurous

Quote: Vision is the #1 key to adventure.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: ... But if I spend [all] my time *reading* about adventures, I won't actually be *having* them.
Author: Lisa Kleypas, Love in the Afternoon

Quote: How are things with you, sir?""Fine." He says it flat."Coffee black. BLT."Now my heart tells me this guy needs more in life, so I take a short. "You ever had a cheese burger with grilled onions and mushrooms on pumpernickel, sir?"That takes a minute to sink in.Then he slaps the counter, grinning. "Bring it on."I sense he needs more."You want a malt with that, by any chance?"He did, of course. "Chocolate," he says, beaming like a kid.Now he's loosening up.It's a privilege to touch humanity in such a fashion.
Author: Joan Bauer

Quote: Sometimes, the only way to solve your problems in life, the only way to conquer your fears, is if you face them. If you face your problems, they just flee. But if you flee instead, run away from them, they only get bigger, and they can totally destroy you.
Author: Elizabeth    Newton, Moon Man

Quote: I never want to be a passive observer of life's possibilities.
Author: Courtney Pierce

Quote: Still, I could find no good reason for not going. So I decided to go.
Author: Nicolette Milnes Walker

Quote: With grace and gratitude, great life evolves.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We need God-great grace in all spheres of life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: May the Lord grant you grace to endure the times.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: The power of encouragement is the grace of life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Even under false accusation those who are in the right can afford to be calm and considerate. God is acquainted with all that is misunderstood and misinterpreted by men, and we can safely leave our case in His hands. He will as surely vindicate the cause of those who put their trust in Him as He searched out the guilt of Achan. Those who are actuated by the spirit of Christ will possess that charity which suffers long and is kind.
Author: Ellen G. White, Patriarchs And Prophets

Quote: Live with GRACE & Die with PRIDE.
Author: Rishi Bakshi

Quote: We have taught this generation how to "market" the Gospel but we have neglected to encourage them to "preach" the Gospel.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: We have created a culture of leadership "development" in the Church at the expense of ignore the ministry of the Church to making disciples.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: fearless face your fate.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: When dreams come true, you won't realize unless they were dreams of bad fate.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Sometimes even the smallest of efforts can change someone’s fate entirely.
Author: Mitch Rowland, Eternity's Reach

Quote: A great leader may be executed in the name of malevolence, yet when his followers look upon his legacy they will see not only the man who once stood, but even more will they see the ideas for which he stood.
Author: Riley Larock

Quote: Rethink Your Success Mindset: Times are getting tougher. We need tougher mindsets to ensure that we go beyond survive to thrive.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Rethink Your Success Mindset: With the right mindset, everything that you experience, along your journey towards success, is a blessing.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Rethink Your Success Mindset: Gratitude is the attitude, fuel and catalyst that transforms life's challenges into wisdom.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Disappointment resides in expectation. Showing a little regard creates consideration, which results in understanding. Steps to a peace of mind.
Author: Tyconis D. Allison Ty

Quote: Knowledge evolves, understanding matures and wisdom progresses. Don't be so hung up on what you think you know.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: When you pray and hope for a change. Don't expect a change to come. Expect the opportunity for a change to come.
Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett, Neglected But Undefeated: The Life Of A Boy Who Never Knew A Mother's Love

Quote: I’ve had a lot of lieutenants over the years, and all the good ones were sick, sick individuals. You might be the best one yet.
Author: Henry V. O'Neil, Orphan Brigade

Quote: A leader’s first duty is to look after his or her people, especially those who are sick, hungry, or thirsty.
Author: Michael Monroe, Afterlife

Quote: I see you have returned, my love; and your mood is as dark as ever. Did your soldiers not adore you to your complete satisfaction?
Author: Wayne Gerard Trotman, Veterans of the Psychic Wars

Quote: It would not do to be Lord of a universe inhabited solely by serfs.
Author: Wayne Gerard Trotman, Veterans of the Psychic Wars

Quote: If you want to see what your truly committed to, look at your results.
Author: Jennifer Ho-Dougatz

Quote: Change does not surface when you are not ready to be the catalyst. Your reaction matters, not your inaction.
Author: Michael Bassey Johnson

Quote: To lead from the front you must get off your behind.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: A product in the marketplace is the result of thought in an inner space and action more than the common place.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Yeast is to flour as action is to ambition. Rising to success requires adding and alternating starters.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: To change you must want to change, you must be responsible for the change, and then take action to make the change. It is your race to run so you need to choose your road wisely.
Author: Thomas Narofsky, You are Unstoppable Participant's Guide: Unleash Your Inspired Life

Quote: Theories might inspire you, but experiments will advance you.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Your right actions might hurt someone, so if required apologize for your right actions, but don't stop taking right actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: By doing ordinary actions efficiently you will become the best among ordinary, but you will not be an extraordinary.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: My action is my prayer.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Too many leaders fancy themselves on being philosophers, but not enough pride themselves on decisive action.
Author: Noel DeJesus, 44 Days of Leadership

Quote: Taking action is the best source of inspiration.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You have gone through enough theory, now it's time to take actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I take my actions because of my passion not because of compulsion.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You were never born with a silver spoon in your mouth. Don't think that way. You were born with a diamond spoon in your palm. Carry it by your own hand. Now, feed yourself
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: Many people experience the travesty of regret in their end days; the realization that nothing held them back, that nothing was in their way, that there is no one to blame, only themselves. Don't just sit by waiting for your life to happen, make it happen! Don’t just hope your dreams will come alive, breathe life into them! Don't let your fear help you birth a well-nourished regret, take action today! At the end of the day, at the end of the year, at the end of your life, live in such a manner that you can hold your head up high, smile, and be proud of a life well lived.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Without action, a vision is just a piece of paper. In education, we have lots of paper.
Author: William Sterrett, Insights Into Action: Successful School Leaders Share What Works

Quote: This is not the time to be passive. This is the time to shape, sculpt, paint, participate… the time to get sweaty, to get dirty, to fall in love, to forgive, to forget, to hug, to kiss… this is the time to experience, participate and live your life as a verb.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: NowNow is the time…Now is the time – Make a changeNow is the time – All is strangeNow is the time – Start life anewNow is the time – Cannot stewHeartbreak, loss, pain, and challenges paleNow is the time – Sharp as a nailNow is the time – Take a chanceNow is the time – Sing and danceNow is the time – Make a changeNow is the time – engageNow is the time…
Author: Christopher Earle

Quote: Keep Moving...Move forwardLet go Give inDecideand just DoProgress every dayAnd make one step forward no matter what's in your wayKeep moving, till one day you wake up and you're there.
Author: Emma Daley

Quote: We have all experience times of despair and fear. But it is better to live with hope and faith.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: In success, people see only the product. But they do not know the details of the process.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Experience is bitter. But it fruits is sweet like honey.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You never know what people have endured to get where they are.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Life is an extraordinary gift some people appear not to appreciate. In every breath and scent, every touch and sight we are gifted by new experience and the chance to feel the richness of experience. Every sound we hear, from the song of a bird to the harshness of an angry voice, is a miracle.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: Hire and promote first on the basis of integrity; second, motivation; third, capacity; fourth, understanding; fifth, knowledge; and last and least, experience. Without integrity, motivation is dangerous; without motivation, capacity is impotent; without capacity, understanding is limited; without understanding, knowledge is meaningless; without knowledge, experience is blind. Experience is easy to provide and quickly put to good use by people with all the other qualities.
Author: Dee Hock

Quote: Strive to follow your big dreams. If you fail, cherish the valuable experience gained during the process. There’s always a second time.
Author: Yatin Patel

Quote: ...our free will could convert a curse into a blessing or a blessing into a curse...To transform a crisis into an opportunity was true wisdom
Author: Radhanath Swami, The Journey Home: Autobiography of an American Swami

Quote: Old ones should respect the energy of youths and youths should respect the experience of old ones.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations
Author: John Mayer, John Mayer

Quote: We never realize the power of real love unless we witness or experience a transaction, because real love costs.
Author: Eric Samuel Timm, Static Jedi: The Art of Hearing God Through the Noise

Quote: Statesmanship is developed in the hard knocks of general experience, private and public.
Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

Quote: Afrikaans was the language of the white minority in South Africa, and the forced learning of it created resentment among blacks. Even so, Nelson Mandela made it a point to learn this language in prison in anticipation that it would help him lead the whole of South Africa.
Author: Robert Lane Greene, You Are What You Speak: Grammar Grouches, Language Laws, and the Politics of Identity

Quote: The artist has the master picture in his mind, before he begins to paint.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Do you know great minds enjoy excellence, average minds love mediocrity and small minds adore comfort zones?
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Be mule-like stubborn about your happy
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: All work and no play will make you sad and grey!
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Just because you can't believe it, doesn't mean it's not happening
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: I believe in my sacred soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You must see yourself with it before you can have it.It comes down to three questions: 1. Do you believe you can have it? 2. Do you believe you deserve it?3. How bad do you want it?If you believe you can have it, you believe you deserve it, and you want it bad enough; you will envision yourself with it and work to get it!
Author: Michelle Hollis

Quote: If you don't believe in yourself, why should anyone else?
Author: Teresa Mummert

Quote: I used to be mad when they called me crazy, until I realized that in those moment they consider me insane I was following my heart, doing what makes me happy and most of all being myself.so now when I am called crazy I take it as a great compliment because it's a confirmation that I'm living my best life.
Author: Micheline Jean Louis

Quote: My heart only knows love.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: What distinguished him in a moment of crisis was his self-command.
Author: T.J. Stiles, The First Tycoon: The Epic Life of Cornelius Vanderbilt

Quote: The question is not 'Am I a leader?' - the question is 'What kind of leader am I?
Author: Steve Knox

Quote: Understanding who you are is critical for your career advancement. Self-awareness helps you get ahead.
Author: Bonnie Marcus, The Politics of Promotion: How High-Achieving Women Get Ahead and Stay Ahead

Quote: Don't Have The Power To Stare At The Sun. I Can Only Try Even I Know I'll Fail. At Least I Have The Courage To Do That. I Know My Power And I Know My Shortcomings Which Most of The People Cannot Even Realize About Their Own. I'm Powerful In My Own Little Innocent World....
Author: Muhammad Imran Hasan

Quote: He had to grow his own NCOs.
Author: Tom Clancy, Executive Orders

Quote: Authentic leadership is at the root of cultures of great innovation, engagement, outstanding client experiences, and growth.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: Growing a culture requires a good storyteller. Changing a culture requires a persuasive editor.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Houses are built brick-by-brick. HOMEs are built word-by-word. Houses don't build themselves. So YOU must build your home
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: ANGERSome Dreams Lead In AngerEven The Coolest People Have Their Limits.While In Anger,Your Mouth Works Faster Than MindEvery Level Of Anger Comes With Another Level Of PainSELF MOTIVATIONUnwarp YourselfOpen The Knot in Which You Were Tied YourselfThe Faces That You Wear Aren't You.You Are What You Wish pinched the peak of madness
Author: Shashi Dhar

Quote: Make their hate your stepping stones towards achieving something greater. This will be the best revenge you can give — by proving to people that they are wrong about you, and that you are better than they could ever imagine.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: A leaders gentle reaction and sound instruction are their greatest weapons.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: An angry leader is a scared leader or a hurt leader or a frustrated leader but most of all they are a vulnerable leader.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: When a man is at peace he is a man, when angry he is an animal.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you cannot stop yourself from getting angry, then at least get angry about things that matters.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The major problem of the world is, most of the people are unjustifiably angry and very few are loving.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Anger is the most effective inspiration.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: ...it’s so awesome to be Human; we have His ability to feel, we can choose what we want to see based on our feelings… and when we choose to see the goodness around us, we amplify it and increase it to its never-ending limits...
Author: Jayendra Puri Goswami, The Creator's Child

Quote: Greatness in the making feels just like you feel right now. Time will soon tell.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: success and failure is like two sides of coin depends on your willingness.
Author: Wasim Malik

Quote: A true hero make people feel like he is part of their family.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Don't let fear outweigh what you feel.
Author: Samantha Leahy

Quote: When a man is pushed, tormented, defeated, he has a chance to learn something.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: Be careful! If the opinion of others is your gauge, then it is also your goal. If you concern yourself with what others think, then you can only go as far as others think. You're better than that!
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Simplicity is complex. It's never simple to keep things simple. Simple solutions require the most advanced thinking.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: Your Results will only change when you change your mindset, thinking and actions.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Don't be an escort to people on their way to success, for it is equally as if you're a sign post, leading the way, and rusting at the end.
Author: Michael Bassey Johnson

Quote: Most of the people will try to prove your right ideas as wrong, so share your ideas carefully or not at all.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Your most important task as a leader is to teach people how to think and ask the right questions so that the world doesn't go to hell if you take a day off.
Author: Jeffrey Pfeffer

Quote: We naturally think from our own perspective, from a point of view which tends to privilege our position. Fairness implies the treating of all relevant viewpoints alike without reference to one's own feelings or interests. Because we tend to be biased in favor of our own viewpoint, it is important to keep the standard of fairness at the forefront of our thinking. This is especially important when the situation may call on us to see things we don't want to see, or give something up that we want to hold onto.
Author: Linda Elder, The Miniature Guide to Critical Thinking: Concepts and Tools

Quote: Don’t let either hate or evil conquer you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, On Eagles Wings:Rise

Quote: Bureaucrats and Politicians are different people, work of Bureaucrats makes us hate Politicians.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You might hate a successful person, but you can not hate a true hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You never require a teacher to lead you into the wrong path, but you do require a kindly word to conduct you aright.
Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

Quote: Just handle what's in front of you now. and the future will take care of itself. Otherwise, you'll spend most of your life wondering which foot you'll use to step off the curb when you're still only halfway to the corner.
Author: Dan Millman, Sacred Journey of the Peaceful Warrior

Quote: Sustainable change, after all, depends not upon compliance with external mandates or blind adherence to regulation, but rather upon the pursuit of the greater good.
Author: Douglas B. Reeves, Leading Change in Your School: How to Conquer Myths, Build Commitment, and Get Results

Quote: Two wrongs' create an additional problem.'A wrong' plus 'A right' creates a remorse.'Two rights' create a solution.
Author: Emmanuel Aghado

Quote: Making new good memories -possible,Going back in your good memories -impossible,Do possible and don't think about impossible -happiness.
Author: omer dar

Quote: If you help them (the crew) create good memories, they'll forget all the bad stuff
Author: Geoff Dyer, Another Great Day at Sea: Life Aboard the USS George H.W. Bush

Quote: We need to take things personally. We need to stop putting profits above people. We need to stop putting greed above need. We need to stop putting the rule of gold above the golden rule. We need to treat people as people and not as problems.
Author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

Quote: Democracy is probably the only discovery by mankind which mostly brought it only happiness.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Pages entertain me more than pictures do.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: One thing I will surely miss is that I couldn't read all the good books in this lifetime.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Any work is always improvable, you cannot really finish the work, you can only abandon it out of tiredness or incompetence.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Beauty is more popular than virtues because it is more visible than virtues.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Few people when meet first time they feel that meeting each other was the purpose of their life.
Author: Amit Kalantri, One Bucket of Tears

Quote: Your shyness alone will bring you more emotional and material losses than all of your other negative attributes.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: She simply converted an average face into beautiful face and a beautiful face into an angelic face.
Author: Amit Kalantri, One Bucket of Tears

Quote: The fastest and easiest way to accomplish any task is to do it with minimum breaks and pauses.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Dance was her style, dance was her fashion.
Author: Amit Kalantri, One Bucket of Tears

Quote: People need appreciation from more persons than they need love from one person.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you are not satisfied with the things you have got then stop crying and start working and go get those things that will satisfy you.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Consistency simplifies the problem more than hard work of one time because no problem cannot possibly beat you everyday.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: With true love you can win one person, with true passion you can win the world.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: We don't like security rules and laws, but without them men will be animals, perhaps the most dangerous animals.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: There are no boring jobs, only boring men.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You may not appreciate the presence of good health, but you will definitely regret the absence of good health, because health is happiness.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: An ordinary man gets arrogant with beauty, conceited with knowledge and ruthless with power.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Eccentricity of a creative mind may not be pleasing for the people around it, but it is important for the progress.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Adversity sure does gives you trouble, but it keeps you humble.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You will have relatively less problems to solve, if you don't confuse problems with inconveniences.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I decided to do the easy task of changing situations and conditions by being a hero, than staying back to do the difficult task of changing people by being just a man.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Accept the ego of extraordinary people as they have achieved something but don't accept the ego of ordinary people.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Youth is the most suitable age to enjoy the life completely or to work diligently for the life, what you decide makes your rest of the life ordinary or legendary respectively.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: A certain way to have financial security in life is not enough savings, but enough ability.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You need not to love everyone, but you need to be polite with everyone, people will appreciate your politeness more than your love, because politeness is sweeter than love.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I never encountered any crisis in life, because I solved my problems before they turned into crisis.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Saying "thank you" signifies sense of gratitude, but it also implies your incapability.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Ability and talent never loose the value, because demand for it highly exceeds the supply of it.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Memories make you sentimental, experiences make you smart.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: It is a courage which can find the solution to every problem, not the intelligence.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: I agree that sometimes it is difficult to choose between right and wrong, but not between right and stupid.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: All the successful personalities had one common element, they all liked reading books.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Just read one book a month and at the end of they year you would be totally different but an impressive personality.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Remember, crowd doesn't care about common sense.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You can survive without artistry, but you cannot live without artistry.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If a person loves you but doesn't respect you then it can not be a real love. It is not possible to love them without respecting them.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Majority wins, but majority is not necessarily right and sometimes majority is awfully wrong.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: So many love affairs doesn't survive, because the couple has been very loving to each other but with the time they stop respecting each other.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Show some mercy to your 'time', don't always waste it.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People crave for more respect than love, because they expect love only from few people but they want respect from everyone.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: To keep your conscience at peace and your respect at high, don't follow those orders which make no sense.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Hero' is not an official status or designation, but if the world recognize you as a hero, it is the highest honor you will ever receive.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I have been loved enough, now I want to be respected.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If people respect your age and not your personality, then it's time for you to do some urgent introspection.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I want people to respect me and not just my position.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: True humanity demands that every human should be loved equally, but if that's not possible for you then at least love whoever you wants to but respect everyone.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Growing age can kill the beauty, not the style.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Rationality and common sense never goes out of fashion.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Heroes are hero no matter if everybody is watching them or nobody watching them.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The position of a hero is not for the comparision, it is a reference point
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Your position may be highly powerful, but you will be a hero only when you are highly respected.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Your wishes doesn't come true, because there is someone else who is wishing harder and trying harder for the same wish.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Heroes are the most wanted and most needed people in the world.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Sometimes a hero is unbelievably good for so many but terribly bad for someone else.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Winners of some competition are not heroes, heroes are not found in the competition, heroes win much more severe battles than competition to become heroes.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Leaders console the world with their speeches, heroes console the world with their actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you achieve a success not achieved by anyone else and not possible to achieve by anyone else then you are the hero of your generation.
