Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: There will never be complete satisfaction in the life, satisfaction is an illusion, there is only heroism.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you are the hero of your family, there is very good chance that one day you will be the hero of the world.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: There are those who hold first rankers and there are those who are heroes.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Everything is going to be fine now because heroes are here.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: People have seen too many common people like them, and they are bored by it. They need heroes.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I was just trying to be a very good human, instead I became a hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Heroism of your father doesn't make you a hero, heroism of you doesn't make your son a hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Today is my last day as a human, tomorrow I am going to be a hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Stretch yourself a bit to know the difference between humans and heroes.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: A charming girl gets more proposals than a beautiful girl.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Great women aren't born great, they become great.
Author: Sabrina Newby

Quote: To be great is not a word but work that makes a word.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: It is never an idea, technology, market forces, or access to capital that makes a company innovative. What differentiates an innovative company from an average company is the people working inside the company.
Author: Jag Randhawa, The Bright Idea Box: A Proven System to Drive Employee Engagement and Innovation

Quote: No, I don't admire the genius. But I admire and love the result of the genius's activity in the world, of which the great man is only the poor necessary tool, only, so to speak, the paltry awl to bore with.
Author: Knut Hamsun, Mysteries

Quote: A surrendered heart leads to greatness. A stubborn heart leads to struggle.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: Expression is saying what you wish to say, Impression is saying what others wish to hear.
Author: Krishna Saagar

Quote: When you have nothing to say, don't.
Author: Krishna Saagar

Quote: I believe "Leadership" is creating the environment for the greatness in people to emerge.
Author: Ziad K. Abdelnour, Economic Warfare: Secrets of Wealth Creation in the Age of Welfare Politics

Quote: The only permission, the only validation, and the only opinion that matters in our quest for greatness is our own.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Impossible is nothing.
Author: Muhammad Ali

Quote: Use your hater to make you greater!
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Lies can't grow. Once plucked they can only wither. But every truth, once planted, grows into a tall, noble tree.
Author: Stefan Emunds

Quote: If a ruler who wants to act honourably is surrounded by unscrupulous men, his downfall is inevitable.
Author: C.J. Sansom, Dissolution

Quote: Hollow Horn Bear knew that to be leader and adviser of his people he must be honest and reliable, and that his word once given in promise must never be taken back. He knew that he must be a man of will-power, standing for the right no matter what happened to him personally; that he must have strength of purpose, allowing no influence to turn him from doing what was best for the tribe. He must be willing to serve his people without thought of pay. He must be utterly unselfish and kind-hearted to the old and poor and stand ready to give to those in need. Above all, he must be unafraid to deal equal justice to all.
Author: Luther Standing Bear, My Indian Boyhood

Quote: Honesty has a power that very few people can handle
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: The great man will come when all of us are feeling great, not when all of us are feeling small. He will ride in at some splendid moment when we all feel that we could do without him."We are then able to answer in some manner the question, "Why have we no great men?" We have no great men chiefly because we are always looking for them. We are connoisseurs of greatness, and connoisseurs can never be great; we are fastidious, that is, we are small."When Diogenes went about with a lantern looking for an honest man, I am afraid he had very little time to be honest himself And when anybody goes about on his hands and knees looking for a great man to worship, he is making sure that one man at any rate shall not be great."Now, the error of Diogenes is evident. The error of Diogenes lay in the fact that he omitted to notice that every man is both an honest man and a dishonest man. Diogenes looked for his honest man inside every crypt and cavern; but he never thought of looking inside the thief.
Author: G.K. Chesterton, Charles Dickens

Quote: An honest man speaks truth, don't expect him to speak sweet.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: An honest man is a debtless man, he doesn't owe anyone anything.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: We live in a world full of duplicity.We are surrounded by people with duplicitous nature.They will be shooting arrows to question our honesty at every step we make.Therefore,it is our duty to protect ourselves by using our integrity as an armor and march forward, victoriously.
Author: Indy Bissessur

Quote: Integrity is the sentry for the conscious soul.
Author: Molly Friedenfeld, The Book of Simple Human Truths

Quote: Until you try to fly, you will never know how high you can soar.
Author: George "GM64" Mercado

Quote: The burden of knowledge is lighter than the joy of ignorance.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: Do not give up when touching the Door of Awareness, you meet its Mindfulness Magic, but let it open wide giving your family a possibility to Create Reality of Your Dreams.
Author: Nataša Nuit Pantović, Conscious Parenting: Mindful Living Course for Parents

Quote: You can't judge your parenting by the choices of your kids.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: You don't gain authority by raising your voice. You prove you don't have any.
Author: Benjamin Lotter, Parenting Pitfalls: Common Parenting Mistakes and Common Sense Solutions

Quote: You don't gain authority by raising your voice. You prove you don't any.
Author: Benjamin Lotter, Parenting Pitfalls: Common Parenting Mistakes and Common Sense Solutions

Quote: Most kids act out because they want your attention. Don't spank your child show them some attention.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: We’ll never solve the problems we don’t talk about.
Author: Justin Young

Quote: There’s one thing you can start doing right now that will change how you communicate with any young human: Remember what it’s like to be one.
Author: Justin Young

Quote: Leadership is giving out far more than one expects in direct return. The rewards are intangible, yet priceless.
Author: T Jay Taylor

Quote: What we are most passionate about becomes our legacy.
Author: Mike Crump

Quote: Many men have children, but not many children have 'Fathers'. Age releases to you reproductive skills. Fatherhood requires LEADERSHIP skills
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: The Tone is the Message.
Author: Kevin T. McCarney, The Secrets of Successful Communication: A Simple Guide to Effective Encounters in Business

Quote: Sometimes silence can kill that a sword cannot
Author: Mohammed Mushtaq GK

Quote: Silence is for fools. Communication is for leaders. Justice is for those brave enough to not stand another moment dealing with people that feel the solution to any problem is through cold indifference because of their lack of courage and insecurities.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Devote yourself to reading of Scriptures.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: God will never forsake you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If your heart is pure, you block any harm.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The blessings of God are inexhaustible.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Don't be in a hurry in life. The sacred-time determines the due events.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: I thank the Lord daily for His glorious blessings.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Without the knowledge of the Scriptures, we fail to pray effectively.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Even Satan can quote scripture out of context why are we surprised when men do it.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Using a combination of history, common sense, the Word of God and the Spirit of God, every leader can generally predict the way things will go.
Author: Dag Heward-Mills, The Art of Leadership

Quote: We shouldn't go to the Bible to back up what we believe. We should look to the Bible to determine what we believe.
Author: Jayce O'Neal

Quote: In life, you have a choice to be better or bitter.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: It’s such an amazing awakening to realize that nothing in this universe happens TO YOU, 100% happens FOR YOU.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: One of the biggest mistakes that a lot of people make, is that they are in the habit of working out only when they feel out of shape or when the weather is about to warm up. But when they succeed in getting back in shape, they would stop exercising out again. One of the problems with this is that going up and down in weight is absolutely not good for your heart and your health in general.Therefore, push yourself to exercise for health reasons. Which means working out all year round; instead of only working out when the summer is approaching or exercising when you are feeling overweight. You truly owe good health to your body. Try not to disappoint yourself.
Never stop feeling the amazement of partaking in one of the most incredible journeys you will ever walk, the walk of life. " ~ Roy Hale
Author: Roy Hale

Quote: Your mind is a powerful tool. Learn how to harness this power and your life will be filled with great things.
Author: Teresa Garcia

Quote: Happiness is achieved when you stop waiting for your life to begin and start making the most of the moment you are in.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Life is a gift. Treat each moment with anticipation and gratitude.
Author: Christopher Earle

Quote: No one makes a lock without a key. That's why God won't give you difficulties without a solution!Your current situation may look Horrorful but don't worry your future will be colourful.
Author: Emmanuel Eliason-Armstrong

Quote: Accept 'what is' they say. What if I don't want to?
Author: Juliette Power

Quote: Accept 'what is' they say. What if I don't want to?- Juliette Power
Author: Juliette Power

Quote: The best things occur when you challenge yourself and face your fears. If you think of your greatest achievements and take an inventory of the times you have demonstrated to yourself (and others) just how strong you are, you will notice it has never been while remaining within your comfort zone doing things that are easy and familiar to you.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: Dream Big! Never apologize for it!
Author: Mignon' Talise Padilla

Quote: Leadership isn't about age but rather, leadership is about influence, impact & inspiration.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: A good leader is not elected, he is appointed.
Author: Andrew-Knox B Kaniki

Quote: Never see adversity as a disability,rather see it as a specia-ability. As an opportunity to believe, an opportunity to accomplish
Author: karan godara

Quote: I'm born with wild horses in my head..With an imagination to conquer this world..I will not settle for comforts of a golden cage.
Author: Jasz Gill

Quote: Personal transformation is an internal job.No one can change you without you first wanting the change for yourself. The transformation starts in your thoughts! Only you can decide to change your thoughts and thus your behavior.
Author: Michelle Word Hollis, A Book of Pearlables: Affirmations for Promises and Provisions

Quote: Don't fear the world and you will conquer it, fear it and it conquers you - rjs
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Man is whoever he thinks he is, within his own boundaries.
Author: Dudley Davidson-Jarrett, Undue Rewards

Quote: No one in this room is identical. We all have something unique to offer. It is the responsibility of each of us to realize what that is – to fulfill our destiny. Imagine the awesomeness – the potential we would have if we worked together for a change.
Author: Aaron B. Powell

Quote: I only wish to read, think and write.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Keep strong and affirm the Scriptures daily.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I am not surprised by any situation. The Saviour is my strength.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I am on earth to live my very best life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: As long as I breathe, I live in love, in the light of life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: May the Creator guide you in unfamiliar path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: God gives wisdom to who dare ask for it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: The holy people delights in the Lord.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: We are all wonderful souls.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: He who loves his job, will own it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Adversity precedes spiritual rebirth.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Substance is like tree and smartness its shadow. The smartness is what we think it is and the substance is the real thing!
Author: Utpal Vaishnav

Quote: Our character develops with endurance of every circumstance.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Reputation is an invisible force that works for or against you based on the efforts you put to persevere building your character
Author: Hiyamedia

Quote: It is with words that my heart sings, with the substance of integrity my character soars and without regret I look back smiling ~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: I'm not concerned with whether you got to the top. I want to know how far you climbed. That is where the real achievement is found.
Author: William James Moore, On Character and Mental Toughness

Quote: Where your flesh is in front, your future is behind.
Author: Paul Enenche

Quote: A leader is not authenticated by title or position, but by character and influence, most important by leading among the pack and not in front.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: The character to follow thru on commitments made to others is built by following thru on commitments made to self.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: You can’t be a successful leader or mentor until you have served. You can’t serve until you have stepped out of your comfort zone. And you can’t step out of your comfort zone unless you have character and keep your word.
Author: Bill Courtney, Against the Grain: A Coach's Wisdom on Character, Faith, Family, and Love

Quote: Never underestimate the capacity of people to choose the easy way.
Author: William James Moore, On Character and Mental Toughness

Quote: When making the problem go away is more important than solving the problem leadership begins to fail. The easy way vs. The character way.
Author: William James Moore, On Character and Mental Toughness

Quote: If you want to become successful, then first become the person who can be successful.
Author: SuccessCoach Nilesh, Go for Success: Be a Champion by 6 Effective Steps

Quote: It's nice to be liked, but it's better to be respected.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Your talent and giftedness as a leader have the potential to take you farther than your character can sustain you. That ought to scare you.
Author: Andy Stanley, Next Generation Leader: 5 Essentials for Those Who Will Shape the Future

Quote: The road is long if one proceeds by way of precepts but short and effectual if by way of personal example.
Author: Seneca, Letters from a Stoic

Quote: If you don't demonstrate leadership character, your skills and your results will be discounted, if not dismissed.
Author: Mark      Miller, The Heart of Leadership: Becoming a Leader People Want to Follow

Quote: Leadership consists of nothing but taking responsibility for everything that goes wrong and giving your subordinates credit for everything that goes well.
Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

Quote: Great men are strong men with great leadership qualities. They inspire others to be loving and caring like themselves. By this their character is made stronger.
Author: Ellen J. Barrier

Quote: Individual effort is good but collective effort is better. We need a NETWORK of nation builders
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Character is contagious.
Author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

Quote: A tough hide with a tender heart is a goal that all leaders must have.
Author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

Quote: People will follow you when you build the character to follow through.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: Democracy changes its opinions from time to time, philosophy doesn't.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Good governance is about nothing more or less than creating happiness. It really is that simple.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: Every nation needs more people who love liberty, fear mob rule, and hate tyranny with the consistent logic and passion of Alexis de Tocqueville. He is still quoted by presidential candidates, but too often he’s ignored by presidents, and therein lies the danger. Tocqueville reads beautifully but governs even better.
Author: John Mark Reynolds, The Great Books Reader: Excerpts and Essays on the Most Influential Books in Western Civilization

Quote: There could be nothing more fortunate for human affairs than that by the mercy of God they who are endowed with true piety of life if they have the skill for ruling people should also have the power.
Author: Augustine of Hippo, City of God

Quote: Since when has leadership been a criterion for sanity? Or vice versa. Hitler was a gifted leader, even Nixon. Exhibit leadership qualities as an adolescent, they pack you off to law school for an anus transplant. If it takes, you go into government.
Author: Tom Robbins, Still Life with Woodpecker

Quote: The challenge has always been that "good people" don't know how to win elections
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Any government has as much of a duty to avoid war as a ship's captain has to avoid a shipw
Author: Guy de Maupassant, Collected Stories of Guy De Maupassant

Quote: Sometimes, the ocean floor is only a stop on the journey. And it is when you are at this lowest point, that you are faced with a choice. You can stay there at the bottom, until you drown. Or you can gather pearls and rise back up — stronger from the swim and richer from the jewels.
Author: Yasmin Mogahed, Reclaim Your Heart: Personal Insights on Breaking Free from Life's Shackles

Quote: Trust your journey, trust the process, raise your energy and the right people will come into your life
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: A great leader never fears criticism and welcomes them with openness and love as if they are the beauty of the journey.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Great leaders create memorable journeys
Author: John  Stein, Building the Pyramid

Quote: Great journeys live long in the memory of those who participate in them
Author: John  Stein, Building the Pyramid

Quote: Sometimes you have to try all options to find out the best one for you.!
Author: Best-Quote

Quote: Letting someone control your life for you and decide what you will be is a sure way of creating things to regret on the day of reckoning.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

Quote: Our being is more important than our doing. We are human beings, acting as though we are human doings. In our frenzied doing, we are often not conscious of our state of being. Yet our deepest impact comes from our state of being because it is at the root of our intentions, our choices, and our behavior.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: War is an option of difficulties.
Author: James Wolfe

Quote: When you learn to say 'NO', you activate the faculty of 'CHOICE' in your mind ! Some of the times you are the chosen one..at other times you CHOOSE for yourself..and saying NO is a sign that one has graduated into becoming a wise CHOICEMAKER ......
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: The only pressure I agree to, is my conscious and not peer pressure.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Life is a choice. Your choices each day determine what outcomes happen in your life. It is by choice, not by chance, that will determine your life. An Unstoppable Life begins by taking responsibility for your choices.
Author: Thomas Narofsky, You are Unstoppable!: Unleash Your Inspired Life

Quote: Life is a series of choices and all we can do is make them.
Author: Kamal Ravikant, Live Your Truth

Quote: We lust after the material things in life, then in a blink of an eye; the life which was once given is taken; is there a point in stressing over the small stuff.
Author: Epiphana Lewis

Quote: Politics was at once clinical and human, driven by principles and passions that he (the leader) had to master and harness for the good of the whole.
Author: Jon Meacham, American Lion: Andrew Jackson in the White House

Quote: Over intellect will make you a genius, over emotions will make you a lunatic.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: It is in the seemingly impossible where we find our true value
Author: Nick Kenens

Quote: It is in the seemingly impossible that we find our true value.
Author: Nick Kenens

Quote: When you feel good about the value you offer the organization, communicating and demonstrating your value to others is much easier.
Author: Bonnie Marcus, The Politics of Promotion: How High-Achieving Women Get Ahead and Stay Ahead

Quote: Be a solution provider and not a part of the problem to be solved
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Bridges are built not to cross over it but it is built to lift you to the other side safely.
Author: Edwin Lawrence

Quote: Be fair, just and kind.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Seek justice: Make a commitment to serve the needs of the ‘least of these’ and give voice to the voiceless.
Author: Artika R. Tyner, The Lawyer as Leader: How to Plant People and Grow Justice

Quote: What is your hands to make a difference in the world?
Author: Artika R. Tyner, The Lawyer as Leader: How to Plant People and Grow Justice

Quote: Research shows that allowing ourselves to forgive and forget can be healthy — it reduces pains, headaches, stress, and leads to a strong immune system. So I say: Why continue to hold grudges? We will just put our health in jeopardy, and lessen the number of pages and chapters that we still need to write in our book of life.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: May you make time to relax and be refreshed.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Motivation may be what starts you off, but it's habit that keeps you going back for more.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: The only pushup you won't be able to do is the one you never do.
Author: Gwen Ro

Quote: Somehow, we have gotten off track from the basics of health and spirituality, and we get in our own way.
Author: Alice McCall, Wellness Wisdom - Inspired by One Woman's Journey with Breast Cancer

Quote: There is no good day or bad day, only good or bad actions.
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: Your morning routine generates a 10x return for good or for bad. Make it good.
Author: Todd Stocker, Becoming The Fulfilled Leader

Quote: Yes it is, because you can only be brave if you're scared.
Author: Laurie Halse Anderson, The Impossible Knife of Memory

Quote: Duty is sinless.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I can forgo my lunch to get the book, I love to read.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Don't take purposeless people as your leaders. Their life is like an empty book with a nice cover paper and you have attempted to buy it. Of which use will it be to you for you to read blank pages.
Author: Israelmore Ayivor

Quote: A person must first learn how to walk on their own before you can guide them in the right direction.
Author: Craig Mercier

Quote: Its all a matter of weeding out the bad and cultivating more productive thoughts. And just like pulling weeds, you have to get to the root otherwise that weed, the self-doubt, that negative programming, will spring back up and shoke off the flower that can blossom for you in the future.Be consistent. Apply that "weed off" whenever you feel the need. Every day see the brighter side of things. Continually tell yourself how lucky you are, how good your life is right now, and how things can only get better
Author: Dave Pelzer, Help Yourself: Finding Hope, Courage, And Happiness

Quote: If it doesn't do you any good, dump it. Take some action, push that lever, flush it away, and don't look back. Take small steps everyday of your life, and start taking control of what you say when you talk to yourself.
Author: Dave Pelzer, Help Yourself: Finding Hope, Courage, And Happiness

Quote: The only way to keep your head above water is to convince yourself you are going to make it.
Author: Dave Pelzer, Help Yourself: Finding Hope, Courage, And Happiness

Quote: Whatever you do, do something positive.
Author: Dave Pelzer, Help Yourself: Finding Hope, Courage, And Happiness

Quote: Inspiration is the power of the soul.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: No road is long enough as long as you "keep on going
Because you are alive and reading thisAnything is Possible
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: Follow your DreamsInstead of following others.
Author: Shashank Rayal

Quote: The only instance where five purely-negative words had had a highly positive, motivational impact are Winston Churchill's, "Never, Never, Never, Never Give-up.
Author: Nabil N. Jamal

Quote: Time, energy, and focus; these are the resources at your disposal each and every day.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Every thing has multiple aspects, it depend on us what we look for and How we look at it.
Author: Shruti Khandelwal

Quote: When people hurt you over and over, think of them like sandpaper. They may scratch and hurt you a bit, but in the end you end up polished and they end up useless.
Author: Andy Biersack

Quote: I am a neighbour king to stretch my branches over him, just as Toghrul sheltered me when I was a weed-stalk next to a strong tree.
Author: Bryn  Hammond, Amgalant Two: Tribal Brawls

Quote: Nixon under pressure turned only to reporters from publications already favorable to him; Kennedy, in trouble, turned to those most critical and dubious of him, and if anything tended to take those already for him a bit for granted.
Author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

Quote: They (the media) found little quality of depth to him, that when she said on the platform with that which he said to them in private. The qualities of introspection and reflectiveness that they particularly treasured were missing.
Author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

Quote: One of the ladies asked about that awful Bobby Kennedy, and Goldwater responded by speaking about the attorney general with touching affection. (Mary) McGrory recalled how Jack Kennedy behaved at a similar stage in his campaign: spouting statistics, attacking carefully chosen enemies and puffing all the right friends, quoting dead Greeks, never cracking a joke lest he remind the voters how young he was.
Author: Rick Perlstein, Before the Storm: Barry Goldwater and the Unmaking of the American Consensus

Quote: A commander's pride got his soldiers dead.
Author: Tom Clancy, Executive Orders

Quote: The factor that made him so powerful was also his greatest liability.
Author: Peter Heather, The Fall of the Roman Empire: A New History of Rome and the Barbarians

Quote: It often seems as though the silent, humble servant is secretly wiser and more discerning than the haughty master; yet through dutiful (and sometimes insecure) surrender he continues to serve and carry out petty orders in loyal acquiescence.
Author: Criss Jami, Healology

Quote: If you're a boss, and not a leader, your time is limited.
Author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

Quote: The counselee should be aware that you are not God. Better yet, she should be aware that you are aware that you are not God.
Author: James MacDonald, Christ-Centered Biblical Counseling: Changing Lives with God's Changeless Truth

Quote: Vision and persistence will take you to the top of the leadership mountain, but only humility will keep you there.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: The immediate reactions of the two superpower leaders when confronted with the gravest international crisis of their careers were much the same, shock, wounded pride, grim determination, and barely repressed fear.
Author: Michael Dobbs

Quote: Great leaders are the first to say, “I was wrong. Let’s make a change.
Author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

Quote: The author describes megalomania as seen in Chairman Mao by saying that what he was familiar with, he was really familiar with. This zeal moved the megalomaniac with a complete lack of appreciation for what he DID NOT know.
Author: David Halberstam, The Coldest Winter: America and the Korean War

Quote: Confident and courageous leaders have no problems pointing out their own weaknesses and ignorance.
Author: Thom S. Rainer

Quote: No one is charismatic. Someone becomes charismatic in history, socially. The question for me is once again the problem of humility. If the leader discovers that he is becoming charismatic not because of his or her qualities but because mainly he or she is being able to express the expectations of a great mass of people, then he or she is much more of a translator of the aspirations and dreams of the people, instead of being the creator of the dreams. In expressing the dreams, he or she is recreating these dreams. If he or she is humble, I think that the danger of power would diminish.
Author: Myles Horton, We Make the Road by Walking: Conversations on Education and Social Change

Quote: The immortality of Thomas Jefferson does not lie in any one of his achievements, or in the series of his achievements, but in his attitude towards mankind and the conception which he sought to realize in action of the service owed by America to the rest of the world...Thomas Jefferson was a great leader of men because he understood and interpreted the spirits of men.
Author: Woodrow Wilson, The Papers of Woodrow Wilson, Vol. 36

Quote: If you want something different, do something different. "Same crap, different day" doesn't describe the day; it describes your attitude towards it.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Always dream big because once you stop dreaming you stop living.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: New beginnings can be painful ends. What your attitude is changes ends into new beginnings.
Author: Maurice Duffy

Quote: The humble one is the better one.
Author: Lik Hock Yap

Quote: Life Sucks. True, but it depends what you let it suck out of you – Pain or Fun!
Author: Yatin Patel

Quote: No matter what, its always an opportunity.
Author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders

Quote: Tears of my Hard Work,are enough to fill the Ocean of my Dreams.
Author: Shashank Rayal

Quote: ReThink culture, because it is the foundation of all strategic success.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: ReThink your success mindset: In life, the stuff that really matters most, is invisible, but palpable.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: The few individuals who are capable of spontaneous and joyous effort stand out. These are the select men, the nobles, the only ones who are active and not merely reactive, for whom life is a perpetual striving, an incessant course of training.
Author: Ortega y Gasset José

Quote: Being willing to listen to others and let them speak into our lives is a critical attitude leaders must have. It is not weakness to get good advice - it is strength to seek it out.
Author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

Quote: It's not what you eat that will kill you as much as what is eating you.
Author: Orrin Woodward, LIFE

Quote: God performs His promises.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I have what I need. This is enough.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Don't get caught in the trap of always "Needing" something. Needing something always projects your mind into the future as if you have it and is the opposite of gratitude. Be content in the present moment.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: Qualifications or not without gratitude you not qualified enough to be a leader.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: I am hopeful because love overflows from my heart. Gratitude for beauty and life leads my way.
Author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

Quote: Embrace the change you desperately need. Tear down your walls and show gratitude for little things.
Author: J. Loren Norris

Quote: I am ambitious. I set goals; not because I am ungrateful for what I have, but because I am happy with who I am. I enjoy the experience of rising above my perceived limitations and discovering new levels of my capabilities.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Think Upside Down Live Rightside Up
Author: Bardi Toto, Thinking Upside Down Living Rightside Up

Quote: No two stories are the same. They may seem the same at first glance, but, once you take a closer look, give the story some of your time, you realise its unique qualities.
Author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Pessimism

Quote: Live your life in such a way that it is going to be the favorite story of your generation and generations to come.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I'm alive now, but I don't know if I will be tomorrow. The state of being alive is not guaranteed, but should I let that stop me from living?
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

Quote: Every nation can harness the energy of its citizens, either towards constructive work to generate optimism and hope, or towards tensions, unrest and war.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: REAL Leaders are experts at bringing out the best in others... Thinking , feelings and actions. They improve their teams' thinking skills and Mindsets.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Performance depends upon our actions an behaviors, which are activated by emotions, which are created when our MINDSET meets reality... Mindsets Matter Most
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: With the right Mindset...effective thinking is automatic.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: There are two words that I believe could be completely eradicated from our vocabulary – “I can’t.” These two words are so definite that they leave absolutely no room for hope. Instead, I suggest we use the phrase, “How can I?
Author: Daniel Willey

Quote: Today is a new day. Even if you were wrong yesterday, you can get it right today.
Author: Dwight Howard

Quote: Life is a one shot deal, it is entirely up to you what you do with it. Me? I intend to make it the best I can, for as long as I can.
Author: Akiroq Brost

Quote: You don't see the world as it is, you see it,as you are.
Author: Krishna Saagar

Quote: Political judgment is the ability to hear the distant hoofbeats of the horse of history.
Author: Otto von Bismarck

Quote: Author points out in Woodrow Wilson the flipside of the positive we might call big picture vision. He observes that as college president Wilson resorted to the language of a national crusade when he met resistance in a local, academic issue.
Author: David Pietrusza, 1920: The Year of the Six Presidents

Quote: Sometimes it is our mistakes that make us the best among men in the world. if we listen to the voices of the world, they speak not to degrade us but to encourage us to overcome that which we have been ultimately blessed with... for what more could we lose if we never choose to overcome anything? I tell you that you are dead if you are foolish enough to not try.
Author: Danish Sayanee

Quote: Instead of allowing a situation to alter your attitude negatively. Let your positive attitude alter the situation.
Author: karan godara

Quote: Let lessons learnt be like fingers burned. Gentle reminders imploring us to stay away from fire.
Author: karan godara

Quote: Flowers wither away when put through harsh conditions. Humans, on the other hand, have a choice. A choice to wither away or blossom.
Author: karan godara

Quote: Let lessons learnt be like fingers burned. Gentle reminders imploring us to stay away from fire. It is a mark of folly to make the same mistake twice.
Author: karan godara

Quote: All we must do is take small steps. Steps with the belief that someday, all those small steps will culminate into a giant leap, a fitting finale.
Author: karan godara

Quote: I did not know of any single soul who succeed in life without a mentorship.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Perhaps I lost sight of my dreams when I became an adult and resigned myself to acting the way adults were supposed to act.
Author: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari

Quote: Some of us teach ourselves and our children to love the superficial outer; our looks, hair, skin, clothes rather than the greater beauty that resides within whereas it is that inner beauty that really defines you and who you truly are
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Try and avoid people who use the word "cant" regularly associate rather with those who say "can" and do
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: No matter how far you have gone down the road its never too late to stop and reinvent yourself
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Within us all are sages, warriors and fools; we more often that not choose the fools
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: In any given situation you will find only what you bring with you...
Author: Christopher Earle

Quote: Not to get all Zen on you, but maybe you should love yourself more.
Author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips, First Star I See Tonight

Quote: Being happy is a requisite for longevity.
Author: Chidi Prosper Agbugba

Quote: All bad things, like good things, must end.
Author: Nihar Sharma, The Battlefield Flower

Quote: So many times we have told ourselves that we are not good enough. So many times the world has told us too. It is in those times that we must find ourselves and do the best we can. You and I today, let’s prove the world wrong.
Author: Nihar Sharma, The Battlefield Flower

Quote: Motivation is the first step in achieving your dreams!
Author: Craig Mercier, The Book of Craigisms

Quote: The commencement of true happiness is the realization that your happiness begins with you.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: The peak of happiness is attained when a person has accepted to be what he is.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: First seek happiness from within, then you will find it without.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: Happiness does not completely depend on comforts or opulence. Even a pauper can be happier than a prince.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: All of us are in the manufacturing industry - manufacturing either our own happiness or unhappiness.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: There is a good life. The goodnews is that you can live that good life. The good life is the happy life. To live this good life, be happy! A truly happy man is a good man.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: Happiness is a journey, not a journey's end.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: They told me that nothing was a sin, just a poor life choice. Poor impulse control. That nothing is evil. Any concept of right versus wrong, according to them, is merely a cultural construct relative to one specific time and place. They said that if anything should force us to modify our personal behavior it should be our allegiance to a social contract, not some vague, externally imposed threat of flaming punishment.
Author: Chuck Palahniuk, Damned

Quote: What you think of me does not change who I am.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you go through the hot furnace of hardships, you will be refined like gold.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Don’t wait till you have grey hair before you believe people will take you seriously because scientifically, grey hair is a sign of old age and not necessarily of wisdom.
Author: Nana Awere Damoah, I Speak of Ghana

Quote: Serving my generation with excellence will in turn mean my generation can lead with excellence.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: When your youth is about to enter in old age it shouldn't wonder, what happened? it must say, well done.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I believe that the choice not to have a choice is a choice in itself
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: I believe that the choice not to have a choice is a choice in itself.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: He was the subject of a little respectful ribbing. But he was, of course, the captain, which meant he had to do lots of the ribbing himself.
Author: Geoff Dyer, Another Great Day at Sea: Life Aboard the USS George H.W. Bush

Quote: Remain open-minded, even when you believe yourself to be a king among peasants. You never know what blessings can be gained or crises averted just by listening.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: Urgency means paying the details the attention they deserve, with the respect they deserve, without delay.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: You are mostly treated by others, the way you deserve.
Author: Krishna Saagar

Quote: We are enjoined whenever we behold the gifts of God in others so to reverence and respect the gifts as also to honor those in whom they reside.
Author: John Calvin, Institutes of the Christian Religion, 2 Vols

Quote: The more you give, the more you get.
Author: Krishna Sagar, Summit Your Everest: Your Coach for Obstacle & Failure Management

Quote: Respect can only be given to those who have earned it by working for it.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: If the Times gave readers far more news, then Lippmann at the Trib made the world seem far more understandable.
Author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

Quote: Just as he was slowly bringing order to his own internal life, he would also bring order to his language.
Author: David Brooks

Quote: The concert we give is winning. And if all the people in our organization whose instrument is scouting of player development or major league scouting or player knowledge, all play well, we're going to have the most beautiful symphony of success. And I think we have.
Author: John Schuerholz

Quote: Great Leaders develop through a never ending process of self-study, self-reflection, education, training, and experience
Author: Tony Buon, The Leadership Coach

Quote: I was not a great communicator, but I communicated great things.
Author: Ronald Reagan

Quote: I discovered that night (in his college's student politics) that an audience has a feel to it, and, in the parlance of the theater, that audience and I were together.
Author: Ronald Reagan

Quote: The thing about language is that once you start getting analytical about it, you can't stop.
Author: Gregory C. Carlson, Sold on Language: How Advertisers Talk to You and What This Says About You

Quote: If you criticize others’ ideas, they will almost never use yours no matter how good they are.
Author: Garrison Wynn, The Real Truth about Success: What the Top 1 Percent Do Differently, Why They Won't Tell You, and How You Can Do It Anyway

Quote: Choose your words meticulously and then let them rumble up from some deep furnace of conviction.
Author: Ron Suskind, A Hope in the Unseen: An American Odyssey from the Inner City to the Ivy League

Quote: All power lies in free expression.
Author: Krishna Sagar, Summit Your Everest: Your Coach for Obstacle & Failure Management

Quote: It takes only an apostrophe to make the word impossible possible according to the word itself
Author: ABC

Quote: Seek to know thy higher self.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: I am a great mother.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Be greatly encouraged!
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Although there are things that just tend to rub you the wrong way too! Smile and move on your choice!
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Don't be soo afraid to fall, that you don't even chase for success.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Let go of a need for personal recognition. Heap kudos on others and they’ll perform even better next time. Leaders are only as good as those who follow them and followers are at their best when leaders are quick to give credit for successes.
Author: Steve Goodier

Quote: You're going to act like a happy man. I know, I know. It's the hardest role in the world.
Author: Pat Conroy, South of Broad

Quote: No one can make you dwell on the past. Control your thoughts and actions! Make your own decisions! Just because someone keeps bringing up your past doesn’t mean you have to accept it --- you are not obligated to accommodate their recollections of you.
Author: Michelle Word Hollis, A Book of Pearlables: Affirmations for Promises and Provisions

Quote: It was typical of the American to identify the one unfinished strand.
Author: Davis Bunn, Lion of Babylon

Quote: Today i am feeling proud that i have a greatest teacher. My encouragement my motivation and my leader is only one that is my teacher. From silent to talkative from dread to cheer all credit goes to teacher for their such a encouragement.
Author: Avinash Advani

Quote: People work harder, longer, and more creatively if they are motivated by the intrinsic pleasure of their work. Managers must do everything they can to make the value of jobs obvious and the joy in them accessible.
Author: Robert Watson, Leadership Secrets of the Salvation Army

Quote: Teach them the quiet words of kindness, to live beyond themselves. Urge them toward excellence, drive them toward gentleness, pull them deep into yourself, pull them upward toward manhood, but softly like an angel arranging clouds. Let your spirit move through them softly.
Author: Pat Conroy, The Prince of Tides

Quote: If you can still write in spite of the fact that you're not getting paid, that nobody cares about what you're writing, that nobody wants to publish it, that everybody is telling you to do something else, and you still want to and you still enjoy it and you can't stop doing it...then you're a writer.
Author: Joanne Harris

Quote: You won't ever know, unless you try!
Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

Quote: It's faith that will take you through and determination that will drive you.
Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett, Neglected But Undefeated

Quote: On Lee as commander: "He had a cheerful dignity and could praise them (his men) without seeming to court their favor.
Author: Shelby Foote, The Civil War, Vol. 1: Fort Sumter to Perryville

Quote: A little knee time first thing in the day keeps u standing all day!
Author: Evinda Lepins

Quote: Josiah became King of Judah at the age of eight. Joan of Arc led the French Army at nineteen. King Tut led all of Egypt at age nine. Age isn't everything you think it is. Your heart and your spirit speak more than a simple candle count on your birthday cake. ~Tony (Exposing ELE)
Author: Rebecca Gober, Exposing ELE

Quote: This was the first piece to the whole story—the beginning.
Author: Sarah Todd Hammer, Determination

Quote: His (Washington's) apparent paralysis was the result of balancing two imperatives: his reputation against the survival of the Continental Army.
Author: Joseph J. Ellis, Revolutionary Summer: The Birth of American Independence

Quote: Some people only go to church for the social life. They like having all the friends in church or getting the praises of men by doing certain things, but they don’t go there to actually worship God. They go there so others can worship THEM instead.
Author: Lisa Bedrick, On the Charismatic Movement

Quote: Don’t just to avoid criticism. If you do nothing, you will be nothing. If you do only the parts you really love, you will also be nothing. It takes what it takes. It takes all of it. Own it, accept it, embrace it and do it. Want all of what you want!
Author: Akiroq Brost

Quote: the only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open.. live wild dont be a normal person.. to become presence, means accepting the risk.. and be sure if u don't take risks u'll have a wasted soul..
Author: Marouane LAASSAFAR

Quote: Acceptance.Good and bad,Fortune and misfortune,Pleasure and pain,I want it all,Because it's mine.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, This Is My Life

Quote: When I accept myself, I am freed from the burden of needing you to accept me.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Ideally, love is unconditional; practically, it is more often the opposite.
Author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

Quote: Sometimes to take two steps in a row, one after the other, I need to make a contract with myself.
Author: Erri De Luca, Tre cavalli

Quote: I do not want peoples to miss me, They just remember me; is more than enough.
Author: Shashank Rayal

Quote: It's Better to Have Something Than Nothing..
Author: Keyur Bhatt

Quote: Ask yourself...If I walk a tight rope,will I fall ,If I shake my balance of thought will it deter me and if I stay focused will I succeed?.~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: The Disciplined Leader is someone who focuses on the 20 percent of activities that drive 80 percent of results.
Author: John    Manning, The Disciplined Leader: Keeping the Focus on What Really Matters

Quote: Entrepreneur, become so disciplined that even your distractions become focused.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Entrepreneur, make today count but don't let the day count you. ~ Onyi Anyado.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: You have to be so disciplined that even your distractions become focused.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Kennedy echoed Stanley Baldwin that a democracy is always two years behind a dictator.
Author: Scott Farris, Kennedy and Reagan: Why Their Legacies Endure

Quote: When you don't know where you are going in life (No Clear Destination), you don't need direction... you need Divine Revelation
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: The hardest and greatest thing a human being can do is submit to his Creator.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Muslims may fall short of Islam but Islam will never fall short of Muslims.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Fear no one except the One.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: If only he could convince her, his dream would be within reach.
Author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

Quote: Failure doesn't define you. It's what you do after the failure that determines whether you are a leader or a waste of perfectly good air.
Author: Sabaa Tahir, A Torch Against the Night

Quote: There is no excuse for failure when you gave up
Author: Shaun Mitchell

Quote: Like words written in the sand taken away by wavesThousands of years of culture discovered in lost cavesClimbing to a mountain at it's highest peakOut of no where strength when thought down and weak
Author: Justin Bienvenue, Like A Box Of Chocolates

Quote: In the pursuit of goals, you cannot give up anytime you feel uncomfortable.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: When failure is hard to take, pain becomes unbearable and you don’t see any way out. Hang on there, its darkest hour that indicates the advent of light.
Author: Evan  Smith

Quote: You can break through every barrier with persistent effort.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It hard to stop the person determined to press onwards.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Jessica Parker. You posses an exceptional gift of leadership. We honor your unwavering determination and your steadfast loyalty. You are a champion of justice and a true visionary guardian of the world.
Author: Kay Cassidy

Quote: Don't put forth for tomorrow what you can do today.
Author: Richmond Akhigbe

Quote: There will be many times in your lives--- at school, and more particularly when you are a grown up---when people will distract or divert you from what needs to be done. You may even welcome the distraction. But if you use it as an excuse for not doing what you suppose to do, you can blame no one but yourself. If you truly wish to accomplish something, you should allow nothing to stop you, and chances are you'll succeed.
Author: Julie Andrews Edwards

Quote: The time to lead is now.
Author: Joelle Charbonneau, Graduation Day

Quote: Somebody needs to be in charge! They may not always like what you’re doing, but press on!” My late uncle, CSM, US Army (Ret) Harris L. Parker, Airborne Ranger, aka Hardcore
Author: Deborah L. Parker, Hardcore Leadership: 11 Master Lessons from My Airborne Ranger Uncle's "Final Jump"

Quote: I am praetor of the legion," Reyna said. "I judge this to be in the best interest of Rome." "To get yourself killed? To break our oldest laws and travel to the Ancient Lands? How will you even find their ship, assuming you survive the journey?" [Octavian]"I will find them," Reyna said.
Author: Rick Riordan, The House of Hades

Quote: Embrace the pain to inherit the gain.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Indeed His blessings are in the struggle.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Opportunity always knocks the door with hurdles. It's up to you either jump the hurdle to grab or owing to hurdle miss the opportunity .
Author: Akansh Malik

Quote: Helping those less fortunate than us is a blessed opportunity to show thanks for the gifts of life that we ourselves enjoy.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: Every day is full of opportunities, but an opportunity is full of only so many days.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: I will never abandon one opportunity and wait for another. We have not reached the goal we are striving for. What you see now is nothing compared to our vision…just tiny parts of what lies ahead.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

Quote: If you are still breathing, you are not a looser as you still have opportunity to bring change.
Author: Rishi Bakshi

Quote: Leaders don't need a path. They make one.
Author: Tim Fargo, Alphabet Success - Keeping it Simple

Quote: Wherever there is danger, there lurks opportunity; wherever there is opportunity, there lurks danger. The two are inseparable.
Author: Earl Nightingale

Quote: The sign of a good leader is easy to recognize, though it is hardly ever seen. For the greatest leaders are those who share as equals in the trials and struggles, the demands and expectations, the hills and trenches, the laws and punishments placed upon the backs of those governed. A great leader is motivated not by power but by compassion. Therefore he can do nothing but make himself a servant to those whom he rules. Such a leader is unequivocally respected, and loved for loving.
Author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

Quote: Embrace your sacred existence.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

Quote: Your heart influences your art.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: If I learned something it was the ride of life, it is fun and crazy.
Author: Adel Abouhana

Quote: Great is a great one whose great ones are great
Author: John  Stein, Building the Pyramid

Quote: So many people are missing their way in life because they are afraid to sign the lease on their gift.
Author: Steve Harvey, Act Like a Success, Think Like a Success

Quote: The more varied the environments in which you exercise your leadership gift, the stronger that gift will become. You will become a far more effective leader.
Author: Bill Hybels, Axiom: Powerful Leadership Proverbs

Quote: Malicious or not, strong leaders always attracted followers
Author: Richelle Mead

Quote: Each day of your existence ready’s itself for your impact
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: What I’m suggesting is that the essence of leadership is soundness and that the essence of soundness is soul, which paradoxical as you might think it is, is that child within.
Author: Tim Macartney-Snape

Quote: Developing your unique thought to the level of being appreciated and adopted by the world - that's genius.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: The pursuit of love is passionate life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Live conscious of every moment and the wonder available in it.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Selfless Actions; expand our life outside of us, enable us admired leaders and make our actions that live beyond our lifespan.
Author: Ahmet Adam Asar

Quote: Stop living within the confines of how others define you! You weren't created to live their life; you were created to live yours - so LIVE it! You can reignite that fire within and bring the passion back into your goals, dreams, ambitions, careers, and relationships by reclaiming control of your own life. Be unapologetically YOU!
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Believe me, You will surely see the light. even if you are in a darkest room though, It will go in through small holes in your room.
Author: Chandra Bobby

Quote: Earth" is not too long an address. It is the parts which make us forget the way.
Author: R. N. Prasher

Quote: Make time to be still.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Good things don’t happen in bulk, they take ample time. You have to have patience.
Author: Evan  Smith

Quote: Fatigue could be the dealmaker's friend.
Author: H.W. Brands

Quote: Patience is the ability to enjoy the calm of boredom.
Author: Jakub Bożydar Wiśniewski, The Pith of Life: Aphorisms in Honor of Liberty

Quote: You can’t think about how much you have left to do because that’s just one thought, one sad thought, that’ll make you bummed out all day long. Instead you’ve got to think about how much you’ve already done.
Author: Catherine Gilbert Murdock, Dairy Queen

Quote: When you choose to let go, you discover more about who you are and what you want out of life, and then you go for it!
Author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

Quote: Dreams do come true, but first you must dream.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: In five minutes you should know if people have confirmed, calculated & considered your vision.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: How you react when your back is against the wall will determine if you see what's actually over the wall.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: What the average call excellent, the excellent call average.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: You need to choose your association according to your vision.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: My role as a role model is to teach my generation how to excel in the role of distinction.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: One of the things I've learned about vision is people will grab it mentally or, have a crab mentality.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: It’s not the application that is stopping people from using timeless knowledge passed on to us, it’s the acknowledging part.
Author: Daya Kudari

Quote: Greatness is unleashed when you develop faith in the power of your faith.
Author: Phumi Ngwane

Quote: As a leader, if you can no longer inspire your people it is time to step aside and let someone else take the lead
Author: Thomas Narofsky, F(X) Leadership Unleashed!

Quote: If you want to get the best out of people, ask them for help rather than assigning them work.
Author: Jag Randhawa, The Bright Idea Box: A Proven System to Drive Employee Engagement and Innovation

Quote: Spending a few moments right when you wake up to inspire and motivate yourself can make all the difference in the rest of your day.
Author: Daniel Willey

Quote: Cometh the hour, cometh the man.
Author: Cliff Gladwin

Quote: Lead by inspiration, not intimidation.
Author: Rebecca Aguilar

Quote: Church must lead all other spheres of influence.We find people from all the mountains there.The church leaders must be able to mentor them
Author: Paul Gitwaza

Quote: Why does it seem that the church is more interested in people involvement rather than people engagement.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: Somehow we American pastors, without really noticing what was happening, got our vocations redefined in the terms of American careerism. We quit thinking of the parish as a location for pastoral spirituality and started thinking of it as an opportunity for advancement. Tarshish, not Nineveh, was the destination. The moment we did that, we started thinking wrongly, for the vocation of pastor has to do with living out the implications of the word of God in community, not sailing off into the exotic seas of religion in search of fame and fortune.
Author: Eugene H. Peterson, Under the Unpredictable Plant an Exploration in Vocational Holiness

Quote: There is a long and well-documented tradition of wisdom in the Christian faith that any venture into leadership, whether by laity or clergy, is hazardous. it is necessary that there be leaders, but woe to those who become leaders.
Author: Eugene H. Peterson, Under the Unpredictable Plant an Exploration in Vocational Holiness

Quote: Deception is nowhere more common than in religion. And the persons most easily and damningly deceived are the leaders. Those who deceive others are first themselves deceived, for not many, I think, begin with evil intent. The devil, after all, is a spiritual being. His usual mode of temptation is not an obvious evil but to an apparent good. The commonest forms of devil-inspired worship do not take place furtively at black masses with decapitated cats but flourish under the bright lights of acclaim and glory, in a swirl of organ music.
Author: Eugene H. Peterson, Under the Unpredictable Plant an Exploration in Vocational Holiness

Quote: Pastors enter congregations vocationally in order to embrace the totality of human life in Jesus' name. We are convinced there is no detail, however unpromising, in people's lives in which Christ may not work his will. Pastors agree to stay with the people in their communities week in and week out, year in and year out, to proclaim and guide, encourage and instruct as God work his purposes (gloriously, it will eventually turn out) in the meandering and disturbingly inconstant lives of our congregations.This necessarily means taking seriously, and in faith, the dull routines, the empty boredom, and the unattractive responsibilities that make up much of most people's lives. It means witnessing to the transcendent in the fog and rain. It means living hopefully among people who from time to time get flickering glimpses of the Glory but then live through stretches, sometimes long ones, of unaccountable grayness. Most pastor work takes place in obscurity: deciphering grace in the shadows, searching out meaning in a difficult text, blowing on the embers of a hard-used life. This is hard work and not conspicuously glamorous.
Author: Eugene H. Peterson, Under the Unpredictable Plant an Exploration in Vocational Holiness

Quote: Without vision, a church devolves into a lukewarm, aimless organization characterized by infighting, budget grabbing and a dead heart for the lost.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: Church leaders raised on rationalism lead ministries where the supernatural, the Vertical, is suppressed and where God Himself is at best an observer and certainly seldom, if ever, and obvious participant in church.
Author: James MacDonald, Vertical Church: What Every Heart Longs for. What Every Church Can Be.

Quote: As a leader it is your job to protect the missional integrity of the Jesus gathering to which you have been called. It is your responsibility to see to it that the church under your care continues as a gathering of people in process; a place where the curious,the unconvinced, the sceptical, the used-to-believe and the broken, as well as the committed, informed and sold-out come together around Peter's declaration that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of the living God.
Author: Andy Stanley, Deep and   Wide: Creating Churches Unchurched People Love to Attend

Quote: Authentic leaders are often accused of being "controlling" by those who idly sit by and do nothing
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: Jesus did not command us to "develop" leaders. He commanded us to make "disciples". The world "develops" leaders, the Church "disciples" them. The two are not the same.
Author: John Paul Warren

Quote: To instill the values for the culture was and is the responsibility of the leadership, and staff alignment was critical to its success. It started with both board and staff. They realized that they needed to share the same value system that says, “I am the equipper, not the doer.” If not, there were going to be immense roadblocks to effectively mobilizing people for ministry.
Author: Sue Mallory, Equipping Church, The

Quote: If you want your ministry to have ‘it’, more important than anything else we’ve discussed, you must have ‘it’. When it has filtered through your heart - the rare combination of passion, integrity, focus, faith, expectation, drive, hunger, and God’s anointing - God tends to infuse your ministry with ‘it’. He blesses your work. People are changed. Leaders grow. Resources flow. The ministry seems to take on a life of its own.
Author: Craig Groeschel, It: How Churches and Leaders Can Get It and Keep It

Quote: A missionary church cannot rely on the professional ministry for the primary work of mission. The role of the laity is critical because it is the lay members of the church who have the greatest contact with those who are outside of the normal structures of church life. In such a situation the task of clergy is not so much to engage in mission themselves, as to support the laity in their mission.
Author: Martin Robinson, The Faith Of The Unbeliever

Quote: Never give up from problems because your problems make you stronger and experienced..
Author: Gagan preet kaur

Quote: Writing is the most powerful weapon on earth.It can change minds and stir souls.
Author: D. Anne Paris, Driven By Love

Quote: The ultimate test of a transformational leader is the ability to raise up a new generation of leaders.
Author: Jim Louwsma, The Art of Virtue-Based Transformational Leadership

Quote: Significance is not determined by the amount of time on stage but by what you do with the time you get.
Author: Mansur Hasib

Quote: Being others-focused instead of self-focused changes your worldview. Living in a selfless manner and seeking to help others enriches our very existence on a daily basis. Get your hands dirty once in a while by serving in a capacity that is lower than your position or station in life. This keeps you tethered to the real world and grounded to reality, which should make it harder to be prideful and forget where you came from.
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: If you can’t handle others’ disapproval, then leadership isn’t for you.
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: We all have something to offer, and we must choose to focus on what we do have to offer, not what we don’t. And remember the dirty little secret is that those who are acting like they have it all together really don’t.
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Build Icebergs, Not Skyscrapers
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Adversity Isn’t to Be Avoided
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Be Chris LeDoux, Not Garth Brooks
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Selfish Apologies Aren’t Apologies at All
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Show Us, Don’t Tell Us
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Be a Strong Leader, Even If You Follow a Weak Leader
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: You Either Trust Someone or You Don’t
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Abdication Isn’t Empowerment
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: If Everything’s a Rush, Nothing Is
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Macromanage, Not Micromanage
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Overoptimism Is More Dangerous Than Overpessimism
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: Don’t Give Someone Responsibility without Requisite Authority
Author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

Quote: One of the greatest responsibilities of an organization’s leadership is to communicate with unwavering clarity the values on which the organization has been built.
Author: Vern Dosch

Quote: It is the leader’s job to model and enforce the values and behaviors that make up the company culture. “Model” the behaviors is key. “Do as I say” only breeds contempt from others.
Author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

Quote: We need to adopt a set of common values and be ready to live out those values
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Decide to be fine until the end of the week. Make yourself smile, because you're alive and that's your job. Then do it again the next week. I call it being professional. Do it right, with a smile, or don't do it.
Author: -Frank Devereaux (Supernatural)

Quote: Love makes me incredible to enter in the new life and smile makes me happier in my life, Science teaches to think but love teaches to smile. I love to be a part of your life when I am depressed there is only smile & kindness that attracts me.#Love#Dimple:p
Author: Avinash Advani

Quote: Siddhartha considered the ways of the demon, and in that moment he struck.
Author: Roger Zelazny, Lord of Light

Quote: There are some among the so-called elite who are overbearing and arrogant. I want to foster leaders, not elitists.
Author: Daisaku Ikeda, Discussions on Youth

Quote: The stars in the sky are immeasurable.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Some may say I did not write well...but no one can say I did not write...that is all that matters. One must attempt the things they desire and in the attempt, master their fear of failure for the only definitive failure is to never try.
Author: Shelley K. Wall

Quote: With a perseverance spirit, you withstand any situation.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: When times get tough and your path gets rough, just hold on. You'll get there soon enough.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: It is very much, she thinks, like looking at the moon and knowing one could make it there, too. It is only time and breath that stand between her and the top. She is young. She'll do it and have done it.
Author: Dave Eggers

Quote: If his decision is correct, he will win the battle, even if it lasts longer than expected. If his decision is wrong, he will be defeated and he will have to start all over again- only this time with more wisdom.But once he has started, a warrior of the light perseveres until the end.
Author: Paulo Coelho, Warrior of the Light

Quote: Persistence and passion will make you invincible.
Author: Christian Baloga

Quote: If you don't acquire the discipline to push through a personal low point, you will miss the reward that comes with persevering.
Author: Jeff Goins, Wrecked: When a Broken World Slams into your Comfortable Life

Quote: Is it not true that the clever rogue is like the runner who runs well for the first half of the course, but flags before reaching the goal: he is quick off the mark, but ends in disgrace and slinks away crestfallen and uncrowned. The crown is the prize of the really good runner who perseveres to the end.
Author: Plato

Quote: Most of the people don't see a big success in life, because small successes ignites ego issues in them.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Service is a selfless deed.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Service is born out of love not duty.
Author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders

Quote: Leadership is service, not position.
Author: Tim Fargo

Quote: You reveal your character by what you do with what you have.
Author: GE Paulus

Quote: When leaders reframe customers into guests, and results into experiences, profits escalate.
Author: Eric Schiffer, Emotionally Charged Learning: Secrets to Competitive Advantages for the Second Half of the Knowledge/Entertainment-Based Economy

Quote: EYou reveal your character by what you do with what you have.
Author: GE Paulus

Quote: Those who serve deserve.
Author: Orrin Woodward, LIFE

Quote: Every new situation leads to new strategy for survival.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The right thing is a luxury for rich and sheltered people. For the rest of us, the only right thing is staying out of trouble and surviving as best we can.
Author: Susan Ee, World After

Quote: Leadership is a Requirement for Survival and a Prerequisite for Success.
Author: Noel DeJesus, 44 Days of Leadership

Quote: Panic is something that good operations officers plan for.
Author: Tom Clancy, The Sum of All Fears

Quote: We -humans - are wizard who turn miracles into technology.
Author: Stefan Emunds

Quote: I pride myself in being a technology innovator, so our specialty at Veeam is our laser-focused commitment to R&D, but you cannot build solid solutions without knowing what the goals are for your customers.
Author: Ratmir Timashev, CEO Veeam

Quote: Data may disappoint, but it never lies.
Author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

Quote: No matter how fast weapons and technology evolve in the 21st century, one thing remains constant is that war is a human endeavor, a grueling contest between two learning and adaptive forces. Victory, therefore rests on how smart, how tough, and how dedicated our boots on the ground.
Author: Agus Harimurti Yudhoyono

Quote: It is no longer just engineers who dominate our technology leadership, because it is no longer the case that computers are so mysterious that only engineers can understand what they are capable of. There is an industry-wide shift toward more "product thinking" in leadership--leaders who understand the social and cultural contexts in which our technologies are deployed.Products must appeal to human beings, and a rigorously cultivated humanistic sensibility is a valued asset for this challenge. That is perhaps why a technology leader of the highest status--Steve Jobs--recently credited an appreciation for the liberal arts as key to his company's tremendous success with their various i-gadgets.
Author: Damon Horowitz

Quote: Be careful of what you dwell on and what you say. Your thoughts and words will either acquit or condemn you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Deliver your message with simplicity and see how powerful impact it has on the audience.
Author: Sujish Kandampully

Quote: People are afraid of change. Change is inevitable to life. Change actually has the mask of pushing us out of comfort zone. Every time we learn, go through life experiences our perception/Emotional chemistry is changing. Embrace change because we are becoming a more polished version of ourselves.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: Nothing happens ‘to’ you, everything happens ‘for’ you.
Author: Linda Deir

Quote: Never give up on the idea you can become great. Always grab on the possibility you can become successful.
Author: Sandu Andronic

Quote: He seemed touched by a larger spirit, his course guided by something beyond him, so talented, so able, so good-natured that he did not even inspire envy in a city rich with envy.
Author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

Quote: If people see the Capitol going on, it is a sign we intend the Union shall go on
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quote: Vision is capturing God's assignment
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Next Steps For Leading a Missional Church

Quote: Workers who can consistently decide with clarity and ease which tasks are most important when under pressure are the most prized in every organization. Highly focused in pressure-cooker situations, they rise to meet the challenges of an opportunity-saturated workplace that demands tough calls at every step.
Author: Julie Morgenstern

Quote: One of the things I’ve learned about vision is people will grab it mentally or, have a crab mentality.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Your comfort zone is not that comfortable.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Writing and achieving your goals is not failure, not having a goal to write in the first place is the start of failure.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: When business leaders talk about the next quarter, they ought to sometimes be talking about the next quarter century.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: Change or you will be changed: leaders who neglect the good of their people will be forsaken. Leadership is a service, not a gateway to privilege.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: I believe that positive energy and optimism help us to take up any challenge in life and to succeed in even the most difficult tasks. I also believe that positive energy is contagious: we can transmit it to others.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: Without a vision to guide our path, and without ambition that knows no limits, we can never build a bright future for generations to come.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

Quote: Great Leadership sometimes requires taking a step backward in order to take a leap forward.
Author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders

Quote: A visionary is a leader of excellence who sees what others do not see, who achieves for now and plans for the future, who positively impacts different generations and raises up other visionaries.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: People will follow someone as a leader, who has vision and purpose; often that leader doesn’t wear a title.
Author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people
