Quote: Gamers can feel when developers are passionate about their games. They can smell it like a dog smells fear. Don't be afraid to hold onto your unique vision: just be aware that it may not turn out exactly how you envisioned.
Author: Scott Rogers, Level Up!: The Guide to Great Video Game Design

Quote: There is no seamen in the world who prefers a slow ship to a fast one. The painters painted better, the cooks took a little more time with the meals, and the technicians tightened the bolts just a little more. Their ship was no longer a cripple, and pride broke out in the crew like a rainbow after a summer shower.
Author: Tom Clancy, Clear and Present Danger

Quote: Long-term solutions are more attractive and cause much less controversy than short-term solutions, which will affect people who are still alive and voting.
Author: George Friedman, The Next Decade: What the World Will Look Like

Quote: He (Newt Gingrich as a freshman congressman) was both passionate about his goals and coldly analytical in his means.
Author: Thomas E. Mann, It's Even Worse Than It Looks: How the American Constitutional System Collided With the Politics of Extremism

Quote: The very essence of leadership is that you have to have a vision. It’s got to be a vision you articulate clearly and forcefully on every occasion. You can’t blow an uncertain trumpet.
Author: Theodore Hesburgh

Quote: Grounded leaders are present for others, operate with fortitude, and influence with the full impact of their vision and strength.
Author: Catherine Robinson-Walker, Leading Valiantly in Healthcare: Four Steps to Sustainable Success

Quote: Vision without implementation is counterproductive.
Author: Douglas B. Reeves, Transforming Professional Development Into Student Results

Quote: If you treat people to a vision of themselves, if you apparently overrate them, you make them become what they are capable of becoming.
Author: Viktor E. Frankl

Quote: As Christians, we are not to beg for signs and wonders but, to command them all the time and not some of the time.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Wise leaders understand that the single greatest determinant of whether followers will ever own a vision deeply is the extent to which whose followers believe the leader will own it.
Author: Bill Hybels, Axiom: Powerful Leadership Proverbs

Quote: Boss may be on, but leader can be anyone.
Author: Ameya Agrawal

Quote: It's almost never the kind of person you are but the kind of job you do decides how much you get paid.
Author: Saahil Prem

Quote: Do you know great people are continually quoted while the average always misquote great people?
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: If you don't sacrifice for what you want, what you want becomes the sacrifice
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Sacrifice precedes any success.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The three great acts are love, goodness and self-sacrifice.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Stars don’t have their own light to glint. It is supplied by sun by burning self. One endures pain for others to survive.
Author: Sadashivan Nair, Negative-Positive and We

Quote: To sacrifice anything is of great honor. To sacrifice everything is of God.
Author: Todd Stocker, Becoming The Fulfilled Leader

Quote: In order for you to receive, someone else has to give. That’s called sacrifice.
Author: Todd Stocker, REFINED: Turning Pain into Purpose

Quote: These things sensibly affected Theseus, who, thinking it but just not to disregard, but rather partake of, the sufferings of his fellow citizens, offered himself for one without any lot. All else were struck with admiration for the nobleness and with love for the goodness of the act.
Author: Plutarch, Plutarch's Lives, Vol 1

Quote: Sacrifices will make you a martyr, victories will make you a hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I am not sure that the best way to make a boy love the English poets might not be forbid him to read them and then make sure that he had plenty of opportunities to disobey you.
Author: C.S. Lewis, On Stories: And Other Essays on Literature

Quote: It’s not that I had more important things to do or that I didn’t want to help with whatever problems were interfering with her students being successful—rather, it’s this horrible truth that life has taught me: misplaced hope is the most devastatingly painful thing you can give someone.
Author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

Quote: Educators are in the news, too. Usually that’s bad. I had a favorite college professor. He used to tell us, 'If you make CNN as a teacher, you’re probably going to jail.
Author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

Quote: Indira was surrounded by people who had given up hope, who blamed their own misery on the influence of Christianity and western cultures, and yet, literally in the midst of squalor, her family had created a place of real beauty. It really makes you stop and think. Uncle Google should be spitting out eight hundred million things American schools have done right. The fact things are so screwed up makes no sense. If you believe Uncle Google, then we’ve done the exact opposite from Indira’s family—in the land of hope and plenty we’ve created a place that’s ugly. We have so much. Can things really be so bad? Maybe we can’t fix our schools because as individuals we’ve never truly been broken. Or maybe Chinese lanterns make everyone wax philosophical.
Author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

Quote: It was only a couple of chickens. Real chickens. The kind that walk around clucking and pecking. Which is what they were doing. Only no one else seemed to care, or even notice. This is normal? Obviously I had a little hiccup reading my notecards. Understandable. I was talking to forty orphans who had to share a dirt floor with two chickens. No one in college had ever prepared me for this scenario.
Author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

Quote: One of underestimated tasks in nonfiction writing is to impose narrative shape on an unwieldy mass of material.
Author: William Zinsser

Quote: Probably every subject is interesting if an avenue into it can be found that has humanity and that an ordinary person can follow.
Author: William Zinsser

Quote: Helping teacher leaders come to understand their gifts is the first step in developing a specialty. Some leaders are great coaches and should focus on instructional leadership in a district or network where that is valued and supported. Great conceptual thinkers are good in startup mode but the daily grind of leading a school doesn't suit them. Other leaders thrive on the turnaround challenge. The dynamic blended future of education will allow more role specialization.
Author: Tom Vander Ark

Quote: Forgive all before you go to sleep, you'll be forgiven before you get up. – Lord Krishna.
Author: Vikrmn, Corpkshetra

Quote: When I can’t fall sleep, I pray.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: However it might go, I should have no regrets. If I should be reduced to begging in the street, then I should enjoy the feel of pavement beneath my feet and the odors of asphalt and automobile exhausts. Good and bad fortune were equally attractive when viewed in such a context. Hunger was as interesting as satiety. A life without sight was as interesting as life with sight. Who was to say different? Society? The bulk of humanity?They were living their first lives, cautiously aware that someday they would die. They had everything to lose. They could not take the risks. But I had been through death, had my insides burned out by it twice.I was living a second life, freed of those cautious awarenesses.I had nothing to lose. I could take all the risks.
Author: John Howard Griffin, Scattered Shadows: A Memoir of Blindness and Vision

Quote: He broke me down past the flesh, past the muscle, past the bone, down to my soul and in a loud provocation, he asked, “What are you made of?”After I gathered the broken bits and pieces of my life together, I shouted at the top of my lungs, “HOPE! Unbreakable, undeniable, irrevocable hope!
Author: Jay Grewal, A Slave to Want

Quote: If you stay on this path as long as I have, you’ll soon learn that the road to providence leads right through perdition. And along that road, the devil’s waiting to collect his pound of flesh.
Author: Jay Grewal, A Slave to Want

Quote: I don’t have perfect teeth. I’m not stick thin. I want to be the person who feels great in her body and can say that she loves it and doesn’t want to change anything.
Author: Emma Watson

Quote: You do not own me. I do not own you.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Self confidence is greatest tool for success.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Life is a journey, a ride of endless means and emotions.
Author: Mary  V. Pate, Now I Have the Best Job in the World: How God Helped Me Through Sabotage in the Workplace

Quote: Maturity is the ability to make a decision and stand by it.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Putting in effort is like riding a bicycle on train tracks, you will get to where you want to go but you will feel every bump along the way.
Author: Davis Levy

Quote: Whoever is trying to bring you down is already beneath you.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Leadership obeys the principle of Hooke's law to the very bone. It explains:When an elastic material is stretched, it returns to its original position. But when it's over stretched beyond its limit point, it loses its elasticity and becomes plastic, and later cuts or breaks.As a leader, in your leadership disposition, it behoves of you to acquaint yourself with this very leadership principle that edges forward. It's however, a human nature to adopt to an environment, so, leaders are humans, they tend to have this rapore with their followers which is somewhat a must needed. But the ability for such one to return and recollect to knowing his boundary makes a good leader. A phenomenon whereby he becomes drunk of platitudes, then it comes to a time where they (followers) dictate for him. And even sought and suggest plans without his consent or knowing, it has gotten to the point of plastic and break respectively.
Author: Richmond Akhigbe

Quote: Being a positive person doesn't mean you never have negative thoughts. It just means you don't allow them space to take root and grow to control your life.
Author: Lorri Faye

Quote: Do not judge me for the many things I do, but rather judge yourself for that which you do not.
Author: George "GM64" Mercado

Quote: It is our thoughts, actions and reactions that manifest our future.
Author: George "GM64" Mercado

Quote: My greatness shall never be measured by my actions or accomplishments, but rather by those of my son's guided by my teachings.
Author: George "GM64" Mercado

Quote: In order to become great we must allows others to become great before us, and not be envious of their greatness but rather rejoice in it. So that when we become great, there will be others who shall rejoice in ours.
Author: George "GM64" Mercado

Quote: Success shouldn't be revenge or a way to overwhelm the naysayers. If that is your reason, you are far from being content.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Never bet against the man in the mirror.
Author: Cornell Thomas, The Power of Positivity: Controlling Where the Ball Bounces

Quote: Being positive in a negative situation is not naive. It's leadership.
Author: Ralph Watson

Quote: I can't change you and you can't change me, but together we can work to change the world.
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: I am waiting for that Morning,When Me and My Dream, both will be Together.
Author: Shashank Rayal

Quote: The Leadership Seduction of storytelling invites self-pity, exaggerates one's importance, and encourages inaction.
Author: Catherine Robinson-Walker, Leading Valiantly in Healthcare: Four Steps to Sustainable Success

Quote: Americans talked about voters the same way Russians talked about Stalin. They had to be obeyed.
Author: Ken Follett, Winter of the World

Quote: Youths are the life blood of any nation.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: There are many countries but few nations. We are committed to building Nigeria into a most desirable nation to live
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: It is your life, accept the responsibility.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you're early, you're on time. If you're on time, you're late.
Author: Lik Hock Yap Ivan

Quote: A decision is a responsibility, if you cannot handle responsibility, don't take decisions.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Yea, he who is a true king of men, will not say to himself, 'Lo! I am worthy to be crowned with laurels;' but rather will he say to himself, 'What more is there that I may do to make the world the better because of my endeavors?
Author: Howard Pyle, The Story of King Arthur and His Knights

Quote: It is your life...OWN IT! Your life purpose empowers you and enables you to live life abundantly. Empowerment begins by taking responsibility for your life and being accountable for your actions. Empowerment is the courage to live passionately and purposefully each day
Author: Thomas Narofsky, You are Unstoppable!: Unleash Your Inspired Life

Quote: Jefferson was ambivalent about executive power – until he bore executive responsibility.
Author: Jon Meacham, Thomas Jefferson: The Art of Power

Quote: If you believe the world will be a better place because you have both the desire and the means to take charge, that's the time for you to jump in. It doesn't matter if you rise up to take the lead only once or twice in your entire working life or if you do it daily. There are so many moments when you can make a difference--by enriching an outcome, saving a great idea, defending the beleaguered or downtrodden, and not least, expressing your own gifts and wisdom.
Author: Charlotte Beers, I'd Rather Be in Charge: A Legendary Business Leader's Roadmap for Achieving Pride, Power, and Joy at Work

Quote: It's been hard for me at times...the responsibility and expectation that comes with being a leader. I'm not always the one I wish I could be, that I should be, but nonetheless, it is my place. If I were to ever show a commitment to something other than my leadership, which could jeopardize the function I have, I would be risking too many lives. I couldn't live with that.
Author: Jessica Shirvington, Enticed

Quote: An Amazing God + Amazing Faith = An Amazing Life!
Author: DeWayne Owens

Quote: Every day is a new day. No matter what has happened before, whenever you awake, you have the opportunity to start anew. It is one of the wonderful things about life.
Author: L.M.Robins

Quote: Within the scope of universal time, it seems I’ll be dead a whole lot longer than I’ll be alive. So while I’m here, I will not worship death; I’ll worship life. I’ll live life to the fullest… victories, losses, successes, mistakes, love, and hurt… I’ll live and learn to the fullest; without apology.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: I’d rather make a thousand mistakes trying for a better life, than to die not making any mistakes at all.
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: The Complexities Of Life Caused By Bad Government Administration, Leadership, Parental Abuse And Mistakes Can Make A Child More Matured Than Their Age. It Happened To Me And It Is Still Happening To So Many Children World Wide. Most Especially, In Africa Where I Come From. This Is Why You See So Many African's Do All Sorts Of Bad Deeds For Surfacing And Surviving To Keep Body And Soul Together.
Author: Baba Tunde Ojo-Olubiyo

Quote: He who is flexible masters the day.
Author: Todd Stocker, Becoming The Fulfilled Leader

Quote: How ought we to love God, Father?" he asked in a whisper."By loving men, my son""And how ought we to love men?" "By trying to guide them along the right path""And what is the right path?""The one that rises"- Nikos Kazanzakis, Christ Recrucified
Author: Nikos Kazantzakis, Christ Recrucified

Quote: There is a lot of pain in being lonely, but a lot of beauty in being alone.
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: What you don't sweat out when you're young will turn into tears when you're old.
Author: Japanese Proverb

Quote: I do have a reason for my insanity. I fear regret.
Author: Shahrukh Ahmad

Quote: If you have trouble getting motivated always remember that time is going to pass either way and that eventually regret is going to make its way around.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: The cost of not following your heart is spending the rest of your life wishing you had.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: We can spend today joyously celebrating potential by acting upon our purpose, or we can spend it mourning the days and opportunities gone by… the first will find you amongst the few who are content and accomplished; the latter will find you with the suffering majority as you exhaustedly swim in the ocean of regret.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life—and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
Author: Georgia O'Keeffe

Quote: If death shows up before my last breathe, I swear I'll kill death.
Author: Uchenna Durugo

Quote: Fearing our confrontations is one thing... facing them unarmed is a completely different matter.
Author: Mark W. Boyer

Quote: It takes bravery to recognize where in your life you are your own poison... it takes courage to do something about it.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Sometimes we have to reach rock bottom before we're willing to rise up and overcome our trials.
Author: Dana Arcuri, Reinventing You: Simple Steps to Transform Your Body, Mind, & Spirit

Quote: In every situation, there is a sacred answer. You must search and seek.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Faith gives us the courage to endure every circumstance.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Your spirit must be strong to survive a shock.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Adversity tests the strength of endurance.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The more I learn the less I know but once you learn adversity is opportunity all you do is grow.
Author: Jeff Valender

Quote: This was the mark of an uncommon soldier, someone whose courage away from the battlefield was the same as that on it.
Author: David Halberstam, The Coldest Winter: America and the Korean War

Quote: God can deliver you so well that some people won’t believe your testimony.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: Serving others prepares you to lead others.
Author: Jim George

Quote: When you are innocently covered by sorrow, It shall be turned into joy.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Staying motivated in business is really less about what you hear and think, and more about what you do and achieve.
Author: Kevin J.  Donaldson

Quote: someday goals become never days of achievement
Author: Colin Myles, G.R.I.T. Spirit of an entrepreneur

Quote: When instinct speaks, listen to it. It might be the next push you need to reach greater heights.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: Every single achievement you make, every single life you change and every single skill you acquire brings you one step closer to becoming a better leader. Every day you can improve the leader in you to become a better person and a greater leader.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: When it comes to achieving, what matters is you to know, what you really want and make up your mind to believe in your own efforts that you will achieve and you will make it with ease.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: In achieving your greatest potential in life, the more enemies you'll make but just “Take care and play the game smart.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: The day you yearn greatly for in your life, will never come so easily as you think without great sacrifice.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: When you weep and lament, you will struggle to achieve and rejoice.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: I would rather aim high and miss the mark than low and make it.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Perfecting is a journey...There is no destination called perfection.
Author: Ashok Kallarakkal

Quote: When you lower the definition of success to such a level that any person can reach it, you don’t teach people to have big dreams; instead you inspirit mediocrity and nurture people’s inadequacies.
Author: Shannon L. Alder

Quote: I wake up starving for success, and no matter how much I accomplish I go to sleep striving for improvement; I refuse to let my enemies outwork me.
Author: Noel DeJesus, 44 Days of Leadership

Quote: Our shortcomings drive us, motivate us – to work harder or realize another purpose/talent.
Author: Aaron B. Powell

Quote: Not to put too fine a point on it, if you want the dream, if you want to sculpt the magic inside your head and heart for real, if you want the recognition, if you want your true identity to be glowing, taking charge and fueling the electricity of life, instead of being stuck and feeling bad. If that’s what you want, you have to let go. By which I mean bolt crop the chains of old – and THAT was by far the hardest thing I’ve done.
Author: Annaliese Morgan, Breaking chains

Quote: Every capitalist is rich, but every rich is not a capitalist.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Capitalism is an ability to stay rich and keep getting rich.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: It takes a little crazy to make a difference.
Author: Dafna Michaelson Jenet

Quote: Believe in yourself and great things will happen.
Author: Sheila Renee Parker

Quote: Leadership is communicating to people their worth and potential so clearly that they are inspired to see it in themselves.
Author: L. David Marquet, Turn the Ship Around!: A True Story of Turning Followers into Leaders

Quote: Read to lead in order to succeed.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Don’t just hope the big idea is going to come, make it happen
Author: Simon Dunn

Quote: The role of leaders is not to get other people to follow them but to empower others to lead.
Author: Bill George, True North: Discover Your Authentic Leadership

Quote: Events in life mean nothing if you do not reflect on them in a deep way, and ideas from books are pointless if they have no application to life as you live it.
Author: Robert Greene, The 33 Strategies of War

Quote: FOR BEING A SUCESSFUL PERSON, ONE NEEDS TO HAVE KNOWLEDGE OF DIVERSIFIED FEILDS. IT WILL IMPROVE YOUR THOUGHTS AND GIVES YOU CREATIVE IDEAS. YOUR VISION WILL BE BROADER AND AIM WILL BE HIGH. WHAT IT NEEDS TO HAVE CONFIDENCE IN YOU!
Author: PRIYANSHU JOSHI

Quote: Integrity, by its definition, means adhering consistently to a strong, reliable code of ethics, whatever that code is.
Author: Scott K. Edinger, The Hidden Leader: Discover and Develop Greatness Within Your Company

Quote: A true leader does not derive power from his position, but from his ethics, from people’s love for him, and from his knowledge, education and excellence in his field of work.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: Be true to yourself-at the core of your leadership are your values and morals.
Author: Artika Tyner

Quote: Leadership responsibility is multidimensional and cannot be described in one or two words. It is personal, interpersonal, environmental and societal.
Author: Linda Fisher Thornton

Quote: The difficulty was not that of following a moral principle at personal cost; the difficulty was that of knowing what to do when there is more than one principal, and when the principles clash.
Author: Elton Trueblood, Abraham Lincoln: Lessons in Spiritual Leadership

Quote: While mistakes may be local, in today’s connected world embarrassment is global
Author: Gyan Nagpal, Talent Economics: The Fine Line Between Winning and Losing the Global War for Talent

Quote: Let me be in your inspiration.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Bad improvisers block action, often with a high degree of skill. Good improvisers develop action."(p.115)
Author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking

Quote: Your children are going through life with their eyes closed, so YOU'RE the one who has to steer.
Author: Jennifer Senior, All Joy and No Fun: The Paradox of Modern Parenthood

Quote: He (the Bible study leader) is blessed with a light touch and a firm hand.
Author: John Kasich, Every Other Monday: Twenty Years of Life, Lunch, Faith, and Friendship

Quote: Even in a hostile press conference with hostile questions there was drama, and he could benefit from the drama and the hostility. He mastered the greatest art of television, appearing to be spontaneous without in fact being spontaneous.
Author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

Quote: George III was incapable of passing on a sense of mission to his son might a given some purpose to the crown prince's existence
Author: Henrik Bering

Quote: When an actor reaches down into his emotional well and pulls up a deeply personal response, the audience can sense something special is going on. They may not know exactly what they're seeing, but they recognize it as authentic.
Author: Martin Sheen, Along the Way: The Journey of a Father and Son

Quote: Never base motivation or fear, entirely.
Author: Peter Heather, The Fall of the Roman Empire: A New History of Rome and the Barbarians

Quote: Unlike most politicians who follow their audience, (Robert) Kennedy tried to lead his.
Author: Thurston Clarke, The Last Campaign: Robert F. Kennedy and 82 Days That Inspired America

Quote: If a church is good at making disciples it will be good at making leaders because in the end, a good spiritual formation plan will lead to an accelerated spiritual multiplication.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Next Steps For Leading a Missional Church

Quote: A question is far more subversive, biblically, than a statement.
Author: Os Guinness

Quote: Reagan understood an important distinction that (Lyndon) Johnson never grasped: being in control and being successful aren't always the same thing.
Author: Jonathan Darman, Landslide: LBJ and Ronald Reagan at the Dawn of a New America

Quote: I'm perfectly willing to be perfectly human.
Author: Donald Miller, Scary Close: Dropping the Act and Finding True Intimacy

Quote: A good officer learned to take care of the feet of his men first, and from there their stomachs and hearts. By that means, he could motivate their souls.
Author: Newt Gingrich and William R Forstchen, To Try Men's Souls

Quote: Lyndon Johnson knew how to make the most of such enthusiasm and how to play on it and intensify it. He wanted his audience to become involved. He wanted their hands up in the air. And having been a schoolteacher he knew how to get their hands up. He began, in his speeches, to ask questions.
Author: Robert A. Caro, Means of Ascent

Quote: The web of trust is built at eye level, peer to peer.
Author: Jeff Jarvis, What Would Google Do?

Quote: We can’t really explain what the goal of mentoring is, until we understand what the church is for.
Author: Rhys Bezzant

Quote: Every good man resists others in those points in which he resists himself.
Author: Augustine of Hippo, City of God

Quote: Paraphrasing Plato's Republic: "Only people who have allowed themselves to be reformed by reality have it in themselves to reform their polis for the better.
Author: Rebecca Goldstein, Plato at the Googleplex: Why Philosophy Won't Go Away

Quote: The Roman Church has grown and grown, fueled by immigration but also renewed by two pontiffs who have seemed to understand what Tocqueville knew: People want guidance for their souls once they are convinced they have them.
Author: Hugh Hewitt

Quote: Managing games comes second. Managing people comes first.
Author: John Feinstein, Where Nobody Knows Your Name: Life In the Minor Leagues of Baseball

Quote: The desire we so often hear expressed today for “episcopal figures,” “priestly men,” “authoritative personalities” springs frequently enough from a spiritually sick need for the admiration of men, for the establishment of visible human authority, because the genuine authority of service appears to be so unimpressive.
Author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer, Life Together: The Classic Exploration of Christian Community

Quote: The man who goes to the top is the man who has something to say and says it when circumstances warrant. Men who keep silent underdressed are moral cowards.
Author: Richard Llewellyn, How Green Was My Valley

Quote: Those who are not true leaders will just affirm people at their own immature level.
Author: Richard Rohr, Falling Upward: A Spirituality for the Two Halves of Life

Quote: When your eyes are fixed on the horizon of eternity, it affects your vision for motherhood.
Author: Gloria Furman, Treasuring Christ When Your Hands are Full: Gospel Meditations for Busy Moms

Quote: A leader may lead, but you have to follow to reach the destination.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: A leader inspires others to dream more. The actions of a really good leader will show how to achieve that dream.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Innovative wisdom with purpose defines a leader.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: A good leader is one who reveals to you your own potential and then inspires and shows you how to reach your potential.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: To be a leader be an example and lead the way.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: When you empower others to be great, you become a great leader.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Be a leader who is driven by purpose but not by position or power.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: By learning more, by doing more, by becoming more, and by creating a common vision, a leader is a person who can inspire others to change for the better.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Leadership is an ability to have a great vision for the future and the ability to inspire others to follow.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: Leadership is a process where a leader has a purpose oriented destination and lets the followers find the best way to get there with a common vision and goal.
Author: Debasish Mridha

Quote: May righteous God guide you on a right path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Only you can find your sacred path.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: When you know the destination, the path is easy.
Author: Ratmir Timashev, CEO Veeam

Quote: People enter different paths seeking for happiness and fulfillment. We must respect other people's individuality. Just because they're not on your path doesn't mean they are on the wrong track.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: We all have different paths in life. As in purpose, so is happiness. As our purposes differ, so do our roads to happiness differ, though we may have common grounds.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: God wants you to face the reasons why you separate yourself from Him. He will show you what you fear, what you need, and what you desire. He will inventory your beliefs and values, and help you line them up with His truth.
Author: Michael Barbarulo

Quote: The key for me was to have faith and trust in God to transform me. This was scary because the foundation that once kept me safe and secure was being taken from me!
Author: Michael Barbarulo

Quote: If you do not have a memory like an elephant, leave impressions like one.
Humbleness is the heart of happiness.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Explore the infinite possibilities in existence.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Whatever you sow, you shall reap. It is better to sow good deeds; love, goodness and kindness.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Celebrate every moment of your life. In one memorable day, you will be gone.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It is better to pray about everything than worry about nothing.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We encountered many hardships. With hope, we find the strength to endure.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The miracles of life; believe, faith and hope.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: No one who has hope will ever be cut off.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Love me for who I am.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Hope is the anchor for the heart.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You don't know your presence of tomorrow, so why to WASTE today?!!!
Author: Jaiminsinh Parmar

Quote: There is hope for the living souls.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: People who lost their mother should be careful about committing crime, because probably no one else is praying to save you.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: We are born with the need for a leader, someone to control the conflict between each individual's need. An alpha in the house, an alpha at work, an alpha in the church and in the White House.
Author: Colin McAdam, A Beautiful Truth

Quote: A leader did not slump. A leader was in control. Even when he least felt like he controlled anything. Especially then.
Author: Brandon Sanderson, Words of Radiance

Quote: It may sound strange, but I get the inspiration for most of my Dreams while I'm sleeping.
Author: Mark W. Boyer

Quote: Push to achieve your dreams. Don't let anyone push you out of dreamland.
Author: Christy Birmingham

Quote: Let's go for our dreams and be stronger than any obstacles.
Author: Christy Birmingham

Quote: That was when I realized we weren’t born to beslaves. It was ignorant for any man to think he could be the master of another. We were all meant to be free, and somewhere there were good people helping to heal this broken world.
Author: Jay Grewal, A Slave to Want

Quote: An individual school can handle a resident idiot from time to time, but an entire school system is only as good as its weakest leader.
Author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

Quote: You show me a school with a principal behind the desk, and I'll show you a school without principal leadership. (Quoting Baruti Kafele)
Author: William Sterrett, Insights Into Action: Successful School Leaders Share What Works

Quote: It’s only when we acknowledge God as the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit, that we can receive His love for us.
Author: Stormie Omartian, Choose Love: The Three Simple Choices That Will Alter the Course of Your Life

Quote: In the school of success, information is the greatest asset. The more you read, the more you discover, the more you discover, the more you recover and the better your life become.
Author: Stella Oladiran, Winning Formulas

Quote: If you keep an active life, you stay young.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Embrace the glory of age.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Every age fraught with discord and danger seems to spawn a leader meant only for that age, a political giant whose absence, in retrospect, seems inconceivable when the history of that age is written.
Author: Dan Simmons, The Fall of Hyperion

Quote: The key to productive life is a complete care for the body, soul, spirit and mental well being.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Spring is a season of fruitfulness.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Someone or something that wastes your time, makes you lose a part of your life. One you can never get back.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you
Author: Alice Glynn

Quote: Everyday that I procrastinate, everyday that I sit stagnant in fear, everyday that I fail to better myself, someone else out there with the same goals and dreams as me is doing the exact opposite.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Today my goal is to be more productive than I was yesterday, and tomorrow more productive than today.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Never allow doubt to roam unimpeded within you. When it arises acknowledge it immediately, and then exterminate it with extreme prejudice.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Thinking outside the box only works if you know everything inside it. Don’t compare your chapter 1 to someone else’s chapter 20. That’s the biggest mistake young entrepreneurs do and end up getting disappointed. The ones you call conventional are the business models, which have been optimized and modified at various stages over a long period of time. You need to work hard and be a bit more patient.
Author: Nitin Sharma, From Tiggie, With Love

Quote: They ask - "How much money is too much money?"The answer always is - "A little more!
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Their job as leader was not to solve the problem – the president really has little control over the economy – but to convince the public not only that he has a plan but that he is altogether confident in the plan's success and that only a cynic or someone in different to the public's well-being would dare to question him on the details.
Author: George Friedman, The Next Decade: What the World Will Look Like

Quote: After the storm there will always be calm - once the winds of change have subsided
Author: Gavin Mills

Quote: Today I will work when others procrastinate, I will confront my fears when others hide from theirs, and I will create solutions when others find excuses; today I refuse to allow my enemies to out work me.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: In all, Nigeria belongs to us all and we have a personal responsibility to see that it succeeds
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Before we ask where the leaders are, we should look in a mirror and ask the person we see “Why are you not leading”?
Author: Carlos Wallace

Quote: Rest and comfort are two different things. Rest is a planned temporary time to refresh and refocus the leader. Comfort is when you settle into unproductive routines and accept satisfactory or unsatisfactory results.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Missional leaders are comfortable in the own skin.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Next Steps For Leading a Missional Church

Quote: Nobody is rewarded for occupying a position, but for becoming effective in the position occupied. If you occupy a position, you must have the weight of influence in order to matter!
Author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

Quote: Somebody had said how only 15 paisa of the one rupee sent from the Centre reached the intended beneficiaries. The job of a leader isn't just to diagnose the disease but to treat it
Author: Narendra Modi

Quote: Never follow a follower who is following someone who has fallen. It's why the whole world is falling apart.
Author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

Quote: If you don’t know what your barriers are, it’s impossible to figure out how to tear them down.
Author: John    Manning, The Disciplined Leader: Keeping the Focus on What Really Matters

Quote: Successful leaders know how to line up support for their initiatives and create the right environment for change and innovation.
Author: Bonnie Marcus, The Politics of Promotion: How High-Achieving Women Get Ahead and Stay Ahead

Quote: Don’t let your principles sit idle on a plaque. Bring them to life.
Author: Cheryl A. Bachelder, Dare to Serve: How to Drive Superior Results by Serving Others

Quote: Demonstrating integrity is indispensable for leaders.
Author: Scott K. Edinger, The Hidden Leader: Discover and Develop Greatness Within Your Company

Quote: Thought leadership is when a leader's thoughts are being used by leaders to lead others.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: It is interesting to note that an overwhelming majority of citizens in the world's three largest democracies have different religions: India (81 percent Hindu), the United States (76 percent Christian), and Indonesia (87 percent Muslim). Two of them have elected women as leaders of their government.
Author: Jimmy Carter, A Call to Action: Women, Religion, Violence, and Power

Quote: Intellectuals are rarely successful as leaders. They are so trapped in their ideals that they cannot venture out in the real world to win and lead.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: Leaders are usually a reflection of the people they lead. How can a leader be moral if his people are immoral?
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: It is never easy for any leader to choose between differentiation and equality. You are condemned either way. When you treat everyone equally, you are considered just by majority as equality benefits below average people and they seem to always be in majority. At the same time, you are also condemned because you can’t produce results with people having a crab mentality. However, if you choose to reward the excellence and punish the non-performer, you achieve the desired results but get condemned for being unfair, unjust, cruel and Darwinian.
Author: Awdhesh Singh

Quote: Effective leaders allow God to shape them into the kind of people they need to be for each situation they encounter.
Author: Jim George, A Leader After God's Own Heart: 15 Ways to Lead with Strength

Quote: All great leaders are known to have faith. They first develop faith in themselves, which means they connect their body, mind and intellect with their soul. They also connect their soul with the Universal Soul where all souls of the world are connected with each other. Leadership is thus a spiritual quality that comes from faith and trust.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, Practising Spiritual Intelligence: For Innovation, Leadership and Happiness

Quote: If you wish to succeed as a leader, you should be capable of transforming the souls of people, which control their intellect, mind and body. A good leader transforms the souls of the people, which then become like his own soul...Once the nature of the followers is changed, they ‘willingly’ follow the path of their leader A leader transforms ordinary men into exceptionally powerful people just like a strong magnet transforms an ordinary piece of iron into a powerful magnet.
Author: Awdhesh Singh

Quote: The most interesting aspect of leadership is that it cannot be predicted. All great leaders had been quite ordinary in their early years. It was only when they became leaders that people started recognising them as leaders.It is difficult to identify specific qualities that make a leader. However, when leaders emerge, people are inclined to point out their leadership qualities. Yet, when other people imbibe the same qualities and try to imitate the actions of their leaders, they may fail.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, Practising Spiritual Intelligence: For Innovation, Leadership and Happiness

Quote: Academically brilliant persons usually make excellent managers and bureaucrats as they can efficiently implement the vision of the government or world leaders by following the prescribed methods. However, they may prove to be poor leaders, for they may not have taken the pain to understand the world on their own, and hence, cannot contribute any new thought or line of action to tackle new problems.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, Practising Spiritual Intelligence: For Innovation, Leadership and Happiness

Quote: A leader is one who chooses the interest of his followers over his personal ignominy. He can beg, steal and even snatch for the followers. He suffers individual loss for the sake of the gain of his followers. That makes him a leader whom people follow because they themselves do not have the courage to do so. People do not mind if someone else does all the dirty jobs for them while they can enjoy the fruits without getting their own hands dirty.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: We praise our leaders when they act against our adversaries. But when our own interest is threatened, we begin to dislike the same leaders, irrespective of the sincerity of their intentions. An effective leader is bound to create enemies.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: Hatred is the emotional price leaders must pay for getting love and honour.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: Effective leaders have the ability to serve and appreciate others while at the same time enabling them to achieve greatness.
Author: -Shandel Slaten

Quote: Impersonators, with time give up hope, but great leaders imitate with discretion.
Author: S. E. Entsua-Mensah

Quote: Like creating a masterpiece, quitting is an art: you have to decide what to keep within the frame and what to keep out.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: Leaders should always be the initiators of reconciliation.
Author: Adam LiVecchi

Quote: A confident leader is like a duck. Above the water, he is calm and poised while below the water, he is driven by a flurry of focused activity.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: Added pressure and responsibility should not change one's leadership style, it should merely expose that which already exists.
Author: Mark W. Boyer

Quote: Leadership defined: An equal and dual commitment to both results and relationships without compromising one for the other.
Author: Al Ritter

Quote: Effective leaders make it easy for people around them to tell the truth, to be candid and open.
Author: Al Ritter

Quote: The most dangerous leadership myth is that leaders are born-that there is a genetic factor to leadership. That’s nonsense; in fact, the opposite is true. Leadersare made rather than born.
Author: Warren G. Bennis

Quote: The mediocre leader tells. The good leader explains. The superior leader demonstrates. The great leader inspires.
Author: Gary Patton

Quote: The captain of a ship can run a great ship, but he can't do anything about the tides.
Author: Matthew Norman, Domestic Violets

Quote: I'm not the boss of my house. I don't know how I lost it, I don't know when I lost it, I don't really think I ever had it. But I've seen the boss's job...and I don't want it!
Author: Bill Cosby, Himself

Quote: Many people read History books but it takes just a few people to LEAD the cause that will shape the course of HISTORY.
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Decision-making is a skill. Wisdom is a leadership trait.
Author: Mark      Miller, The Heart of Leadership: Becoming a Leader People Want to Follow

Quote: Senior pastors cannot be those who think they can do everything but are willing to let a few people help them. Rather, they are those who know they can’t do everything, don’t want to do everything, and are not willing to do everything; they welcome others to come along-side with their gifts in order to form a powerful team for Christ.
Author: Sue Mallory

Quote: I have learnt from the politics of my great country, Nigeria that there is nothing wrong with the heads of states, but there is something wrong with the state of the heads.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

Quote: It doesn't matter if the glass is half empty of half full. Just drink it while everyone is arguing about it and be thankful you had a glass with something in it!
Author: Karen  Gibbs, A Gallery of Scrapbook Creations

Quote: I could impart excitement, but not urgency. – Francis Chen
Author: David Platt, Follow Me: A Call to Die. A Call to Live.

Quote: Pique or policy. We would never know.
Author: Roger Kahn, Good Enough to Dream

Quote: Galvanized people can do careless things. It is in the extreme and emotion-laden moments that distance and coolness are most required. I am tempted to howl in rage. It is not my place to do so. My job is to try to dissect the event, place it in context and try to understand what has happened and why. From that, after the rage cools, plans for action can be made. Rage has its place, but actions must be taken with discipline and thought.
Author: George Friedman

Quote: While you and I are allowed the luxury of our pain, president isn't. A president must take into account how his citizens feel and he must manage them and lead them, but he must not succumb to personal feelings. His job is to maintain a ruthless sense of proportion while keeping the coldness of his calculation to himself.
Author: George Friedman, The Next Decade: What the World Will Look Like

Quote: Presidents and other politicians manage the appearance of things, largely by manipulating the air and hope.
Author: George Friedman, The Next Decade: What the World Will Look Like

Quote: Tunney has all the makings of a hero – he was clean living, intelligent, polite, reasonably good-looking – but, like Lou Gehrig, he lacked the chemistry that stirred affection.
Author: Bill Bryson, One Summer: America, 1927

Quote: Every great movement needs an agitator. Every leader of spiritual ideals need a John the Baptist.
Author: William Allen White

Quote: It is one thing to rouse the passion of a people, and quite another to lead them.
Author: Ron Suskind, Confidence Men: Wall Street, Washington, and the Education of a President

Quote: Serving my generation with excellence will in turn mean my generation can lead, with excellence.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Entrepreneur, don't just read history, write it so people can see the future in the present.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Entrepreneur, either your brand is distinct or your brand is distant.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: A struggle is fatally injured not so much by the stumbles of its leaders as by their mumbles
Author: Agona Apell, The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock

Quote: Your distinction shouldn't be measured by your duration but rather, your donation.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Yes, content is king but excellence is his queen. ~ Onyi Anyado.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: You have to grab the goal, visualise your vision, excel in excellence and then become distinct in distinction.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: The call of distinction cannot be heard by the average, neither can the vision of distinction be seen by the eyes of the mediocre.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: When you walk in distinction, you don’t compete with anyone but competition wants to compete with you.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Do you know invisible determination and effort will always accomplish visible distinction and excellence?
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Entrepreneur, you are your brand. Your website, business card, speech and how you walk and talk is your brand.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Really think about what you want your eulogy to say about you, then live THAT.
Author: Tanya Masse, Stairway to Awesomeness!: 30 Fundamental Steps to Living a Life of Awesomeness!

Quote: Give serious thought to why your company should care about your strategy. Specifically, find problems that the board wants to be solved. What are senior managers scared of? Part of becoming a credible strategic thinker is learning effective approaches to selling ideas for your situation. You’ll know that you’re getting better at selling (or pitching) strategy when managers start coming to you when there is strategic thinking to be done.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: The only difference between a prayer and a curse is the one who stands to profit.
Author: Paula Wall, The Wilde Women

Quote: In true love, one has no reservations.True love is unquestionable,indisputable and totally recognizable.
Author: I. Alan Appt, The Strength in Knowing

Quote: A sheep that walks amongst wolves is called dinner - rjs
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Ability does catches my attention, but its a politeness in the person that I remember.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I am a rock in a sea of despair and yearning. Take hold of me and together we may form an island of hope and plenty.
Author: Christopher Earle

Quote: You are the best book you could ever write phi
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Deep in my heart politeness impresses me more than competence.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The deepest and darkest dungeons that we are ever flung into are the dungeons of the mind
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Frustration is having a debate with a blind man on shades of red
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Leadership is not about your ambition. It is about bringing out the ambitions of your team.
Author: Cheryl A. Bachelder, Dare to Serve: How to Drive Superior Results by Serving Others

Quote: Ambition is a path, not a destination, and it is essentially the same path for everybody. No matter what the goal is, the path leads through Pilgrim's Progress regions of motivation, hard work, persistence, stubbornness, and resilience under disappointment. Unconsidered, merely indulged, ambition becomes a vice; it can turn a man into a machine that knows nothing but how to run. Considered, it can be something else - pathway to the stars, maybe.
Author: Wallace Stegner, Crossing to Safety

Quote: At the end of the day let their be no regrets, only a desire to do more tomorrow than you did today.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: At the end of the day let there be no regrets, only a desire to do more tomorrow than you did today.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: You want to know the great thing about today, it doesn't care about what you did or didn't do yesterday or what you're going to do tomorrow, it only cares about what you do right now.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: The worst president is closer by nature to the best then either is to anyone who has not gone through what it requires to become president.
Author: George Friedman, The Next Decade: What the World Will Look Like

Quote: You may delay your ambition, but never forget your ambition.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you are not working towards something, your life will end with nothing.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: If a man wants his dreams to come true he must wake up.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Every cult of personality that emphasizes the distinguished qualities, virtues, and talents of another person, even though these be of an altogether spiritual nature, is worldly and has no place in the Christian community; indeed, it poisons the Christianity community.
Author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

Quote: A century is about events. A decade is about people.
Author: George Friedman, The Next Decade: What the World Will Look Like

Quote: Groves, with his eye for sizing up people who could get things done, saw the deep ambition Oppenheimer covered with his surface charm.
Author: Garry Wills, Bomb Power: The Modern Presidency and the National Security State

Quote: Letting go of your desires will allow them to come to you much quicker
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: What I truly believe, I will achieve.
Author: Walter Marin, Positive Attraction: Seven Simple Steps for More Love, Money, and Happiness

Quote: Fears are nothing more than a state of mind.
Author: Napoleon Hill, Law of Success: The 21st-Century Edition

Quote: Because knowledge does not need an academic greenhouse. It can bloom, anywhere.
Author: Rashmi Bansal, Poor Little Rich Slum

Quote: Procrastination is the enemy of action!
Author: John Di Lemme

Quote: Regret nothing. Everything broken can be remade. And everything remade can once again be broken
Author: Kulpreet Yadav, The Girl Who Loved a Pirate

Quote: When you think of quitting, remember why you started!
Author: John Di Lemme

Quote: The day you wake up thinking the world is yours is the day you start living.
Author: Samer Chidiac

Quote: Cut the crap! I don’t care how many hours you work, I care how much work you do in those hours.
Author: Pulkit Patel

Quote: Branding is not just a product, it's also a way of life, an idea, branding is actually leadership.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Africa is crying out for entrepreneurial leaders & for leaders who are entrepreneurial.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Not having a recognised brand & trying to stand out in the market is like going to the market without any goods.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: It's called entrepreneurSHIP, not entrepreneurSTAY. Don't wait. Just ship.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: When you walk in silence your excellence will always speak for you.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Entrepreneur, your either raising the bar of excellence or your exhaling at the bar which is expensive.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: You will never see an eagle of distinction flying low with pigeons of mediocrity.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Start local, think global & constantly raise the bar of excellence.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Entrepreneurs see the "no diving" sign and back-up to get a running start.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: The one thing all entrepreneurs have in common is that they started. The one thing everyone else has in common is that they haven’t.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: There's no such thing as a superhero, but together we can world in a new direction.
Author: Biz Stone, Things a Little Bird Told Me: Confessions of the Creative Mind

Quote: Attention deficit is no longer the supposed domain of Generation Y’s who were brought up on a diet of social media and new technology. A recent study revealed 65 percent of 55-64 year olds surf, text and watch television simultaneously.
Author: Kevin Kelly DO the pursuit of xceptional execution

Quote: In 2007, Stanford Business School Advisory committee asserted that self awareness was the most important attribute a leader should develop. The challenge for the modern entrepreneur is to take that path.
Author: Kevin Kelly DO the pursuit of xceptional execution

Quote: My major goal in business was to learn. I had legislated in my mind for failure the worse possible scenario was I would learn a lot regardless of the outcome. This goal was the foundation for success of the business. Peldi, Balsamiq
Author: Kevin Kelly DO the pursuit of xceptional execution

Quote: Willingness to learn is important, willingness to act on what you learn is critical.
Author: Kevin Kelly DO the pursuit of xcdeptional execution

Quote: The challenge for the entrepreneur is to find your passion and make fear history.
Author: Kevin Kelly DO the pursuit of xcdeptional execution

Quote: Sometimes you live life, and sometimes life happens to you. But you always get to choose what you do about it.” Devon Brooks
Author: Kevin Kelly DO the pursuit of xcdeptional execution

Quote: Without growth, organizations struggle to add talented people. Without talented people, organizations struggle to grow.
Author: Ray Attiyah, The Fearless Front Line: The Key to Liberating Leaders to Improve and Grow Their Business

Quote: I subscribe to the thought that it doesn’t matter if it’s right or wrong. What matters is what works.
Author: Tony Curl, Seriously Simple Stuff to Get You Unstuck

Quote: Sometimes we just have to suck it up and do what we have to do, until we are able to do what we want to do.
Author: Mark W. Boyer

Quote: We all cannot do everything or solve every issue. "It's impossible", however, if we each simply do our part. Make our own contribution, regardless of how small we may think it is.... together it adds up and great things get accomplished.
Author: Mark W. Boyer

Quote: Shiloh showed him what he could ask of his men, and indeed what he MUST ask of them.
Author: H.W. Brands, The Man Who Saved the Union: Ulysses Grant in War and Peace

Quote: We are lost, but we're making good time.
Author: Star Trek V

Quote: The newly-minted captain is told to let nothing stop him but to do nothing that would risk his ship or his crew.
Author: Patrick O'Brian, Master and Commander

Quote: One presidential advisor to another: "If the world made sense, we'd all have to find honest work.
Author: Tom Clancy, The Cardinal of the Kremlin

Quote: Every great leader has incredible odds to overcome.
Author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

Quote: You may doubt others but you can be sure to yourself.
Author: gnalluap

Quote: Our greatest currency is our time and we cannot save it. Spend it wisely and never waste another's or your own.
Author: Kyle Barger

Quote: When a leader is at their limit the last thing they want to hear is that they need to change even more. Maintaining good rhythms of rest, exercise and fun create more energy for a leader to be willing and open for change.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Anything that needlessly robs you of your time, energy, and other precious resources is destructive to you and your leadership.
Author: John    Manning, The Disciplined Leader: Keeping the Focus on What Really Matters

Quote: We are partners in our own deception. The lies we tell ourselves. The life we have settled for, when we yearn for the life we wish for. We become our own worst enemy as we yearn for the things we don’t have and discredit the gifts we have.
Author: Tony Curl, Seriously Simple Stuff to Get You Unstuck

Quote: I was a normal person, living in a rough area with a foreign mother, I endured it and came out of the other side to help hundreds of thousands of people worldwide to change their lives just like I had mine.
Author: Stephen Richards

Quote: One person's success is another's first step, only you can rate your achievements and find peace within yourself.
Author: Robert Zeidan

Quote: Death, I've dreamed of it, I've desired it, but what real happiness can come from it?
Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett, Neglected But Undefeated

Quote: The tests and exams were not so difficult to pass but we fail a 'yes' or 'no' answer when it comes to dealing with sin
Author: Wogu Donald

Quote: Keep striving, for God gives His hardest battles to His strongest soldiers.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Your body is a Temple. You are what you eat. Do not eat processed food, junk foods, filth, or disease carrying food, animals, or rodents. Some people say of these foods, 'well, it tastes good'.Most of the foods today that statically cause sickness, cancer, and disease ALL TATSE GOOD; it's well seasoned and prepared poison. THIS IS WHY SO MANY PEOPLE ARE SICK; mentally, emotionally, physically, and spiritually; because of being hooked to the 'taste' of poison, instead of being hooked on the truth and to real foods that heal and provide you with good health and wellness.Respect and honor your Temple- and it will honor you.
Author: SupaNova Slom, The Remedy: The Five-Week Power Plan to Detox Your System, Combat the Fat, and Rebuild Your Mind and Body

Quote: We must be present enough and receptive enough to “hear” with our whole being beyond just the words that are being spoken.
Author: Henry Kimsey-House, Co-Active Leadership: Five Ways to Lead

Quote: Ability to find the answers is more important than ability to know the answers.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: He turned the presidency – and the President's House – into something it had not been before: a center of curiosity and inquiry, of vibrant institution that played informal but important roles in the broader life of the nation, from science to literature.
Author: Jon Meacham, Thomas Jefferson: The Art of Power

Quote: He hadn’t asked to become a leader, but did that absolve him of responsibility? People needed him. The world needed him. And, with an understanding that cooled in him like molten rock forming into a shape, he realized that he wanted to lead. If someone had to be lord of these people, he wanted to do it himself. Because doing it yourself was the only way to see that it was done right.
Author: Robert Jordan, Towers of Midnight

Quote: Description before prescription is the trait of a leader!!!
Author: Santosh Adbhut Kumar

Quote: If you can lead yourself when nobody is following, people will follow when you are not leading
Author: Saji Ijiyemi

Quote: The relational leader operates not by being known by everyone, but by authentically creating positive relationships with people around her.
Author: Scott K. Edinger, The Hidden Leader: Discover and Develop Greatness Within Your Company

Quote: Lead by Example,not by showing samples
Author: Seyi Ayoola

Quote: A leader cannot avoid being hated. This hatred is directly proportional to his influence and power. A person who does not wish to be hated should avoid leadership roles.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: A leader is criticised for whatever he does as all his actions benefit some and adversely affect others. When other people commit the same mistake, they can be forgiven or ignored, but never a leader, for his actions affect a large number of people.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: Hatred is very powerful. It can overpower love. When a man burns in the fire of hatred, he cannot feel any love, and is willing to destroy his enemy even if it kills him. It is amazing to note that a leader who may be driven to act against another in hatred, may be showered with love in the process. People who share his hatred may love him for rising up to the challenge.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: People don’t need you to fix them, they are not broken, just serve them.
Author: Malti Bhojwani

Quote: There is a leader in every manager, there is not a manager in every leader.
Author: Gert Van Mol

Quote: The very meaning of a leader is that people must follow him. If no one follows, you cannot be a leader even if you are the most intelligent, powerful and wealthy person in the world. Interestingly, you cannot become powerful or wealthy unless you are a leader. Further, anyone who acquires wealth or power automatically becomes a leader as people tend to follow such people.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, Practising Spiritual Intelligence: For Innovation, Leadership and Happiness

Quote: The knowledge of the worker is often called ‘skill’, for it requires manual dexterity and training. The knowledge of the manager is ‘academic’ as it can be taught in colleges and universities. However, the knowledge of the leader is ‘creative’ which can generally not be taught, and must come from within.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, Practising Spiritual Intelligence: For Innovation, Leadership and Happiness

Quote: I would rather be on the team of the Leader who prays to God for wisdom to guide the followers, than to be on the team of the leader who leads without prayer.
Author: Ellen J. Barrier, How to Trust God When All Other Resources Have Failed

Quote: A great leader is almost always a great follower for he knows what to learn and from whom.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: A leader is one who travels the path carved out by him, and he ‘leads’ himself onward on that path. If his path is good and his goals are desirable, many more may follow him in their desire to achieve the same goal. Hence, followership is the effect of leadership and not its cause.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: You do not become a leader because people follow you. Rather, people tend to follow you because you have leadership qualities. The journey of leadership often starts alone.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: A leader is generally not more virtuous than most ordinary people. The opposite is usually true. Because people are reluctant to be led by those perceived as evil, a leader expertly creates a façade, behind which he hides all that may appear dirty. This is a difficult art where the leader has to wear two masks, one in public and the other in private—and no one should see the true face of a leader.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: The actions of a leader are always criticised by scholars as well as common men. A scholar has no obligation to produce result, so he is free to rebuke leaders for not sticking to noble means. Common men envy leaders their position and power, thus feeling happy in vilifying them to pull them down to their own levels.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: A true leader is responsible for his followers who have reposed their faith in his leadership. If an ordinary man fails, it is a personal failure. But when a leader fails, he shatters the entire ideologies, principles and morale of all those who followed him. The impact is much bigger and stakes are higher.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: A boss in essence is every woman willing to try, push, succeed, fail but ultimately do the work in her lifescape to make her mark on the world the way she wants to draw it.
Author: jaha Knight, The Soulphisticated Lady's Guide to Being a Boss

Quote: Great leadership is not about giving orders, it's about taking others
Author: Saji Ijiyemi

Quote: The key function of a leader is, to build more leaders.
Author: Krishna Sagar

Quote: I believe leaders should be questioning machine, rather than an answering machine.
Author: Saji Ijiyemi

Quote: Your organization needs you to be the lead, not the lid. If you're not growing as a leader, you've become the lid
Author: Saji Ijiyemi

Quote: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
Author: Arnold H. Glasow

Quote: A leader is heard, a great leader is listened too.
Author: Jacob Kaye

Quote: The problem with being a leader is that you're never sure if you're being followed or chased.
Author: Claire A. Murray

Quote: As Antiquus's son, I was next in line to be the leader of my village... But leadership is not inherited. It is earned through action.
Author: Tony DiTerlizzi, A Hero For WondLa

Quote: The real heart of strategy is the strategist.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: At any given moment you have power to decide how your story is going to end
Author: Robin Dabhi

Quote: The best to know is to face it, take a next step toward it.
Author: Bhagat Negi

Quote: Important decisions are better made after a good nights sleep
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: A decision clouded with doubt is never a good decision
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: In the matters of your life don't take orders, take decisions.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Everyone is entitled to making bad decisions from time to time, but the true test is in how you handle things after those decisions have been made.
Author: Alicia T. Bowens, L.O.V.E. for Teen Moms: You Can Still Have Lives of Vision & Empowerment

Quote: A number of small decisions, each appearing insignificant in the moment and made in isolation of one another, can result in a negative outcome.
Author: Vince Molinaro, The Leadership Contract: The Fine Print to Becoming a Great Leader

Quote: We are very quiet there, but it is the quiet of a storm centre. .
Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

Quote: Digital age of business and world shall move up from apathy, to sympathy, to empathy.
Author: Pearl Zhu, Digital Master

Quote: Life is a sacred wonder.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The new world with more technology, more connectivity, more innovation, and more advantages is less forgiving than the one we left behind
Author: Lillian Gregory

Quote: Managers maintain the present while leaders create the future.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: Every organisation, not just business, needs 1 core competence: Tactical execution
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: The worst question ever asked, is the one which is never asked.
Author: Krishna Saagar

Quote: With a clever strategy, each action is self-reinforcing. Each action creates more options that are mutually beneficial. Each victory is not just for today but for tomorrow.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: Strategy is not really a solo sport – even if you’re the CEO.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: If you are a leader or someone who works for the interest of a community, first make sure that you understand the interest of the people who make up that community. In this way, you will have a good chance of minimizing, perhaps, avoiding the us versus them mentality.
Author: Duop Chak Wuol

Quote: Still we remain, still we fight. Still we strive, still we survive.
Author: Saim Cheeda

Quote: You cannot win everyday, but make sure u win, at-least once in a while.
Author: honeya

Quote: Life is, at times, tough...And all we need to do is to prove that we are tougher than it...
Author: Sanhita Baruah

Quote: You shouldn't just give during Christmas and Thanksgiving you should be giving all the time.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: Excluding the God of providence in your life’s configuration and design is like removing the thermostat from a thermodynamic system.
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph

Quote: Perfection of this human life happens when we take the responsibility to be and act as authentic Leaders in every life situation.
Author: Indy Bissessur

Quote: I am not perfect,my roots are not watered with perfection.
Author: Nomthandazo Tsembeni

Quote: Priorities need to change at different stages of our life if we want to grow and evolve.
Author: Apurva Purohit, Lady, You're Not a Man! : The Adventures of a Woman at Work

Quote: We fiction writers are a brazen lot, are we not? For we, in our passion, embrace just enough truth to consecrate our delicately contrived lies.
Author: Val Edward Simone

Quote: Hatred is the price that society extracts from its leaders for the honour, power and wealth it bestows unto them.
Author: Awdhesh Singh, The Secret Red Book of Leadership

Quote: I love Hitler for his leadership, but I abhor his actions.
Author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

Quote: If Captain Jean-Luc Picard asked you to serve him aboard the starship Enterprise, you'd likely be happy to. You would recognise him as a great leader and a good man, and so you wouldn't have any problem following his orders. This is basically the relationship God wants with us - not slaves, not pets, not possessions, we would be co-workers and friends.
Author: Lewis N. Roe, From A To Theta: Taking The Tricky Subject Of Religion And Explaining Why It Makes Sense In A Way We Can All Understand

Quote: For basic survival, as for evolution, we have to accept the past as the creator of the present, influence the future, and act in the present.
Author: Daniel Egger, Future Value Generation: Do you need to create new Business Logics?

Quote: No actions, no results. Everything else is a commentary.
Author: Utpal Vaishnav

Quote: Honourable is right.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: When your actions are aligned with your dreams and goals, you become the point of origin for their reality.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Be wise enough, know when to move on.
Author: Lailah  Gifty  Akita

Quote: It is not necessary to be an 'Intelligent', It's wise to have the 'Internet
Author: Sumit Kumar Mallik

Quote: If knowing yourself and being yourself were as easy to do as to talk about, there wouldn't be nearly so many people walking around in borrowed postures, spouting secondhand ideas, trying desperately to fit in rather than to stand out.
Author: Warren G. Bennis, On Becoming a Leader

Quote: People need to learn how to take the role of leader out of God's hands.
Author: Lionel Suggs

Quote: Sometimes, it becomes necessary for you to hit the bottom, and hit really hard that it awakens you.
Author: Frederick Espiritu, The Path to Awesomeness: Becoming Super, Being Human

Quote: The power to change is already within you, ready to be discovered. Find new methods to deal with old routines. It is up to you to make the conscious choices that bring a better future.
Author: Lynn C. Tolson, Beyond the Tears: A True Survivor's Story

Quote: transformation begins with the individual” Dr William Edwards DemingThe New Economics - 1993
Author: Priyavrat Thareja

Quote: According to Google statistics, people search the word "money" four times as often as the word "goal". This creates a word: "frustration".
Author: Tim Fargo, Alphabet Success - Keeping it Simple

Quote: Our differences need not divide us because even as we are unique and individual, we are also all one.
Author: Henry Kimsey-House, Co-Active Leadership: Five Ways to Lead

Quote: Ronald Reagan was just as angry. But he made you want to stand right alongside him and shake your fist at the same things he was shaking his fist at.
Author: Rick Perlstein, Before the Storm: Barry Goldwater and the Unmaking of the American Consensus

Quote: Jefferson was the rare leader who stood out from the crowd without intimidating it.
Author: Jon Meacham, Thomas Jefferson: The Art of Power

Quote: No matter what, we have to keep moving forward, even if we have to crawl.
Author: Kellie Elmore

Quote: We need to pay as much attention to the MEANS, as to the END! This is the biggest principle of SUCCESS..The END is so enticing, that we lose sight of the details altogether..Success lies in the DETAILS!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: Be your best proponent, ally, and advocate.
Author: Asa Don Brown

Quote: Always love, always encourage, and never let despair get in the way.
Author: Super Star

Quote: Always put yourself around people who want to succeed because when they succeed you will to succeed as well.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: You would free yourself from so much stress and drama if you just understood and embraced the truth that you are enough.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Keep hoping. Be patient and diligent. Never give up. Hold on to your faith. God helps us when we show Him that we are willing to help ourselves.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: If you are willing to be helped, you will receive help; and for as long as you sincerely ask, you will be helped.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Help does not only come through financial assistance. There are a lot of ways with which one person can help another person.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: The Lord God is sacred helper
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: When your world seems like falling apart, an inspiration is something you can always hold on to.
Author: Diana Rose Morcilla

Quote: I love people who choose to surprise the sad ones, Just to make them smile!
Author: Artist Lisa May

Quote: Life says: " Write down your experiences in a notebook, not on a blackboard. Don't start with a clean slate, but with a new page, so you can look back.
Author: Naveed Nawab Ali, Life Says

Quote: The media will mess your way of thinking up, don't take they word for nothing do your on research.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: In a world filled with flaky people, those that honor commitments and do what they say STAND-OUT. Integrity is currency.
Author: Dr. Matthew Loop

Quote: There are many ways to become mistress (or master) of one's fate after a betrayal, but they all have things in common: conscious effort and a fighting spirit, embodied in what I call 'the Affirmative No.' The Affirmative No incorporates self-enhancing outrage, independence, and courage. It is a stance through which a traumatized person actively proclaims her will by rejecting the role of victim.... Unable to change our predicaments, we actively changed their meaning and our relationship to them, and in the process, we discovered that we could exert power when we thought we had none.
Author: Jeanne Safer, The Golden Condom: And Other Essays on Love Lost and Found

Quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow, hope lies in dreams in imagination
Author: Irak. ibrahim Hussain Didi

Quote: The easiest way to have a peek behind the curtain is to learn from those that are ahead of you.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha, Overcoming the Challenges of Life

Quote: Don't let them beat down your spirit and the spirit of your ideas go with reality and what seems natural to you ...transpire within this Universe and together we shall have a goal.
Author: Auliq-Ice

Quote: Tragedies break us, yet sometimes they make us.
Author: Nihar Sharma, Stranded

Quote: It is a miracle if we can find true friends, and it is a miracle if you have enough food to eat, and it is a miracle if you get to spend your days and evenings doing whatever it is you like to do... Lemony Snicket, The Lump of Coal
Author: Shirley A. Moore
