Quote: Why start if you are going to do a half-assed job anyway?
Author: Monika Zands

Quote: Teams Triumph When Today's Tribe Leaders Transform Their Mindset.
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: Teamwork and trust trump ego and arrogance in building high performance sustainable successful teams. Rethink your team building ideas
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: We now live in a time when PEOPLE and profits must become equally valuable in the corporate leaders Mindset.Rethink your Leadership Culture to become a conscious, high performance organisation
Author: Tony Dovale

Quote: You must take the world as you find it, with a struggle to be something more honest than those around you. Phineas, as he preached himself this sermon, declared to himself that they who attempted more than this flew too high in the clouds to be of service to men an women upon the earth
Author: Anthony Trollope, Phineas Finn

Quote: there is no significance in life without struggle
Author: Lolly Daskal, Thoughts Spoken From The Heart

Quote: Struggle shapes our character. And character dictates what we will become.
Author: Jeff Goins, Wrecked: When a Broken World Slams into your Comfortable Life

Quote: You can't truly appreciate the top if you've never hit rock bottom.
Author: Vanna B.

Quote: I believe more youths stay out of leadership positions because of the fear of indequacy and criticisms.
Author: Paul Bamikole

Quote: He was very good, it turned out, at outlining the flaws in the government as long as someone else was in charge of the government.
Author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

Quote: The point of criticism is to build you as a leader and a dimension to reflect.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: Even if you do nothing, say nothing and be nothing, there will still be many who will criticize you. It is much better to be criticized for success than be condemned for failures because success rids you of the many miseries of life.
Author: Awdhesh Singh

Quote: The writers in the newspapers could sounds smart because they did not have the responsibilities of decision, and they could sound bold by enunciating positions which they were not required to implement.
Author: Elton Trueblood, Abraham Lincoln: Lessons in Spiritual Leadership

Quote: A leader is always first in line during times of criticism and last in line during times of recognition.
Author: Orrin Woodward, LIFE

Quote: Life is for a specific mission. Find your role and fulfill it.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Legacy accounting: Will you have been an asset or a liability on the world's balance sheet?
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: If someone wanted to be a runner, you don't tell them to think about running, you tell them to run. And the same simple idea applies to writing, I hope.
Author: Markus Zusak

Quote: The higher consciousness feel the most pain because they search for the darkness in order to bring it to the light and thus feel the most pleasure.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: All leadership in the Kingdom is by example.
Author: Adam LiVecchi

Quote: I am not a dog who needs a bitch to satisfy the life , i m here to build an empire and for that i will wait for my queen
Author: surya pratap

Quote: Defining your own truth and then living according to it ... changes your sense of self and sets you free; it makes you fearless -- or at least more courageous -- with every significant person in your life. When you're not so insecure, there are things -- offhand cruelties, insensitivities large and small -- you don't tolerate, things you don't have to deny.... Once you are the one who determines the meaning of your life, nobody can gainsay it. This act of self-assertive defiance immunizes you -- at least to a certain extent -- from ever allowing someone else to control your destiny ever again.
Author: Jeanne Safer, The Golden Condom: And Other Essays on Love Lost and Found

Quote: Taking a solemn oath and sticking to it casts everything in a different light and infuses the ordinary with significance. It can change a person more radically than any drug or many years of therapy.
Author: Jeanne Safer, The Golden Condom: And Other Essays on Love Lost and Found

Quote: Behind every successful flight, lies the will, full of thrust, against the wind; the will to win.
Author: Vikrmn, 10 Golden Steps of Life

Quote: There is something indefinable in an entrepreneur, and I saw that in Steve," he said. " He was interested not just in engineering, but also the business aspects. I taught him that if you act like you can do something, then it will work. I told him, " Pretend to be completely in control and people will assume that you are.
Author: Walter Isaacson, Steve Jobs

Quote: Your life is a reflection… you don't get what you WANT, you get what you ARE. You gotta BE it to SEE it.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Earned money brings you security, borrowed money gets you slavery.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If the 'Journey of 1000 miles begins with a single step' - that is prescribed to - ALIGN
Author: Priyavrat Thareja

Quote: The race for excellence has no finish line.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, رؤيتي

Quote: Stamp your performance with excellence.
Author: Sherman Morris

Quote: Leadership is bringing people into new realms of excellence and challenging them to become distinguished in their chosen field.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: We must be the ones to re-define the world class standards of excellence
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: As I tell my children, 'If you are going to do something, do your best while you're doing it.
Author: Michelle    Moore, Selling Simplified

Quote: Leaders are readers, disciples want to be taught and everyone has gifts within that need to be coached to excellence.
Author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

Quote: The decision you will take today has the power to redefine your past and redesign your future.
Author: Mayank S. Sengar, Life and The Grey Notes

Quote: Nothing remarkable or impressive comes to be overnight, and all those so-called "overnight success" stories misrepresent the truth. It is only the manifestation of that success that appeared overnight, but its essence was built up over time.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

Quote: No matter how good you are to people, you will always have barriers and enemies on your way to success
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: The greatest profit, is to make your own gain.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Knowledge alone is not enough, but with hard work it's worth progression.
Author: Unarine Ramaru

Quote: If you want to find your greatest love, it will be inside the hardest thing you do.That's where it will be
Author: Regina Dugan

Quote: I work as hard as possible and try to fail gracefully. :-)
Author: Plex Team

Quote: You may not be the person with high IQ, but you can be the person with highest hard work.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Early to bed and early to work might get you a success, but late to bed and early to work will get you a glory.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: No man is exempted from the subtle deception of doctrinal drift – the man of God expects this temptation.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Our enemy attacks the conscience little by little seeking to wear us down and then wears out a leader's resolve to fight the good fight.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Realize your potential. Anyone that says one person can’t change the world is wrong. Your actions, thoughts, and words all ripple out into the world. One act of love can change someone’s life. One lifetime of love can change the world. When you realize all of your power, you can start benefiting the entire world with positive actions. Realize your potential to change the world.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: See things in terms of Potential. Recognize:Your Amazing Potential.
Author: Akiroq Brost

Quote: A leader's job is not to put greatness into people, but rather to recognize that it already exists, and to create an environment where that greatness can emerge and grow.
Author: Brad Smith

Quote: Your Potential is all that you can HAVE but have not yet possessed. No limits. No boundaries
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Your Potential is an OBLIGATION.Its what you MUST be,do and have because you CAN. You Can, you Must, You will
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Make sure your priorities line up with your values.
Author: Michael Barbarulo

Quote: Each day is a new chance to improve your life, and that of your family, friends and colleagues. Be positive in your outlook, honest in your dealing and determined in your efforts. You will succeed
Author: Arthur Crandon, Deadly Election

Quote: You start off with a little spark, and it's whether or not you nurture that spark. You have to expand it and work on it
Author: Ed Sheeran

Quote: You hire the best people you can possibly find. Then it's up to you to create an environment where great people decide to stay and invest their time.
Author: Rich Lesser

Quote: Most people overestimate others' talents and underestimate their own.
Author: Orrin Woodward, LIFE

Quote: Chits knew no ideology.
Author: Rick Perlstein, Before the Storm: Barry Goldwater and the Unmaking of the American Consensus

Quote: You can buy a man's time, you can buy a man's physical presence at a certain place, you can even buy a measured number of skilled muscular motions per hour or day. But you cannot buy enthusiasm, you cannot buy initiative, you cannot buy loyalty; you cannot buy the devotion of hearts, minds, and souls. You have to earn these things.
Author: Clarence Francis

Quote: To be given loyalty is to be infused like a gemstone, to be granted the frightful license to destroy not only one's self, but all within one's care.
Author: Brandon Sanderson, The Way of Kings

Quote: If you aren't loyal to the few you won't be blessed with the many.
Author: Orrin Woodward, LIFE

Quote: Are your consistent beliefs serving you or are they holding you back?
Author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Edge

Quote: Observe the behavior of your environment carefully for clues as to what is acceptable and rewarded.
Author: Bonnie Marcus, The Politics of Promotion: How High-Achieving Women Get Ahead and Stay Ahead

Quote: We are the planet, fully as much as water, earth, fire and air are the planet, and if the planet survives, it will only be through heroism. Not occasional heroism, a remarkable instance of it here and there, but constant heroism, systematic heroism, heroism as governing principle.
Author: Russell Banks, Continental Drift

Quote: I kept wanting to go back on the stage and do it again since I had so much fun and felt so accomplished. It seemed that I had regained a lot of the confidence that I knew I had years before when I performed onstage all the time.
Author: Sarah Todd Hammer, Determination

Quote: Nature paces its change in gradual steps, and in this time of renewal, I danced in sync to the rhythm of life.
Author: Lynn C. Tolson, Beyond the Tears: A True Survivor's Story

Quote: What is assertive in a man can appear abrasive in a woman, and female leaders risk appearing too feminine or not feminine enough.
Author: Barbara Kellerman

Quote: If we can spend more time uprooting vices and rooting virtues, our world will be safer and better.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: If you don’t want to waste your time on thinking, start reading.
Author: Aman Jassal, Rainbow - the shades of love

Quote: To guess is no good, but to anticipate is GREAT.
Author: Filipe Alou

Quote: The most damaging cognitive bias is overconfidence (illusory superiority), making leaders use their “gut” when they should be more rational.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: Why is it that such a basic education such as not quitting or not giving up is always continued to be taught? When we drive to a destination and hit a stop light or a train do we turn back around no because we will never arrive to that destination pretty easy concept to understand for everyone.There are many more basic examples that are "Basic" but the real reason is that 99.9% of most understand basic concepts but we don't listen to our intuition. We know action, consistency, not quitting are basic to success.Once Fear, Anxiety, Love, Laziness, lack of focus and ambition are overcome by our strength of intuition then we can achieve anything that we want.
Author: Matthew Donnelly

Quote: Life is sometimes hard, and you have to laugh your way through it.
Author: Mabele "Madea" Simmons Tyler Perry Don't Make A Black Woman Take of Her Earrings

Quote: Learn to love your haters, they are a wonderful source of inspiration.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: I was eight years old and scared, and had no idea what was going on
Author: Sarah Todd Hammer

Quote: Once you truly understand that it is okay to lose or fail, you are free, you have nothing to fear, and only then, can nothing in this world hold you back.
Author: Yahya Mohamed

Quote: So long as you have life, you can pursue your dream.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You can get what you want.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The whole thing could have been uncomfortable if all your wishes were to be drowned in to the sea or passed through a heart of a lion that shed not the innocent blood.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: The Sun Tzu School (which wrote the Art of War) surely never imagined that their antiwar, pro-empire treatise would become known and accepted after the fall of the first empire as a text on military tactics. Likewise, they would have been surprised to see the Ping-fa military metaphor—an inspired teaching device—come to be seen as the message and not the medium.
Author: David G. Jones

Quote: Stressed, depressed, but well dressed.
Author: weheartit

Quote: You can't make a difference unless you are different.
Author: Chris Hodges

Quote: Contemporaries of Alexander Hamilton noticed "his conspicuous sense of self-possession, his unique combination of serenity and energy.
Author: Joseph J. Ellis, The Quartet: Orchestrating the Second American Revolution, 1783-1789

Quote: its size, the House was an environment in which, as one observer put it, members “could be dealt with only in bodies and droves.
Author: Robert A. Caro, Master of the Senate

Quote: While Lyndon Johnson was not, as his two assistants knew, a reader of books, he was, they knew, a reader of men— a great reader of men.
Author: Robert A. Caro, Master of the Senate

Quote: Few emotions are more ephemeral in the political world than gratitude: appreciation for past favors. Far less ephemeral, however, is hope: the hope of future favors. Far less ephemeral is fear, the fear that in the future, favors may be denied.
Author: Robert A. Caro

Quote: People fail to realize there's a difference in kinds of money. There is old money and there is new money. Old money has political power but new money has only purchasing power. (1963)
Author: LIFE Magazine

Quote: Psychology of small things rules.
Author: Stefan Fatsis, A Few Seconds of Panic: A 5-Foot-8, 170-Pound, 43-Year-Old Sportswriter Plays in the NFL

Quote: Jason (Elam, a Christian) is the kid in high school who gets along equally well with the jocks, the brains, the geeks, and the slackers, and influences their behavior.
Author: Stefan Fatsis, A Few Seconds of Panic: A 5-Foot-8, 170-Pound, 43-Year-Old Sportswriter Plays in the NFL

Quote: The great actors always play themselves.
Author: Scott Farris, Kennedy and Reagan: Why Their Legacies Endure

Quote: A newcomer could ascertain the identity of a town's true leaders – which storekeeper was respected, which farmer was listened to other farmers – only through endless hours of subtle probing of reticent men.
Author: Robert A. Caro, The Path to Power

Quote: One biographer said Kennedy lived along the line where charm became power.
Author: Scott Farris, Kennedy and Reagan: Why Their Legacies Endure

Quote: Twitter gives people an illusionary sense of leadership.
Author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

Quote: his was a profession in which a good leader constantly had to adapt to new weapons, whether he liked them or not,
Author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

Quote: Leaders need to sacrifice "power-over" to get "power-to".
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: Strategic coherence is more important than strategic perfection.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: Leaders need to correct for cognitive biases the way a sharpshooter corrects for wind velocity or a yachtsman corrects for the tide.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: Yesterday’s decision-making strategies are ill-equipped to deal with petabyte information flows.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: It is time to euthanize change management.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: The notion of "business as usual" is a harmful myth.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: Our relations seemed poor to me, and I wasn't surprised that the US intelligence picture in the Horn of Africa was weak. Much of what I read consisted of recycled news headlines repackaged as intelligence. Real, valuable intelligence only came from real people, yet we hadn't done much to meet and work with the people.
Author: Eric Greitens, The Heart and the Fist: The Education of a Humanitarian, the Making of a Navy SEAL

Quote: (John F.) Kennedy was an elitist and not a populist. He was enthralled by a certain British aristocratic view of politics in which an enlightened ruling class makes reasoned, rational decisions that are in the interest of the more emotional and easily manipulated masses.
Author: Scott Farris, Kennedy and Reagan: Why Their Legacies Endure

Quote: A president must know what it is he does not know, and he should remain calm in pursuit of it, but there is no obligation to be honest about it.
Author: George Friedman

Quote: Intelligence analysts should be self-conscious about their reasoning processes. They should think about how they make judgments and reach conclusions, not just about the judgments and conclusions themselves.
Author: Richard Heuer

Quote: The reality is that the American people have no desire for an empire. This is not to say that they don't want the benefits, both economic and strategic. It simply means that they don't want to pay the price. Economically, Americans want the growth potential of open markets but not the pains. Politically, they want to have an enormous influence, but not the resentment of the world. Military, they want to be protected from dangers but not to bear the burdens of long-term strategy.
Author: George Friedman, The Next Decade: What the World Will Look Like

Quote: That image of a chessboard — an epic contest between two giant players, carefully nudging their pieces around the globe as part of a grand strategy — has indeed become a familiar metaphor for the Cold War. But it is misleading. Many decisions remembered today for their farsighted, tactical brilliance were denounced in their day as weak-willed. And big, public gestures often made less difference than the small, hidden ones.
Author: Sam Tanenhaus

Quote: In carrying out a peacekeeping mission where the grand strategy is to maintain peace and order by persuading armed parties or other hostile elements to back away from aggressive activities, military strength is not a definite measure of success; neither could material contribution alone guarantees the "winning of the hearts and minds" of the people. What appears to be important is the day-to-day conduct of the peacekeepers on the ground; those who uphold the principles of neutrality and impartiality, as well as those who are able to carry all aspects of its operational duties exceptionally.
Author: Agus Harimurti Yudhoyono

Quote: Doing nothing requires effort. Over time, that effort is greater than the effort necessary to improve, or move somewhere better. The trick is to redirect energy.
Author: Max McKeown, Adaptability: The Art of Winning in an Age of Uncertainty

Quote: A great strategy meeting is a meeting of minds.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: Brilliant strategy is the best route to desirable ends with available means.
Author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book

Quote: The manager needs only a molehill to build a mountain, but the money-ger needs a full mountain to build another.
Author: Agona Apell, The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock

Quote: Leadership is about relationships - whether it’s a business deal with a client or a conversation with a family member - our ability to understand and appreciate individual uniqueness and perspective is paramount to living a fulfilled life.
Author: Steve Knox

Quote: Leaders are never measured by their success but rather by the success of those they've been entrusted to lead. Therefore, a leader can never be considered successful until those they lead are successful.
Author: Greg Cagle

Quote: In the realm of faith, there is no fear.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If you brave in life, you get the best of life.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: It was, however, time to accept fear for what it was, an emotion that was preventing them from being who they needed to be.
Author: Stephen Reid Andrews, The Visions of David Palmer: Rising Phoenix

Quote: Talking to strangers is very panic fear, to be fearless and good communicator in long term try talking to strangers with courage like you already know them.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: There shall be no more death, Because we have already seen all that, Its old and we are tired of it, And now we need something new, And this new thing is Eternal Life
Author: Boris Pasternak, Doctor Zhivago

Quote: Live your life in a way, that there is more left after you than an Excel table.
Author: Strýco Mange

Quote: you only know you can do something if you keep on doing it
Author: Jenny Han

Quote: Speaking less and doing more says more.
Author: Kayambila Mpulamasaka

Quote: ‪#‎PRAISE‬ ‪#‎CRITICISM‬ ‪#‎NEUTRAL‬If you live off people's compliments..you will soon die of their criticism..
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: The more positive you are the more people want to be around you and the less positive you are...well, just reverse it!
Author: Germany Kent

Quote: Do something,get something. Do nothing,get nothing. Doing is the beginning of being. Being is the beginning of achieving. Achieving is the essence of living and living is the spices of life
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Discovering Yourself

Quote: Every problem has one immediate cause, many remote causes, long term and short term effects
Author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Repositioning Yourself for  Greater Success

Quote: Reach for something out of the ordinary. You must dare to even come close.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Miracles don't just happen on their own you know, you got to make them happen.
Author: Joem S. Aguilar

Quote: Let them ridicule you, laugh at you, hurt you & ignore you but never let them stop you.
Author: Apoorve Dubey, The Flight Of Ambition

Quote: There is hope for the hopeless.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: I am not ashamed of my failures. It is only a foot-stones for building my success.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If the knock once and door remain lock, do not turn away. With persistent knocks, the door will be open.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: If knock the door once and it remains lock, do not turn away. With persistent knocks, the door will be open.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: How can we tell people "never give up" when some haven't even started yet.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Giving freely is sharing freely.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: We are all we got in this world why not help each other.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: If you want to make a difference, the next time you see someone being cruel to another human being, take it personally. Take it personally because it is personal!
Author: Brené Brown, I Thought It Was Just Me: Women Reclaiming Power and Courage in a Culture of Shame

Quote: Through social media, missing persons are found; sick persons are given chances to live a healthy life. I say, that is the modern bayanihan movement.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: A properly educated leader, especially when harassed and under pressure, will know from his study of history and the classics that circumstances very much like those he is encountering have occurred from time to time on this earth since the beginning of history. He will avoid the self-indulgent error of seeing himself in a predicament so unprecedented, so unique, as to justify his making an exception to law, custom or morality in favor of himself. The making of such exceptions has been the theme of public life throughout much of our lifetimes. For twenty years, we've been surrounded by gamesmen unable to cope with the wisdom of the ages. They make exceptions to law and custom in favor of themselves because they choose to view ordinary dilemmas as unprecedented crises.
Author: James B. Stockdale

Quote: I’m sure the driver was a great guy and all he wanted was to drive me to my hotel—but he was a complete stranger to me and the truth is that being vigilant isn’t a part-time job, it’s not about being nice to people, it’s about reality. I made a terrible mistake once, believing the monsters that want to hurt us are easily labeled and identified, rather than walking and hiding amongst us. That’s my reality.
Author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

Quote: An army of sheep led by a lion is better than an army of lions led by a sheep.
Author: Alexander the Great

Quote: Africa must remain on the path of democracy. But democracy MUST also remain about the PEOPLE, not about power
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: I wander this path,So lost and yet so free.I have fallen so many times.My heart knows what I want,And yet, something holds me back,A demon that lusts over pointless endeavours.This path is a battlefield.One man will fall,One man will stand,A cycle till the end of my time.My heart’s main fear that it will lose,And so, I lose and I lose.My heart, so insecure,My demon, oh, so confident.Stop.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: We all have our demons, it is not anyone else's duty to validate them.
Author: Sara Secora

Quote: How often does a man ruin his disciples by remaining always with them! When men are once trained, it is essential that their leader leave them, for without his absence they cannot develop themselves. Plants always remain small under a big tree.
Author: Swami Vivekananda

Quote: Products are made in the factory, but brands are made in the mind
Author: walder landorm

Quote: Some will, some won't. Look for the ones who will.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: I am ready to burn up but not ready to rust down.
Author: Manoj Arora, Dream On

Quote: Do good and inspire others to do good
Author: Bhupendra Pratap Singh

Quote: We have to expect disappointments, trouble, losses and hurts as an inevitable part of life. It is vital to repeat to ourselves the most important and comforting words of all time: THIS, TOO, SHALL PASS AWAY!
Author: Donald Pillai

Quote: Every morning, whether I've slept or not, whether I've made it through the day without crying or given in and sobbed in the shower, where no one can hear me― the sun comes up, and I make my choice.
Author: Robin York, Deeper

Quote: If you want to attain some heights in your life, you have to walk every minute.
Author: Prakhar Srivastav

Quote: I can share my dreams, and even encourage you along the way, but you have to have your own dreams. You have to want for something, and work towards it. Don't give up in when you feel overwhelmed, undeserving or unprepared. He has given you the gift(s) you will need. If you remember that, fear will have no place to reside.
Author: J'son M. Lee

Quote: Your men will not take the hill if you're simply yelling commands from the safety of the rear.
Author: Noel DeJesus

Quote: Life is like a game, once your piece is on the board there is no leaving until you have finished. It does not matter how you finished just that you pass the line...
Author: Samuel Train

Quote: What I can do, I will do. What I can't do, I will surrender to the one that can.
Author: E'yen A. Gardner

Quote: Self-preservation isn't worth it if you can't live with the self you're preserving.
Author: David Levithan, Every Day

Quote: You don't have to make it big, but you do have to make a big impact.
Author: Jamie McCall, Living the High Life Without Drinking the Champagne

Quote: LB Living Better... the only mistake is not to begin.
Author: LB Living Better

Quote: Feel the pain. Feel the pleasure. As long as I’m living, I will enjoy every experience that I can. Happiness, glee, passion, peace, fear, pain, I want to feel it all, good or bad. I want to live, not in monotony, in utter craziness. I’m living not dying.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: I don't judge a person by the place he or she is. I'm more interested in where that person is going, and the steps they are taking to get there.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

Quote: There’s no better way to serve and nourish the magnificence in another person than to simply listen to them openheartedly and without judgment.
Author: Henry Kimsey-House, Co-Active Leadership: Five Ways to Lead

Quote: If you are not willing to give a less experienced qualified professional a chance, don't complain you are charged double for a job worth half.
Author: Mark W. Boyer

Quote: I don't consider those competitions fair where judges get to decide the winner, because selected judges quite often are not worthy or qualified enough to make the right decision.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If you are a winner by the judgements of few judges and not by your performance, you are not a real winner.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Photography is the story I fail to put into words.
Author: Destin Sparks

Quote: Faith and Hope are spiritual graces from God; therefore, to look at a situation and to say that ‘it is hopeless’; or to look at one’s self, and to say that ‘I am hopeless’, is closing the door in the face of God.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: In life, we have no control over the storms that we encounter. It’s normal to feel devastated and sad, but to continue being sad is already our choice.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: I realized that just because “I can’t,” doesn’t mean “I shouldn’t.
Author: Kcat Yarza

Quote: The symbol of peace cannot be daunted by evil. I smile to show the pressure of heroes and to trick the fear inside of me.
Author: Kouhei Horikoshi

Quote: Rarely has a new player on the game captured so much attention so fast.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Heroes may die but they doesn't get tired.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Heroes are higher than their vulnerability that is why they are heroes.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: As a general man I tried watching movies, playing sports, going to picnics and other entertainments but I still got bored, then I tried heroism and now I am hero, and I never get bored.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: For happiness don't pursue satisfaction, but pursue heroism.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Finishing work makes you a man, finishing difficult work makes you a hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: One courageous act can make you a hero but frequent courageous acts will keep you a hero.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You have worked too long in the life, now its time for heroism.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: My friends wanted their names in the list of employees of some company, well I wanted my name in the list of the heroes of the world.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: If I have to dangle myself in the water like a freaking minnow, I will. Those people don't deserve this type of treatment. ~Willow Mosby (Exposing ELE)
Author: Rebecca Gober, Exposing ELE

Quote: One sure way to kill a dream, is to suffocate it with worry.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Its not workload that kills you, its worry that kills you.
Author: Vijay Dhameliya

Quote: Your mission: May you continue to shine no matter the storms you have been through.
Author: Karen Salmansohn

Quote: Somehow We all are Burning Ourselves as We Constantly Thinking About Our Past.
Author: Bunny Naidu

Quote: Say what is true, although it may be bitter and displeasing to people
Author: Anonymous

Quote: You should never be satisfied with a little if you are capable of using and enjoying more.
Author: Abhishek  Kumar, The Richest Engineer

Quote: [But] you can't find love if you're not willing to lose it. You can't find happiness if you're not willing to risk being sad. And you can't find the love of your life without risking breaking your heart.....drive in.
Author: Kunal Nayyar, Yes, My Accent Is Real: and Some Other Things I Haven't Told You

Quote: We have minds that are equipped for certainty, linearity and short-term decisions, that must instead make long-term decisions in a non-linear, probabilistic world.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: If you like tiger cubs,you got to get into the den!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: To take risk and fail is not a failure. Real failure is to fear taking any risk
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: Leaders know that the fruit of life is out on a limb.
Author: Orrin Woodward

Quote: It's important to appreciate the impact ofknowledge in our lives, and that of our parentsin getting us educated. However in today'sworld, if someone have not been to school, thatmeans he must have been educated.
Author: victor adeagbo

Quote: True happiness that stands the taste of time comes by recognizing and appreciating what we do possess.
Author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

Quote: BlessBacks: Souvenirs for those who express their gratitude to their illuminators.
Author: Julie Saffrin

Quote: A true leader sticks up for his followers.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: Lincoln did not admire those who think it is a mark of sophistication to sneer at patriotism. He believed that God has a will for a country and that is honest man should rejoice in the effort to try to remake his country after the Divine pattern, insofar as that pattern is revealed to him.
Author: Elton Trueblood, Abraham Lincoln: Lessons in Spiritual Leadership

Quote: As you meet the needs of others, you will never lack anything.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Your true self is enough. There is no need to be better than everyone else around you to be happy. True happiness comes when you are in harmony with yourself and no longer feel the need to one-up other people. Make healthy decisions, pursue your passions, and live your truth, do it all for you.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: There is much more joy in being a survivor than been a quitter.
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

Quote: To some life is a complaint, to some it is a competition and to some it is a conquest.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Surfing and Life hold parallels.
Author: Elizabeth Salalmanca-Brosig

Quote: Do life soaring
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: The king should act with promptitude, for without promptitude of action mere destiny never accomplishes the objects cherished by kings. The question for whether it is the king that makes the age or the age that makes the king, the king should entertain no doubt. It is the king that makes the age.
Author: Meera Uberoi, Leadership Secrets From The Mahabharata

Quote: Set your goals high, and don’t stop till you get there.
Author: Bo Jackson

Quote: Peace is possible for dead bodies, living bodies can not expect peace on the way to the victory.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: The sweetest victory is that won when everyone counted you out because they believe you can not make it.
Author: N. K. David

Quote: The roller coaster is my life; Life is a fast, dizzying game. Life is a parachute jump; it's taking chances; falling over and getting up again. It's mountaineering; it's wanting to get to the very top of yourself and to feel angry and dissatisfied when you don't manage it.But if we are talking in terms of making progress in life, we must understand that "good enough" is very different from the "Best.
Author: Paulo Coelho

Quote: Leaders can hold onto busyness like a weapon of protection.
Author: Angela Lynne Craig, Pivot Leadership: Small Steps...Big Change

Quote: God is alive in each one of us. We just need to bend our knees, hold our hands together and open our hearts to Him.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Prejudice is a belief born from a shortcut to thinking
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: So many people die with their dreams in their hands.
Author: Alex Rogers, I'm Only Human After All

Quote: Not every smile is genuine some are just the bared fangs of wolves about to eat you - rjs
Author: rassool jibraeel snyman

Quote: Always see things through till the end, miracles happen right before your about to give up!!
Author: Essa Alam

Quote: You will never be lonely if you love yourself enough
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: the deficiency of the negro race is not as a result of the deluge number of bad leaders;rather, its is an outcome of the shortage of young negro intellect ready to lead a revolutionary africa.
Author: victor adeagbo

Quote: African leaders should not turn the continent into a giant collector of donations and loans from wealthy nations—they must find other plausible means to help established their economic security so as to minimize poverty. This incoherent blunder on the mainland must be scrutinized.
Author: Duop Chak Wuol

Quote: Always follow your passion to be successful.
Author: Harry S. Vested Jr.

Quote: Sometimes it’s OK to go with the flow; you need not to be a winner, diverse, superior, special EVERYTIME.
Author: Aman Jassal, Rainbow - the shades of love

Quote: It is not the size of a person in the fight, but the size of the fight in a person is what determines victory.
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

Quote: Leadership reveals itself in the big moments, but is forged in the small. It is the exponential and compounding product of our many incremental behaviors and actions; all of which arise out of our choices in values, beliefs & emotions. Choices all. Not a one is thrust upon us.
Author: Christopher Babson, Breakout Presentations: Wow! People in Business and Life

Quote: Sometimes, life gets overwhelming. You feel pestered, overworked and unappreciated. Your vision becomes blurred and your dreams suddenly feel too far from reach. You feel wasted, even though you know you’ve come a long way. At that point, ALL YOU NEED TO DO is calm down, close your eyes and remember why you started out in the first place. You really just need to look within yourself to find your purpose again.
Author: King Samuel Benson

Quote: What is troubling is not just being average but settling for it. Everyone knows that average-ness is, for most of us, our fate. And in certain matters—looks, money, tennis—we would do well to accept this. But in your surgeon, your child's pediatrician, your police department, your local high school? When the stakes are our lives and the lives of our children, we want no one to settle for average.
Author: Atul Gawande

Quote: Give up the idea that by ruling over others you can do any good to them. But you can do just as much as you can in the case of the plant: you can supply the growing seed with the materials for the making up of its body, bringing to it the earth, the water, the air, that it wants. It will take all that it wants by its own nature, it will assimilate and grow by its own nature.
Author: Swami Vivekananda, The Complete Works of Swami Vivekananda: v. 3

Quote: I have never seen a heavyweight champion apologize for a knockout
Author: Jock J. Davis

Quote: start something, with a knowledge to end it.
Author: Krishna Sagar

Quote: Believing in yourself truly means trusting your capability to think, learn, do, and deliver better results. In that case, it doesn’t matter where you’re starting from. As you keep going, you’re developing into a better person.
Author: SuccessCoach Nilesh, Go for Success: Be a Champion by 6 Effective Steps

Quote: An effective leader is also an effective listener.
Author: Artika Tyner

Quote: The leader is always learning new things and gaining new insights.
Author: Artika Tyner

Quote: A few of the managers we spoke with for this book worried that the tour of duty framework might give employees "permission" to leave. But permission is not yours to give or to withhold, and believing you have that power is simply a self-deception that leads to a dishonest relationship with your employees. Employees don't need your permission to switch companies, and if you try to assert that right, they'll simply make their move behind your back.
Author: Reid Hoffman, The Alliance: Managing Talent in the Networked Age

Quote: Delegation is not a binary thing. There are shades of grey between a dictatorship and an anarchy.
Author: Jurgen Appelo, #Workout: Games, Tools & Practices to Engage People, Improve Work, and Delight Clients

Quote: To foster a solution mindset, tell employees that you are not interested in who or what caused the problem. You are only interested in hearing how we plan to go beyond the problem.
Author: Jag Randhawa, The Bright Idea Box: A Proven System to Drive Employee Engagement and Innovation

Quote: Leadership is the influence of a person(s) on another person(s) which guides their efforts in a specific direction, with more purpose, clarity, and unity than they would have held on their own.
Author: Michael A. Wood Jr.

Quote: It can be dangerous to be right at the outset. Managers in some LCD-first companies interpreted the pivot point as an unconditional endorsement of everything they had been doing. As a result, they failed to recognize the need to rethink some details of their technology, such as the importance of color displays, and their complacency helped former plasma companies pull ahead.
Author: J. P. Eggers

Quote: Increasingly, management’s role is not to organize work, but to direct passion and purpose.
Author: Greg Satell

Quote: Forcing your employees to follow required steps only prevents customer dissatisfaction. If your goal is truly to satisfy, to create advocates, then the step-by-step approach alone cannot get you there. Instead, you must select employees who have the talent to listen and to teach, and then you must focus them toward simple emotional outcomes like partnership and advice....Identify a person's strenths. Define outcomes that play to those strengths. Find a way to count, rate or rank those outcomes. And then let the person run.
Author: Marcus Buckingham

Quote: People. Products. Profits. In that order.
Author: Ken  Goldstein

Quote: Define excellence vividly, quantitatively. Paint a picture for your most talented employees of what excellence looks like. Keep everyone pushing and pushing toward the right-hand edge of the bell curve.
Author: Marcus Buckingham

Quote: True leadership is caring about the people who don’t care about things you care about.
Author: Richie Norton

Quote: The care of your body is one of the most important investments you can make. What good are expensive clothes, cars, and clutter when your body is sick from neglect? No purchase is worth more than the value of your wellness. Think about your priorities. Is an hour of browsing social media worth more than an hour of strolling peacefully through nature? Is having an unhealthy meal out worth more than eating a healthy home cooked meal? You choose what abuse and neglect to your body is worth it. You can choose to think that love for your life and your well being are worth more than anything else.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: When deciding whether or not to go for your dream, remember that you don't need a bigger net, you just need bigger wings.
Author: Sheri   Fink

Quote: Socialists are convinced socialism will work if it's only managed by the right people. It's one of the reasons so many socialist countries wind up led by dictators. Socialist leaders inevitably become convinced that only they can manage the state properly, so it would be folly, they reason, to give up their hard-won power. That's how socialism always seems to wind up with people like Stalin, Hitler, Pol Pot and Chairman Mao in charge.
Author: Tom    King

Quote: Martial Arts does not teach you how to fight, it teaches you why not to.
Author: Lakshya Bharadwaj

Quote: The more you practice the better you'll be, the harder you train the great in you they'll see.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: Basketball is not just a game its a way of living if you apply it to everyday life.
Author: Alcurtis Turner

Quote: My favorite passage from the book: "Sometimes we motivate ourselves by thinking of what we want to become. Sometimes we motivate ourselves by thinking about who we don't ever want to be again. Everything we do is part of who we are. How we choose to use those memories, to motivate or to submit is entirely up to us.
Author: Shane Niemeyer The Hurt Artist

Quote: Discouraged?As I was driving home from work one day, I stopped to watch a local Little League baseball game that was being played in a park near my home. As I sat down behind the bench on the first-baseline, I asked one of the boys what the score was."We’re behind 14 to nothing,” he answered with a smile.“Really,” I said. “I have to say you don’t look very discouraged.”“Discouraged?” the boy asked with a puzzled look on his face. “Why should we be discouraged? We haven’t been up to bat yet.
Author: Jack Canfield

Quote: Plane Ride - In our sport it is natural and necessary to set up goals to inspire us. We all want to achieve the next level, the break-thru performance. What we (all of us) must not forget is that the journey to these goals is the best part. The daily process of obtaining success takes up the majority of our time and effort throughout our lives. Remember to appreciate what you’ve done in the past and what you are doing in the present on your way to higher goals. This will allow you to always strive for something more without missing out on the fact that your path to success is as much a starting point as it is a finish line.
Author: Matthew Alan

Quote: Carry your wings of hope so high in the sky that there is no room left for disappointments.
Author: Heenashree Khandelwal

Quote: Leadership is the art of disappointing people at a rate they can stand.
Author: John Ortberg, Who Is This Man?: The Unpredictable Impact of the Inescapable Jesus

Quote: The right questions help you discover the right answers. Be careful what questions you are asking yourself…
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: How can I find a way to overcome this?’ is a much better question than ‘Why is my life so bad?’It’s the questions we ask ourselves that will determine how we live our life.
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: It’s not the quality of the answers that changes our lives, it’s the quality of the question
Author: Steven Aitchison

Quote: Pay attention! At all moments of the day you are either leading or being led.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: Your greatest area of leadership often comes out of your greatest area of pain and weakness.
Author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

Quote: It is only through dialogue, deep listening, and passionate disagreement that we find our way to something larger than a singular and isolated point of view.
Author: Henry Kimsey-House, Co-Active Leadership: Five Ways to Lead

Quote: He could follow someone’s mind around, and get where it was going before the other fellow knew where it was going.
Author: Robert A. Caro, Master of the Senate

Quote: Then I resolved that I would go back out there and somehow cope with the situation, despite the fact that I lacked a strategy and was frightened to the pit of my being.
Author: William Styron, Sophie's Choice

Quote: Overwork can cause a break down.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: As a king can wear a crown, a crown can also weary a king.
Author: Anthony Liccione

Quote: I'm proud of myself So it's okay if you're ashamed of me.I'm happy with what I've accomplished So it's okay if you're not impressed by me.I've done what many can't So it's okay if you don't believe in me.I love the things I compileSo it's okay if you think I cramp your style.I've done it by myself But I'll help you should you ever call on me.
Author: Neha Yazmin

Quote: Don't waste any of your precious time or energy on negativity. There's no time for that nonsense.
Author: Tanya Masse

Quote: This is your time, right now, to get up and start moving. With motivation floating in the air around you, take a chance at your dreams. This moment may never come again. This motivation may be lost. This might be the last chance you have to change your life. Are you going to waste this chance? Are you willing to give up your dreams out of fear? Time is not going to stop. Time will keep leaving until, before you know it, your life is gone. This life is the only chance you get, this life will never restart. This is it. Is the way you are living right now worth your life?
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Explore fully the sacred-moment.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

Quote: Life is contentment.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Life is contentment not a competition.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: The secret to living a strong life is right in front of you, calling to you every day. It can be found in your emotional reaction to specific moments in your life.
Author: Marcus Buckingham, Find Your Strongest Life: What the Happiest and Most Successful Women Do Differently

Quote: Every flower can flourish with fertile soil and water.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Don't wait until people are dead to give them flowers.
Author: Sean Covey, The 7 Habits of Highly Effective Teens: The Ultimate Teenage Success Guide

Quote: Washington not only fit the bill physically, he was also almost perfect psychologically, so comfortable with his superiority that he felt no need to explain himself. (As a young man during the French and Indian war he had been more outspoken, but he learned from experience to allow his sheer presence to speak for itself.) While less confident men blathered on, he remained silent, thereby making himself a vessel into which admirers for their fondest convictions, becoming a kind of receptacle for diverse aspirations that magically came together in one man.
Author: Joseph J. Ellis, Revolutionary Summer: The Birth of American Independence

Quote: From her character in the HBO miniseries: "The art of politics is the art of applying the seat of the britches to the seat of the chair.
Author: Abigail Adams

Quote: Good units walk a thin line between indiscipline and ineffectiveness. Ignore the rules too often and you’ve got a mob, but enforce the rules too strictly and you’ve got a herd.
Author: Henry V. O'Neil, Orphan Brigade

Quote: The Shah "had traveled to Europe and had been fascinated by the march of progress he observed there. But, once back in Terhan, this fascination had not been translated into sustained Persian modernization, but rather dissipated in the Shah's intense but short-lived passion for the latest novelties. "He is continually taking up and pushing some new scheme or invention which, when the caprice has been gratified, is neglected or allowed to expire".
Author: Charles Emmerson, 1913: In Search of the World Before the Great War

Quote: If leadership is the spinal cord of success then discipline is its lumbar vertebrae.
Author: Noel DeJesus, 44 Days of Leadership

Quote: The assistant commander at any post is supposed to be a ruthless son of a bitch.
Author: Tom Clancy, The Cardinal of the Kremlin

Quote: Under a bad leadership Serbs are capable of committing the most terrible atrocities; under good leaders we can do great deeds. It's like a field - if it's not cared for, the weeds will take over. But if you tend it, water and feed the seeds, you will read a bountiful harvest. Serbs are lazy, we lack discipline and have no capacity for self-criticism." With Their Backs to the World
Author: Åsne Seierstad

Quote: If you put your best foot forward and if you overcome your fears, you will surely be able to attain the heights of success
Author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

Quote: We all have dreams; things we want to achieve, to have or to own, to be or to see.
Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

Quote: You are all so good and I wish I were better. Now get out of here because I want to be where you are.
Author: Amy Poehler

Quote: Presenting leadership as a list of carefully defined qualities (like strategic, analytical, and performance-oriented) no longer holds. Instead, true leadership stems from individuality that is honestly and sometimes imperfectly expressed.... Leaders should strive for authenticity over perfection.
Author: Sheryl Sandberg, Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

Quote: No greater place to be than in a leadership position to lead young minds to prosperity
Author: Darrius Garrett

Quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
Author: Babe Ruth

Quote: First gain the victory and then make the best use of it you can.
Author: Horatio Nelson

Quote: Strength lies not in defence but in attack.
Author: Marquis de Acerba

Quote: Live for something rather than die for nothing.
Author: George S. Patton Jr.

Quote: Victory is a thing of the will.
Author: Marshal Foch

Quote: The organization of supplies, the command of men, anything in any way constructive requires more than intellect; it requires energy and drive and an unrelenting will to serve the cause, regardless of one's personal interests.
Author: Erwin Rommel, The Rommel Papers

Quote: If you live the same day, week, or year that you have always lived, your life will never get any better. Let yourself actually live. Fix what is broken in your life. Explore what you have left unexplored. Find the discomfort of the new and embrace it. Enjoy all that life has to offer.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Take my hand, hold on tight, and together we will jump. Jump out of the darkness and into the blinding light. I don’t know what struggle we will experience out there but I believe it is better than struggling here in the darkness. Together let’s change our lives. Let us take risks to create a better life. I believe.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Don't just DO something. Stand there! (and get perspective and understanding)
Author: Scott J. Simmerman Ph.D.

Quote: He was the first prime minister in a long time who did not have a son or a son-in-law in business or real estate
Author: Sanjaya Baru, The Accidental Prime Minister

Quote: TAKE' nothing for granted..The 'GIVE' may be expensive!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: No matter how long we wait, God’s promise shall be fulfilled.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: Making excuses as to why you cannot do something based on what you don't have, or what hasn't happened yet, only serves to hold you back even further. WAIT FOR NOTHING & NO-ONE.
Author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

Quote: A marriage is about how clever you deal with it, not about pushing it away when hurricanes come crashing down. You've to be strong and find a way to not let the world tear your marriage apart.
Author: Diyar Harraz, After the Storm

Quote: Nothing in life that is of value comes easy. If good things came easily then the value would be diminished. When we have a vested interest, when we give everything we have, then, and only then are those good times valuable.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: We live in a society that only embraces success and that is who we are. It takes a great deal of inner strength to deal with the time commitment of coaching when very little seems to be accomplished.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Coaching is like riding a roller coaster with many ups and downs. The true test is weathering the storm. The average length of time anywhere in America that a man is a head high school football coach is three years.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: It is important for coaches to mentor young people toward those things that are most important in life and aid them in creating their own order of priorities to live by.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: I truly believe that success is determined not on Friday nights during games but rather in practice away from the lights and glimmer where coaches and players only have each other, their sweat, their discipline and their loyalty to each other. It is at practice where the boys of America become men through hard work, dedication and perseverance.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: The development of the “We Believe” philosophy must be real and not cosmetic. Everyone must buy in and understand that it is not a motivational tool, but rather something very personal that should be lived and that all must believe in order for true success to be achieved.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: I think we had to hit rock-bottom in all facets of the program before we could ever start moving in a positive direction.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: If you are not a part of the solution then you must be part of the problem. I am done with problems here!
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: I will not promise boys positions, I will not promise any of you football success, I will demand discipline, character, respect, and work ethic throughout the program. If I succeed in getting people to believe then success will follow.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: The great cancer facing all of us during this ‘new millennium’ is entitlement.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: •	“…it is easy to read that this game is more than just a game, it is a culmination of a group of coaches and boys on a mission to not just experience, but rather to achieve something that only they believe is truly possible.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Before success can truly become routine, there must be that transition from that wanting/hoping to have success toward honestly knowing you can earn success with your talents and work ethic.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: To achieve any group goal, individuals must work to improve themselves as a means to improve the group.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: I teach our young men that respect is earned each day on the practice field, in the classroom, and how each young man lives his life.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: The third year at a school for any head coach is the most important year for the program they are attempting to develop.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: A team goal requires a team effort.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Coaches must take calculated risks all the time. One thing is to talk about what you plan to do and another is to prepare and then execute a plan toward change.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: As of today, you do anything that I feel is disrespecting our program in any way, you are gone! From this day forward, everyone will be at practice in uniform as we will either build this program into something or we will destroy it!
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: The unknown can be a great tool.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: It is more likely that coaches have players go down in games they are losing than games they are winning.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: America is a country built on unity, hard work and diligent pursuit of personal goals leading to collective success.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Once an athlete feels his coach does not believe in him resentment develops and everyone loses at that point.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: This is truly a rags to riches story which doesn’t happen often, but it does happen. Hope is offered to those who face similar challenges that in this great Country dreams can be realized when work ethic and passion lead the way.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: The coaches will offer a direction, a plan, routine, discipline and the players must develop the desire to work together accepting their roles as they learn in preparation for the season.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: The youth of America need routine, repetition toward excellence, a sound but not punishing discipline, and the opportunity to make mistakes without the feeling of failure.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Every time our great Country has been critically challenged either by dictators or terrorists, we as a Country have put aside our personal agendas and focused on doing what we need to do to win when threatened.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: •	I have experienced the youth of Generation X, Y and currently Z. Teenage boys have changed in many ways over the years. Yet still they are quite similar to the boys I first coached in 1980 at a high school in Ohio.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: we first need to get boys out for football and then the plan will gradually come into play
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: It is so easy to judge those around us and decide their value without knowing who they really are or what they truly represent.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Being fired is part of the risk when anyone plans to take on the responsibility as a head coach.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Sports programs are an important part of young people’s lives but should never over-shadow the true purpose of high school and that is to earn a diploma. So often today sports have become more important than an education. This must be remedied because the true focus must always be toward the student’s academic development.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Winners accept responsibility because acceptance of responsibility nullifies excuses.
Author: George M.   Gilbert, Team Of One: We Believe

Quote: Self belief, Wise choice and Karma are the three main ingredients of Winners.
Author: Sandeep Kakkar

Quote: Life is the gift of being able to do something, so use it
Author: Ean Rodriguez

Quote: Most of us want to be authentic. Yet, we are not who we think we are. We are made up of a rich array of facets and possibilities, many of which we ignore because we label them as “bad”. We create a cardboard cutout image of ourselves to look good to others. The discord between who we are and the image we have to live up to slowly kills our aliveness. When we suppress parts of ourselves, it lowers our mojo, sense of fulfillment, leadership effectiveness and impact in the workplace.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: If we try to emulate the leadership style of others we perceive as successful, we end up being second-rate versions of someone else.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: Authentic leadership is about leading from the core of who we are to inspire each of us to our best contribution toward a shared mission.
Author: Henna Inam, Wired for Authenticity: Seven Practices to Inspire, Adapt, & Lead

Quote: Let's Not Just Be Heroes! Let's Be Heroes Who Lead!
Author: Daniel Wetta

Quote: You will never Grow until you come out of your Comfort Zone and Try some new Things.......
Author: Amarnath Kamaraj

Quote: when i started i had to start no excuses and even without knowing what i am gonna to do just had to do "something" . this fire is needed to do any work otherwise people exist nd die .
Author: jagvir ji

Quote: A happy birthday is measured not in the amount of gifts one gets, but in the amount love one receives.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: And a young prince must be prudent like that,giving freely while his father livesso that afterwards, in age when fighting startssteadfast companions will stand by himand hold the line.
Author: Seamus Heaney, Beowulf

Quote: Human Dignity has five characteristics : A playful curiosity,a capacity for dreams, a sense of humor to achieve and correct those dreams, a certain flexibility and spontaenity of behavior, a capacity to fight for and save those dreams !
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: SILENCE does not always mean 'NEUTRALITY'! Sometimes, it may mean 'consenting' to a wrong, sometimes it may mean 'condoning' a mistake and sometimes it may mean giving space to the wrong doer....SOMETIMES, we need to get up and FIGHT!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: It's simpler to live in a mindset of moving forward, than in a mindset of procrastination!
Author: John Di Lemme

Quote: Today is a special day that will go by very fast, so let’s take every second to make the most out of every moment.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: To nourish a tree you must get to the roots, the same is true if you must uproot it.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: Sometimes you have to realise that things will never change if you don’t make a change yourself, and sometimes, you need to realise that it only happened so that you could learn something.
Author: Charlotte Eriksson, Empty Roads & Broken Bottles; in search for The Great Perhaps

Quote: Time flows like memories on the shores of the past.
Author: Michael Joseph Murano, Age of the Seer

Quote: All the time and effort put into networking can be all for naught if there is no follow-through. The same goes for sales. And leadership. And … well, everything.
Author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

Quote: If your Idea cannot CHANGE the INDUSTRY, you have added no VALUE
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: Balance is not something you find, it's something you create
Author: Jana Kingsford, UNJUGGLED: Lessons From a Decade of Blending Business, Babies, Balance and Big Dreams

Quote: An applause is not just the recognition of good performance, but its proof of being different than the crowd.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: He had to do so many things and make each appear as though it were the only thing he had to do. He had to compartmentalize everything, when on one task to pretend that the others didn't exist.
Author: Tom Clancy, Debt of Honor

Quote: Not every President is a great speaker. Not every President is a great thinker. But in the modern era, every single President is a master of one thing: eye contact.
Author: Brad Meltzer, The Inner Circle

Quote: The loneliness of command had made Eisenhower emotionally self-sufficient.
Author: Jean Edward Smith, Eisenhower in War and Peace

Quote: Life is the greatest chance that has been given to all of us. So how do you choose to live your life? You’ve got a pen. Write it down.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Bury your enemies with success.
Author: Moosa Rahat

Quote: When you allow yourself the abilityto challenge your doubts, to embraceyour deepest and darkest fears,that is when you learn how to bea healer and hero in your own life story~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: An easy life does not make men, nor does it build nations. Challenges make men, and it is these men who build nations.
Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Flashes of Thought

Quote: Challenges in life always seek leaders and leaders seek challenges.
Author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

Quote: The theory that something has to be big to have a significant impact is false.
Author: Angela Lynne Craig, Pivot Leadership: Small Steps...Big Change

Quote: Coachable people seek out those who speak truth to them, even if it is a painful truth, because it protects them and it makes them a better person and leader.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer

Quote: Whether a chief executive ofﬁcer (CEO) is applying the practices to build an organizational vision or an employee is helping a colleague resolve a problem, anyone at any organizational level can leverage leadership practices.
Author: Gary DePaul, Nine Practices of 21st Century Leadership: A Guide for Inspiring Creativity, Innovation, and Engagement

Quote: Effective leaders are good spotters. They are on the lookout forpotential leaders. They have the ability to look beyond other’s deficiencies tosee their possibilities.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Church Planting Landmines

Quote: #Leadership is not how much you can take away from others,it is about how much you can inspire,teach and build others by example ~bns
Author: Bluenscottish

Quote: The fundamental characteristic that enables hidden leadership to bloom is demonstrating integrity.
Author: Scott K. Edinger, The Hidden Leader: Discover and Develop Greatness Within Your Company

Quote: Many of our leadership practices have gone from being tried and true to being tired and tarnished.
Author: Mark      Miller, Chess, Not Checkers: Elevate Your Leadership Game

Quote: One of the landmines that church planters never dodge is the landmineof leadership development. I will never forget the day when I realizedthat there are no such things as 'ready-made leaders'.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Church Planting Landmines

Quote: Having a good definition of spiritual leadership is critical to developmentof leadership cultural throughout your church. You need to know what you areshooting for if you are going to hit the target.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Church Planting Landmines

Quote: When you don’t have time to do your job, that’s a good indication you’re playing the wrong game.
Author: Mark      Miller, Chess, Not Checkers: Elevate Your Leadership Game

Quote: There is nothing worse for a young convert than to be thrust into leadership without mentoring and ongoing coaching because the devil relishes these vulnerable souls.
Author: Gary Rohrmayer, Church Planting Landmines

Quote: Only a person who perceives that all human beings are important can become a great leader.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: 21st century leaders will be growers, not knowers.
Author: Paul Gibbons, The Science of Successful Organizational Change: How Leaders Set Strategy, Change Behavior, and Create an Agile Culture

Quote: What trumps the 'How' of Leadership is the 'Why
Author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders

Quote: Now is the time to reinvent yourself and develop a new plan of action. Now is the time to create new actions and practices that are focused on growth and development in your personal and professional life. Now is the time to unleash your leadership potential and ignite your passion to lead.
Author: Thomas Narofsky

Quote: The best of all leaders is the one who helps people so that eventually they don’t need him.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: I strongly believe that leadership is an art, not a science. I've learned that leadership can be innate or it can be learned. However, I don't believe anyone was truly born to be a great leader. Great leaders are formed over a long period of time through a series of opportunities and experiences. Without opportunities, even the greatest natural leader among us may never become known for great leadership.
Author: Scott H. Dearduff, A Cup of My Coffee: Leadership Lessons from the Battlefield to the Boardroom

Quote: When a leader replaces the value of selfless service with selfish ambition they have officially regressed back into a boss.
Author: Noel DeJesus, 44 Days of Leadership

Quote: There are few second chances when it comes to establishing your leadership legacy.
Author: Scott H. Dearduff, A Cup of My Coffee: Leadership Lessons from the Battlefield to the Boardroom

Quote: Put your name on the mailbox.
Author: Scott H. Dearduff, A Cup of My Coffee: Leadership Lessons from the Battlefield to the Boardroom

Quote: Stay in your lane.
Author: Scott H. Dearduff, A Cup of My Coffee: Leadership Lessons from the Battlefield to the Boardroom

Quote: There is no "one" way to be a perfect leader, but there are a million ways to be a good one.
Author: Mark W. Boyer

Quote: Leaders create a legacy daily.
Author: Steve Gutzler

Quote: There is no better manager than a natural born one.
Author: Rossana Condoleo

Quote: Strong nations are built on SOLID HOMES not big houses
Author: Fela Durotoye

Quote: An actor is just a part of a movie, but director - he is the movie.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Its been enough enjoying now, let's begin achieving.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: I'm all for fighting tyranny and oppression.
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri, Brushstrokes of a Gadfly

Quote: The world is starving for leaders who are not afraid to dismantle the sacred and precious beliefs, which hold us as prisoners of the past.
Author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

Quote: He was responsible for administering an army that lacked time-tested procedures and routinized policies, so every decision became an improvisational act.
Author: Joseph J. Ellis

Quote: Success has NO Rules except ONE..It follows NO rules and most RULES are made on the way!
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: Marriage is not 'I', its 'We'.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: You are asking for an extra hour after you have wasted a day.
Author: gnalluap

Quote: People conceptualize conditioning in different ways," he said. "Some think it's a ladder straight up. Others see plateaus, blockages, ceilings. I see it as a geometric spiraling upward, with each spin of the circle taking you a different distance upward. Some spins may even take you downward, just gathering momentum for the next upswing. Sometimes you will work your fanny off and see very little gain; other times you will amaze yourself and not really know why.
Author: John L. Parker Jr., Once a Runner

Quote: Running a race assigns a point to a sport that often feels very pointless. It's an exuberant payoff to months of tedium. It's a way of crafting an end boss for a particularly cumbersome video game. It's a fun, monstrous reason to keep putting one foot in front of the other. So, do yourself a favor: go build a monster.
Author: Matthew Inman, The Terrible and Wonderful Reasons Why I Run Long Distances

Quote: I always pushed myself. Whenever I felt I needed to stop, I made myself run faster.
Author: Cecelia Ahern, A Place Called Here

Quote: In the era of globalization, everything is interconnected. A problem in one part of the world will definitely impact on other parts of the globe. Such phenomenon is also valid for defense and security context. A conflict in a state will bring implications in its neighboring countries or other countries extended in the same region. Therefore, collaborative efforts in tackling common defense and security problems are essentially required.
Author: Agus Harimurti Yudhoyono

Quote: The New Economy brings the need to tap people’s curiosity, quest for knowledge and understanding, in order to develop a sustainable society.
Author: Miguel Reynolds Brandao, The Sustainable Organisation - a paradigm for a fairer society: Think about sustainability in an age of technological progress and rising inequality

Quote: If you want to do a few small things right, do them yourself. If you want to do great things and make a big impact, learn to delegate.
Author: John C. Maxwell

Quote: Gen. Matthew Ridgeway "intended not to impose his will on his men, but to allow the men under him to find something in themselves that would make them more confident, more purposeful fighting men. It was their confidence in themselves that would make them fight well, he believed, not so much their belief in him. His job was to keep them to find that quality in themselves.
Author: David Halberstam, The Coldest Winter: America and the Korean War

Quote: Just because your pain is understandable, doesn't mean your behavior is acceptable.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: We believe people with Passion CAN change the World for the Better." -Steve Jobs
Author: Steve Jobs

Quote: If you’re always asking what if you made another decision, you will never be happy with the decisions you have made. Every decision in your life has been the right one at the time to allow you to get to this point in your life. The only decisions you can change are your decisions in the future.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Even if one, two, some, or all senses and faculties fail to function, the heart still beats. Even if the eyes are blind, the heart still can see and feel through the love. Even if the ears fail to listen, the heart can still hear the whisperings of love. It is the heart that must be open at all times, to give love and to receive love. All we have to do is listen with our hearts.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Our little actions of love, when put together, can make a big difference.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Our hands will never be too small for helping those who are in need as long we have the heart to care.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Make winning a habit & success will always be yours!
Author: Sujish Kandampully

Quote: Time,Crawling so slowly, numbing our minds,Boredom, lack of ambition, lost.Passion and it speeds along.The fire burns again.Time,Fast and filled.With passion, no matter how fast time flies away,I am content.Alive.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Employment was better than idleness for men, because it kept the enemy guessing.
Author: H.W. Brands, The Man Who Saved the Union: Ulysses Grant in War and Peace

Quote: You win, not by defeating others, but by performing better than before.
Author: Vikrmn, 10 Golden Steps of Life

Quote: When you are not afraid to fail, you will always win.
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

Quote: ...'you have to ask yourself though, who are we to stop a war?’I sigh, wishing that the glittering pinpricks above us were truly stars.
