It was rare to see any due to the endless cloud cover. ‘Who are we not to?’ I say, to no one in particular. If we weren’t willing to try, then what did that say about us? I try to ignore the pessimistic voice eating away at my thoughts. Change could start with a few, but real change needed thousands.
Author: H.J. Stephens, When There's No Tomorrow

Quote: Strong combat leadership is never by committee. Platoon commanders must command, and command in battle isn't based on consensus. It's based on consent. Any leader wields only as much authority and influence as is conferred by the consent of those he leads. The Marines allowed me to be their commander, and they could revoke their permission at any time.
Author: Nathaniel Fick, One Bullet Away: The Making of a Marine Officer

Quote: People respond more to the authority of status, than the authority of truth.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: Being an authority on paper does not immediately grant you authority over a group until it is earned by you and given by them.
Author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

Quote: Certainly, a clear line must be preserved by strict discipline, and on the other hand the men must know that everything is done for them that hard times permit. On the top of that it follows that, among real men, what counts is deeds, not words; and then it comes of itself, when such are the relations between men and their leaders, that instead of opposition there is harmony between them. The leader is merely a clearer expression of the common will and an example of life and death. And there is no science in all this. It is a practical quality, the simple manly commonsense that is native to a sound and vigorous race.
Author: Ernst Jünger, Copse 125: A Chronicle from the Trench Warfare of 1918

Quote: But I knew something that Elena hadn't. That the measure of a true queen didn't lie in her magic. It had more to do with who she was, and what she was willing to give of herself, than it did with the powers she possessed- Charlaina di Heyse
Author: Kimberly Derting, The Offering

Quote: So let me just say this. There are ways. You already know that because, in your life, there have been High Kindness periods and Low Kindness periods, and you know what inclined you toward the former and away from the latter. Education is good; immersing ourselves in a work of art: good; prayer is good; meditation’s good; a frank talk with a dear friend; establishing ourselves in some kind of spiritual tradition — recognizing that there have been countless really smart people before us who have asked these same questions and left behind answers for us. It would be strange and self-defeating to fail to seek out these wise voices from the past--as self-defeating as it would be to attempt to rediscover the principles of physics from scratch or invent a new method of brain surgery without having learned the ones that already exist.
Author: George Saunders

Quote: Do the new, be the change.
Author: Neeraj Vohara

Quote: The knowledge of Evil brings you near to God.
Author: Abhijit Tripathi

Quote: Accept, forgive and forget. Forgive not only the people who hurt us, but also forgive ourselves, accepting whatever is the outcome, then forget the wrongs, learn from them and move on. Holding on to the guilt and pain would just make life miserable for us.
Author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

Quote: Life is too short to waste time waiting for other people's approval on how you live it.
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Quote: In life, never lose hope that you are nearing a dead end, Only when you reach the end of the road you realize a road to its left and to its right.
Author: Mohammed Mushtaq GK

Quote: Everything That Has A Beginning Has An End.
Author: Ibrahim Khidair Ali

Quote: ... we shoved out many hopes and fears into their hands, believing those hands were strong because they had firm handshakes. They failed us, always. There was no way they could not fail us - they were human, and so were we.
Author: Isaac Marion, Warm Bodies

Quote: An innovative idea is special because only a certain few get to have it
Author: Scott E Roy

Quote: Every time you say it is impossible, you shoot yourself in the foot
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

Quote: But with superior morale, with an unwavering, fanatical spirit, everything is possible!
Author: Timur Vermes, Er ist wieder da

Quote: Talking with three people deeply is better than talking with thirty people superficially.
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: The people who ask questions decide the quality of their conversation.
Author: Vikrant Datta

Quote: Run after today, lest you run out of tomorrows.
Author: Ryan Lilly

Quote: Slow down to speed up. Anonymous
Author: Melissa G.  Wilson

Quote: Until we become the change we seek, the change we seek will never come.
Author: Carlos Wallace, Life Is Not Complicated-You Are: Turning Your Biggest Disappointments Into Your Greatest Blessings

Quote: New Beginnings are in order, and you are bound to feel some level of excitement as new chances come your way.
Author: Auliq Ice

Quote: I have started to dislike you because I don’t want to make you my weakness and it can obstructed my destination
Author: Avinash Advani

Quote: I have frequently thought to myself, 'If I can teach my daughter one thing, it will be the love of self unconditionally.' Unconditional love and peace are obtainable, but they are only obtainable if I can learn to move beyond the conditions that I placed on my life. When conditions are placed on my life and on the lives of others, they ensure that I will never experience the depths of love and happiness.
Author: Asa Don Brown

Quote: You don’t have to be dead to leave a legacy.
Author: Onyi Anyado

Quote: Most people have no idea why others do what they do..The whole World from their own little mind decide 'what' it is..Sad when reasonably intelligible people continue to judge & judge..7.2 billion people under the Sun, how many can one please???Therefore....
Author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

Quote: Thriving leaders are the ones surrounded by diverse people from different generations.
Author: Jon Mertz, Activate Leadership: Aspen Truths to Empower Millennial Leaders

Quote: He who would rule must hear and be deaf  see and be blind.
Author: German proverb

Quote: I know I have the body of a weak and feeble woman  but I have the heart and stomach of a King  and of a King of England too.
Author: Elizabeth I

Quote: It is a characteristic of all movements and crusades that the psychopathic element rises to the top.
Author: Robert Lindner

Quote: It is much safer to obey than to rule.
Author: Thomas a Kempis

Quote: It is said that Mr. Gladstone could persuade most people of most things  and himself of anything.
Author: Dean William R. Inge

Quote: It is the characteristic excellence of the strong man that he can bring momentous issues to the fore and make a decision about them. The weak are always forced to decide between alternatives they have not chosen themselves.
Author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

Quote: Nothing is more difficult  and therefore more precious  than to be able to decide.
Author: Napoleon Bonaparte

Quote: There are two levers for moving men - interest and fear.
Author: Napoleon Bonaparte

Quote: To get others to come into our ways of thinking  we must go over to theirs  and it is necessary to follow  in order to lead.
Author: William Hazlitt

Quote: With a good conscience our only sure reward  with history the final judge of our deeds  let us go forth to lead the land we love asking His blessing and His help  but knowing that here on earth God's work must truly be our own.
Author: John F. Kennedy

Quote: Achilles absent  was Achilles still.
Author: Homer

Quote: To lead the people  walk behind them.
Author: Lao-Tzu

Quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles  but today it means getting along with people.
Author: Indira Gandhi

Quote: When you come into the presence of a leader of men  you know that you have come into the presence of fire - that it is best not uncautiously to touch that man - that there is something that makes it dangerous to cross him.
Author: Woodrow Wilson

Quote: I've got to follow them - I am their leader.
Author: Alexandre Ledru-Rollin

Quote: The reward of a general is not a bigger tent - but command.
Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

Quote: A leader may symbolize and express what is best in his people  like Pericles  or what is worst  like Hitler  but he cannot successfully express what is only in his heart and not in theirs.
Author: Charles Yost

Quote: A true leader always keeps an element of surprise up his sleeve  which others cannot grasp but which keeps his public excited and breathless.
Author: Charles de Gaulle

Quote: If I advance  follow me! If I retreat  kill me! If I die  avenge me!
Author: La Rochefoucauld

Quote: If I advance  follow me! If I retreat  cut me down! If I die  avenge me!
Author: Benito Mussolini

Quote: Follow me  if I advance  kill me if I retreat  revenge me if I die!
Author: Ngo Dinh Diem

Quote: A frightened captain makes a frightened crew.
Author: Lister Sinclair

Quote: As for the best leaders  the people do not notice their existence. The next best  the people honour and praise. The next  the people fear  and the next the people hate. When the best leader's work is done  the people say  'we did it ourselves!'
Author: Lao-Tzu

Quote: The slave begins by demanding justice and ends by wanting to wear a crown. He must dominate in his turn.
Author: Albert Camus

Quote: A leader is a dealer in hope.
Author: Napoleon Bonaparte

Quote: To lead means to direct and to exact  and no man dares do either - he might be unpopular. What authority we are given now is a trinity: the grin  the generality  and God (the Word).
Author: Marya Mannes

Quote: Dictators are rulers who always look good until the last ten minutes.
Author: Jan Masaryk

Quote: A chief is a man who assumes responsibility. He says  'I was beaten'  he does not say 'My men were beaten.'
Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

Quote: Every man of action has a strong dose of egotism  pride  hardness and cunning. But all those things will be forgiven him  indeed  they will be regarded as high qualities  if he can make them the means to achieve great ends.
Author: Charles de Gaulle

Quote: Dictators ride to and fro upon tigers from which they dare not dismount.
Author: Hindu proverb

Quote: I have no family. My only responsibility is the welfare of Quebec. I belong to the province.
Author: Maurice Duplessis

Quote: It is better to have a lion at the head of an army of sheep  than a sheep at the head of an army of lions.
Author: Daniel Defoe

Quote: Where there are no tigers  a wildcat is very self-important.
Author: Korean proverb

Quote: 'Ah  John A.  John A.  how I love you! How I wish I could trust you!
Author: Canadian Liberal politician

Quote: I really believe my greatest service is in the many unwise steps I prevent.
Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King

Quote: I have nothing to offer but blood  toil  tears and sweat.
Author: Winston Churchill

Quote: I have never accepted what many people have kindly said  namely that I have inspired the nation. It was the nation and the race dwelling all around the globe that had the lion heart. I had the luck to be called upon to give the roar.
Author: Winston Churchill

Quote: Winston has written four volumes about himself and called it 'World Crisis'.
Author: Arthur Balfour

Quote: Winston Churchill - fifty per cent genius  fifty per cent bloody fool.
Author: Clement Attlee

Quote: If you shoot at a king you must kill him.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: The final test of a leader is that he leaves behind in other men the conviction and the will to carry on.
Author: Walter Lippmann

Quote: In Pierre Elliott Trudeau  Canada has at last produced a political leader worthy of assassination.
Author: Irving Layton

Quote: Every woman's man  and every man's woman.
Author: Julius Caesar

Quote: When we think we lead we most are led.
Author: Lord Byron

Quote: An army of stags led by a lion would be better than an army of lions led by a stag.
Author: Latin proverb

Quote: If the blind lead the blind  both shall fall into the ditch.
Author: Matthew

Quote: Reason and judgment are the qualities of a leader.
Author: Tacitus

Quote: As long as I have a want  I have a reason for living. Satisfaction is death.
Author: George Bernard Shaw

Quote: Where the willingness is great  the difficulties cannot be great.
Author: Niccolo Machiavelli

Quote: We can do whatever we wish to do provided our wish is strong enough. What do you want most to do? That's what I have to keep asking myself  in the face of difficulties.
Author: Katherine Mansfield

Quote: Love makes the wildest spirit tame  and the tamest spirit wild.
Author: Alexis Delp

Quote: Great men undertake great things because they are great  fools  because they think them easy.
Author: Vauvenargues

Quote: We must each find our separate meaning in the persuasion of our days until we meet in the meaning of the world.
Author: Christopher Fry

Quote: Fear  desire  hope still push us on toward the future.
Author: Michel de Montaigne

Quote: It is for the superfluous things of life that men sweat.
Author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Urgent necessity prompts many to do things.
Author: Miguel de Cervantes

Quote: Acting was a way out at first. A way out of not knowing what to do  a way of focusing ambitions. And the ambition wasn't for fame. The ambition was to do an interesting job.
Author: Harrison Ford

Quote: To hear how special and wonderful we are is endlessly enthralling.
Author: Gail Sheehy

Quote: If each of us were to confess his most secret desire  the one that inspires all his plans  all his actions  he would say: "I want to be praised."
Author: E. M. Cioran

Quote: Some people change their ways when they see the light  others when they feel the heat.
Author: Caroline Schoeder

Quote: No leader can be too far ahead of his followers.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quote: As long as I have a want  I have a reason for living. Satisfaction is death.
Author: George Bernard Shaw

Quote: No leader can be too far ahead of his followers.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quote: With faith, we can conquer the mightiest mountain.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: You will never become who you want to be if you keep blaming everyone else for who you are.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Finish the work, otherwise an unfinished work will finish you.
Author: Amit Kalantri

Quote: Lincoln on Grant: "He makes things get. Wherever he is, he makes things move.
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quote: The greatest triumph is victory over all trials.
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: A little knee time first thing in the day keeps you standing all day!
Author: Evinda Lepins

Quote: Look to the past only to find ways to improve your present and future, never to find regrets. Don’t let what has happened in the past limit your life now. Let your past expand your life.
Author: Avina Celeste

Quote: Every teacher are once a student, Every professional are once an amateur, Every rich are once a poor, Every motorist are once a learner, Every friend are once a stranger, Every ex are once a lover, Every today are once a tomorrow, Every emigrate are once a citizen, Every dead are once alive, Every house are once a land, Every super star are once an upcoming, Every winner are once a dreamer and every start always have an end. Stay humble and Positive, afterall life is vanity- Goals Rider
Author: Goals Rider

Quote: Never engage in gossip, it kills your soul, and wounds another’s heart
Author: Steven Aitchison
